title: A Class
comment: Beautiful family environment. Delicious food with excellent customer service skills. A very sophisticated man called "Shazad" who has worked there for long and quite a few who are very respectable, unlike other restaurants who have perves.

title: Awesome food
comment: Excellent service provided by Shezad. The food is awesome. Clean restaurant. Price is reasonable as well.

title: Great little spot
comment: Such a great spot, food is always wonderful and staff are all very kind, professional and helpful, especially Courtney, no complaints from us.

title: The best lunch in a very long time
comment: I came away from the most wonderful lunch today smiling. Having been fortunate to sit in the sunshine on one of two tables outside, and have the most delicious food and warm, friendly service, I felt almost like life was back to normal again. The two course lunch was fabulous. Excellent choices, we shared two starters, the hummus and their fabulous filo pasty cheese filled spring rolls. They were so delicious. We both had vegetarian mousaka, and though not what was expected mentally in our minds, the taste was incredible.

title: Lovely little gem
comment: We chose this based on TA reviews and they were spot on . This is a charming little restaurant on a cute side street by Hampton Court. We sat outside watching the world go by and enjoyed really friendly service and wonderful food. The cheese filo sticks with mint dip were perfect as was the pomegranate margarita.

title: Great food!
comment: Best place in Chingford for a curry, very tasty! - Lovely & friendly service every time we come in - highly recommend

title: Just the medicine
comment: Visited as a family on 11/02 and enjoyed a lovely veggie cooked breakfast served by helpful and welcoming staff.A short walk from Wembley station I recommend a visit and will hopefully revisit in the future.

title: La Perfection!!!
comment: A must do. Dinner only, closed Sunday’s.

title: Delicious authentic food
comment: Offers tasty fusion food that comes in big portions and served by friendly staff. Ordered from here often and never been left disappointed.

title: Best platter ive had
comment: Food was amazing. Tasteful and good portion size. Great value. Everything was delicious. The new go to place with the family

title: Best Wembley restaurant
comment: Absolutely amazing service .. very fast and tasty food there was 12 of us for my mums birthday meal we had the tawa platter which has everything for you to enjoy and they accommodated us very well thank you we will defo be back

title: A lovely experience with the family
comment: Amazing food with such a lovely service. The staff were very friendly and attentive Will defo be coming again.

title: Great food decent price with friendly staff
comment: Food was amazing love taste , nice atmosphere very good service , friendly staff will definitely recommend

title: Great food 👍
comment: So happy I discovered this place. Lovely food, good deals and attentive staff. The chapli kebab is a winner ordered a couple times since my visit too.

title: Top quality restaurant
comment: Food and service were great.

title: Best tadka daal and Chaapli kebabs
comment: Amazing place. Visited it 1st time today and must say impressed by the quality of the food and friendly service. Tried the tadka daal and chapal kebabs, they were really nice. Cant wait to try the lamb karahi next time.

title: Simply the best!
comment: I'm not one to personally write reviews, however the service and food at Mezzet is simpy the best! Ive worked in hospitality all of my life and really value great service.. we always receive the best at Mezzet. Jonas, one of the managers is incredibly charming and always makes us feel special. He's attentive and extremely knowledgeable on the delicious Lebanese dishes which in my opinion are some of the best I've eaten. The quality of the food as well as the portion sizes are great and Mezzet's setting is cosy and attractive. A good sign of a restaurant is when you're thinking of what occasion is coming up, so you can go back there!

title: Always excellent
comment: Love Mezzet. Incredible food (the houmous & mahammara are essentials). Lovely decor. Good service. What more do you need?

title: 5 star
comment: Really enjoyed food and service. Staff are very friendly especially Khan ! Would definitely come again!

title: Varsha J
comment: It was my 3rd visit to the restaurant with my friend who was already a VIP customer to this restaurant for years. Food on the whole was amazing and did not let me down once again. Atmosphere has a cosy Feeling and staffs were very attentive. Best Indian in Chingford for sure and rare to eat amazing Indian food with lots of flavour. The tandooris are highly recommended as well as the curries. I wish they could fo home delivery to Redbridge and I also suggested. Hope the owner/management will consider in future. Thanks for the great service and it’s 5 star for me.

title: Fantastic Service .... Amazing Food
comment: Coming here is always a pleasure. Very friendly staff, always care for every need. The food matches very high standards. Highly recommend!

title: Absolutely fantastic lunch
comment: Absolutely fantastic lunch at The French Table. Incredible food - we both had the beef which was just perfect - and the service was exceptional.

title: Great find
comment: Checked it out after TripAdvisor reviews, parked at ASDA, then two min walk. It is in a community centre and just a small cafe.. lovely host, good breakfast for 4 with coffee and juice for about £25. A nice change.

title: Amazing
comment: I love eating at kulcha.specially the kulchas witb chana they are amazing..service is amazing all friendly..love to go there again and again

title: SUPERBE!⁹
comment: How does one sum up the superb?

title: Real taste of India in London
comment: Came to southall from east London to do shopping. I passed this restaurant to get to another restaurant which unfortunately closed down so me and my daughter decided why not try this place. Omg the food is off the scale loved everything we ordered. The guys working in the restaurant were very welcoming and friendly, service was excellent. I just wish we had this place in East London, next time in southall I will only eat there. Put it this way my daughter is a fussy eater and very rarely eats spicy food and she loved it and wants to go back. Real gem this place is worth every penny. Taste of India on a plate for real!!! Love it so much .

title: Always amazing
comment: We have been going to the one in Hayes at least once every week since they opened and we never had a bad experience. Food is incredible and service is even better. They always ensure you have a very nice experience. They are attentive and you can see that they are passionate about good food and good customer service. Thank you and see you next week ;)

title: Taste of Punjab in Southall
comment: Went there luchtime. Had a really tasty,authentic,Punjabi taste food. we had Kulcha thali which is served with Chana and Dahi. Gobi kulcha was very satisfying. Also saag paneer with Makki di roti was the real deal. We really enjoyed the food. Service was excellent.Friendly staff.

title: One of the best restaurants in London
comment: We always get the tawa for 2 people (£15 each) when we are extremely hunger, and it always delivers. If you like mild tasty North Indian food and the best kebabs, you will love this place. It's a owner run restaurant and hence why the customer service is excellent at this price point. Worth the trip out of London!

title: I can't stop eating here
comment: this place is unique and you wont find a place like this anywhere. staff are friendly and the place is very clean

title: Finger licking good!!
comment: Amazing true Indian food and very courteous staff...all of us loved the food....Fantastic experience!!!

title: Meaty place
comment: Great place for dinner for meat lovers!!! Do take a bit more time as the food is freshly cooked on spot.

title: An excellent service with
comment: An excellent service with delicious food I would recommend to all those who love desi food in great atmosphere served by a friendly staff.

title: Nice place for food
comment: One of the best in the area. Food and service was amazing, highly recommend their Chapli kebab. Cant wait to come back again.

title: Tawa experience
comment: Firstly, great chapli kebabs, food on the tawa tasted fresh and flavoursome...naans were thin and hot, and service was good...

title: Taste of peshwari Wembley
comment: Went for a meal today with my family! Food was amazing and staff were very friendly too! Reasonably priced.... Definately recommend!

title: AMAZING AUTHENTIC PESHWARI FOOD
comment: Oh my god.

title: I've walked wanting to go to Peshawar, and not just for the food
comment: Speechless, the food was beyond anything I've ever tasted, complete authenticity delivered to a high standard.

title: Amazing taste, Real taste of Takhat Bahi Chapli kebab
comment: Exactly same taste you can get in Takhat bahi chapli kebab....

title: *WOW*
comment: Absolutely delicious food, turbot was spectacular, staff lovely , has to be one if my favourite places ever!!!!

title: A taste of France
comment: As we should have been in France we were delighted to find a French restaurant near our hotel. It didn’t disappoint. The kir royal added to the authenticity. We selected starters and main courses from the excellent selection of seafood and fish, and finished with the cheeseboard. Even the bread surpassed expectations. It was all truly delicious and, if we lived locally, we would be regular diners. Toute était très bonne.

title: Fantastic AGAIN
comment: Returned here after being taken here by friends in July and the food was outstanding on both times.. We had Scallops and Monkfish from the specials board, along with friends having moules and foie gras.. Empty plates all around.. A lovely restaurant, glad to see its been full both times we have been.. Their specials menu is almost as large as the menu online, so PLENTY of choice for everyone.. A true 'family' restaurant, with local produce and great variety.. We have actually booked again and will continue to do so.. The owners are visible throughout the evening, stopping to chat even when busy.. A truly outstanding place.. Thank you JP + Kim

title: Love this place
comment: Amazing food and a great experience led by JP. This is my third time here and always a special treat.

title: A fantastic Samba in food, chat, laughter, and music.
comment: Three of us descended on this wonderful eatery on Sunday. We were greeted with smiling warmth by Marta and Ana, and shown to a table of our choice. Since Covid 19, Capricho takes it very seriously and there were sanitisers at the door, with glass shields in place, and social distancing guidelines honoured; you felt very safe. Armed with Jungel, Capirao, and Pornstar Martini cocktails, we made our selection from a varied menu. There was Pica Pau, Gambas Whisky, and chicken and peaches, as starters; all were full of flavour and beautifully presented. For our mains, there were five fish grill; monkfish and prawns on a skewer; and a monkfish, clam, and prawn rice pot: the taste was astounding. This was baptised with a new rose wine, which was light and fruity. We were then joined by Carlos, and we enjoyed the chat. We concluded this culinary delight with ginginha, Beiraos - plus complimentary ones: muito 'brigado Marta and Carlos. As always, the warm and friendly atmosphere, including the chat and laughter, was truly uplifting. Our compliments to their talented chefs, and we'll be back soon. Until then, keep smiling and be happy.

title: Vegetarians catered for
comment: I have been meaning to try this place for a long time, and I wasn't disappointed. Beautiful food with amazing flavours. You have to try this place for yourself.

title: ENJOYABLE
comment: Well worth a visit. Enjoyed the ambience, waitress service was super and very inviting and went the extra mile. Food was very nice. Would go back

title: a "must eat" restaurant
comment: we went there for my wife's birthday, we were made very welcome from the start, service is second to none, food is excellent,cooked to perfection,and they fell over backwards to accommodate my daughter who is lactose intolerant,will be going back

title: Best restaurant in Staines
comment: Shawkat and his team are just amazing, the food is incredible but more importantly the staff are superb, if I could I’d be there 7 days a week!!!

title: WORST RESTAURANT EVER
comment: If there was an option to give a rating of 0 it still wouldn’t be low enough for this ‘restaurant’. We placed an order for sushi and tempura, we then quickly realised that the tempura was fish and we had ordered vegetable being as that we both vegetarians for religious reasons thus we were deeply offended. The manager is shockingly rude telling us a series of lies and ultimately refused to change our order! We are shocked and disappointed by our treatment.

title: Love this place!
comment: Everytime I think about Sushi, I think of Sushi Nara! I love this place! Quality is very consistent, service is great- the employees do know you and always have a smile on their faces- and most times they give you a free sample of sushi. Food is very fresh and I haven't found a better place in the UK. They are also quite innovative - try their 'sandwiches' (sushi triangles coated in tempura).

title: Beautiful food and lovely manager
comment: I have been to this restaurant several times and each one of them food has been delicious and well presented. Beautiful sushi and sashimi.

title: Another great visit
comment: I have now been to Sushi Nara four times in the last two months and each time I am impressed by the quality of the food, fantastic sushi platter, and the soft shell crab is to die for, all washed down with a nice selection of beers / saki

title: Lovely find
comment: Came here for lunch. Service very quick. Food was very good, though I wish I'd gone for the sushi. Next time!

title: Absolutely lovely
comment: Love this restaurant but due to covid doing takeaways. Had a takeaway Sunday lunch...beef and pork belly..simply the best. Plenty of meat, veg, roast potatoes and yummy gravy. Thank you and looking forward to the next takeaway but also looking forward to eating in your great restaurant again when covid is over. Thanks for being there for us. Len and sheena x

title: A festa in food, chat, laughter, and great music.
comment: After the torture of lockdown, Capricho's reopening was simply divine. Firstly, they adhered to the safety guidelines and sanitisers were within easy reach; the tables respected the social distancing parameters, and the staff wore suitable protection. That said, it was great entering their bifolding doors once more and to be greeted with warmth by Cristina, Marta, and Carlos; it was wonderful seeing their smiling faces. We were soon shown to our table of choice. The decor is still welcoming with light-greys and hanging and recessed lighting that gives warmth, yet is bright enough to read the menus. The background music set the atmosphere wonderfully. The three of us relished the happy yet relaxing mood generated by Capricho. Armed with refreshing Jungel, Capirao, and Pornstar cocktails we made our selection from quite a varied menu. Starters: Gambas Whisky, Pica Pau, and Gambas Pimento. Respectively, these were: prawns in a whisky-garlic sauce; cubed tuna with garnish; spicy prawns; all were full of flavour and perfectly prepared and presented. Our mains consisted of five fish; monkfish and prawns on a skewer; and monkfish, clams, and rice pot. Again, they were tasty and devoured in seconds. This culinary perfection was baptised with a chilled Prosecco to toast Capricho's reopening, and it complemented our meal perfectly. We concluded this gastronomic gluttony with Beiraos, black Americano, and a Cappuccino - plus complimentary ones from our gracious hosts - obrigado. My wife, Angela, and I, have now known Marta, Carlos and their splendid team since they first opened, and we seemed to have hit it off really well; they are now more like friends and family, and it's always great catching up with all of them. So, yet again, thanks for the welcome, chat, laughter, perfect service, and smiling friendship. Our compliments to the talented chefs who had worked so hard and successfully on their flavourful concoctions. Until our next invasion, keep healthy, be safe and, above all, be happy. Until then, muito 'brigado and keep smiling.

title: Very very good
comment: If you want good Portugueses ...or just a fantastic food experience!!!

title: It’s good to be back
comment: We enjoyed an early meal here after coming last October due to the rave reviews. A varied and flavourful menu. The service is easy going but attentive and there is such a variety of well sought out dishes, we always struggle to choice. For an authentic Portuguese experience look no further.

title: Nice little place with tasty food
comment: We had a really nice post lockdown meal in here. Service was top notch and food good. Would recommend the lamb that my girlfriend had as was particularly good

title: A regular Hungarian guest
comment: It was the second visit after lockdown.

title: Fantastic restaurant
comment: We’ve visited this restaurant many times now and the food is always fresh and of high quality. A delicious risotto has been added to the menu. My husband loves the steak on the stone. Wine drinkers will love the traditional Portuguese green wine which is very refreshing.

title: Delicious food!
comment: I came here for the first time and loved it. Food was delicious! Great service. I’m gluten intolerant, lots of dishes could be made gluten free, lots of dishes are naturally gluten free anyway. My dietary requirement was taken seriously here so i felt relaxed I ordered the mixed seafood plate and it was so yum!

title: The usual dilemma... where should we eat...
comment: What a great place.. on of my nieces has eaten here before and suggested it... I’m so glad she did! Food was amazing

title: A really nice little restaurant
comment: Really good food in this little restaurant (yes, it isn't big). Be prepared to bring your own alcohol (Co-Op opposite if you forget).

title: So good I don't want anyone else to know about it
comment: We're lucky enough to live 5 minutes' walk from this little gem of a restaurant, so perhaps I'm biased. But even if I didn't live nearby, I'd travel. We've tried most things on the menu and we've haven't come across a dish we don't love yet. The chicken peanut curry, in particular, is outstanding and I have to stop myself ordering it every time we go. And it's bring-your-own booze too. What more could you want? Don't tell a soul.

title: Awesome place!
comment: I’ve been a regular visitor for 6 years & cannot recommend this place highly enough. Food is always top quality, the staff are great (genuinely lovely people!) & I’ve never come away disappointed.

title: Amazing food and nice staff loved it
comment: The food was delicious and the two ladies that served us were really polite and friendly would definitely recommend it

title: We have been eating here for 11 years, still fans!
comment: We started eating at Sush Nara when it was a mini restaurant with only a few stalls and we pearched on the counter to have our meal, looking at the chefs preparing the fish. Then they opened the upper floor and had more tables available and finally now there's a full size restaurant. The food is still spectacular and the menu is even more interesting, as it now includes more Korean dishes, so one can mix it up a bit. They are now licensed and we don't have to bring our own booze with us, as we used to do a few years ago (and no corkage!).

title: Hidden gem
comment: Fabulous sushi / Japanese food really fresh and tasty amazing little place easy to miss as tucked away in side street but definitely worth searching out if your a sushi fan .... not licensed

title: Has it lost some charm??
comment: This is the first time we have visited the new restaurant....

title: Mr & mrs obidare
comment: Henry & lee where excellent hosts, saw to all of our needs me and the mrs will 100% be coming back !

title: Amazing evening
comment: This place was so stunning. Really enjoyed our meal, we ordered rib eye steak and it was cooked to perfection. You don’t get unlimited fries or salad anymore and you only get fries or salad with your steak however the portion sizes were much bigger and definitely enough. The service was great, always asked if we needed anything. Food came very quickly. The only downfall was I ordered a bottle of coke and it was tiny and I wouldn’t dress up as everyone else was in tracksuits as it’s in a hotel but loved everything else.

title: Ozer
comment: Great server great food and helpful. Coming back tomorrow! Thank you ozer you are very helpfully will see you again soon food was lovely

title: Great service from Henry
comment: I ate here for my birthday and Henry made it a very special night. very attentive and made it a fun night.

title: Great service and food
comment: I travel a-lot for business. Pleasantly surprised with the food and service, both were exceptional. Had steak and lobster for dinner and was excellent. Service at breakfast was great. Christina is great!!!

title: An absolute pleasure
comment: Henry and Chris were amazing they made us feel really at home, their service was great and Henry especially kept checking on us asking if we needed anything. To top it off Henry threw in a complimentary dessert for free :) such a pleasure I’ll definitely back soon!

title: Lockdown Nirvana
comment: Best posh burger and chips ever! Cannot wait to order again! As a local it was an easy online book to collect the food. Ready bang on time. Still hot when I got home. Fine dining for lockdown and really looking forward to eating in when I can. Thanks.

title: Friends Express birthday meal
comment: We really enjoyed our Friends Express take away on Saturday for my lockdown birthday meal. The food was hot and delicious (we had the Venison Bourguignon with mash and the Friends Burger) and the delivery was on time (actually a few minutes early). It is the second time we have ordered from Friends Express and both times it has been excellent and good value.

title: Friends Express New Service
comment: Enjoyed great cioking by Chef Harvey Pertolla even during lockdown.

title: Super Takeout
comment: With only takeout available we ordered 2 main meals online. Great quality, punctually delivered and good value. Hopefully reopening soon but will support takeaway till then.

title: Top Quality Food.
comment: One rare places in Harrow that serves really good food, and high quality. Keep up the good work! My whole family loved it. We will be ordering again for sure.

title: Fairytouch123
comment: Nice food and very friendly

title: Sunday brunch
comment: For a birthday celeberation we went back to Friends under its new ownership and were delighted with the experience. Great value for an excellent bruch in a lovely Sunday relaxed atmosphere. Its fabulous to have the old place alive and kicking in Pinner!

title: The complete package!
comment: Been to the restaurant since its re-launch several times (before November lockdown and also once after before hospitality closed its doors again in December) The warm approach from the staff makes you feel right at home in the village of pinner. There is no restaurant like it in the area for good, honest, seasonal British and French cuisine/cookery. After speaking to one of the waitresses i was shocked to hear Harvey the new head chef was only 25! The chef and his team are very talented and there passion for food clearly comes across whether having shakshuka for brunch to monkfish off the ala carte. Both i can personally recommend!! Delicious! I was very pleased to hear they also are doing there takeout option during tier 3/4 cant wait to give it a try soon! We will be visiting again when the hospitality industry is allowed to welcome us back! Until then Merry Christmas to the Friends Restaurant team!

title: Disappointed as used to be so good
comment: This is my 3rd review of Friends in Pinner, however my 1st since under a new chef.

title: Great Christmas Dinner
comment: For the first time we used the delivery service and this was for our Christmas Lunch. I had my reservation about it having always cooked but was pleasantly surprised. The food was well cooked, tasty and there was plenty of it, what a wonderful way to have Christmas dinner and no washing up. Thank you Friends

title: Lovely setting, good friendly
comment: Lovely setting, good friendly service and great fresh tasting food however in my opinion it’s slightly overpriced (we stayed for overnight before departing from Heathrow so it was convenient however)

title: Steak & Lobster
comment: Although the decoration and atmosphere was lovely and very fancy. I didn’t enjoy the food much. Came here about 3x and thought I’d try to enjoy it but I just don’t think it’s the right taste for me. First time eating a steak here and I wasn’t a huge fan. The lobster however was tasty. Staff here were lovely too, served by someone named Alicia.

title: Steak for the masses
comment: If you’re someone who orders well done steak or who’s taste buds are completely trashed then I’m sure this is the place for you. I can’t say I’ve ever had a worse steak in my life for ultimately the same price I would have paid at a very reputable steak house. For those of a more discerning palate stay away!

title: Everything perfect!
comment: Everything was perfect! Food really good and quick. Staff very professional and friendly, especially our server Christina who was very helpful and attentive! She was extremely nice at all times and made sure we were looked after!

title: Delicious option in Staines!
comment: Recently visited Staines to meet local friends for dinner. We were very pleased with the variety in the menu. The sushi was fresh and delicious. The restaurant is large and open and can easily accommodate large groups. We would definitely go back the next time we are around.

title: Nice Asian
comment: Dinner with friends and we really enjoyed. Service was friendly and food was served superfast. Also taste of food was excellent.

title: My favourite sushi restaurant
comment: This is my favourite sushi restaurant.. ever!! It’s delicious, fresh and so reasonably priced.

title: Very friendly people
comment: Spotted whilst running past and went back next night for takeaway. Nice people who have moved across the road from this address to larger restaurant. Was busy for a Wednesday night. Didn’t take long for food and was very tasty. Not cheap but not expensive either. Will use again.

title: Great food at Momo's!!
comment: I loved it ! Possibly the best Japanese restaurant I have ever been to! Amazing food, friendly listen to staff and when you pay the bill,they give you some White Rabbits( milk-flavoured chews from China and my favourite!)! And to think that some people gave it a BAD REVIEW!!! We'll, don't them, because they're just snobs who criticise good food, but if you went to their house and asked them to make you a meal, it would be worse than they've described Café Momo's! I ask you, DON'T LET THEM RUIN IT FOR YOU!!!!!!!! I may be 10 years old, but I know delicious food when I taste it!

title: Two consecutive nights
comment: Went in to try this place whilst on on my own, enjoyed it so returned the next evening with friends, superb food which

title: Absolute gem of a place
comment: This was one of the nicest meals I have had for a long time. Fresh, simple and very very tasty. Shared the fish cakes and prawn summer rolls to start and all amazing and good sized portions to boot. As I’m a pescatarian I asked for the chicken and king prawn pancakes without the chicken. No problem at all and it was filled to bursting with juicy prawns. I could eat it all again today.

title: Disappointing
comment: First visit...and last, sadly.

title: As good as ever
comment: So pleased that this small well established restaurant has survived. Beautiful refurbishment, delightful staff and, of course, splendid food. Having enjoyed dinner we will return for the newly offered brunch. Welcome back!

title: Fine dining and wonderful atmosphere
comment: Wonderful food and intimate atmosphere. The staff are incredibly attentive and the food was a delight. Good choice (including for a vegetarian) and we were delightfully surprised with snacks and taster dishes in between the mains.

title: Loverly Food
comment: Had really loverly food here fine dining was fantastic. Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. We were asked if we had any dietary requirements i.e. allergies which I thought was very good. My only letdown was the Mojito unfortunately it had no brown sugar in it the lemonade or soda water was flat and there wasn’t enough ice in my opinion. The Chefs canapés were delightful and the pallets cleanser was delicious. The food and atmosphere was brilliant I will be going back and I would recommend you try Friends at least once.

title: Breakfast of Kings!
comment: We've been to Friends a few times over the years and have always had a fantastic meal. The restaurant only reopened a month ago (after Covid lockdown) and they took the chance to do a subtle but elegant refurb in the meantime. Still the same cosy feel, but fresher and modern. They also have a new Head Chef. I was looking for somewhere for breakfast and to my surprise found that Friends is now open for breakfast and have a fantastic menu. I opted for the Shaksuka (spicy and aromatic, beautifully runny eggs, I'm still thinking of it now) and my husband had the Eggs Royale (silky hollandaise, perfectly poached eggs). We also opted for a cheeky Bellini as it's Friday and why the devil not?! The food was impeccable as was the service. We were lucky enough to get a small sample of the porridge, which was rich, creamy and indulgent. It was just a perfect start to our day. Can't wait until our next visit......!

title: Lovely champagne brunch 🥂
comment: Had a lovely time with my friend to celebrate her birthday.

title: Beautiful food amazing favours
comment: If you want fine dining this is a great place to go. Venison was amazing wit celeriac 2 ways. Staff friendly and charming.

title: Sunday Brunch a delight
comment: Went with family for a Sunday brunch as a treat before lockdown kicks in. We had been to Friends before for dinner but since our last visit, saw they had done an uplift to the interiors which brought out the character of the exterior very well - especially with the warm lighting. The staff were very prompt in their service and they came across as relaxed and friendly. I ordered a vegetarian breakfast and family had ordered avocado on toast. Both were very generous in proportion and absolutely delicious. Must try (after lockdown of course)

title: I had a lovely birthday meal
comment: I had a lovely birthday meal at friends the food is outstanding! The staff go out of their way to make you feel welcome. Would highly recommend this enchanting place

title: Fantastic food
comment: We have just ordered online (Covid 19 so the restaurant is closed). The food was excellent quality, the ingredients were very good as well. Both salmon and venison were very enjoyable, a cauliflower soup was a highlight. Highly recommended!

title: Overpriced and just ok
comment: We used to come here fairly often as it was a cheap and cheerful local restaurant with nice fresh food. The food isn't bad, but not that authentic and no pho on the menu - odd for a Vietnamese. What has changed is the price. As a group of 6 we were told when booking we had to order both a starter and main each, which seems an arbitrary rule to make extra money. The cheapest starter was £6, most were £7 and summer rolls were £8 and mostly noodle inside. Dipping sauce was hoi sin (Chinese!) or chilli - no noac cham as you'd expect at a Vietnamese. Mains are mostly £14 or £15 if you want meat involved. With BYO corkage of £2 a head, tap water, the mandatory starter and main each and the mandatory 10% tip, we spent £27 a head. It's just too much, especially when the food is only ok. Service is pleasant, atmosphere nice, but we won't be rushing back.

title: Tasty food, friendly service
comment: We had a lovely meal here on a busy Friday evening (we booked in advance which is recommended - they had to turn a few people away around 8:45pm).

title: Ladies night out
comment: It was a small restaurant so you need to book on the weekend

title: Delicious food!
comment: Small and casual restaurant with authentic Vietnamese cuisine.

title: Lovely dinner
comment: I have been to Wagamama Staines many times, the food is always excellent and the staff is attentive, friendly, lovely at all the time.

title: Outstanding Service
comment: Once again our experience was above and beyond like always. Firstly I’d like to express my gratitude towards waitress, Sofia. She was an absolute delight with an infectious smile! Professional, polite and simply superb. Sofia went above and beyond with her service as myself and partner are very picky with our food. She recommended a beautiful dish “

title: Unbelievable
comment: Tonight I finally hit this place after years of walking past and thinking must try.......omg I have missed out. The food is AMAZING. The service so personal and friendly you feel they’ve known you for years. I cannot recommend enough....my only disappointment is I’ve left it so long to discover this truly amazing little gem

title: Great service
comment: Loved the food and excellent service. I d been working nearby and so tried it out . So kind and polite . Food was lovely too

title: Delicious food, amazing staff
comment: We tried this for the first time. The food is truly exceptional. As we had said that we had never eaten in wagamama before to one of the waiters, I think her name was Monica, she welcome us with a big smile, she asked us if we'd been there before, she started by recommended us few dishes and answered all our questions regarding the ingredients, we went on her recommendation, we started with chiken gioza,chilly sqid and mushroom bunns, I had the ginger udon, she was able to order it with no chilli as I don't like spicy food, and my partner has a chiken catzu, the food was sooo delicious,it arrived fast as well. I can't be enough thankful for her lovely attentive service and great recommendation of the food and she had meke our first experience in this restaurant soo lovely, Thanks so much Monica,I'll definitely see you soon!!!

title: Lovely food as always. Writing
comment: Lovely food as always. Writing this review as Charlotte, our waitress was amazing. She was helpful, kind and recommended the tama squid which was great.

title: Clean and always great service here!!
comment: My partner and I always go to Wagamama’s Staines and the staff are always so friendly, the service is impeccable and I can’t stress enough but once again the staff are really helpful and polite.

title: Great service
comment: Food was fresh and the service was excellent. Thanks Sofia for looking after us will be back soon...

title: Great service
comment: Came in tonight for a meal with the hubby after work and it was lovely. Great food and a really friendly and attentive waitress called Sofia. Nothing was too much trouble. Will definitely visit again soon. Thank you.

title: Brilliant service and food
comment: Haven’t been to this branch in years, we were served by a lovely girl called Sofia who saw to our every need, she went above and beyond to make our experience memorable. She defo deserves some recognition for her customer service!

title: Best Portugeuse restaurant in London
comment: Returned here post COVID and had an amazing experience. The restaurant has gone to lengths to make it very safe, with tables well spaced apart and lots of cleaning evident. But it is the food that makes this place very special, they have nailed the combination of traditional Portugeuse flavours with modern cuisine. We had the whisky prawns and clams for starters that were both very fresh and tasty. I had the rib eye steak which was mouth watering, tender and packed with flavour, perfectly accompanied by sweet potato fries and creamed spinach. Drinks and desserts were also amazing and the service was excellent. I don’t think you can find a better Portugeuse restaurant in London! Thank you Capricho.

title: Delicious food and great service
comment: Outstanding service, especially from Charlotte this evening Food was delicious aswell and good vibes all around.

title: A Must If You Like Fish & Seafood.
comment: My husband & I celebrated our wedding anniversary there, the welcome, cleanliness, service & varied menu were all excellent. As it was a warm evening we decided to have sangria, which was the best I have had both in the UK & abroad. The unusual selection of fruit in it gave a wonderful taste. We won't be waiting for a special occasion to go there again & highly recommend it.

title: Great service and authentic flavourful food
comment: Came with my friends here as we wanted somewhere with a nice ambience to eat and we were very impressed. The food was presented beautifully and tasted amazing. The service was great and you can tell the owners put a lot of effort and care to making the dining experience a lovely one.

title: It’s fish and chips
comment: Lovely setting and polite staff.

title: Lovely food, ambience and staff
comment: My family and I have visited Galata Pera twice and we loved it. The food was fantastic, the ambience was beautiful and the staff were very polite and friendly.

title: Isolation treat
comment: Absolutely fantastic service from start to finish. Food was amazing, on par with top worldwide burger restaurants. Can’t wait to visit after lockdown ends. Bravo ‘Carved’ doing a good job x

title: lovely cafe
comment: Had breakfast here during a short break and it was perfect for a light breakfast, coffees, lunch or snacks. Plenty of choice with an outdoor seating area. Staff friendly and efficient. Good value for money cafe to start the day before a days activities.

title: A so disappointing meal experience
comment: Very disappointing. Found some of the staff a bit unfriendly. Not a great atmosphere apart from the larger groups enjoying birthday celebrations.

title: Exceptionally good
comment: A really great Sunday lunch - original ( and lovely) cocktail, delicious tuna starter and melt in the mouth beef . Lovely atmosphere , professional service in a relaxed style. We’ve never had a bad meal here and think it gets better. The previous reviewer can’t possibly have been to OneOneFour.

title: Great Turkish Food in Locksbottom!
comment: I have visited Istanbul several times as well as ordered during lockdown, and have never been disappointed. The food here is delicious and full of flavour. Staff members have always been very friendly and would definitely highly recommended.

title: Great Food and Service
comment: Had dinner and found the staff friendly. We had to get a special meal for an allergy sufferer. This was not an issue and we had a very good meal.

title: Family night out
comment: With the ease of lockdown visiting daughter. Left the restaurant arrangements to her. As she is 7 1/2 months pregnant will be the last chance to eat out just the 3 of us. Mind you looking forward to being a grandfather, anyway, as before great food, friendly staff. Not the cheapest place but for the quality of the food well worth it. Three of us starters, mains and drinks, with obligatory poppadums, £96. Thoroughly enjoyed the evening thanks everyone.

title: Birthday Treat
comment: The food was really tasty. Service was very good. Staff including Apu were polite and attentive. We really enjoyed our meal thank you.

title: Nice but expensive
comment: Just in the area and looking for a good Turkish restaurant.

title: Best Indian
comment: Came here yesterday to celebrate a friends birthday... 20 of us and the service was incredible. Food 10/10 too!

title: A great find for a take-away
comment: During the Coronavirus lockdown, we have been trying various delivery services from restaurants in our area at least once per week. In this case we decided on Galata Pera as their menu appeared to be both interesting and varied. (We had no prior experience of the restaurant itself.)

title: Outstanding Customer service
comment: Overall experience was very good however Customer experience was outstanding. Rachel was brilliant, her service is second to none.

title: Delicious Meal!
comment: Visited at the start of August for our wedding anniversary & post Covid lockdown dinner. Restaurant was organised really well inside to support Covid-19 safety measures. Staff were lovely and friendly. Our waitress was fantastic, really helpful with questions about side dishes and ingredients as one of us has a nut allergy. Food was absolutely delicious & everything was very well cooked.

title: Enjoyable meal but waitresses not wearing masks.
comment: Enjoyable meal, we had the lunch menu and it was very nice. The food wasn’t rushed so the meal did take a while which was fine.

title: Disappointing after good recommendations
comment: Went to poor boys after a few friends had given it really good reviews and raved it was a must try!

title: Best Steak around
comment: Little gem hidden in Northwood, lovely polite and friendly service and the food was amazing, separate bar if your early.

title: Great way to start the day
comment: Really nice coffee, served with a smile. The best thing about this cafe, though, is the cinnamon buns - truly spectacular! The big leather sofas inside are a really comfy place to chill out, and the outside tables are great for a bit of people-watching.

title: Great Coffee
comment: Stopped here for a rest after wandering Windsor Castle for several hours. The venue is very clean with a great range of food available.

title: Great restaurant
comment: 16 of us had a meal at Assos for my husbands birthday after being told a party our size could not be catered for by another local venue, what a stroke of good luck.

title: Birthday celebration
comment: This restaurant was recommended to us and what a lovely restaurant it is. The food was fantastic, very well presented, Alex our waiter was brilliant, taking the time also to chat and have a laugh, we will definitely be going back, would thoroughly recommend this restaurant.

title: Mum’s 90th birthday
comment: 7 of us arrived ready to celebrate Mum’s 90th birthday, and right from the time we walked in the door the service was exceptional! When staff realised we were there for such a special occasion the stepped things up a notch and I think I can safely say Mum was made to feel very special! Thank you so much, wonderful service, delicious food! We will be back!

title: Booked a table on the off
comment: Booked a table on the off chance

title: Our first but not last visit
comment: We went herre as party of 10 (7 adults and three children) for my husbands birthday ona Sunday lunch. We had a really good time with excellent food.

title: ALWAYS AMAZING !!
comment: I have to start by saying that this is not only the best Turkish restaurant I have been to but for the quality of the food and service it is one of the best restaurants as well

title: You won’t be disappointed!
comment: This review is in particular for the manager who goes by the name of Hussein and a colleague called “Sherif”. The hospitality and customer service was phenomenal, they asked us multiple times if we needed anything with the most outstanding manner. We definitely recommend you come and check Beirut nights out for yourself!!

title:
Sabahat was excellent
I was
comment: Sabahat was excellent

title: Complete breakfasts and lovely buffet dinner
comment: We really enjoyed our breakfasts both uk and continental. Also live cooking is well catered, something enjoyable for everyone. No staff bothering, really helpful and polite. Yes a la carte is also great but leftbank isan easy option!

title: Fabulous Buffet Anniversary Lunch!
comment: Have always wanted to go here, so booked for our Anniversary. We were lucky to have a window seat with a view of the river which was good in spite of the rain! The meal was excellent, with appetiser buffet, then fresh pulled beef, lamb shepherds pie and tasty spicy chicken kebabs. There was a variety of vegetables, new roasted potatoes, etc. The desserts were excellent too, as was the service! They also served us a chocolate anniversary dish, very thoughtful, thanks and thoroughly recommend this for a special occasion!

title: Quality buffet
comment: I've eaten here several times and have always been impressed. On this occasion I visited for Halloween lunch with family and, whilst the restaurant was quite busy, standards were still maintained. Excellent choice of starters, varied and interesting main courses (the beef pie was a delight!) and tempting desserts. The restaurant was beautifully decorated for Halloween too. We'll return one day.

title: Phenomenally Perfect
comment: What an amazing place! The food is to die for, the service, is top notch, and the drinks are amazing! It was y first time here, but certainly not my last. This place has something for everyone.

title: Buffet dinner was poor. Not recommended.
comment: My family and I had been here before on a few occasions, so chose this restaurant (Leftbank) within the hotel, to celebrate my mother-in-law's 82nd birthday. We'll, the food was so disappointing. The selection of food, in particular the mains buffet, was poor. The roast beef was burnt to a crisp. The lamb tasted of...I'm not sure what it tasted of but it certainly didn't taste of lamb. No one had the chicken so I can't comment on that. Probably the best section was the starters buffet. Quite a comprehensive selection. The desserts were pretty average. The custard was like water ! I was, like all the guests at the table, very disappointed in the quality of the food and for sure will not be returning here. The price you pay for this buffet is not cheap and therefore you expect something much better than what you'd get at the Toby Carvery.! . The service was probably the only good thing. No complaints there. I would not recommend going to this buffet based on my experience last night.

title: Complet pigout!
comment: The staff were all very friendly and helpful and we were given an explanation if how it all worked.

title: Great selection
comment: There was a Great selection of food for starters, mains and desert. You can tell alot of time and effort has gone into preparing and cooking the food. Would highly recommend.

title: Disappointed!
comment: Having eaten at the Leftbank before and loved it we booked for a relatives 82nd birthday. On the day a friend warned me that she had recently felt the quality wasn't as previously experienced.

title: "EXCELLENT SUNDAY LUNCH"
comment: We have enjoyed many excellent Sunday lunches at The Leftbank. The buffet is very good with a variety of both starters & main courses.The staff are extremely attentive & nothing is too much trouble & the setting by the river is second to none.

title: Best shisha in Wembley!
comment: The atmosphere is great! Quite a Middle Eastern experience with dimmed lighting and buzzing environment. The shisha is one of the best in Wembley. Definitely try the milkshakes!

title: What an amazing lunch experience!
comment: Came to the Leftbank restaurant straight after a pamper day at the Runneymede's spa and we were HUNGRY! Well, no problem as the buffet at the Leftbank is the most plentiful and varied we have ever encountered. Amazing service and awesome food- loved it.

title: Amazing service
comment: Sharif is a mualim!!!!!!!

title: Beirut Nights
comment: Best customer service by Sharif. Made my night better! Enjoyed everything especially the food and staff.

title: Amazing restaurant
comment: I went to Beirut with family last Saturday, the restaurant has an amazing vibe really relaxed great for families and friends. The staff are wonderful they are so helpful and attentive, my waitress was called Sabby, she really made the night more special for us she couldn’t do enough to ensure we enjoyed our time. The manager is super friendly too, I will definitely be back!

title: Amazing service
comment: Came here last Saturday and absolutely loved it. The staff are amazing, was very happy with the waitress Sabby, so friendly and really enjoyed the service. Will definitely be coming back here again! The food was amaaaazinggggg, definitely recommend the cheese sambooski dish!

title: Amazing customer service
comment: Best customer service by Sabahat!! She recommended the best shesha flavor, and also recommended really good food as it was my first time there. The atmosphere is super chilled out. I would definitely come again and recommend the place to more people.

title: Excellent food
comment: Very pleasant and accommodating staff . Food good value well presented . Will definitely take family and friends there

title: Pleasant
comment: Were visiting London from January 24 to 27. As we were staying in Premier Inn in Hanger lane we decided to have dinner here on Saturday evening. A bit of walk from the hotel,but it was worth it. I have been to Turkey and Tunisia before ,so I was familiar with Arabian food. The restaurant itself didn't look busy,but shisha area outside filled up very fast. The food was really very delicious and portions very generous. My wife loved moussaka. The service was attentive and not intrusive. If I was to stay nearby on my next visit I would have no hesitation visiting again.

title: Tip
comment: Best place for shisha, very good customer service by Mr Mahmood my brother thank you got the warm welcome appreciate it and the shisha was peng

title: A taste of Turkey
comment: Great little spot to eat at a decent price. Only real issue is because of where it is located it can be quite difficult to find a parking space.

title: A must for all
comment: What a great little restaurant. I had heard glowing reviews about this restaurant from friends and family but was still a little dubious.

title: Lara Grill
comment: This was our first visit to the Lara Grill, and came on a personal recommendation. It was my husbands birthday so thought as he likes a good Turkish grill this would be a nice way to celebrate. I booked a table which was a total waste of time as the tables are not reserved so we had to wait until a table was ready. Then when our table was ready, we were seated next to the toilets. Now who wants to have their birthday meal sat next to the toilets. On telling the manager his response was “everyone has booked a table”. Sorry not good enough. I personally was ready to leave however my family insisted we persevere. We ordered the Lara Feast. The bread and dips were lovely and the meats and rice cooked well. Another down point had lamb chops but no steak knife which was definitely needed. Waitresses were rushed off their feet so service was inconsistent however appreciated efforts and so rewarded with a tip. The Lara Grill has the potential to be really good but basic service let’s it down. Would I visit again. Maybe as a walk in (where in that case would be happy to sit anywhere) but for a special get together. Definitely NOT.

title: dissappointed
comment: They use to be really good before, then they became bigger, and the quality dropped. On two occassion, i ordered a delivery and both times i was not happy, first time it was the dessert...it was not sweet and looked like it had been made a few days ago, 2nd delivery was today and they did not complete the order and missed some items out. I am happy to accept these mistakes if the food was free...but when you pay for it and there are mistakes then thats very annoying. I wont be ordering from them again. If you guys order from them i suggest you check your order before accepting it at the door.

title: Turkish Take Away Heaven
comment: Had a great takeaway. Lots and lots of really nice food and the staff were as friendly as ever. So tasty we ate the lot and made friends with a local Tom Cat who loved it too. All round winner

title: Mrs sandra george
comment: 5 star service. Food was amazing I had salmon and seabass. No bones at all.vwe thoroughly enjoyed the meal. Going back next week.

title: Love it!
comment: great grilled food, less greasy compared to other Turkish, tasty, lovely restaurant, matched with excellent serving staff. Highly recommended & I will not hesitate to return, excellent value for money too.

title: Not overly impressed.
comment: Visited end of January on a Friday night of which on the back of positive reviews from colleagues at work.

title: Lovely meal
comment: This is our fourth visit to this restaurant. Fantastic food at very reasonable prices, we went for the "assos shared platter" which is more than enough food for two of you. Great service and nice surroundings. Would definitely recommend it

title: Not great
comment: Visited here for a friends birthday won't be going back again. Staff made us not feel welcome more like we was in the way. Ordered our drink not all of them were given to us had to keep asking for the missing ones. We had an 8 o'clock table didnt order till around 9 didnt get our mains till nearly half 10. Food was not very nice when we finally got it. Was not very impressed with this restaurant.

title: Great restaurant with wonderful staff
comment: What do you get when you get fabulous food and wonderful staff - An amazing restaurant!

title: Excellent Sunday lunch
comment: Great meal at a very affordable price. Staff are very friendly too. We had a party of 55, which was catered for VERY well. No complaints and highly recommend the restaurant. Parking can be fun, but you get 4 hours free in Sainsbury's nearby (<5 min walk).

title: Love this place!
comment: The staff, the restaurant, the food....absolutely brilliant!

title: Origional and good coffee
comment: I really liked my coffee break there, it used to be the ticket office for the train station and got now converted

title: Great Coffee
comment: Stopped in for a flat white before going to the castle and enjoyed it. Not much seating indoors and it was too cold to sit outside, but that's not their fault. Highly recommend!

title: Great atmosphere and a cheery welcome
comment: This cafe is situated in the booking hall of the old Windsor Town railway station and has many original Victorian features. Really nice place to sit and the staff are welcoming and jolly. Excellent coffee and teas and a good range of snacks and cakes. Inexpensive!

title: The perfect pitstop
comment: We stopped off here on our bike ride to rest and refuel. A lovely spot to shelter from the sunshine or rain, very bicycle friendly! The coffee was tasty and their famous cinnamon buns were fresh from the oven...delicious! Well priced and will be coming back soon!

title: Good quality.
comment: Lovely cafe, good quality food and drink, excellent location in the middle of the old station. feels kinda individual even if it is part of a chain.

title: Best cafe in town...
comment: Just love this cafe. Great location, great selection of food and drinks. Staff were friendly. Service was really fast and efficent. Having walked around Windsor trying to find a cafe for breakfast, this cafe by far was the best and busiest (but in a good way).

title: The Best. Full Stop.
comment: We have been visiting Nick and his team here for six years or more. It has the feel of a family. All staff seem happy working there. The coffee. The service. The ambience. The best I have come across - and I am very well travelled.

title: Great coffee, sandwiches and cinnamin buns!
comment: A haven for hungry cyclists and families! It's a fantastic stop-off in the centre of Windsor with plenty of sandwiches, snacks and drinks. It gets nice and busy on the weekends and in tourist season and is a perfect place to meet-up with family and friends.

title: Friendly service at a unique place
comment: I have had my eye on this place since the beginning of the year and finally got the chance to pop in here with my brother over the weekend.

title: So yummy!
comment: We were very impressed with Poorboys! It is definitely worth the hype. I ordered a “dirty boy” with Southern fried chicken and Cajun mayo - it was insane! And the Mac and Cheese was to die for! Will definitely be coming back !

title: Delicious food and great staff
comment: Came here for brunch and it was great. The staff were so friendly and fun and the food was delicious. I would highly recommend this place for brunch, dinner and takeaway (I have done all 3!)

title: Poor boys is the best place in kingston
comment: Poor boys is our favourite place to eat in kingston and we are regular customers. The cajun shrimp dirty boy and the fried chicken po boy are our favourites. It is a must visit when in the area.

title: The queue suggested it would be great, but it wasn't
comment: The place feels dirty, with a mop and bucket near a table, the wait was long and the food was ok. The mac and cheese was bland, and the boo fries were pretty nasty. I don't like all the packaging that comes to the table including paper bag, and couldn't imagine coming here for an evening. It's a long wait for meh.

title: Great food
comment: Been here a lot since our first visit at Christmas time last year. Great food and friendly owner. Glad to see business is going well enough to extend the restaurant, keep it up!

title: Worth the wait!
comment: We have wanted to go here since before lockdown after seeing a few friends go here on Instagram. After lockdown it REALLY blew up. We had to pop in to Kingston after work mid week to take some stuff back and decided to go here and finally try it. You can’t book online so at first I was thinking will it be busy/won’t it. When we arrived there was no tables inside only outside. It wasn’t raining and wasn’t too cold so we was happy to sit outside. They were actually installing heaters when we arrived so soon I think there will be heaters outside for guests as the inside availability is limited due to Covid. We wasn’t cold at all though and I didn’t have a coat so I would say sitting outside isn’t an issue. The owner was sat on the table next to us and he was lovely and friendly. I have to say EVERY member of staff here is friendly, informative and generally seem happy to be there. I cannot STAND restaurants where the staff look like they wanna leave or rush you through the menu. I LOVE it when you’re looking at the menu and the staff recommend dishes or talk about the menu with passion. Our waiter (I think he was called Charlie) was recommending loads of dishes and telling us what sauces went best with each item etc. But with genuine excitement as if he knew we was gonna love it! There is nothing better than when the staff have tried the food and love it enough to be passionate about recommending it. Also the gentleman serving our drinks was so lovely and he made an effort to ask us if we was enjoying our drinks and also made an effort to recommend cocktails to have. He was also really friendly and informative. I feel like the food is really good value for money. We ordered some of the nibbles to start... we thought they would be really tiny, as they wasn’t that expensive. The portions were MASSIVE! The hot and blue chicken lollipops and popcorn cauliflower were both insane. I wish they had never ended. For mains we both had Po’ Boys. one chicken and one pork. Both lovely!! The owner came over had a chat with us at the end and he deserves all the success he has, he is such a genuine and lovely guy who even made an effort to tell us how amazing the other restaurants around him were. He told us to visit the wine bar for the cheeses one night and also told us his next door neighbour did the most amazing curry that we will try one night! We will be going back here! There is nothing like this around here and it’s the perfect addition to Kingston! It’s giving people a reason the travel to Kingston from surrounding areas.

title: Fantastic setting, idea, staff and food
comment: What a great relaxed setting, great food and great staff. Staff so friendly I wanted to steal them for my business

title: Delicious!
comment: My partner and I came here for lunch today. We sat outside with the option of sitting inside once a table became available. The outside seating has plenty of heaters so we stayed as it was lovely and warm.

title: The best steak in the area.
comment: This is the best steak we have had in a long time. I can also recommend the Empanadas as a starter. Our server Talia was very attentive and made our experience even better.

title: Brilliant Service
comment: Beautiful restaurant, very clean, excellent food (non steak eater) and incredible service...particularly if you are lucky enough to be looked after by a young lady by the name of Taline.

title: Excellent as always
comment: Like most sensible reviews, the service is fantastic, without being intrusive, and the food is just about perfect. Love this place!

title: Absolutely first rate
comment: Last night my daughter and I paid our first visit and it certainly won't be our last

title: Can't wait to return
comment: I ordered a medium rare, but more on the side of rare, sirloin steak and my friends ordered med rare ribeye. Unfortunately when my steak arrived it was not even slightly rare. I showed our charming waitress; she was mortified and so apologetic. It was immediately removed and I was served a new delicious rare sirloin and the Manageress brought me a fresh dish of hot chips. We ordered sides of mushrooms and tenderstem broccoli with our steaks which were fabulous - a recommendation for vegetarians. After we had finished our delicious meal, our outstanding young waitress brought us a plate of Churros as an apology for my steak. Mistakes happen but it was handled so well. They have implemented many safety measures so we felt safe taking my friend's 98 year old mom there. We have been before and will definitely be returning for more delicious food and excellent service.

title: Magnificent Sunday lunch
comment: We would just like to thank our waiter Syd for a most delightful lunch. He was so attentive, professional and kind. The food was absoultely delicious and quick. We felt very safe in these difficult covid times. A really lovely meal for a special occasion. Thank you

title: Very tasty food and very attentive staff
comment: We enjoyed a fantastic meal at the pub a few nights ago. The portion sizes are perfect and the food is extremely tasty. We also found the staff to be extremely attentive and aware to the Covid measures. Great value too.

title: Sunday lunch
comment: Lovely Sunday lunch sitting outside in the terrace with attentive professional staff and great food (and portions).

title: Few beers
comment: Popped in for a couple of beers! Lovely atmosphere, great service and properly set up in our current situation. Not obvious that the measures are in place. A cosy pub with a lovely dining room. Little bit more expensive than some local competitors but worth it. Spotless in every sense.

title: Such a lovely pub!
comment: Great decor, atmosphere, service and food. We were three adults and three children and they were great with the kids.

title: Dinner for 4, Sat 04 Oct
comment: Never disappointed with this lovely place: very professional, friendly service; got the whole Covid procedure totally sorted, lovely food, good atmosphere. Good menu selection; better than other food pubs in area. Would always recommend.

title: Lovely dinner
comment: As usual we had a very enjoyable dinner.

title: Lovely lunch
comment: My wife and I had a great Friday lunch here. A lovely local pub with very friendly staff, would recommend.

title: Great food, good atmosphere, beer kept well and good selection of wies
comment: We've enjoyed this pub for years - through ups and downs - and the refurbishment / revamp as an upmarket gastro pub has been much appreciated. The inside restaurant has a slightly funky feel and is not at all cramped.

title: Little hidden gem in Kingston
comment: Absolutely love this little pub in the heart of Kingston! We popped in recently for a glass of red by the fire settling in for the winter nights. Since re opening and corona virus, the pub has really taken to the new changes to ensure everyone is safe. The staff are fantastic! Food is great and the wine choice is even better! Highly recommend

title: Meet a friend for a drink
comment: Being able to meet a friend for a drink outside and under cover was great. Good wine and good service - look forward to the heaters coming soon!

title: Great food
comment: Great take away food during lockdown. Love the flavours, good portion sizes and delivery is prompt! Will definitely order again.

title: Ordered on Uber Eats - can't wait to visit in person
comment: Delicious food and very well packed. Thank you for the bread and dips we requested in our order! I have been looking for a nice Turkish restaurant in the area and glad I found one

title: Take away due to coronavirus
comment: We had a take away delivered the food was delicious. My only criticism would be is the food was salty. Apart from that we enjoyed our meal. As soon as lockdown finishes we will definitely visit the restaurant

title: Take away due to covid.
comment: The food is excellent. The service is good, the people are very friendly and helpful when you call to place an order.

title: Very good
comment: Really good experience. Food is very good and staff very friendly. Lovely location next to the river. Would definitely come back!

title: Lovely food 😋
comment: I had visited on 25/7/2020 amazing food, great atmosphere,very clean environment. I can't believe I didn't know about this place before, but I'm glad that I do now. Highly recommended.

title: Visited for a family meal on Thursday
comment: We had a wonderful evening at Galata Pera. The food is delicious and fresh and there is something to suit the majority of diets and tastes. Portion sizes are very generous and everything from the salads, charcoal grilled vegetables, meats and fish and the exceptional sauces taste as though they have been made with love and care. The service is hospitable and the staff are friendly and welcoming. The location next to the water is perfect and what a joy to find somewhere which is not just another anonymous chain restaurant.

title: Excellent Indian!
comment: We’d heard about Shampan ages ago from friends who used to live in the area, but never had a chance to visit. Today we ordered a takeaway from them (they’re closed due to the pandemic, but you can order for collection); the food was incredible. We had lamb rogan josh, with lamb so tender it was falling apart when touched with a fork, chicken starter - imaginatively served with an original yoghurt sauce - and dhal, all fresh, delicious, a delight. This isn’t your usual, greasy-bag takeaway – this is restaurant-level meal you can enjoy at home, with staff who are polite, friendly, attentive. We were so happy with our meal, I phoned the restaurant again to thank them. We’ll go back when they reopen and until then, will happily order from them again.

title: Would Recommend
comment: This is the first place that I’ve eaten out with my family post covid and I have to say the food was excellent as-well as the service. Very friendly staff, would come back again and would definitely recommend.

title: Great takeaway
comment: We like to visit the Shampan in Welling and during current circumstances, we were pleased to see they were still doing takeaways. My prawn rogan josh was as fresh and tasty as when we visit, The Bombay aloo was great, thank goodness for decent Indian takeaway food where restaurant quality is maintained.

title: Mr
comment: Tried Shampan for the first time yesterday and was very pleased as it was also my wife birthday and she also loved the food). Very pleasant and friendly staff. Recommended highly!

title: Dinner Takeaway
comment: A really surprisingly good first take away from this SE London restaurant.

title: Decent Indian but lacked depth in flavour and spice
comment: First time customer after reading the reviews. I ordered the lamb achari, chicken tikka bhurna for mains. Both dishes had too much tomatoes therefore it was very acidic. The dishes lacked depth in flavour and needed a kick. The brinjal bhaji and saag paneer was good. I did get 20% off the bill however would have been gutted if I was charged full price for an average Indian takeaway.

title: Fantastic
comment: The lamb sali is one of my favourite curries - lovely slices of lamb with a real kick to it. More expensive than most takeaway curries but definitely worth it. My wife has had a few different milder curries and loved them as well. We have visited for the Sunday buffet in the past and that was great and fantastic value. Highly recommended.

title: Buffet Feast
comment: The Leftbank restaurant at the Runneymeade is just great-Buffet style with tremendous variety of hot and cold dishes which are superb-and presentation is great

title: Should listen the customer
comment: I order a burger and i said i’m milk allergic and that i don’t want any sauce. They remove the cheese, what it is ok, but they leave the sauce, explaining me that the sauce hasn’t milk. Ok, but i said that don’t want the sauce. It is easy...isn’t it?

title: Amazing
comment: My first buffet. Delicious, fresh and amazing dish selection. We sat by the river and shared a bottle of wine. Absolute idyllic, and I was completely stuffed. Thanks!

title: Fabulous as always
comment: Booked the Runnymede as 2 of my friends were celebrating birthdays and I couldn't think of anywhere better than the Leftbank.My reservation was dealt with promptly by Sharron and I also received a text reminder.An added bonus to our booking it included an offer of bottomless Procecco!!! What's not to like with an fantastic array of food,gorgeous location such a huge selection.The service was great a special shout out to Gary & Iseof (joseph?)who were super attentive and made the afternoon fabulous.Can not wait to return & would highly recommend.

title: Lockdown birthday celebration meal to take away.
comment: Its strange times celebrating your birthday during lockdown but being able to eat an amazing Indian meal from this great restaurant was a saving grace. You must give it a try. The owner was really lovely and even gave me a free bottle of wine as a birthday gift. We are looking forward to our next meal from the Shampan Welling.

title: Evening meal
comment: Excellent buffet. Tremendous choice especially starters and puddings. The wine list has a good range and a good number of them are available by the glass. The house red is excellent value for money.

title: Excellent food, stunning views, great environment
comment: Love coming to The Leftbank Restaurant, the sunday lunch is always worthwhile. Great choice in a buffet style. The carvery is delicious, deserts are amazing too! I brought a friend and he was really impressed. Such good value as well as everything is included in the price. The only negative was the staff clearing away the plates on the tables quickly. They seemed quite under pressure, but it was very busy. Would definitely highly recommend.

title: Fabulous meal at the Leftbank,
comment: Fabulous meal at the Leftbank, celebrating our 20th anniversary- both of us had hangar steak, gorgeous! Really recommend! Good portion sizes and great taste. We were also looked after really well.

title: Weekend away
comment: My husband and I stayed at the hotel and ate in the Leftbank restaurant for our evening meal and breakfast each day. The food choice is very varied and of good quality. The only thing we would of preferred it to of been served rather than self service, as it is more relaxing not to have people constantly walking past getting their food.

title: Excellent Food, Dinner overlooking the Thames
comment: Our first meal out since lockdown. The perfect place to go. The meal was excellent, service great (as always). We had a great evening on the terrace, well spaced out.

title: Food mediocre
comment: I think to be fair that this is a shisha place only, and that the food is a add on rather than the other way round, which basically means don’t go there is you will not be smoking and expecting good food!

title: Table of 3
comment: Excellent Shisha, good food. The service we received from Anand made us feel comfortable and really enhanced our visit today, Really recommend this place. Thank you Anand.

title: Amazing amazing amazing !!!
comment: I came here for dinner and I have to say this is by far the best Lebanese restaurant I have been to. The food is superb, the staff is unbelievably kind and lovely and I will definitely make the trip back here ! Definitely one of the most enjoyable meals I’ve had in a while. Highly recommended!

title: Not a licensed restaurant, so bear that in mind
comment: Not a licensed restaurant, so you need to be aware of that if you are a big beer bellied swigger like myself. However, after two nights away with work, a third with no option of an alcoholic drink was most welcome. The food was great, with a buzzing atmosphere; and obviously popular with the local Middle Eastern community. I was made to feel most welcome. The food was very good and plentiful. Would recommend.

title: Best shisha
comment: Lovely experience with my family we had very delicious food specially the bebe chicken the black mamba shisha is the best

title: Nice experience
comment: Great food...perfect atmosphere...nice shisha ...best shisha place in London.lot of thanks to the manager wael and my waiter cherif

title: Shisha is so good!
comment: They have a good selection of shisha which stays fresh for so long! And it doesn’t get harsh at all. I’ve been a couple of times and it never disappoints! The service is really good and the staff are so lovely. Would definitely recommend Beruit nights you can’t go wrong.

title: Okay
comment: First of all, I just want to say that the decor of this place is a bit outdated. It felt like being in an old arab livingroom (tastewise).

title: Beirut Nights
comment: I’ve heard a lot of people talk about this place and wanted to see the hype. The food was average but came with large portions. Also seems quite lively outside when smoking shisha. Still yet to try the shisha from this place

title: Amazing resturant
comment: I loved the food and the place! The staff and owner were very friendly. Would visit this place again100% and recommend it to everyone. The food is all fresh and hand made. 10\10

title: Lovely evening
comment: As per usual this restaurant lived up to its reputation. Despite previous reviews, Covid-19 regulations meticulously adhered to. Warm welcome great food. Looking forward to next visit

title: Amazing - favourite local restaurant!
comment: Myself and my partner have been going to this restaurant for around 3/4 years. We love everything about it. The menu is delicious and the staff are simply amazing and helpful they really do make your experience.

title: unable to get reservation
comment: when ever i phone up they always want to either give me an earlier resavation or a later one dont matter what time i ask for it is almost like they dont want small bookings as i only try to book for n2

title: Great Evening
comment: 1st time visit to this restaurant and was not disappointed. Delicious food and wine with the staff very friendly and helpful.

title: Very rushed
comment: We where very disappointed in here after being a few times rushed our starter which prawn cocktail I counted five if lucky and then main was rushed wine is over priced especially oyster bay in Sainsbury 8 pound to selling it for over twenty five not good far too hot too will not rush back

title: An excellent meal in a lovely restaurant
comment: I took my 93+year old mum out for her birthday. The staff were very attentive when we arrived, the atmosphere, meal and staff were all first class. When they heard it was her birthday they made her feel really special. ( Anna in particular) Thank you and we will cetraben back soon .

title: Great food and friendly staff!
comment: This is our first lunch here for a while and everything is set up for COVID rules. I thoroughly enjoyed my skate with sauces and my husband liked his beef sunday roast. A really good Porn Star Martini too! A really nice local restaurant with friendly and helpful staff! A good range of dishes on the menu too, with some specials on the board.

title: absolutely fantastic
comment: i must say after visiting this place for several years we have never once had a bad experience the food is superb the staff are very professional and the setting is very cozy. anyone that is not happy with their visit here really do not appreciate fine dining

title: Absolutely Fabulous!
comment: Having been twice to this restaurant in the past week (it was that good.. Had to rush back) I cannot fault it! Everything cooked fresh, food and staff fabulous and nothing is too much trouble! They made me a pasta sauce without tomatoes (different than specified on menu, but made to my requirements... They truly do go the extra mile) and zucchini fries which weren't on the menu (so devine!!!)

title: Great dining experience
comment: One of the best restaurants in Hornchurch excellent food nice atmosphere fabulous staff. Always consistently good

title: H ali
comment: Excellent customer service. Waiting time was less and good served in good time. Food was well cooked and delicious

title: Birthday dinner
comment: This is the 1st time we have eaten here...

title: Great Turkish food
comment: We use to dine in all the time but recently feel safer just getting a takeaway. The staff are great, excellent customer service. The food is delicious both eat in and takeaway. We normally get the Lara mix grill, lahmacun and yoghurtlu chicken shish and every time we have not been disappointed so fresh and tasty.

title: Amazing Food and Excellent Customer Service - 5 Stars
comment: I have been with friends on numerous occasions and the food is absolutely amazing. I had salmon and my friend had seabass They go the extra mile and take all the bones out which makes eating the fish much more enjoyable.. The manager came over Mehmet and spoke to us even though he was exceptionally busy. Our food came very quickly and he told me the fish is delivered on a daily basis. That would explain the exquisite taste and freshness of the fish. I have tried many other turkish restaurants and they dont compare to the price and quality and customer service I always receive from Lara Grill. This is definitely my regular spot. My friends also agree with me.

title: Dinner
comment: A cosy restaurant in East London. Great authentic Turkish cuisine with a very reasonable price. Portion is good and service was great.

title: Exceptional food!
comment: Exceptional food!

title: One of the best in Essex.
comment: One of the best in Essex. Ordered a few takeaways. Every time consistent and delicious. Can’t wait to dine in after the lockdown.

title: Quality food
comment: I have Visited Lara Grill on a few occasions can get very busy , service is good and food is excellent , I always have lamb chops , comes with rice or chips , get side salad dips & bread £15 , highly recommend.

title: Lockdown 2 Takeaway. Yummy!
