comment: Lockdown 2 Takeaway.. Just as good as ever, definitely the best Turkish Grill in Dagenham. Thanks for a lovely meal.

title: Nice enough.
comment: Recently had dinner here with my wife.

title: Excellent service
comment: My boyfriend and me always go there, we had nice meals and very friendly service. Lamb chops were amazing, very tender and juicy. Also they do very nice cocktails, pornstar martini is my favourite! Thanks for the amazing night.

title: Belated Valentines meal
comment: We were recommended this restaurant a couple of years ago & it is by far our favourite.The standards have never slipped as you find with a lot of places.Very intimate environment but also feels friendly.Niw doing pints of fraught Peroni .Would recommend Garlic prawns,mussels(starter) Surf & turf-Lobster/fillet steak mains,superb.Friendly,knowledgable staff who don’t rush you 5*

title: Stunning takeaway meal with excellent delivery service
comment: We ordered a lovely takeaway meal during the pandemic as we had missed visiting our favourite restaurant and we weren't disappointed - the food was delicious as always and was delivered on time by the usual friendly waitress. The meal transported very well and we even ordered a couple of cocktails. Thank you so much and hope to use you again and visit the restaurant again when it is open

title: Not very nice
comment: Friday night we win with friends a night out and we choose this restaurant but was wrong choice food tasteless not flavour

title: Take Away - a disappointment
comment: I ordered a take away last night,from Rienna's as a treat. I ordered the skate with saute potatoes and at £17.95 I was disappointed, the saute potatoes were burnt and more like crisps and the stake was on the small side. Its certainly wasn't value for money.

title: Superb quality
comment: We have just returned from vacation in Greece and was craving a Roast dinner , we ordered a takeaway for collection with Anna the manageress on leaving the airport, not only was the Roast of the highest quality But I ordered a cheeky long island ice tee cocktail which was also fabulous especially after poor weak cocktails sampled in Santorini.

title: Very posh and high standard.
comment: Very posh and high standard. The food is amazing and the staff are so nice and polite. One thing I would like to add to the menu would be dauphinois potatoes with lamb as that would a great side.

title: Delicious Meal ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
comment: Had a lovely meal last night with friends. Fish cakes yummy, salmon outstanding! Hubby said the mussels were fab. This restaurant never disappoints. Can’t wait for our next visit ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Amazing restaurant
comment: This restaurant is absolutely amazing!! The food is so good & staff are lovely especially Anna who is brilliant. We have been here a few times now & love it. Last time we visited it was for my husbands birthday dinner & was quite a few of us but they were brilliant with us all. Highly recommend this restaurant to everyone. A lovely gem in Hornchurch

title: Best Restaurant in Hornchurch
comment: Another great meal at Riennas this evening, food top quality and fabulous staff. Good to be back after lockdown, thank you!!

title: Great Turkish Restaurant
comment: I have been in this lovely Turkish restaurant many times, every time when i eat there quality of food and the attention and the good behaviors of the serving staff for the customers never changes.Thank you so much for the food and service you guys provide i will definitely come for great food more often.

title: Great Turkish Food
comment: It was a great dinner. The food quality was amazing. Staffs were very helpful and friendly. Ayberk was very helpful and customer focused. Reasonable prise. Never miss it if you are in Locksbottom area. Excellent.

title: Tony
comment: Once again the food here is 10/10.this place is not local to me but it certainly worth the drive it's the best in Bromley by far. Chef murat and all the staff are alovely.

title: Delicious takeaway
comment: Very happy with our takeaway tonight. The meat was so tender and the portion sizes were so big! Will be back again for takeaways and we will be paying a visit when they open again. The manager is always friendly and chatty.

title: Excellent meat quality
comment: This restaurant has the best meat quality in a Turkish restaurant on the south side of London. Prices are high but you get what you pay for with amazing quality meat and if you are like me and don’t cheap out on food quality, this is the place for you.

title: Just one thing that would have made it perfect!
comment: My wife and I came here on a busy Saturday night for a much needed and well deserved date night.

title: Alice
comment: My favourite restaurant! Food has been amazing everytime and everyone is so friendly. Highly recommend

title: The best Turkish restaurant around by far
comment: We visited the Istanbul for my partner's birthday celebration.. The meal was great and they made a great fuss over my lady singing happy four-day in Turkish..

title: Never again!
comment: We were feeling very sorry for the restaurant businesses in Locksbottom which have had to close. So when we saw the Istanbul Grill was still offering takeaway service we decided to give it a go. ( we have eaten there previously)

title: I am glad you are open again!
comment: Had a takeaway meal with my girlfriend as they reopened recently , everything is fresh as always! Well done guys, i am glad you are open again!

title: Excellent
comment: 5 stars!! Lovely owners and fab food! Very good kebab to lift the mood of lockdown!!

title: I would recommend to anyone!
comment: We went to Istanbul grill again as they re opened and I got a takeaway It looked really nice and it tasted amazing they were really quick making the food.

title: Great atmosphere for a perfect family night out
comment: First night out after lockdown and I was so impressed. The food was delicious and the cocktails were great. Lovely atmosphere and great for a family night out. Will definitely be coming back again in the future.

title: In a word ... Excellent!
comment: We visited to celebrate my daughter’s birthday just before lockdown. We had a great evening. Service was fab, as was all the food. Last night, we ordered takeaway. Again, friendly staff, great quality meat and each element of the meal was excellent. Also really impressed with the packaging, nearly all of which is recyclable. Great to see a restaurant make such an effort to avoid plastic containers and bags. All in all, a great restaurant worthy of support especially during these challenging times. Looking forward to our next visit.

title: Great service! Food was fantastic,
comment: Great service! Food was fantastic, I had a chicken shish which was lovely. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice evening out.

title: Disgusting takeaway
comment: I ordered a meat moussaka. It was disgusting and if I had been in the restaurant it would have promptly been sent back. The meat moussaka consisted of a base of sweet potato followed by a layer of aubergine then a layer of courgette then a thick layer of a disgusting cheese sauce. I genuinely thought I had been served the vegetarian option but then found a minuscule bit of mince. It was awful. I’ve never liked the food from there but was desperate as I was shattered and didn’t want to cook. Never again. I also ordered a portion of bread. It would have been nice to have been told the meal already came with bread so there was a bin full of that.

title: Great Restaurant
comment: It's one of the best turkish restaurants I've ever been in. My waitress, Emily, was very friendly and kind. I've ordered an adana kebab and it was delicious

title: Exceptional in every way
comment: Having been to One One Four many times to go to their Gin Bar, this was the first time we have eaten there. On a Tuesday evening it is an experimental set menu, 3 courses for £25, a couple things had supplements and the courses could be paired with drinks for £45.

title: Stunning Restaurant - Highly recommended
comment: I'd been wanting to try One One four for a while and finally got a table booking as they are very popular! Prior to the booking the new restrictions came in and they were so accommodating with our booking. The meal we had in there was superb, we went for the 3 courses and was not disappointed! Perfect portion sizes and the flavours complimented each other so well! The staff were attentive and followed social distancing rules. Alongside the food we had some great cocktails and wine! Looking forward to coming back here! Thank you one one four team!

title: Sensational food
comment: Top class food at a decent price coupled with professional and friendly service. This is the best restaurant in the area by a distance and certainly the best meals out we have eaten for a long time.

title: Amazing as always
comment: The food here is really exceptional - it's beautifully presented and delicious - and the menu always interesting. It's fine-dining in a relaxed atmosphere. And service is fabulous - friendly, efficient and professional. I can't think of another place quite like it.

title: Exceptional Sunday roast
comment: We knew it would be good because 114 only does good, but lt was a late Sunday lunch and the danger with that is you often get dried out tired food. Not here. A perfectly pink roast beef followed by a beautiful cheese board. Plus we had Tilly serve us - what a delightful lady, we had a lovely conversation and she is a great brand ambassador

title: Best Sunday lunch ive had in years
comment: Well sometimes a sunday roast comes together and 114 didnt disappoint . Top quality beef cooked to perfection , great spuds , rich gravy and great veggies

title: Brilliant meal
comment: Just managed to get into One One Four before second lockdown and it was great. The starter of squash ravioli was so tasty - would really recommend it. Main course was a perfectly cooked guinea fowl and dessert was a chocolate tart (what's not to like?) Luckily just about had time to finish it with the 10pm curfew looming.

title: Average as ever
comment: Multiple visits, always OK , never amazing. This place has a monopoly on decent food on the high street, miles better than anything else nearby. But it’s just not that great. Staff always confused, maitre D always a bit stand off-ish, food decent with being that great. They are a fairly good neighbourhood restaurant with zero competition- fact is that you drive 4 / 5 miles and there’s miles more quality and choice. I’m sure they’ll do just fine as a business but I’m not spending anymore money here

title: So, so lovely
comment: This place is like what every restaurant should be or at least should want to be. The interior, the absinthe, the food! The whole experience was tied together by our amazing server Tilly, we had to ask her name because she was so involving and friendly. She made the whole meal a breeze and helped us feel not out of place at all even though we don't normally afford these luxury meals. 100% worth the money, we highly recommend a visit

title: Excellent food and atmosphere
comment: Excellent food and a very friendly atmosphere, and a lively wine cellar, perfect for a date night. Or a business meal

title: Wonderful French Restaurant, so good we went there twice
comment: It’s not often you find such a superb restaurant right next door to where you are staying The food and service were exceptional, After visiting the first night we were in Windsor, nothing else compared so we went again on our last night and it was still as good, would thoroughly recommend

title: A real restaurant
comment: Tuesday for lunch. It was a bit quiet but very good. This was laid out like a proper restaurant, with a French flavour. Tablecloths and fine glasses/china. Bread comes. Anne had duck and I had sole; both very good and from the Table D'hote menu and plenty of nice wine, then delicious desserts. £60 all in.

title: Best fillet steak ever!
comment: Definitely recommend a visit to A la Russe. The goats cheese and fig starter was delicious and light but the fillet steak was the star of the show. It was cooked to perfection and so tender. The staff were friendly, attentive and funny. The restaurant was busy and the atmosphere spot on. Definitely going back next time we’re in Windsor.

title: Excellent meal.
comment: Lovely find. We were supposed to be in Paris this weekend but covid stopped that.....

title: Perfect romantic dinner
comment: Always been a fantastic restaurant but not been since prior to lockdown. Since re-opening, their COVID measures are very good and we felt safe and comfortable. The staff are brilliant. Attentive and quick. The food was OUT OF THIS WORLD. Probably the best steak we have ever had! Good value as well. Would really recommend this to anyone who wants to eat about but may have concerns over what measure they have in place. Don't worry. We will be back. Thank you

title: Never disappointed
comment: Great food, great staff, great location.

title: Our favourite restaurant never fails to please.
comment: Since opening after lockdown we have visited a few times. We have not had a bad or even mediocre experience, every time it's been brilliant. The greeting from front of house, Pasquale and his team to the genius of Andre in the kitchen. We try to always have something different every time we visit. From the new menu we have between us tried most things and there is nothing we wouldn't order again.

title: Tablecloths
comment: We came to A La Russe for a second time as the first visit was so good.

title: Very good restaurant
comment: We wanted a good meal on my daughter's last night in the UK and this restaurant did not disappoint. We decided upon having starters and desserts. The soufflé starter and the desserts were excellent, as was the side dish of Dauphinoise potatoes. Woul highly recommend

title: Meal with family
comment: Visited Assos for the first time today with family. Thoroughly enjoyed the food, smiles all around. My meal was tasty and the baklava for dessert was a real treat.

title: Very good restaurant
comment: I loved the food , very professional and nice staff . The desserts were amazing . I recommend it , definitely !

title: Poor
comment: Dined here Saturday night.

title: Fantastic Food & Service
comment: Fantastic food (I can highly recommend the pork belly), good wine and great service. An excellent restaurant, enjoyable atmosphere and top quality service. Honestly the best meal I have had in some time.

title: Still fabulous post lockdown
comment: We were so delighted to know that One One Four had survived the past few months & myself & hubbie enjoyed a fabulous meal last night. The lovely Daria waited on us & this is the third time we've met her, so lovely & she was very happy to be working again.

title: Perfect in every way
comment: Went for Sunday lunch . Absolutely amazing menu . Stunning ! Cooked to perfection . My all time favourite restaurant , Tilly our waitress pulled out all the stops , looking after us and making us feel so welcome . This is a must , can’t wait to go back

title: Exquisite dining experience!
comment: I took my girlfriend here for her birthday and we both opted for the 3 course meal. Wow!

title: Superb
comment: The food, service and decor are fantastic! Prices are reasonable for the quality. The menu is limited to 3 per category, but each choice is tempting. Also, if asked they will tweak the reciepe (e.g. for pregancy).

title: Highly recommend!
comment: We have been looking forward to eating at this restaurant for a while, and recently got the chance to...

title: No face masks?
comment: Very surprised to see staff without face masks when they get so close to customers whislt taking orders and serving. What is the reason for this? I know it is not compulsory for restaurants to do so, but common sense says one should.

title: Charming with great food
comment: Had a lovely evening meal here yesterday. I had the special of lamb cutlets and my husband had steak. Perfectly cooked and delicious. Great choice of sides too. Also good choices of wines. Excellent service and a lovely atmosphere.

title: A brilliant find - would definitely recommend
comment: We went here as a party of four, all of us agreed that we had found a gem. We all enjoyed the food and the ambience and we are a pretty discerning group. You can often tell when you begin to read your greeted by the staff and start to read your menus how the evening will go. Other diners too seem to give off positive and negative vibes. At a la Russe all was positive. But on to the food, we were blown away by the quality and value offered. To start three of us had scallops with a pea ravioli and an apple/thyme veloute. This was simply delicious and if I close my eyes I can still taste the sweet, perfectly cooked scallops. The roasted peach and goats cheese with parma ham chosen by my partner was also very much enjoyed. We decided to take advantage of the sorbet/Prosecco based palate cleansers one with Vodka and the other Calvados. Again we would recommend. Our mains consisted of a Fillet steak in a green pepper and brandy sauce. It came cooked as requested (medium rare) and was said to be flavoursome and like cutting through butter. Another of the group opted for the Chicken breast involtini style which was rolled with halloumi, chorizo and parma ham was served with a spicy tomatoe sauce - this was another hit. Two of us plumped for the lamb cutlets which we thought were very good value. They were serves with a wine, shallot and rosemary jus these were soft, cooked to perfection and simply delicious. We ordered four sides to share which are reasonably priced at £3.50 to £4.00. There is a good selection of desserts but only two of us were able to manage them. I would have liked the crepe suzette but none of my companions were up for it. Also due to Covid restrictions it can't be prepared at the table so I'd have missed that show element. Instead I ordered an Eton Mess (well it did seem appropriate) It was good just sweet enough without being too sweet with a good mix of strawberries and decent size chunks of meringue. My other companion had the Tiramisu which again was well received. All in all a very enjoyable evening and somewhere we would definitely return to. The staff were friendly and efficient and were able to make us smile when referring to the rather long pepper grinder as one for social distancing. Oh and there is a glass floor panel in the restaurant where you can see right down into the wine cellar. Very quirky. We meant to ask about the history but were so engrossed in the food we forgot. If you go perhaps you could do so and let us know. But do go if you live in the area we would highly recommend.

title: Best moules marinieres I’ve ever tasted
comment: Only had my starter so far, but it says something when you sex moan while eating! Can’t wait for the main course!

title: Never fails to please
comment: A usual haunt for celebration meals, so when lockdown happened we were concerned that Andre and staff would make it through the other side. How pleased were we when they re opened. We have visited 3 times since reopening and have not been disappointed. From the greeting by Pasquale at front of house and his team to the magic that Andre creates in the kitchen. Since coming here during the last three years we have not had a bad meal. Last night was so no exception and well worth our trip from Crowthorne. We highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Windsor or living within the area. A little gem.

title: Awesome dinner
comment: We were staying near by in an hotel and wanted something special for dinner for us 2 and the kids.

title: Still undoubtedly the best
comment: Still undoubtedly the best restaurant in Windsor for home cooked excellent quality food . Me and my special group of friends were really pleased to return for the first time since February. We regularly come here for our catch ups as we know everytime it never disappoints. The tables always are well spaced in any case which also is why we like coming here. Excellent value for money and you do feel you are well looked after with well dressed tables and attention to detail. Thank you all and we will be back soon. The soufflé and halibut were amazing.

title: A thoroughly enjoyable evening.
comment: A thoroughly enjoyable evening. My starter & main were perfectly executed; peaches with goats cheese (salad dressing was superb) was delicious and my main of Parma ham wrapped sea bream could not be faulted. My wife’s main was also fish; skin was not crispy & meat slightly overcooked. Garlic potatoes were fabulous. Wine was excellent; overall, a great experience and we will return.

title: Great to be back
comment: First time back since the lockdown and it’s still as excellent as ever. Pasquale and front of house team so attentive and friendly. Came as a party of 5 and everyone loved the food. And with the Eat out scheme got £50 off the bill. What more could one want!

title: Lovely Romantic Evening
comment: Had a night away for the first time in too long. Booked A la Russe from reviews and we were not disappointed. Delicious three course meal, excellent service and lovely wine. Couldn't have asked for more and felt comfortable with the reduced capacity. This was our first meal out since lockdown and the return to (semi) normality was very welcome. Will definitely be back next time we are in Windsor.

title: Fantastic dinner - amazing fillet steak!
comment: Terrific service with lovely food and even better atmosphere. The menu has good variety and the wines available are excellent! Throughly enjoyable evening!

title: Anniversary lunch
comment: My wife and I had a wonderful Sunday lunch to celebrate our anniversary. As always the food was delicious and beautifully presented. We had crab cakes and duck parfait to start, followed by the Sunday roast beef. The roast is to be highly recommended. Thanks so much to Tilly for her friendly service - she made our anniversary extra special.

title: Mid week evening visit
comment: 1st time visit with 2 friends. Took advantage of the Government eat out scheme. Good job we booked as packed ! Tables spread out plus perspex sheets between tables. 2 of us had the mixed shish and our friend had the Assos special. Ordered 3 x haloumi cheeses on the side. Delicious ! 3 big bottles of Peroni (no Efes !?) and some soft drinks after. With the max discount, bill came to appx £20 each. Fantastic ! Will be back soon...

title: Birthday
comment: Came here for my sister birthday. It was a bit noisy because there was a big group of people behind us. But the food and service was as good as usual even though it was very busy.

title: Would return again to make up my mind whether a hit or miss.!
comment: Booked for the Bank holiday Mon, (Daughters 1st Wed Anniversary), and happy to see they had sectioned Off the restaurant really well With Perspex sheeting etc due to Covid.

title: Great food (lamb chops and beyti)
comment: Following a recommendation from a good friend of mine I visited Assos for dinner with the family. The waiters greeted us warmly and we were immediately taken to a clean well prepared table.

title: Great waiter and superb food
comment: Lovely meal and service was fantastic. The guy that served us was very friendly and attentive. He made the evening. Highly recommend and will definitely return and recommend.

title: Birthday celebrations
comment: Great meal again in this lovely restaurant for my son's birthday. Friendly staff and the food is delicious

title: First visit since lockdown
comment: Our first visit since lockdown. Very impressed with the setup with moveable Perspex screens positioned between tables and as it was a warm evening the front doors all open. Orders taken promptly for both drinks and food and allergies noted. Food up to their usual good standard and staff attentive but not intrusive.

title: Sunday Lunch at Assos
comment: This is my first visit since the Covid-19 restrictions were put in place. As you can see from the photo the staff are wearing face coverings and the tables are separated in to cubicles. There were tables of up to 6 but groups of more than 6 are grouped on different, but adjoining tables separated by screens.

title: Lovely little cafe
comment: Lovely little cafe in the station .. delicious coffee and amazing cinnamon buns. Crazy one way system though which was a it confusing

title: Worth a visit
comment: Great customer service.

title: Must visit in Windsor
comment: While walking around Windsor for the first time, I found lots of people eating some appetising snack. I quickly traced it to this cafe, and there were lots of people ordering it. Thus I thought it must be good. The queue was not long because staff is very quick and efficient. I ordered a cappuccino and a cinnamon bun. Oh, it was very good. The coffee was also superb, organic flavour with silky texture, reminded me of a very good coffee that I used to have in Manhattan - NY.

title: 👍
comment: Outstanding cappuccino, excellent flapjack and great service, all in a lovely station. A must stop if you’re in the town.

title: Pop your Lycra on for a discount
comment: Stopped off for breakfast after cycling to Windsor. I had a bacon sandwich, cinnamon bun and coffee. Service was swift though the menu is a bit limited on breakfast options. Plenty of seating and there is 10% discount for locals, babies and those on Lycra - nice idea

title: Cinnamon Cafe is the PERFECT stop before you visit Windsor Castle
comment: Windsor is filled with lovely shops and restaurants, and we stopped at the Cinnamon Cafe for a quick breakfast. The location is perfect as it’s nestled next to the Royal Windsor Information Center in the Old Station, directly across from Windsor Castle. Their menu was extensive and we opted for their delicious flat white coffee, while Julian chose the most gigantic cinnamon mocha I’ve ever seen.

title: Had a bacon sandwich and cinnamon
comment: Had a bacon sandwich and cinnamon bun with my daughter this morning and was blown away at the service and organisation. A simple one way system, screen at the counter and by the seating area, very impressive. Lovely friendly staff all in masks, perfect.

title: Great Coffee
comment: The mocha coffee is delicious and you can not visit with out having a Cinnamon bun, they are fab! I also tried the cream cheese and bacon bagel which was very tasty too

title: Nice cinnamon buns
comment: Nice cinnamon buns which my young son devours. Coffee has improved over the years too. Good location near train station. One of the best cafes in Windsor.

title: Not a place to visit unless you’re one of the owners friends!
comment: We waited over an hour for food, received the wrong order and the food was luke warm at best (the chips had gone really soft and the shrimp had gone chewy).

title: Pre lockdown
comment: My partner and I came across poor boys this evening on our way through Kingston cycling to Epsom. Given it was the last night before lockdown we were offered a table without a prior booking, and we were amazed by the absolute attentiveness of you guys! Not often do we write a review but we were so compelled to say how impressed we were. From the moment we sat down, we were waited on so sincerely, from cocktail recommendations to friendly banter, we were made to feel so at home! It was like hanging out with old friends... with lockdown on the horizon, many bars we visited this evening had run out of drinks, staff didn’t seem welcoming, however you guys were on top form and blew us away! So thank you, for your sincere service, and we look forward to popping by for takeaway over the next month. You’re a shot above the rest. We will definitely be recommending you to our friends.

title: What a place...
comment: Blown away by the kindness and warmth of the place, food was amazing, so delicious and hearing it’s all scratch made is wonderful, no corners cut. Music great, decor amazing, felt like being in a friends house. Couldn’t be happier ;)

title: Beyond amazing!!
comment: The food here is always beyond amazing, and it’s service with a smile. I was overjoyed when I found out they were doing takeaway during lockdown, and the food is just as amazing as sitting in. Delivery and ordering were super easy and the delivery driver was lovely. 10/10 on all counts from me, you guys are awesome!

title: Lockdown excellence
comment: Thought we’d try poor boys for a change and weren’t disappointed excellent food and great service!

title: Birthday treat takeaway
comment: Major disappointment!! I ordered a beef brisket with Cajun fries. One of the two slices of beef was 99% fat! Why waste time cooking a lump of fat and sending it out for delivery? The prices aren't cheap so I expected better! I will spread the word."Don't waste your money".

title: Delicious food and great service
comment: Delicious food and excellent, friendly service. Need to get to 100 characters but there’s not much more to say. The breakfast bagel is excellent too!

title: I was disappointed.
comment: I thought this place was a reasonable restaurant until I visited. Unfortunately, it is just a fast food chain with tables. Seafood was over cooked and everything seemed to have batter. WHY!!!

title: 40th Lockdown birthday meal
comment: Hidden gem! Down a quaint cobbled side street, a small rustic niche new Orleans fishing shack.

title: Fantastic!
comment: We had such a wonderful evening here. Food great and staff extremely attentive, particularly our waitress Cydney. They couldn’t have done more for us. This was my first visit and I’ll be back with my family. Thank you!

title: Lovely evening at Lomito.
comment: Lovely evening at Lomito. Great atmosphere, service and food. We were served by Cydney who was excellent and very attentive. As always the food and wine was fabulous and I can’t wait to come back.

title: Lovely dinner at Lomito
comment: Lovely, friendly service at Lomito from our personal waitress Cydney who looked after us all so well and ensured we felt comfortable. Amazing food and staff, great night out. We will be back, thank you!

title: Sensational.
comment: Good day all round - little traffic, Sun shining, and a brilliant luncheon in Northwood.

title: Fillet Steak
comment: Great steak, no fat, very nice bit of meat but very expensive. Service was very good, bread was lovely and waiter was prompt.

title: Fantastic !!
comment: We went for a family meal for my birthday yesterday afternoon and already can’t wait to go back again. Our Waitress, Rachel was so attentive and friendly, made some excellent recommendations on food and drink from the menu. The food was so delicious and cooked so well (would highly suggest the Sunday roast for anyone visiting on a Sunday ). Would 110% recommend Lomito to anyone looking for a place to eat within the Northwood area !!

title: Rude staff
comment: We were due to make a reservation there yesterday, when I popped in at 6.15pm to reserve a table for 7pm, I asked to use the toilet. The waiter at the door point blank refused to allow me to use the toilet.

title: Lockdown 2 Perfect Takeaway!
comment: Great experience from ordering to collection to eating - the last bit embarrassingly fast. Great steak and chips and chicken- well packaged for takeaway. We will be back and strongly recommend for those missing a treat!

title: Excellent food and service
comment: Excellent food and service even though the restaurant was busy. Our waiter Theo looked after our table of 5 very well.

title: One of our favourite restaurantsin Northwood
comment: Always a very friendly and welcoming restaurant,whose staff make you feel at home.The menu offers a good range of steaks, some of which are a bit on the expensive side.However there are lots else to choose from.Wines by the glass are good value

title: Disappointed by the mains
comment: Great starters prawn toast , satay and then dumplings great SO disappointed with Chicken In Ginger and Spring onion and their signature dish of Green Curry both like soup no sauce more like water dreadful .

title: Just No !!
comment: Ordered through Uber eats initially for it to be cancelled 45 mins later and then decided to order through deliveroo and collect and the order was completely wrong and just about edible

title: Fantastic Thai Food :-)
comment: We were staying in the area for the weekend & visited on Saturday night for my husbands birthday with our two children (aged 10 & 7). The service was fantastic and the food was truly one of the best Thai meals we have had (and we have had a lot!) The staff went over and above and food was beautifully presented and full of flavour. They recommended the children to share a dish even though we were going to order two and as we left they even gave our son one of the transformers he was playing with! Would highly recommend this restaurant, it is very authentic ....a little gem :-)

title: Ordered takeout from this restaurant
comment: Haven’t eaten inside this place but today we ordered food from this restaurant which was delivered to us. The food tasted great. My only reason for the three star rating was the lack of prawns in our dishes. Lots of curry yes but obly 2-3 prawns in each dish. Not great if you’re feeding a family of 4.

title: Still the No 1 Thai in the area
comment: We have been regulars of this restaurant for many years and was very happy to see them reopen as a proper socially distancing eatery after lockdown. Staff are lovely and always so welcoming and the food is really, really good. We’re lucky to have such an authentic, cosy Thai in our area.

title: Amazing takeaway
comment: Absolutely love this new Thai restaurant. I ordered pad Thai and massaman curry and it was delicious. I’ve ordered three times now from this restaurant. Delivery is always on time, food always hot and lovely quality. Highly recommended x

title: Wonderful food and service
comment: Wonderful food and wonderful service. Each time we eat here we love the food and never feel bloated afterwards. The service is wonderful too and it’s a really authentic experience

title: Great
comment: Number One Thai is really lovely restaurant to eat Thai. Staff are welcoming. They maintain social distance and present food mannerly. yes they deserve 5 stars

title: Funky and Different
comment: Had a great fun lunch Tacos and chicken wings

title: Staff made us feel welcome!
comment: I've been in here a few times and always found the food absolutely delicious and the staff are super friendly.

title: How have I not been here before
comment: Monday lunchtime and my son and I were hungry. We walked in and sat down. I was offered the beers to taste.

title: Time to wax lyrical about Carved...
comment: I’ve been eating at Carved whenever I get the time ever since it opened and it’s always the best. I always say to myself when I eat there “why don’t I come here more often?” Compounded by the fact I’m a big NFL fan. The food is epic. Simple as that. Proper American food done very very well (I personally think “American” food is done poorly in the U.K. Like I never enjoy Bodeans when I eat there as an example.) The service is always top notch. Friendly staff that clearly care about the experience their patrons are having. Everyone seems to enjoy working there! Chatty and happy. Drinks are great. I remember when they didn’t have any draught beer! That was a big upgrade in my opinion. A mix of classic and classic with a twist cocktails are done well also. If Gordon Ramsey ate at Carved, he would say the food/drinks/overall brand is executed brilliantly 100%. I’m no chef or restaurateur but I think Carved is so Franchiseable. Recommendation for patrons: O.G burger with a Camden Hells. Advice to Carved: Fish tacos all year round.

title: Stopped for drinks and brunch
comment: Thought would give this place a go as keep walking pass...met by friendly and helpful bar man ..ordered drinks beer and a jd. Whilst deciding on food . Ordered food. Drinks were very good food was ok nothing special...after lunch visited toilet...big mistake !!!! If I had seen the state of toilets and back area of place would not of had a drink let alone any food.!!! Sorry to day will not be going back .

title: Embarrassingly poor
comment: Used to be a massive fan of Carved when it first opened and was a regular visitor with friends.

title: Grabbing Dinner
comment: Very good Burgers and Beer. Unplanned but worth stopping by and filling up. No Draft Beer just bottles but friendly service.

title: Good meaty burgers
comment: Came here for dinner one evening, place was pretty empty which was a shame. Burgers were really nice and tsunami fries were delicious

title: Excellent food and great service
comment: Found this by accident really and booked last minute. Very pleased I did. Staff were friendly and attentive, surroundings were very good and food was excellent. Clearly busy most of the time so worth booking. If in this area and looking for quality steak, this is the one

title: Great home made burgers.
comment: Great home made burgers. The sloppy Joe was so good.... excellent atmosphere and beers were on tap....

title: Brilliant Sunday lunch
comment: Visited this weekend based on a recommendation....loved it. Great staff, great food and great atmosphere. Roast beef was excellent, medium rare, loads of well cooked veg and huge Yorkshire pudding!

title: Nice outdoors
comment: Very nicely appointed outside area with small amount of cover available to book in advance. No space heaters so no environnemental impact. Beautiful interior and facilities.

title: Best Thai restaurant I’ve been to
comment: We had a meal for the first time here (Friday night) and it was honestly the best Thai food I’ve eaten in England - really tasty dishes, loads of flavour and great portion sizes. Very friendly and attentive staff, couldn’t do more for you. We really enjoyed our meal and will defiantly be visiting again.

title: Ok but expensive
comment: Went with my son but i used to go here when it was a wine bar 25 years ago and not much changed really . Same layout , the food was ok but thought it was expensive for what we had. Wouldn’t rush back .

title: Same as always. Just amazing
comment: Same as always. Just amazing

title: Really nice food
comment: Keep coming back here. Although it's small we like the atmosphere and friendly staff. Ordered the mixed starter which is always nice, would just like a little more sauce for the Satay. My husband ordered the red beef curry and I had the duck with ginger and chillies which was lovely and spicy. The pad Thai is also really good. We did have to wait for our drinks but upon paying the bill we were given a bottle of prosecco as a Christmas gift which was a nice touch.

title: What a brilliant Thai restaurant.
comment: What a brilliant Thai restaurant. Managed to fit us in on a busy Saturday night with a last minute booking. Food was absolutely beautiful especially the hot and sour soup. Will be back

title:
Just perfect
Most authentic
comment: Just perfect

title: Amazing Thai
comment: Amazing Thai. Never disappoints. Food fantastic. Fast delivery. Been waiting for restaurant to open since lockdown. Did not disappoint. Fabulous food.

title: Favorite place!!
comment: The best place to eat around here! The portions are big, the service is brilliant! The sliced duck in chilli and ginger is my favourite by far!!

title: Home Delivery - Amazing Food
comment: We had a delivery from them this evening for the first time. Absolutely lovely meal, hot, tasty, well packaged, very timely arrival and amazing taste. Proper Thai delivered to my door. Thank you.

title: Best thai food anywhere near here
comment: Great food and service, if you love thai food then this is where you want to go without question, not too pricey either

title: Big Buns
comment: I really like carved .. great burgers and chilled atmosphere .. will be back to try more from the menu

title: Lunch
comment: We’ve walked past here numerous times and decided to give it a try today. Nice, friendly staff, so first impression was good. Burgers were delicious but the fries were coated in a Cajun seasoning and it was a bit over powerful. Very generous portions. Overall, a decent place to eat in Bexleyheath.

title: Best Restsurant for miles.
comment: I have quickly become a massive fan of this restaurant. It is the best place for food for miles around. A funky and fun venue. Staff always happy and helpful. The food speaks for itself. It's packed with flavour, its delicious. Its a perfect spot for dates, hanging with friends it enjoying some family time. I've even slipped in solo a few cheeky times. Can't speak highly enough.

title: Needs to step its game up
comment: This is a friendly place with nice guys running it But if it busy the service is very very poor. Needs to improve its operation or it won't survive

title: Amazing Philly cheese steak
comment: A friend kept going on about this place.. so I was looking forward to going with all the hype. Aesthetically It had a proper New York vibe, without feeling cheesy which was cool. I only ordered a philly cheese steak sandwich and a beer (goose IPA which was also great). I have to say the cheese steak sandwich was epic! Not greasy, steak was thin and cooked perfectly, the brioche bun was a great addition. Definitely the best American style food restaurant in Bexleyheath. It’s a breath of fresh air compared to all the high street chain franchises - Highly recommend.

title: Querky Dining
comment: Great place to eat. Seems expensive for a sandwich but wait till you try them and they are substantial enough to share.

title: Not clean
comment: I was really disappointed today as I really wanted to enjoy my lunch. I order my burger and then saw the waiter use his blue glove to open dirty doors, take money and then assemble our burger with the same glove. We approached the waiter asking if he had changed his glove and he simply replaced the glove with a new one and continued making our food. No apology, no explanation just the fact he said "I'm rushed off my feet" so we left without eating. At no point should paying customers have their hygiene compromised. We don't need to eat dirty food.

title: Food fail Friday
comment: I have been a customer here a few times and experiences have been let’s say very mixed.

title: Burgers similar to 5 guys not bad
comment: I thought for the price this place was good.... roughly spend £20 - £25 or less for a meal plus appetizer.

title: Good food, good beer, warm surroundings
comment: Warm greeting by the staff, well spaced tables, quick drink order and informed server about the specials of the day. Beer well presented and clearly well kept; the pie was very good, perhaps just a little too much pastry to filling, but decent mash and greens. the decor and ambience both very good

title: Bad Service, cold food. Not always like this.
comment: 17:00 on a Saturday afternoon, my girlfriend and I decided over Miller and Carter to go to Carved. She's a resident in Bexleyheath and we've been before a few times.

title: Thank you so much
comment: We had a delicious lunch to celebrate a birthday. The staff were warm and welcoming. We were not rushed and the ambience was superb. Thank you so much

title: Always a good experience
comment: This pub has the best service in Kingston, need I say more. They've done a nice job on the refurbishment too.

title: Relaxed atmosphere, lovely food
comment: Popped in for an early dinner on Friday evening. Staff very friendly, food was really nice, in a relaxed setting. One of our favourite 'gastro pubs' in Kingston

title: Excellent!
comment: Great pub meal! Chicken Kiev beautifully cooked and sea bass wonderful. Sticky toffee to die for. Brilliant service from young staff. Will be back!

title: Great Sunday Roast!
comment: Had an amazing Sunday roast here. The interior is very well furnished and decorated and overall lovely atmosphere.

title: The Best pub in Kingston. And kids friendly too.
comment: We have a 3yo and it is not easy to find a decent place to eat that is also kids friendly and clean at the same time. This place ticks all the boxes - it is wonderfully renovated, bright, cosy and clean. Very professional and friendly staff. And of course food - amazing. (We had burgers - perfection on a plate).

title: Special
comment: Eaten here on numerous occasions,each time excellent service and even better food.

title: Slloooowwwww
comment: Our booking was at 7:30. Excitedly we hadn’t eaten all afternoon. We ordered promptly but our Starters were disappointingly late. The soft shell crab was over cooked and fried. The main course food was delicious but arrived so late out we didn’t get to savour the dishes but we actually had less than 30 minutes to eat under the new curfew rules and rushed our meal.

title: All hype, but no substance.
comment: Absolutely awful service. (Partially a reflection of waiting staff and equally of the kitchen preparing the food). The waitress wrote the order down wrong, then we walked through it with her to be sure and when the food arrived, they'd still left dishes off!

title: Delicious food
comment: It was very delicious food and entire family enjoyed the lovely food at Indian Zest.

title: Curry above the norm
comment: Have had a sit down curry and a takeaway. On both occasions the flavours were exceptional.

title: Takeaway
comment: Used to really enjoy the food here but sadly it’s lost it’s edge and quality. Won’t be using again. In addition, had to wait too long

title: Tasty food and good service
comment: Thank you for a most enjoyable evening meal in very congenial surroundings. I love Indian food and Zest does it well.

title: Beautiful food
comment: Every time we come to this restaurant the food is delicious, especially the Chicken Miravna. We always try the specials and these always delight

title: Delicious
comment: We had a takeaway from Indian Zest last week having eaten in a few times. We were able to use the website to pre-order for delivery at a selected time. The food arrived on time and was absolutely superb. The quality of the produce and the flavours were wonderful, it is by far the best Indian restaurant in the area. Can't wait to be able to visit again!

title: Another great meal at the Canbury Arms
comment: Consistently good food, good service and a nice setting. Very grateful that the Canbury Arms is my local.

title: Having not tried zest for
comment: Having not tried zest for a couple of years decided to give takeaway a go during lockdown. Menu is a bit different to your standard curry house which is nice. What an amazing experience, meats are excellent cuts and the curry exceptional. We’ve had two takeaways in 2 weeks and both were top draw! Keema Naan also top draw, so many get it wrong. Highly recommended!

title: Thanks for a cozy celebration
comment: We had a dinner with friends celebrating several occasions at once ; they let us bring my own wine as an exception, as I had saved a very special wine bottle for my friends. We loved the cold meze which was more than enough for a starter, and we enjoyed the vegetarian moussaka and kebabs very well-made. Everything was perfect. Turkish coffee was served in a beautiful silver cup with a plate. Loved Baklava. The food and atmosphere gave authentic impression.

title: Delicious mixed kebab
comment: Sat outside on a pleasant evening. Delicious mixed kebab - chicken and pork served with rice. Nice place to be with a decent beer. Service was also very attentive - very good overall.

title: Amazing food - highly recommend
comment: Came in here on the off chance whilst staying in the premier inn around the corner...saw the other great reviews on trip advisor and it did indeed live up to expectations! Food was incredible (easily the best baklava I’ve ever had), really lovely atmosphere and superb service. Would also recommend!

title: Disappointing
comment: Was really concerned that the tables were not socially distanced so when we were offered a table by the window where would have been barely 1m away from the next person we asked for a different one. No face coverings worn by the staff who went from table to table - felt a little unsafe in the current climate. Choice of food was limited but what we had was ok. Baklava was very disappointing - have had this abroad and here before. Only choice of 3 desserts which were also quite pricey for what you had, especially the ice cream. Shame as in a nice setting.

title: Excellent service, great food, fantastic options for Veggies too
comment: Visited on a week night. Good sized portions, very well presented. Fantastic flavours and such a great selection for a Veggie. My meat eating friend confirmed his meal was also delicious. Will definitely return. What a find, in Brentford too!

title: Staff so rude
comment: We order from here a lot as the food is usually good however tonight they missed stuff from our order and gave no dips for one of the dishes. When we called we were told “we aren’t a kebab shop and we never send wraps” they send them every time it’s part of the dish. Cannot believe how rude he was we will never order from here again! Didn’t enjoy the food at all this time as no dip

title: Amazing....
comment: I am a meat lover and boy was I happy to discover that these guys know how to cook. Each meal I had has been heaven. The portions are nice and I highly recommend you try it. Its super yummy....I have ordered here every day since I discovered them

title: Disappointing food
comment: This is quite an expensive restaurant for the dishes they serve, but thought we would give it a go. What a let down, the meat was chewy which was the main part of our meal and the staff were rather rude

title: First time out from shielding.
comment: First time out from shielding. Lovely meal as always & staff friendly & welcoming. The tables are 2m apart so you don’t feel worried about being near anyone. Only concern I have is that the masks staff were wearing were worn intermittently on/off etc and some weren’t wearing any. I would feel more at ease if staff continued to wear the masks at all times when visiting your table, leaving the bill, serving your food etc as they are too close to you.

title: Best Indian I’ve ever had
comment: Best Indian I’ve ever had and the staff are SO friendly, welcoming and knowledgable. Thank you Shampan!

title: Disgusting service!
comment: Ordered online, the order turnt up completely incorrect. Called up to advise of the issue to be told they don't have a driver which was a lie as he had just made my delivery, I was advised to come and collect the food myself.

title: Special evening ruined
comment: Warm welcome and attentive service.

title: Amazing food and service
comment: First visit to a restaurant after lockdown. Wonderful service by Jay and delicious food. Really enjoyed the atmosphere and the measures to make it safer to dine in due to COVID.

title: Delicious authentic food
comment: Went there with a friend and had a lovely experience.

title: Smashing
comment: I took a group of seven to the Indian Zest this week. I’m a big fan of this restaurant. It’s in a lovely building and is not at all cheesy like many Indian restaurants. Most of the dishes are not what you’d find in provincial Indian restaurants in Britain. They are fresher and tastier. I had an excellent fish curry and we all had a great evening.

title: Poor food
comment: Visited for set lunch menu. The service was fine, however the food not so good. The starter of tikki and bhajia (onion Bhakti). - both had been over fried. The tikki was difficult to cut with the knife as the coating was so hard, the same with other. Sag panner was over spiced. Really disappointing after reading other reviews.

title: Still one of the best curry houses in Surrey
comment: Top Tip - if you want superior curry Or something out of the ordinary, this is the place to go. Definitely book ahead

title: Disappointing meal
comment: Visited this restaurant after reading some of the reviews unfortunately we were disappointed both with value and quality.The vegetarian menu is limited so we ordered items from side order section .The starter was poor value 4 pieces of Bajia for £14 .We found the food very hot ( chilli)

title: Zest for Life!
comment: Best Indian food ever! Sumptious. Staff very attentive for our friends birthday celebration outside in courtyard. Delicious flavours. Cant get over how tasty the food was and freshly made naans.

title: Zest for life!
comment: Visited for birthday party set up in courtyard outside. 3 tables. Fabulous attention from staff. The food was sumptious -best Indian food I have ever tasted. Delicious and freshly cooked. Cant recommend enough!

title: Worth a visit
comment: Amazing food, great service and lovely calm atmosphere. The food is very different to the normal Indian cuisine. Would highly recommend it.

title: Food was amazing, service could do with improvements
comment: We visited the Shampan for my mums birthday at the end of September. My parents are regulars and have always said how amazing the place is so couldn’t wait to try for myself.

title: Mediocre masala
comment: Despite lovely atmosphere and authentic decor we were slightly underwhelmed at the lack of flavour in some of the dishes from the limited menu. Staff were pleasant but somewhat slow, we acknowledge that it was busy as they were participating in the Eat out to Help out initiative but we were left waiting great lengths of time to be served.

title: WONDERFUL . Had the most delicious
comment: WONDERFUL . Had the most delicious meal last night here. The food was absolutely amazing and the service was excellent .

title: Amazing food and service
comment: Food is amazing and brilliant service, thank you Hapiz for looking after us. We had a lovely time and would definitely recommend.

title: Delicious food and great service!
comment: My husband and I had a delicious Indian feast at Shampan! The food is sooo good! We definitely recommend Aloo Chops as one of the starters! The service was really warm and friendly- we were looked after by Hafiz and Bappy :)

title: Definitely recommend
comment: Lovely service, lovely atmosphere, lovely food. Definitely recommend. Thank you to our waiter Hafiz who looked after us all evening.

title: Poor service
comment: Ive been a regular customer for some years. Tonight as per lockdown I used the app to place my order and was advised a time to pick having pre paid. I waited some 25 minutes passed my requested pick up time whilst the staff dealt with every delivery driver who seemed to be placed in a higher priority list before any customer being served despite arriving later than others.The staff in the meantime batted back calls on the phone of incorrect orders

title: A fairly average Italian
comment: A friendly welcome and a very vibrant atmosphere. Food good but portions a little large. I opted for the special main course, not asking the price, as most people wouldn’t, and was disappointed to find it was almost £10 more than the other dishes and at £25 for a standard fish dish was expensive.

title: No social distancing
comment: Well, we walked out. After being shown to a table with less than a foot between us and the people next to us we spoke with the waiter and asked to be moved, he seemed to be be head waiter. We said we were not happy only to be told 'well we are busy and over booked' we said we would have to go and he said OK. On our way out we then passed a table of 8 celebrating a birthday !! We pointed this out to the same waiter to be told there was a gap in the tables, there wasn't!!

title: Ignoring COVID
comment: This is a small restaurant with loads of tables. We went Saturday thinking that they were be taking precautions for COVID and there would be less tables in there I was wrong , the table next to us was less than half a meter distance, people were crammed in and nearly all tables were occupied . Staff not wearing masks properly and

title: Always the Best Italian Restaurant in Sidcup...
comment: We came quite often in this restaurant and always everything it is spot on. I was last night with my wife and I think they are taking care of Covid-19 as I saw less tables and distance was fair enough to me, hand sanitizer,waiters they all had face masks and check in book provided to us which means the are being careful.

title: Don't Bother with Delivery!
comment: The first time we visited the restaurant, the food and service was excellent, so I had high hopes when I ordered food for one to be delivered. I ordered at 6.19 and the docket had a time out of 6.49. After several phone calls, my food arrived at 8.10 pm almost two hours after the order was placed. I phoned after one hour and was told the driver was leaving. I am only 10 minutes away from the restaurant. He did not arrive. When he eventually got here he said he had gone back to the restaurant and the food had been cooked then. Obviously, whoever I spoke to had not been telling me the truth. I asked to speak to the manager but was told he was 'away'. Of course, when I opened the bag, the food was cold and certainly nowhere near the quality of the food we had in the restaurant. The small poppadoms were oily and tasteless, totally unlike the ones we had in the restaurant A waste of £32.85 for chicken masala, rice, dal, a plain nan and poppadums for one person. I would not advise ordering food for delivery from Chatora as their system is hopeless. Also on line a 20% discount is offered but when this was taken off my order, it came to less than their minimum order of £30, so the discount was removed!!

title: Brilliant birthday meal!
comment: Absolutely divine food! My family surprised me for my birthday & i’m sooo glad they picked such a lovely restaurant. The ambiance, decor & vibes were great! The staff were so lovely & attentive. Special shout out to the owner who helped us through the menu & was able to veganise a few dishes from the new menu. Every single part of our meal was delicious! I will definitely be returning in the future!

title: There's soup, home-made soup and Derrek's Mum's 'Home-Made soup
comment: Possibly THE best soup ever...full of chunks of lamb with potatoes and dumplings. This plus the great salads, great tea, paninis plus a table overlooking the river. They even arranged for the sun to shine.

title: Great food
comment: Nice meal. Lots of variety on the menu. I had a pepperoni pizza and shared some chips and onion rings, all were very good

title: Our first meal out tonight
comment: Our first meal out tonight for so long and the Beautiful South did not disappoint. We took our granddaughter who was a bit nervous about going out to eat again. Such a great welcome and any worries she had about going to eat out were soon gone. Temperatures taken as we went in and every possible precaution taken without it taking away any of the pleasure in dining out after so long. Great food, lovely service - we’re so lucky to have a restaurant of this caliber locally.

title: Incredible vegetarian food and wonderful atmosphere
comment: We recently moved to the area and saw the great reviews for this restaurant so had to give it a try. We were not disappointed! The place was buzzing when we arrived but safety measures (including a temperature check) had been put in place so we felt comfortable. We are both vegetarian so were worried about there potentially being a lack of choice but there was a range of options and each course was sublime. The padron peppers in particular were a highlight. Staff were friendly and accommodating. We will definitely be back!

title: A wonderful evening
comment: We felt totally safe with the measures taken. Had temperature check on arrival next to the auto hand sanitizer. There was lots of space between the tables.

title: Delicious Lunch💙
comment: Just popped in for a quick lunch as I didn’t have much time, and was greeted by the waitress Airina... the service she gave to me knowing the limited time I had was impeccable... She really looked after me, and my lunch I had was delicious...next time I’ll try their Pizza’s as the waitress recommends...

title: Lockdown Father's Day Take Away - 21st June 2020
comment: If you want exquisite and delicious Italian food, Toscana, Sidcup is the place to visit. My wife and I had take away meat balls and barbecue ribs for starters followed by Linguine with fresh water tiger prawns, paprika, cream brandy and chives and Tagliatelle with smoked salmon, fresh cream, chopped leek and fresh dill, The food was piping hot, delicious and the portions were generous. We can't wait to order this weekend as well.

title: Lovely food nice atmosphere
comment: All the food we ate was lovely and the portion sizes generous. Every course we had was lovely and the atmosphere in the restaurant good

title: Just eaten another wonderful
comment: Just eaten another wonderful dinner from Toscana. We’ve used Toscana for a few takeaways during the last three months and the food is not only great but plentiful (understatement). We can’t recommend enough. Even when restaurants can open again it would be brilliant if they continued to offer a takeaway service.

title: Wow the food here is fantastic
comment: Wow the food here is fantastic

title: Wonderful to see them again!
comment: Went almost monthly before lockdown and then had takeaway a couple of times. Has always been fantastic for both food and service.

title: Bottomless lunch
comment: Visited a few weeks ago for a bottomless brunch on a Sunday with family. At £25 you get 3 courses and the choice of bottomless beer, prosecco or wine. I couldn’t believe the quality of the food and the prosecco for this price. I’ve been to other bottomless brunches where the prosecco has been rubbish, but here it was lovely and drinks were constantly being topped up. Food was small portions but very rich so we were full up by the end the fig rice pudding for dessert was my favourite. All staff including the manager Anson were very polite and friendly, wearing masks and adhering to covid measures. You won’t find a better value bottomless brunch for this quality, highly recommend and I will be back.

title: Great food and service
comment: Visited for dinner. The service was exceptional. The food delicious and not your routine Indian. Limited menu with lots of variations. Will visit again.

title: A real Gem of a place to stay
comment: Just spent a wonderful weekend at the Crown and Cushion. A wonderful pub right on Eton High Street with residents’ parking at the rear.

title: Value value value!
comment: We stayed at this establishment to visit the theatre in Windsor. Only a stroll over the bridge. The friendliest staff we have ever encountered. Lovely large room and exceptional breakfast. Parking and breakfast included in the quoted price. We are already arranging our next visit.

title: Lovely food great service
comment: We went to Beautiful South for my son’s 21st Birthday meal with family (12 of us) in mid December.

title: Thanks Rishi
comment: This was our fourth visit to Roz Ana. It has most certainly become our Indian restaurant of choice but is usually saved for a special occasion as its prices are more than we can afford to pay on a regular basis. On this occasion the Chancellor himself was subsidising our meal so how could we refuse? As ever, we enjoyed the buzz in the place, the stylish interiors, the Bollywood dance sequences screened on a wall and the friendly masked staff. However it is the food that is the real star here and we were not disappointed in our choices. The Laphroaig flavoured tandoori chicken is a marvellous dish and the lamb was as tender as, well as tender as lamb can be. I had decided to score our experience 4 out of 5 ( docking a point for the investment required) but that is just churlish in these benighted times so a 5 it is, and thoroughly well deserved.

title: Valentine
comment: Great food and wonderful service.

title: Perfect Choice
comment: The perfect choice for a team lunch. A polite greeting before being taken to our table and offered a glass of Prosecco whilst waiting for other members to arrive. Beautiful ambience, duck was cooked to perfection with plum sauce. Colleagues complimented the Turkey, Steak, veg option and Salmon although Salmon could of been cooked a minute or two more. Will definitely go again with friends.

title: Great Environment!
comment: We found it via tripadvisors and the reviews were helpful and correct. We loved the music, relaxed atmosphere and the generous servings on your plate! It is a casual restaurant but the food and atmosphere were great, we did not want to leave but we had to because we had to go and pick someone!

title: Best independent bar and cafe
comment: Always great recommendations from people working there, friendly, atmospheric, and a range of new drinks. Great local feel, best views and lovely decor!

title: Very good Italian lunch
comment: It was the hottest day of the year so far, and probably for the whole year. There is a lovely outside seating area mostly separated from the road by very nice small bushes.

title: Hidden gem of Barking
comment: Had a lovely lunch with lovely views along the river. Staff were friendly and helpful. Good choice of both food and drink. There was also a bbq on the day that we went which was brilliant.

title: Very disappointing - closed with no notice!
comment: Drove to Treviso to celebrate my birthday with my family, including my baby son. My parents had travelled a long way to take us, and had confirmed booking the week before via phone. When we arrived, the restaurant was closed with a sign on the door saying “closed due to gas problems.” We hadn’t received a call, email or any kind of message as to the closure, which would have given us time to book somewhere else. The issue was not that they had had to close, it was that we had not been told. Luckily, with a hungry baby in tow, we managed to make a last minute booking at Sebastian’s Italian down the road - which was absolutely fantastic from start to finish and I would thoroughly recommend. Luckily not a wasted trip for my family in the end!

title: Good food
comment: I'm glad I booked because before too long they were turning people away.

title: Very poor show
comment: We had booked this restaurant for a special occasion and had travelled a long way only to find it closed!!!!! No phone call, no message left to inform us that they had a problem with the gas supply. After a Google search and a phone call to another Italian close by, we ended up in Sebastian's, which was outstanding. Great food and excellent customer service saved our day. Treviso, you could learn something from this restaurant!!!!

title: Gorgeous little Italian restaurant
comment: Gorgeous little Italian restaurant in Kew - it’s always packed and has a great atmosphere, charming and welcoming staff and the food is so delicious - yummy, yummy, yummy - what more can I say!

title: Hidden gem tucked away!
comment: Really happy to stumble into this place, was very busy when we went, service and food was good with lots of different drinks available

title: Amazing evening with friends
comment: We visited with few friends on Friday evening and had a great time.

title: Love it!
comment: A lively atmosphere and hidden location in the heart of beautiful Richmond.

title: Great Dinner
comment: Beautiful restaurant. Awesome food.

title: My first visit of the place
comment: We went there for early dinner on sunday. 12 of us in total. They set the tables at bottom area for us which is good.

title: Birthday feast
comment: My son booked this restaurant for my Birthday , six of us all ages and an 87 year old ... the food is amazing something for everyone ,apart from the basics pizza/burgers( which are excellent !!) ...the Lebanese food is so tasty ,I had a mixed grill , my husband had ribs, lots of little nibbles you could order as appetisers , I really enjoyed every minute and will be back ....the service is excellent also ...what more could you wish for ...

title: ribs - insane!
comment: food is unreal would defo recommend the ribs and kofta and a cheeky Eton mess to finish off with 10/10 from me :)

title: Brilliant 1st visit
comment: We were a table of 8 and it was our first time to the Richmond vault and I can say I will be going back!

title: Great vegan options in Richmond
comment: A hidden jem definitly worth finding. A range of vegan options and a nice atmosphere. Will definitely visit again.

title: Favourite spot in Richmond
comment: Our first meal out since March and it just had to be Richmond Vaults. Yet another perfect meal. Hearty, mouthwatering portions - the meat fell off the bone. Especially recommend the lamb shank. Of course the beers are fantastic, as is to be expected, but the cocktails are delicious too. Attentive, kind, friendly staff who were kitted out in PPE and very careful not to cross contaminate etc by washing hands and changing gloves between serving each table. There was even individual bottles of hand sanitiser on each table, which was a nice touch. We frequent many restaurants in the local area and this is far and away our favourite. Big thank to you to all the team yet again.

title: Always a treat!
comment: I love everything about this restaurant. I have been visiting it for several years and have never been disappointed. Once again I had a superb meal before attending the rugby on Sunday. The meal was absolutely delicious, served promptly in a great restaurant with a lovely atmosphere. My favourite in the area!

title: Perfect Italian Restaurant
comment: Delicious Italian food and friendly, warm service everytime. Great for a special occasion or for a casual mid week meal. Always perfect!

title: “Fabulous seafood and great environment “
comment: When you look forward to much to go to a restaurant and it doesn’t disappoint in any way. From the lovely outdoor seating, to friendly polite, professional staff, to superb cuisine.

title: Coronavirus take away
comment: Absolutely stunning - this restaurant goes above and beyond time and time again - sad we couldn’t sit in and drink wine but we will soon. Thank you so so much for a beautifully prepared meal which was the best food since we were last with you before the lock down. Keep safe and see you soon x

title: horrible food & worse service.
comment: food was bland, owners were rude- seemed like they were only treating the poc with disrespect. Clearly racist. Don’t bother wasting your money in such a terrible restaurant.

title: Lovely Lunch by the River
comment: We came along for a quick bite to eat and we're warmly greeted by the owners who immediately recommended delicious jerk chicken and fish macaroni meals that they were willing to make for us not on their usual lunch menu of paninis. We enjoyed a gorgeous view of the river and we're disappointed we couldn't have stayed longer for the BBQ party they were planning that day. Would definitely return!

title: Hidden gem
comment: I was visiting a show at the excel and fancied a walk. Hard to find but well worth it. The owner was a true gent and I'll be back next time im down from liverpool. Seek it out that man Derrick knows his liquor. Congrats on such a place

title: As Others Have Already Said - The Proverbial "Hidden Gem"
comment: Despite only living just across the "border" in East Ham and intending to visit The Boathouse Cafe and Bar since it had first opened, we eventually got around to visiting it yesterday afternoon. To put it simply, we found (as others have already said) that it's the proverbial "hidden gem". A fine outside terrace overlooking the River Roding/Barking Creek, plus a comfortable looking "artistically decorated" small bar serving a full range of drinks (with or without alcohol!) including four decent craft beers (£5 per pint) which was an added bonus - we were expecting bottled beers only. On our next visit, we'll have to try the food which certainly looked very tempting (though I was amused to read the one negative review of The Boathouse Cafe and Bar which expressed disappointment that it wasn't a restaurant - lets be honest - the name is a bit of a give-away) Very highly recommended!

title: Hidden Gem
comment: Great food, beer and very friendly helpful service. This place is a hidden gem in Barking by the river.

title: Beautiful place
comment: Lovely place highly recommend , nice staff, fantastic homemade food and cocktails . Drinks are one of a kind and really hard to find anywhere else.

title: Transported to a world that is in order...
comment: Imagine this....

title: Lovely little riverside bar
comment: We have been going to Boathouse since last year, once every few months.

title: We spent New Year's Eve here
comment: We spent New Year's Eve here and it was our best celebration for years. The food was lovely, a set menu with plenty for everyone, the staff couldn't do enough for us, and the atmosphere was great. Drinks were not overpriced. Wine was very reasonable.

title: Christmas Day DInner
comment: Excellent Christmas day dinner,very accommodating for the fussy vegetarian dinners in our party. Prawn starters was amazing and Christmas Turkey was lovely..when my mother said, she loved it..I knew we were onto a winner here...great atmosphere too..well done to the waiting staff too.

title: Always a beautiful dinner
comment: The Beautiful South is easily my favourite restaurant. I always suggest it to friends whenever I’m going out to eat as it always makes for a great meal and evening. The service is always fantastic and really friendly. The food is beautiful. I have tried several dishes off the menu and it is has all been delicious. Everyone I have taken to this restaurant has really enjoyed it and I will continue to go myself and continue to recommend it.

title: what a fantastic place
comment: i really enjoy it here love a candle lit dinner .. the food is really nice and its great value for money in a area that is very expensive and some places just dont offer that value

title: This restaurant should not allow large party bookings which they are clearly not able to cope with.
comment: There was a birthday party booked for the same night we visited at which there were at least 40 guests.We were seated at the back next to the party tables. The guests decided it would be acceptable to stand up next to the bar and also stand in their designated area. The staff were making no effort to get the guests seated and were even serving them drinks. After half an hour I complained to the manageress, who said that the seating area wasn't ready. This was a lie as the tables were ready to sit at. After another 15 minutes I again complained and was told this time that she had asked the guests to sit down but they weren't listening. During all of this time the crowd at the bar behind where we were sitting kept barging into our chairs and the noise they were making was horrendous.

title: Excellent Service and Delicious Food
comment: As a vegan; the staff were very accommodating and gave me plenty of delicious options I could try. The food was full of flavor and colour. The service was warm and welcoming. I would recommend this restaurant to all my family and friends. Great place for Sunday lunch.

title: Brilliant Restaurant
comment: Brilliant restaurant, food is amazing and staff so welcoming and lovely. I am recently trying to be pescatarian and the fish is amazing, beautifully cooked. I had the monkfish.

title: Excellent value, delicious food!
comment: We were looking for somewhere to have lunch but had our two dogs with us. We were turned away from several other places in Windsor before we were warmly welcomed at The Crown and Cushion. We had a wonderful lunch, VERY reasonably priced, super friendly service but not over the top. Could not fault this place!

title: Great value & location
comment: On Eton High St, 2 minutes from footbridge into Windsor. Easy to access all that Windsor & Eton offer.

title: Good food, quick service
comment: I arrived at the pub to find a lesser menu than last time and asked why, they had said they've changed hands. However, the food was very good and arrived very quickly. I ordered the fried chicken bloomer and my boyfriend ordered the sausage and onion bloomer. Both were very yummy. Would definitely still recommend to all friends.

title: Drinks
comment: Great pub with very friendly and welcoming pub.

title: Perfect for lunch
comment: I came across this place by chance when we were trying to find somewhere for lunch and what a perfect find it was. We ordered halloumi ciabattas with chips and the food was served super fast and was very reasonably priced.

title: Proper grub.
comment: If you visit Windsor, or just dropping the boys off at Eton college (!), this excellent pub is worth the walk across the bridge into Eton High Street. Great pub menu, and drinks and food are competitively priced. Cosy atmosphere. Friendly staff. I highly recommend the sausage and mash with just the right amount of tasty gravy. Really good.

title: lovely find this little pub
comment: tucked in corner in eton this lovely pub serves really good food and if you plan to stay in windsor this pub offers accomodation with parking!!

title: Excellent Pub Grub
comment: Visited Crown & Cushion on a very miserable wet day - the pub was cosy and warm, staff were friendly and helpful. The menu is pretty standard pub fare, which is great if you're a tourist looking for a English Pub experience. But it was the burgers that stood out to me - great selection, quality meat and fantastic fries. Didn't want to stop eating even though I was stuffed!

title: THANK YOU FOR SENDING DELICIOUS FOOD TO THR NHS
comment: Realy big thank you from North Mid for the tasty curry, totally delicious - made our day!

title: Amazing, thank you.
comment: Thank you so so much Roz Ana for the incredibly tasty curries that have kept us fueled as front line doctors and nurses during the covid pandemic. The food was so tasty and I will be recommending to all my Surrey friends!

title: Thanks a lot for your kind
comment: Thanks a lot for your kind and generous donations to the NHS! The food was delicious !!! Highly recommend

title: Amazing food
comment: I have had take out from this restaurant and the food is fabulous. Even as take away, the food holds great flavour. Can’t wait to dine in soon!

title: Simply Amazing food. Best
comment: Simply Amazing food. Best Asian food I’ve had in London. You won’t be disappointed. The chicken is to die for

title: Fabulous first post lockdown meal
comment: We are so lucky to have Roz Ana within walking distance of our home, so when were deciding on somewhere for our first date night post lockdown the decision was an easy one to make and we were not disappointed.

title: Excellent lockdown takeaway
comment: This has been our favourite local restaurant for some years now, but until last night we hadn't ordered their takeaway during lockdown. Four mains and two vegetable side dishes with rice and breads were all delicious and too much for five of us (even with my greedy teenagers). Leftovers for two lucky people today.

title: Amazing takeaway
comment: I knew this restaurant had a great reputation but it is just a little to far for a convenient walk so we took the opportunity to order from Deliveroo during lockdown. It was superb. We both had the salmon to start which was really moist with a great glaze. The prawn biryani and prawn methi malai were both really tasty with really generous portions.
