Despite the distance, this will now be a real priority to try in person once the lockdown is over.

title: Fabulous food and excellent service
comment: Thank you for the delicious food, excellent service and a great evening. We will definitely be back soon.

title: Good food but a bit pricey.
comment: There are a lot of good reviews for this restaurant so we gave it a try. The staff were friendly and the food was good. Not the dishes you usually see in an Indian. It was good to try new things. I thought it was a bit pricey though. £91 for three with no puddings.

title: Dreadful Customer Service
comment: Booked a meal through their booking site online,

title: fabulous takeaway delivered in style
comment: The food was so tasty and delicious and delivered to us personally by the manager along with a bottlle of prosecco on the house in celebration of my 70th birthday

title: Great addition to Richmond
comment: My husband, daughter and I had a delightful meal at Chatora tonight. When we arrived we didn’t really like our allocated table but the staff immediately found us a lovely table upstairs. The food was fresh and delicious. The service was excellent. Often a curry restaurant lacks ambiance, this one doesn’t! Great addition to Richmond, which really needs these good and independent restaurants. We will be back.

title: Won’t be returning
comment: I went here with a couple of friends and my partner, table was booked prior to visit as all these 5 star reviews we thought best to. We were seated by an open door, not ideal being October. The menus were paper, and unsure if these can be cleaned what with virus concerns. The waiter asked us if we would like to hear his recommendations so we said yes, for him then to mention all the most expensive options on the menu - salmon, lamb shank etc (me rolling my eyes). We ordered some starters and mains. Didn’t take too long to arrive. The starter looked pretty, but was a bit spicy for what was advertised on the menu. I ordered a Red pumpkin curry for my main, and oh my, what a disappointment. It was basically the smallest pathetic little cubes of pumpkin which were still relatively hard, in a bowl full of sauce which swamped the pumpkin, may as well have just been the sauce. It was way too spicy, with a one chilli symbol on the menu I was surprised, and with a burning mouth advised the waiter it was too spicy and he went and got me some yoghurt (a bit of a wait tho). The yoghurt helped and I ate a little more before I got bored of the tough bits of pumpkin and the undercooked garlic naan. I ordered a vanilla ice cream for dessert as my mouth still burned and horrified that for £6 I was produced two scoops of ice cream which was the cheapest ice cream you can imagine, something you would buy in Iceland. So disappointing as at the price I would have expected a nice proper vanilla ice cream. So we ask for the bill, and for 4 with only 3 beers came to £155, which I thought was a lot. I checked the bill, and I had been charged for the yoghurt - £4 for some yoghurt to help me eat my food with the stupid amount of spice they put in my curry. I was so annoyed I said something and was told “we have to charge for yoghurt sorry”. I mean, not only was the food poor, but that for me was just out of order. To note - in any other curry house I have been too, if something is a bit too spicy I have always been offered yoghurt with no extra cost.

title: Top restaurant super service
comment: Top restaurant super service , food was really tasteful and even manager/ owner was leading from the front talking to his customers and giving out fish samples which were lovely.

title: Dinner
comment: We had a wonderful meal at chatora on Saturday night. Food was gourmet Indian. Really delicious great menu, great service such lovely staff we will be back

title: First but definitely not last visit!
comment: Went for the first time yesterday evening and the food was absolutely delicious! The lamb shank roganjosh and the pahadi chicken were so tasty and cooked to perfection! We also had the achari paneer tikka to start which was the best paneer dish I’ve ever eaten! The service was also exceptional, we will definitely be returning

title: Superb Lunch
comment: My wife and I just visited Toscana for lunch for the first time and are very impressed. The set lunch menu was varied and interesting with the option of starter/ main, main/dessert or all three. The a la carte menu was also available. We both had crayfish salad starter with plaice in a caper sauce for my wife and a sliced steak and parmesan shavings dish for me to follow. The service was fast, polite and unobtrusive and the food was excellent both in quality and portion size with potatoes and veg included. We were too full too sample the desserts but those served to others looked delicious. Will certainly visit again (and again!).

title: Very disappointing
comment: My wife and I had a very disappointing meal in Toscana last night.

title: 6 of us visited on Saturday
comment: 6 of us visited on Saturday 22nd August and had yet another memorable meal at this fine restaurant

title: Great food and friendly service!
comment: Myself and my partner decided to book a table here as we had never been before. It did not disappoint! The food was very nice and great potions too (as we had read in previous reviews). The service was quick, friendly and welcoming. The prices were fair for the quality of the meals. Overall we had a wonderful experience.

title: Delicious meal
comment: Went here with hubby on the ‘eat out to help out scheme’ .. we will be back!!! They managed to fit us in at the last minute & I’m glad they did, the food was delicious & staff lovely.

title: Great friendly and safe restaurant post lockdown
comment: This was the first restaurant my husband and I went to post lockdown being eased. This is a family run restaurant and the service is a big part. We chatted beforehand about the menu having never eaten Tunisian food before and were recommended some delicious selections. Portions were great and the restaurant decor was wonderful. Only 3 couples in there to allow for social distancing but still had a nice feel and charm. Left feeling stuffed and will definitely be back. BYOB which we always enjoy.

title: Give this a go!
comment: Excellent food. Friendly service and quite fun! The lamb was cooked to perfection.

title: Interesting food and a great discovery
comment: A new experience which we liked very much. There were four of us so the owner recommended Mezze and Breek to start with. Both were yummy. The mains were interesting and two of us had the spicy chicken stew whilst the others had a mountain of couscous. It was a fun experience and we were made to feel most welcome. However (big BUT coming up), it's BYOB. Nothing bad about that but to charge £4 corkage, or should that be 'screwtoppage' per bottle, is not a good move. Please get rid of it!

title: We went on the last day of
comment: We went on the last day of the 50% off deal. Pre-ordered and got served quickly. Lamb roast, chicken roast, two stews and a range of starters. The lamb stew was my favourite. This place is a Gem in the heart of Ealing. Halal and serves no alcohol. Family business with an authentic feel. Thanks for accommodating us. I am glad we came. Pity that, due to COVID, they had run out of Tunisian desserts. Still that is an excuse to go back!

title: Excellent food and service
comment: Had a really delicious Tunisian meal here - food and service were top notch. The Breek rolls were incredible. Highly recommended.

title: Delicious food
comment: I really tried to give 5 stars as the food was so delicious and felt very authentic but I could not for the following reason:

title: Amazing experience
comment: We went here yesterday for the first time and had an amazing experience. The restaurant opened especially for us and not only was the food brilliant, but we treated so well by the owners. We will come back again soon. Thank you

title: A fantastic Tunisian chef!
comment: Fantastic meal! This felt like a true Tunisian experience and one I recommend to anyone! Very friendly staff :)

title: Great food, informal surroundings
comment: A family run restaurant with a great host who recommended a starter platter followed by spicy chicken stew & the roast chicken Tunisian style Waw loved it.

title: Re visit as previos visit haphazard
comment: My friend and I had a haphazard visit in August and were invited to visit again by Elvis, the manager. We went and was greeted by Shemsi, another manager, who could not do enough for us. On this visit the food and service was excellent.

title: Great food and service
comment: We have been visiting ASK for many years and have never left a review, so thought it was about time. I visited for a meal with my son and we were served by Shemsi, who we have had the pleasure of being served by many times. As usual he was very helpful and attentive and very good with my son who wanted me to add this review on his behalf:

title: What a place!
comment: Chose to go for something different for a family relatives birthday and Sidi Bou didn't disappoint. When was the last time you heard of a mother and son team running a restaurant in London?

title: Excellent service
comment: Manager Airina made sure we were all well taken care of.

title: review
comment: Outstanding customer service from manager Airina. Made sure everything was perfect and gave us a lovely warm welcome and service throughout ! Definitely be coming back here especially for those Strawberry Mojitos too

title: Excellent service
comment: The food was very nice and the service was top standard manager Airina was very polite and helpful will be definitely coming back again

title: Lunch With Mum💜
comment: Popped in for Lunch with Mum, and was greeted at the door with the waitress Airina, who explained the COVID rules and made us feel comfortable, and seeing that the restaurant is really spaced out nicely due to the distancing rules..

title: Ask in Beckham
comment: We went to Ask today for lunch. Food was great and the service excellent. We never had desert as in most restaurants these are overpriced but would recommend the main dishes.

title: A very safe and delicious family meal
comment: We are regulars of ASK for many years and hasn’t been for some time. The manager gave us such a lovely and warm welcome back.

title: Great as always - food is
comment: Great as always - food is perfect and Natalie looked after us with efficiency and kindness. High recommend

title: Great food but let down by rude and unwelcoming staff
comment: What keeps me coming back to Treviso is the food. Food is extremely tasty and authentic.

title: Delizioso, squisito, creativo, originale!!
comment: Simply fabulous -- intimate, extremely friendly, a chef with a real flaire for the original particularly in their house specialty -- seafood of all kinds (calamari with chorizo; scallops and gambas in an exquisit "sauce" of puree potatoes; brilliantly garlicy sardines -- the list goes on, particularly the daily specialties). I actually wonder if those few with negative reviews were at a different restaurant as I can't imagine how to rate Treviso as anything other than delizioso, squisito, creativo i originale!

title: Not just the best Italian in Richmond but one of the best in London
comment: I can’t say enough how wonderful this family run restaurant is. I’ve been a number of times and each time the food and atmosphere have been wonderful. Book you won’t be disappointed. Lovely food, lovely place and lovely people. A little gem.

title: Ambiance great, food amazing
comment: The food in this little Tunisian Restaurant is amazing. The staff friendly and obliging. Value for money - absolutely.

title: Fabulous Tunisian Food
comment: The wife and I enjoyed a tremendous meal together there on our first night in Ealing. Very hospitable owner and outstanding food... best couscous I have ever had. Will go back when in Ealing again.

title: The best of Tunisian
comment: We were recommended this restaurant by our son who wanted to go there to celebrate his birthday. We can see why as although this restaurant is seemingly a distance away it is a short walk from Ealing Broadway Station but much more importantly the food was spectacularly good and the service clearly family run and individual. I have eaten brick in many restaurants in the Middle East but I’ve never tasted such a delicately cooked and delicious version of this meal. There was a large selection but everything was home-cooked and tasty. We will definitely be going back and highly recommend this for anyone who wants to try the best of Tunisian food.

title: Lovely restaurant, lovely people
comment: Went with a couple of friends late on a Monday night - I'd been meaning to go for a long time but had never popped in. The welcome was wonderful, the food was excellent - have the breek, have the meze, have the couscous! - and we're all looking to go back for shakshuka one weekend lunchtime! We're lucky to have it in Ealing, drop in as soon as you can!

title: Cozy atmosphere and great food
comment: The restaurant is small and friendly, and the food is superb. I've been three times now, each with different people, and everyone has been impressed and hoping to return. (But only I live close enough to keep visiting.) Although they don't serve alcohol, you can bring your own. And since the restaurant is so close to Ealing station, it would be convenient for people wanting to meet up with friends from elsewhere.

title: A cosy and quite surprisingly good restaurant with superlative Tunisian food.
comment: I went to Sidi Bou because passing through Ealing for a work commitment, I thought I would stop over and try the food. I'd heard about it as it was one of the winning entries in this year's Ealing Restaurant Awards. And Oh my, was I pleasantly surprised.

title: Amazing and awesome
comment: Amazing and awesome Tunisian food! Great atmosphere and people! Feeling home like in Tunisia! It’s like a trip in Tunisia

title: A Tunisian Gem
comment: We are wondering why we hadn’t found this lovely Tunisian restaurant before – a stone’s throw from Ealing Broadway station overlooking Haven Green.

title: Our fav restaurant
comment: Just had to say that we go weekly to this restaurant. The food is consistently good, the waitresses and waiters very good and attentive. The waitress - Romina is extremely good she always remembers our usual drinks without any prompting and makes us feel very welcome and at ease. The manager Shemsi is very good too. They have a lovely team at this Ask. Definitely worth a visit if you have not already been there.

title: Lovely Saturday dinner
comment: Tonight me and my family really enjoyed our meals and would very happily come back.

title: Okish but has to improve food
comment: A nice place to start with, personally I wouldn’t name it a fine dining experience, but for a quick meal out it can be acceptable. Some dishes like the pizzas did lack identity, I hope it was just in our case.

title: Lovely !
comment: Had dinner for our daughters birthday ...we booked a table it was quite busy for a Wednesday evening ...lovely round table ...nice space between tables ...lovely atmosphere very present and professional staff our drinks order was taken then our food order ...nice time between courses menu has an excellent choice something for everyone...nice cocktail menu too ...good was delicious and piping hot ...will definitely return and highly recommend for couples or groups

title: Valentines date
comment: Valentines date I booked for me and my boyfriend as neither of us had been to an ask Italian and we were not disappointed, the food was good especially the bruschetta and the service was amazing she came out to collect our plates when we were finished and didn’t bother us or rush us, the valentines set menu was good and it was about averagely priced for an Italian I also liked the fact they do soft cocktails so you can drive but still look fancy

title: Haphazard service
comment: My companion and I visited the Beckenham, Kent, BR3 restaurant for a pre booked reservation at 1445 05/08/2020 and were promptly seated by a young staff member in close proximity to other patrons, we were not shown the sanitiser pump upon entry. We were sat for quite a long time until our order was taken by the same staff member who sat us and then asked again by the other two members of staff for our order as we sat for a while with no drinks as ordered. I requested that my Caprina pizza have vegan mozzarella instead of regular mozzarella due to a cow milk allergy but the goat's cheese was to be included on the pizza, my companion's order was for linguine frutti de mer.

title: Lovely meal with great service!
comment: Lovely meal with great service from Shemsi. 9 of us booked for dinner and the food and service were great. We thought because of the Dine Out deal it would not be the same but it was great.

title: Poor quality of food
comment: Takeaway from Ask Italian was poor. Small portions - the seafood linguini had very little seafood and the lasagna tasted like a ready meal. The food arrived lukewarm. Not value for money.

title: Brilliant service and food!
comment: I went to Ask Italian Beckenham on the 25th of August, and had a wonderful meal. We were served by Shemsi, who was attentive and efficient throughout our time there. He was the perfect server and could not have done more. Our food arrived quickly, and we did not have to wait a long time to order any of our three courses, which, by the way, were all delicious. I cannot wait to return!

title: Family lunch
comment: Had a very pleasant lunch with a huge variety of ages in our party (from 5 to 75) Everybody enjoyed their food and our service was fine . Only small downside was that condiments were shared from table to table without sanitisation and we weren't asked to sanitise on the way in .

title: A quality TV Production needed quality food!
comment: I needed to cater an impromptu dinner meeting for 18 people. I left a message on the Sidi Bou website just after noon, and got a phone call from the manager a few minutes later.

title: Simply The Best
comment: Perfection! Excellent Tunisian dishes, all home-cooked. Great stews, mezze, merguez sausages, the "specials" (just ask!), great hummous and good vegetarian options as well. A unique menu and a special restaurant (in Ealing) with friendly service; it's a small, family-run place ...and they do take away or delivery as well. We were happy to find Sidi Bou, still cooking meals to put smiles on faces through the difficult times. Thank you!

title: Outstanding Food
comment: We went on a Monday lunchtime and sat outside.

title: Excellent seafood and service, again!
comment: Excellent food and service - another fantastic evening at Treviso with my friends.

title: Excellent Italian
comment: Everyone at our table had excellent food - tastes were amazing and service - if you love your Italian food - then you must visit - highly recommend.

title: Mr Motivator dropped in unexpectedly
comment: Treviso is well-reviewed on this site and being a fan of Italian cuisine, I was keen to try it. The restaurant sits on the corner of Evelyn Gardens and Kew Road in Richmond. The corner spot, and the green foliage that surrounds the building, make it one of the more attractive eateries on this street. I took a date here on a Saturday evening in mid-September. We arrived at 9pm and on arrival were shown to a romantic table for two by the window at the front of the restaurant. The tables are placed very closely together and while I didn’t feel they were so close that the other diners were listening to our conversation, the tables are definitely less than two metres apart (and there was no hand sanitiser available on entry) so bear this in mind if you are particularly Covid-conscious. The restaurant is dimly lit with dark wood décor and lots of wine bottles line the shelves, serving as ornamentation.

title: Amazing food! But shocking
comment: Amazing food! But shocking behaviour from the owner!!

title: Absolute gem of a restaurant!
comment: This was our last pre-lockdown restaurant visit and was also pretty much by chance as our other booking had to be cancelled due to a few hold-ups. Not seats inside so we snuggled up outside with a few heaters and a blanket for warmth. We shared a Risotto ai Frutti di Mare starter (it was not on the menu) and it was both substantial and sublime. Also not on the standard menu was a beautiful large T bone steak to share with roasted potatoes, mange tout and beans and accompanied by a very good bottle of Chianti. The service was outstanding and its clear that the people here love the Restauarant and its food. Will certainly be going back to this one and highly recommend it!

title: Just average!
comment: My friends and I visited the restaurant after a lovely day out.

title: I love Treviso!
comment: I go there regularly! Pasta with salmone is the best!!! Everything is great! The steak is also amazing. And the stuff is lovely. I’ve been there with family, as a couple, friends, etc. It is always great!

title: Lovely people, incredible food
comment: I visited The Beautiful South for the second time last night (I live in Suffolk so not local for me) The food was delicious, I recommend the chicken liver starter. The couple that own the restaurant are just lovely and very welcoming. Such a pleasure to go there, I wish I was local.

title: Fantastic food
comment: Had a lovely meal, food was really good, great friendly service. Has to be one of the best restaurants in the local area.

title: Wheelchair accessible
comment: Really good food and very friendly staff. Wheelchair accessible and helpful. I highly recommend and would definitely come back again.

title: Terrible over priced food and poor service
comment: I Would not eat here again or recommend this restaurant, which was a real shame.It was very disappointing for my daughter, as we had attended for a mother and daughter pre celebration dinner for her 19th birthday.

title: Lives up to their name
comment: Beautiful restaurant for sure, and food is absolutely delicious, however extremely overpriced. And chips are way too salty.

title: Great service, great food
comment: What a meal, great atmosphere, amazing ambience and food as well as lovely service from Anisa, what else can you ask for? One of the best pubs in Richmond!!

title: Fabulous Sunday lunch
comment: What a wonderful Sunday lunch and menu with a superb Christmas twist. Highly recommend the roast beef and the delicious chocolate torte with warm black cherries in kirsch and Chantilly ice cream. Delicious.

title: Birthday
comment: My visit yesturday to richmond vault was very seccesful, first of all I have to thank the the young manager I think his name is Charlie he did everything to make us enjoying the food and the atmosphere.food wise was just amazing fresh and tasty. I had a steak very rich melting in a mouth,all my familly was happy indeed definetely we will go again thank you everyone.

title: Hidden Gem
comment: My family and i visited Richmond Vault recently and had a very enjoyable 3 course meal. The service was fantastic and the food was delicious, I will be visiting again soon and thoroughly recommend this restaurant.

title: Tasty ribs!
comment: Love the ribs in here, pizza is always good as well. Friendly staff, good choice of beer/wine and relatively inexpensive. Underground so hard to get phone signal but maybe that's not a bad thing!

title: Amazing experience
comment: Me and my husband found the place by mistake as it is underground with small sign in the front to state that it is a restaurant. It really surprised us in a very good way. All the people who served us were very polite, food was incredible. My husband ordered beer, but I did order gin and tonic. They do serve bottle on the side as it should be. Well done! We will definitely come back soon.

title: Cosy and comfortable
comment: Unpretentious pub with quirky comfortable rooms. Onl ate at lunchtime but perfectly acceptable pub grub.

title: Great food and service no vegan options!
comment: Lovely friendly staff.

title: Rebecca was amazing!
comment: We attended The Vault last night for our date night and the whole experience was fantastic. Covid safe measures in place and food and drinks absolutely lovely. The stand out was our server, Rebecca. She was so helpful and friendly and made sure we had a great evening so a massive thank you to her. All staff were equally as friendly and helpful so they deserve a shout out too. We can’t wait to come back!

title: Lovely place, great food and friendly staff.
comment: Ate here with my daughter on 21st. Had prawns and mussels to start, and chicken kebab and larger portion of mussels with sides of bread chips and salad (included). Wine was well chilled and good quality, great selection of gins. All food was perfectly cooked and the mussels were excellent quality. A great meal and really well priced. Service from Poppy was great, friendly, professional and attentive, even when it started getting busy. We will definitely visit again to try the beers!

title: Amazing! Wow what a find this
comment: Amazing! Wow what a find this fantastic restaurant was. Great service and a great atmosphere. Starters were delicious (special Lebanese Spicy Sausages). Ribs were sensational - probably best have ever had. Will definitely return when in Richmond again. A must visit.

title: Second faultless visit for great food
comment: Three of us visited on the 7th of March for lunch. This was our second time here ear and we were adamant we were going to return!

title: Popular Venue
comment: This pub with food is very popular with the locals. With Coronavirus still around, everyone was asked to sit, eat/drink, socialise in the outside part of the pub. Friendly service from the staff too. Fish (fish and chips) was humongous and delicious although the chips were not as good; a little shrivelled but good dinner anyway

title: Food great, hygiene less so
comment: Eat at the crown and Cushion today. The food was first class but did not see one table cleared sprayed clean after being cleared for next guest outside. Inside there was a queuing system.

title: Safe
comment: Only popped in for a drink mid afternoon. Felt safe during Covid-19 very clean, friendly staff.only place I have visited so far that has foot Mechanism to open toilet doors without using yours hands. Well done.

title: What a great find
comment: What a great find.

title:
Spent Saturday night on
a
comment: Spent Saturday night on

title: superb
comment: Whenever in Windsor we always try to pop into this lovely pub in Eton.Both food & drink is always very good .Great prices,good size portions of food at really good prices and the staff are always very polite.Keep up the good work.

title: Lovely friendly Pub/Hotel
comment: Overnight stay at this lovely old Pub/Hotel. Nice room, great shower and comfy bed. Staff all very nice and helpful and a great well cooked breakfast. Two bonuses , great location for Windsor and it’s own car park.

title: 2nd visit..
comment: This is our second visit and it was as good as the first!! Somewhere to park your car very friendly staff and a fab breakfast! We had room 1 which was great, the bathroom a little small but that didn’t make our stay any less enjoyable! The beer garden is lovely..food is great value for money..perfect location for all the sightseeing...highly recommend..

title: Hidden gem of Kingston
comment: Third time dining at Roz Ana and we continue to be pleased with the experience. Service is exceptional and ambience is very welcoming. The food is always authentic and interesting. However, our curries could have been a little hotter, my Rara Lamb was supposed to be double spicy and it was medium while my partner asked for extra hot Prawn Methi which was also quite mild. Otherwise I would recommend Roz Ana as the best Indian in Kingston! I always look forward to the dessert selection particularly the cheesecake, perhaps the best I've had.

title: Underwhelming
comment: I had heard great things about this restaurant and its special Chicken tikka laphroaig masala. Went there with huge expectations.

title: Great modern Indian cuisine
comment: If you’re looking for a fresh and modern twist on Indian cuisine then this is definitely for you!!

title: Amazing Indian food
comment: The food at Roz Ana is delicious. We have eaten here a few times and everything is so tasty and fresh. The staff are always friendly and the service is brilliant.

title: Very warm place to be
comment: Friendly reception. There is a computer placed at the entrance show tables and allow customer to view seating and if necessary as to availability allow to change and settle. All food served are cooked and served well. We enjoyed poriyal, Biriyani, lime rice and paneer. My daughter is a big fan of lime rice. All clean

title: Different type of Indian Cuisine but delicious nonetheless!
comment: Enjoyed our experience here and the food was delicious. As other reviewers say a bit different to a curry house offering an array of interesting and yummy dishes! Staff were very helpful as one of us had an allergy and were attentive to our needs! Luckily we were on the Eat Out scheme as it was a bit pricey - would've been £70 for 2 without dessert!

title: The best Indian restaurant
comment: The best Indian restaurant I’ve visited in London.

title: Decent food, great service. You live and learn
comment: Definitely a lovely place and the staff are very welcoming and helpful, I will say our meat was on the dry side especially as it both came in sauce however we enjoyed and will go back again soon to sample some of the house specials which other tables around us had ordered and looked wonderful. We left knowing we had probably ordered the wrong meals which was in a way our own fault and if we had used this website prior to our visit we would have know. You live and learn.

title: Saturday night Dinner.
comment: Outstanding experience! When entering hand sanitiser was provided and all the staff were in masks, making me feel so comfortable with the current pandemic. The food was outstanding but the service was next to non, a massive thank you to Marcy for making my experience so welcoming! A true asset to the team

title: Delicious food
comment: Delicious food, big portion sizes and unusual dishes. I would highly recommend the aubergine peanut curry.

title: Amazing fish and chips!
comment: Every time I have bought fish and chips from this restaurant, it has been fabtastic! Always fresh and has a good texture, better than any shop around London. They have a fast service s you're not waiting long and give generous amounts too! Anytime you feel like real fish and chips - go to The Cod Father!! :)

title: Codfellas fish and chip shop, Oldfield circus.
comment: Saturday i ordered two small Cod and chips,The chips was warm and cold..The Cod was thick with batter and held alot of grease like it was battered twice and fried again, the batter was dark colour.

title: Disappointed
comment: I am a regular here but disappointed with my order. Bottom of the pile chips cold and fish full of batter and thing fillet for a large fish.

title: Fabulous cod, mushy peas and chips
comment: That large cod won! I couldn't finish it and I can it!! Lol

title: Disappointed
comment: Wondering if there's been a change of ownership as service & quality have plummeted & all staff new (where is Emre Tunc). Visited for first time since lockdown - was told I couldn't pay by card, cash only (which is worryingly against current safety advice). As I had to accept change out of the till I asked for hand gel which they did get for me. Staff did not wear gloves at all. Whilst waiting for my order another customer had to point out items had been missed from his. No menu or prices on display at all. Although my chips smelt so lovely & inviting I was majorly disappointed - pale & bland. Won't be going back.

title: The Codfather, Charging full price whilst being part of eat out to help out scheme
comment: On the government website it states they are participating in the eat out to help out scheme, when I got there and asked about this today they stated they knew nothing about it, that is all 3 staff members present at the time. I saw them charge every customer full price without asking whether they were eating in or taking away, whether they knew about the scheme only they know but you would think that management would feed this information back to the employees, I hope they will not be claiming money back off the government if they are participating in the scheme and continue to charge full price, if the employees do not know of the scheme and only the management knows about it then they will need to feed this information to them as soon as possible to avoid them misleading future customers

title: 100% most amazing fish and chips
comment: Thanks codfather old field circus, I can actually say that your fish and chips were the best fish and chips I have ever had, I can’t praise you guys enough for the quality of food and professional service I experienced whilst in you shop. Considering you were just closing and was kind enough to still take my order was also very good service. Cheers guys

title: Changed hands
comment: Think this place has new owners. Cash only payment in the time of covid when everyone wants to pay contactless. Somewhere saving a few pence on each meal by not accepting card payment must be scrimpng elsewhere. Is it cod!!!

title: Best fish and chips around
comment: great value awesome portions fresh fish, only order small chips as portions very big excellent value

title: Simply the best
comment: This place is simply the best on so many many levels. Derrick,who greeted us, seems to have to ability to keep all his customers happy at the same time, making you feel very special. He made us the most tasty baguette ever,when we went there last Sunday to listen to some 'folk singing' friends perform. My partner had a good discussion about the wine to help with his choice whilst I had cups of tea made for me, all with such a smile, brilliant. There is always a great feeling in this venue/bar/cafe and I just wish it was much closer to where we live so we could go more often. But always well worth the trip. Thanks Norma & Mac

title: Musical Evening
comment: Great venue for a drink and catch up with friends but also to be introduced to different kinds of music. Derek is a great host and offers a relaxed atmosphere.

title: It was nice
comment: Found this place as recommended on trip adviser and it did not disappoint. Looking forward to returning in the summer when its warmer so can sit outside!

title: Wow
comment: I am so glad that I found this place. The atmosphere is always friendly and chilled. Whether you come on your own or with friends, you are always made to feel welcome. The staff are friendly and helpful. I just love the fact that I can forget I am in Barking when I come here. Highly, highly recommended. It's my 'happy place'.

title: Love it!
comment: I just love this place! Lovely atmosphere, wonderful decor with photos of local people on the walls. Really friendly, helpful staff. Food and drink are spot on. Lovely outdoor seating area to enjoy when the weather is good. Have only visited during the day, would love to try of an evening with some live music but unfortunately live too far away. It's a little gem!!

title: Well if friendly service and
comment: Well if friendly service and and fantastic location is what you’re after - the Boat House is the place.

title: a great little cafe/bar
comment: This is a real gem. It is a calm, friendly and peaceful place, doing great lunches - make sure you have the salad with the panino, and also great beer. The Lithuanian beer was wonderful.

title: The only good bar in Barking
comment: I've lived in Barking for six months now, and while I've nothing against Wetherspoons, it should never be the second best bar in an area. Thankfully the best bar, the Boathouse, is an absolute gem - friendly staff, good food, and good beer. And a great view over the canal (when it's dry enough to sit outside!). Can't recommend highly enough.

title: Night out
comment: Husband was on a coutse in barking stayed at the ibis went to the boat house if you like cocktails pay a visit to this place right on the canal and the cocktails are to die for

title: Great fish and chips
comment: Great service from the staff, very fast and efficient. Food tasted great, very big portion sizes, highly recommend if you are in the area. No surprises they win so many awards.

title: Great fish shop.
comment: Fish was cooked to order every visit and was of very high quality..There is plenty of variety to go with your fish and chips.They have chicken,sausages with or without batter and many other choices.

title: Check your order !
comment: I ordered, and paid for "Large cod and chips" , and was charged 9.80, that was fine.

title: Excellent fish and services
comment: Our regular place to for cod craving every week.

title: Take away
comment: Fish and chips. Really average take away but the portion was big. Good value for money and everything fine is general just missing the flavour

title: Excellent fish and chips
comment: Great quality fish and chips, possibly one of the best around. Always cooked fresh to order. Service is always 5 star. Polite and always service with a smile, happy to drive threats distance to eat here.

title: bad food &hygiene
comment: went to this shop expecting it to be clean considering it has just been refurbished the chips were hard fish was greasy sausage was raw person who served me was wearing dirty apron i thought he was a bullder yes thats how dirty they were needless to say i got the runs shortly after eating food avoid this place at all costs it is not cheap either

title: Good sized cod, very crispy
comment: Good sized cod, very crispy batter. Chips were very deep fried so extremely crispy, which I liked but partner did not (he prefers the slightly soggy, soft chip shop chips). Ordered takeaway via Uber Eats.

title: Outstanding food. The shop
comment: Outstanding food. The shop is nothing special but the cod and chips are as good as anywhere I’ve found inside the M25. This team of people know how to serve great fish and chips. Prices are good. Well worth going out of your way and skipping past other chippies to get to this one.

title: Good value and clean
comment: Nice chippy.Fish was Cooked fresh to order and better quality than most other fish and chip shops in the immediate area

title: Delivery of fish and chips
comment: Just ordered rock and chips for my dad and myself and it was cooked to perfection and piping hot when it was delivered. I think it’s one of the best pieces of fish I have ever eaten. Thank you to The Codfather.

title: Lewis wood
comment: Mohamed was the best service ever given plus he recommends and knows the menu inside out... Legend!!!

title: Mohammed
comment: Mohammed is a legend, made my time here fun & quick service what a man, really enjoyed the speed of the service

title: THE BEST
comment: Mohammed was bloody brilliant! He was so friendly, I wanted him to join us for a drink! Best service by far! I will be returning and will hope that Mohammed serves me!

title: Favourite date location
comment: Have been three times now, I already loved the place but the most recent visit was even more amazing. Would recommend the salmon curry and the side chick martini cocktail. The place has a wonderful atmosphere perfect for a couples night and brilliant friendly service. I miss the 2 courses deal they had on the first few times we went but the food is still worth the price. Love that the 2 for 1 cocktails deal is for the majority of the day and the drinks are always so nice- the selection of rum is perfect.

title: Nicky was amazing!
comment: We had bottomless brunch and Nicky was the best waitress ever. I’ve never had that level of attentiveness in a restaurant

title: Great time!
comment: Came here with my best friends for one of their birthday. Great service n great drinks! The brunch is so worth the money!!!

title: Harrison was amazing
comment: I came into turtle bay tonight. Very polite gentleman. Excellent customer service. Made me feel really welcome.

title: Staines branch: ask for Hanna to serve you!
comment: Hanna, in the Staines branch, was absolutely amazing. Very cordial and nice, despite being just few serving several people, as the place was packed!

title: Amazing experience
comment: Had a lovely time at turtle bay, was served by Harrison who was very polite, efficient and made my visit here worth coming again! Thank you!!!

title: Dinner at turtle bay
comment: We had a lovely dinner at turtle bay. Our server was Hanna was very lovely and helpful, always checked it everythinf was okay and gave us good recommendations for food/drink. Overall had a really good experience thanks to her.

title: Antonio
comment: Great food and great service from Antonio. We loved the Jasmine tea, poppadoms, bhaji. also loved poached pear Bruker and mango sorbet. Great menu.

title: This is a regular place when
comment: This is a regular place when I’m at Heathrow; lovely service from Antonio and colleagues and the food - as ever - is superb. Good drinks menu and nice ambiance.

title: Amazing food and amazing service
comment: Actually the best Indian food we have ever tasted. Wonderful food and really good prices. Our waiter Antonio was so attentive and advised us on how much food to order. We will definitely be visiting again!!

title: Fabulous staff
comment: The food was lovely, especially the dessert, but I have to give thanks to my waitress Christina who made the whole meal great!

title: One Night In London
comment: I admit I was a captive audience as I was staying overnight in the hotel. The food was good. The boti kebab seasoning was on point and the meat was cooked correctly. The same with the palak ghost.

title: Superb Dinner
comment: Great service, great dinner. Some of the best modern Indian cuisine I have had. Nice personal touch by waitress Natalia.

title: Amazing food and service
comment: The food was amazing. It was authentic Indian food made to the best. Well done to the chef. The staff were abouslotly friendly and welcoming. Prem and Reagan gave the best customer service. It was my birthday yesterday and Prem and Reagan surprised me with a dessert and candles. Just made my birthday.

title: Amazing surprise
comment: wow, first time we tried this restaurant and wow it was absolutely amazing, really authentic indian (and we make around 3 every week ourselves) - definitely going back next time we go to Heathrow

title: Excellent Service
comment: My servers were Prem and Reagan. They were very friendly and professional. The butter chicken was lovely. Reagan suggested the white chocolate brulee custard for dessert and it was quite possibly the best dessert I've ever had. The texture was unexpected but amazing (custard on bottom, with this caramelized ice like layer on top).

title: Great place!
comment: If you want to go somewhere where you feel comfortable this is the place! Very friendly staff, people seem so not stressed out like in other restaurants but still service and food is brilliant. My daughter absolutely loved it, macaroni cheese, chicken, salad, fries and watermelon was what she ate and that is a lot for a 1,5 year old. I liked the food but desserts were a win for me. One of the best cheesecakes I have ever tried, sweet but not as sweet to make me sick like some cheesecakes do. Ice cream added to sticky ginger pudding was some new flavour for me, you can't describe it you got to try it. The last but definitely the best for me was a cocktail white caraiben, I wish I could buy it in a big bottle to get home for family parties! Sweet but not to too sweeet because of the fruit, I recommend it to anyone who likes trying new things. Adding everything together I was really happy to eat my family lunch there and will come back as soon as lockdown ends.

title: Amberose
comment: Great time, the waiter Ambrose took extra care in making sure my group had a great time and 5* service :)

title: Miss L
comment: Great service but Ambrose definitely topped expectations and made sure we all had a great time :) :)

title: Love this Place!
comment: Wonderful atmosphere and such a caring staff! Service was excellent and happy to see very clean restaurant! Food was really good! cocktails are a treat! I would recommend to everyone that is passing by to stop and have a fun time!

title: Bottomless brunch
comment: Really good experience, service was so fast! Lunch and unlimited cocktails for £27 was really worth it. So much cheaper then a night out to a bar. Would defo visit again.

title: Brunch!!!
comment: Abbie & Nicky, Absolute Troopers! Second time we’ve been, had Abbie looking after us, amazing service again! Today we had the pleasure of meeting Nicky, they are the most efficient servers I’ve ever met! We were well looked after for the whole duration. I would definitely come back just based on their service! Give them a Xmas bonus!! The food was also amazing the hot chicken burger was to die for

title: A home from home
comment: So glad Turtle Bay Staines is back, again. Me and my family love Keiron and his team and the food is always next to none

title: lovely restaurant
comment: Great service and all staff are friendly and very attentive! Nice vibe and I can see that they work hard to keep it tidy! Tasty food and super awesome cocktails! love youuuuu

title: Miss
comment: VJ was the best, took amazing care of us, made sure we always had a drink. So polite, deserves a raise!

title: Watts
comment: Gabi was great! She was prompt and super caring about us, best service I’ve had in this pandemic and couldn’t ask for anything more! She advised us and encouraged us! WE LOVE GABI

title: I was craving Indian food
comment: I was craving Indian food whilst staying at another hotel which only offers a generic menu and a basic ready meal type butter chicken. Annaya offers authentic Indian cuisine with a smile. I thoroughly enjoyed the Methi chicken and the Jeera Puloa. I will definitely be back next time I’m staying nearby.

title: Excellent high quality indian food and service
comment: We tried Annayu restaurant last night, and from start to finish Regan took great care of us. We had the scallop starter along with some poppadoms and condiments which were great. We then had the fish tikka, palak paneer and okra with the pulao rice and paratha with some

title: Delightful Food & Lovely Surroundings
comment: The restaurant is decorated to a great standard and very authentic, the staff are very friendly and helpful. On arrival we ordered drinks, a good selection of cocktails are on offer, the menu is very well laid out and the disruptions do make you mouth water!

title: A curry the night before flying home
comment: We always have a curry on our last night in the UK its become something of a tradition for us. When ever we have an early flight back to LA we stay at the Radisson Blu on Bath Rd. The Annayu is on site and the food is excellent. We have prebooked and just walked in and on every occasion been treated like family. The staff are attentive, friendly and helpful from describing the food you order to ensuring the wine glasses stay full. The atmosphere is relaxed and you are never rushed to finish and release the table. Some would say that an airport hotel & restaurant would not be a "go to place" I disagree. If I lived in the area I would definitely treat this as a destination restaurant for date night. Thank you see you in September.

title: Very good restaurant
comment: I went here in early January and really enjoyed the meal so I went again. Antonio served me and he was very polite and professional. I would certainly recommend this Indian restaurant

title: Yummm
comment: Very good...my husband thought the flavors were too mild but I thought they were good. Just add chutney! Christina our server was fabulous - I would go back just to hang out with her. It’s a bit on the pricey side, but it was so convenient when we were at the Raddison and had a nice atmosphere.

title: Jewel in the crown...
comment: I stayed here coz I missed a flight n I am so glad I did. The restaurant is super super amazing. Was greeted by Regan on entering and he was super attentive n so were the other staff, all with a smile. Had the mixed bhajia plate and a Lamb Rogan Gosh with Butter Naan and Kulcha. It was to die for... if you are looking for good Indian Food then look no further.

title: My Favourite
comment: We are now regular to Annayu and the food or the service you receive is really value for money we will be back again. Thanks christinfor your hatdw

title: Amazing authentic Indian food
comment: Amazing food- loved Achari Paneer Tikka. Richmond needed an authentic & tasty Indian food place and we’ve finally got one! Kudos to the chatora team.

title: Indian food
comment: food is good and light. The portion is exactly enough. Price / quality is excellent. the waitress (Cristina) was very helpful and took the time for the table.

title: Excellent service from Christina
comment: Great food and excellent service highly recommended.

title: Amazing standard of food worth a visit
comment: Amazing standard of food , amongst the best Indian restaurants that I’ve ever visited . Malai kofta especially good.

title: Best meal I've had in 2020
comment: We had their takeaway last week and were very impressed with the quality so we decided to try the restaurant... and boy was it worth the trip. As someone who tries to eat seasonally, this meal managed to incorporate all the seasonal vegetables, in original ways and most of all everything tasted delicious! The service was impeccable, the portions were quite large, the quality was excellent. Will be going back next week to try all the other dishes I didn't manage to order. Good for vegans, vegetarians, pescatarians, gluten free.. you name it!

title: Excellent restaurant
comment: Chatora- based in the heart of Richmond. We visited this restaurant with work colleagues and it has outclass food. This restaurant has its own unique style and has a relaxed atmosphere. The staff were very polite and courteous to Us and we were very well looked after. We ordered the lamb and chicken biryani and it was on point. The flavours were lovely and they reminded me of all the flavours from back home. We also ordered the Handi Ghosht. This dish the meat was very soft and tender and the curry’s sauce was amazing. Our desert was also absolutely Superb as we had the the kulfi, falooda and the kheer. We had a fantastic night and will definitely be visiting this restaurant again.

title: Lovely cosy restaurant!
comment: I went with my family to celebrate my mums birthday and this warm welcoming indian was a great pick. Good food, good service, overall good experience. Plus they did a birthday plate for my mum which was appreciated!

title: Dinner
comment: Excellent Indian food with a great service. Jamshed is a gentleman and deserves great success in this venture. They are a bunch of lovely people with outstanding Chefs.

title: Excellent restaurant
comment: Chatora is an amazing restaurant in the middle of Richmond. The restaurant is absolutely gorgeous and so welcoming due the cosy and refined environment. The food was absolutely outstanding and outclassed. The taste is very unique and has the original taste of Indian food. We can’t wait to go back and we will definitely recommend to other people. Thank you Chatora for the amazed time and food!

title: Top-class Indian restaurant.
comment: This is a top-class restaurant in the area. Food quality and taste are one of the best I have experienced in any Indian restaurants in London. Delivery was so quick and all items were hot. Overall, above and beyond my expectations. I shall visit this restaurant with my family as soon as this pandemic ends. Keep going and all the best, Chatora!

title: Incredible Indian food and lovely service!
comment: We visited Chatora twice now, days apart as we were so impressed the first time around.

title: Best veal I have ever had...
comment: First time visting for lunch during the week and it was as amazing as ever.

title: Delicious meal
comment: Came here for dinner on a Saturday night just after restrictions had been lifted. We managed to book a table on the day which was good. We was seated with plenty of distance from other diners. The food was really nice, both starters and mains. The service was good and I would definitely return.

title: Always best Take Aways from Toscana.
comment: Birthday Meal From Toscana makes you feel like you are dinning there with their delicious Food and large Portions. Thank you guys for making us happy with your food and service .We are trying to help you in theese difficult times hope we go back to normal soon.Can't wait to be back there.Big thank you for the Best Italian Restaurant in Sidcup

title: The best takeaway ever!
comment: What better way to see in the New Year?!

Visited for a friend's birthday, The surf and turf fillet was probably the best i ever had. The food was on point and we rate the new covid steps they've taken. Was a busy restaurant but our two waiters made us feel comfortable. served by the very charming Ashna. Ash (Nash) thank you for the surprise drinks they were as PERFECT as you. They have a new menu and staff but still good as ever.

title: OMG
comment: Had a takeaway for a birthday. The way it was presented in the boxes, was unbelievable. Just like you would get at Toscana. The melon starter was lovely. Also the skate and lamb cutlets. Big portions. Would have again and would recommend. Thank you Toscana

title: Fantastic meal and service.
comment: Fantastic meal and service. From the moment we arrived with a 13 month baby we were looked after exceedingly well. All staff were great but our hostess, Christina, made the experience excellent. Great atmosphere, superb steak and truly exceptional staff. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent meal
comment: Fabulous dinner tonight! Steak was lovely and we all enjoyed our deserts. The chef catered very well for my mum who is a ceoliac. Christina, our waitress was charming too!

title: Disappointing
comment: Myself and my bf tend to go to Gauchos a lot but it was our anniversary so we decided to try somewhere else and chose Steak and Lobster.

title: Amazing service Christina!
comment: I had the best time ever because of Christina! She was literally so funny and her service was 11/10!!!

title: Mouthwatering & melted in
comment: Mouthwatering & melted in my mouth.

title: Steak and lobster restaurant
comment: I'm not one to leave reviews but I had to for this wonderful experience at the steak and lobster restaurant at the Radisson hotel. I had the Surf and Turf and my partner had the T-Bone. Cooked to perfection is all I can say. Drinks were suggested to us by our lovely waitress - the Lychee martini is fantastic. The service given by Ashna our waitress is probably one of the best we've had. I didn't say it was our anniversary before until it came up in conversation and she kindly bought out a dessert plate and her partner personally validated our parking for us. The gestures in service made this a very special evening for us. This was our first visit to steak and lobster and certainly will be the first of many.

title: Restaurant review
comment: We had an amazing waitress called Christina who was extremely attentive and friendly. She made the whole experience very enjoyable along with the food which was delicious.

title: Great dinner!
comment: Recently visited and was served by Regan and Christina. Both were charming and ensured we had a fantastic meal!

title: Miss
comment: Christina is amazing the best customer service we have received ever she made the experience amazing

title: A hidden gem
comment: Have visited this restaurant many times and last went on January. What a great cozy venue with excellent food and drink choices.

title: Part Cooked takeaway for 25th Anniversary surprise during lockdown
comment: JP and Kim cooked up a fantastic meal, Garlic Lobster, Chicken in Blue Cheese sauce, their legendary chocolate mousse and a selection of cheeses and fresh bread. Everything was perfect and just needed heating up so made it so easy and my wife and I could enjoy a wonderful meal at home. The wine selection was also fantastic.

title: Fabulous post lockdown birthday treat
comment: We booked for our first post lockdown resturant night out to celebrate my partners birthday. Start to finish the food and service was amazing and impeccable. Wine was beautiful and the after dinner drinks excellent value also. The fillet steak and my special pork dish were cooked beautifully. A really great local resturant with great dedication to ensuring saftey and wellness for guests and their own staff.

title: Long overdue return visit made
comment: Just have to say how great it was to see JP & Kim again this evening. Took my daughter here tonight for her first visit and it absolutely blew her away. Great to see that nothing has changed since lockdown (well a few masks and sanitiser) but the food is still top drawer! Always top notch and never fails to impress. If you get the chance to stop by, i would highly recommend it! 10/10 yet again!

title: Great local restaurant
comment: Having lived locally for over 10 years, we’d somehow never managed to get here. We’ve now been twice in a month, once as a couple, and once as a family. The menu is good, but what really makes this standout is the set of daily specials. A lot to choose from - Seafood platters, surf and turf, Scallops, mussels, langoustines. All of it very fresh, well cooked and presented. Service is good and not fussy. We’ve now booked a birthday dinner in 3 weeks time so I think it’s safe to say we thoroughly recommend it.

title: Anniversary meal
comment: I cannot think of a better place to have lunch with friends than au coeur d’Hampton Court on the buzzy Bridge Rd. Le Petit Nantais has been setting the pace there for many years.

title: As good as it looks
comment: We have lived in the area for two years and always talked about eating here. The restaurant is decorated in classic French style and very appealing from the outside. We finally got round to eating here for dinner and we’re not disappointed. The menu was well thought out and the special list as long as your arm. We both had exquisite meals, pork belly & monkfish. The owners were also friendly, engaging and passionate. Highly recommend and will definitely be back soon

title: Excellent French food
comment: A more limited menu as they are emerging from the Covid lock-down, but the food was excellent. The fish was fresh and my companion's rip-eye steak was tender and cooked as specified. The other course were tasty and obviously prepared with care. This is a well-run, friendly establishment that deserves to prosper once again. I can't eat here every week, but I nevertheless plan to return in the near future.

title: By far the best Sushi restaurant
comment: By far the best Sushi restaurant in Surrey. Great food and really friendly staff. Also every well priced.

title: Cute and intimate bistro
comment: Quiet and intimate restaurant - beautiful decor with clusters of lights and flowers and mirrors everywhere.

title: Before you order check out the specials
comment: This is a great place for a bit of a special meal out, cozy and romantic with friendly staff and great service.

title: First time - and boy is it
comment: First time - and boy is it good . Food excellent quality tasty and fresh . Service was excellent - happy team obviously know it’s good ... really friendly and refreshing .... will go again

title: Really don't bother
comment: A disappointing evening. We had both been really looking forward to our meal out tonight but it was frankly awful. We ordered with the app from our table. We see little point of this as there was very limited description and a long wait. We had to remind them about our drinks order. When the food did arrive initially it was cold. The second round of drinks and an appetizer were cancelled as there seemed little point as after a very poor meal we just wanted to leave. Why ask if we have any food allergies ( we do to mushrooms , )if you're going to ignore it or not read it at all. The tempura vegetables with the included mushrooms were quite possibly the largest sliced still raw vegetables we've ever seen!!! If my wife had eaten this , this would have caused her a severe reaction. \The app asked twice about allergies and we duly filled it in - pointless. We sent back a chicken yakitori dish as it was cold and the other starter was tepid. It seems obvious to us that they had to much going on with the takeaway collections to give any quality food or time to their sit down customers. It's ok to be apologetic but having only 3 people doing front of house with one dedicated to take out isn't good enough. Get more staff or concentrate on one thing - you're doing two things badly rather than one thing well.. Yes these are difficult times but come on get it right!!!

title: Had to do some computer work
comment: Had to do some computer work for a friend who knows I love Japanese food. We tried to order a delivery from sushi Nara but that didn’t work so we decided to call them up and they said order from Uber eats or make a collection if we make a collection we get 10% off. We did an order for collection and I went to pick it up they said they already took the 10% off Which they actually hadn’t done and I had to prove it to them and it took 10 minutes to actually get the 10% discounted. The food was fair to middling although it was mainly on a Korean tilt. The sashimi was cut too thick and the Gyoza was deep fried and tasted of oil. The kimchi Gyoza had no spice to it whatsoever. The special rolls were amazing. It’s a hit and miss depending on what you order. I will try and order again and maybe try some of the Korean dishes but he’s not a great Japanese restaurant by any shakes.A lot of the dishes were cheaper on uber eats than they were on collection prices. To be honest I’ve got really confused!

title: Mmmm so good! But beware!
comment: Wow super good food and really worth spending it with sushi nara!

title: Not cheap but great for a special occasion
comment: We met up with some very good friends as due to COVID we had not see them for a very long time. We wanted to push the boat out a little to celebrate getting together and to catch up. All I can say is this was a good choice, with great food, service, ambiance this restaurant hit the bullseye spot on. Our waiter was helpful, and attentive, and full of excellent advice on the Specials for the day, he was not wrong, I went with what he recommended and it was excellent. It was so good I could of eaten it all over again, but my pocket could not stretch to that and to do so would of been greedy. We all had a great evening, yes it was more than we would spend as a rule on eating out, but quality like this is worth it.

title: Very good meal
comment: Four of us visited Lugana for dinner on Wednesday evening. We enjoyed a very good meal and everyone around us seemed to be enjoying their experience too. The restaurant was full with a really jolly atmosphere, but the staff were having to work very hard to get everyone fed and finished by 10.00pm. Service was good and quick; all staff were wearing masks. Because there were many diners, it was quite noisy, but had a real buzz.

title: Best dining experience by a mile
comment: The restaurant abides by the recent COVID rules.

title: Nice little find today...
comment: Nice little find today, this restaurant will not disappoint. Our food was absolutely fantastic, presentation beautiful and service perfect...is it too soon to come back tomorrow

title: Every visit has been amazing
comment: Every visit has been amazing and the food and hospitality never disappoint. Keep up the good work. Liver meal and starters great.

title: Midday lunch
comment: First class lunch. Friendly service with excellent food. Not rushed very pleasant experience. Good menu to choose from with reasonably priced wines.

title: Fantastic delivered food
comment: Its a special occasion but couldn’t go out. Amazing food and plenty of it. All perfectly cooked. Highly recommend!

title: Best restaurant in Staines
comment: We had a lovely dinner on Thursday , delicious food great staff special one lady Monica she was amazing look after us all night.Highly recommend

title: Best Italian food for miles!
comment: Best Italian food for miles! Friendly service, authentic flavours and generous portions - what more could you want!

title: Best Italian Around
comment: Been here numerous times and it never disappoints. Most recently got a takeaway in which I had the Chicken Alfredo which was outstanding and had the rest of my family wishing they had ordered the same! For value, taste as well as portion size, you can't beat it. Inside the restaurant, there's always a great atmosphere with friendly and jovial staff as well as quick service, even when it is busy. The seafood pasta, chicken alfredo and the meatballs are my top recommendations when visiting!

title: Wonderful food and friendly staff
comment: Great options available for Vegetarians and Vegans, we had a lovely member of staff named Sofia who was very helpful and recommend the Yasai Pad Thai which was delicious!

title: What a lovely time
comment: I visited few Wagamama restaurant but I have to say that this time the experience was so nice. We were looked after by a staff call Saphire (excuse if the spelling is wrong) and she made it so enjoyable. Nothing was too much, bringing our girl some pens and spare drawing mats! Saphire was super efficient, super friendly... I wish they had a Saphire in all the other branhes!

title: good to eat noodle
comment: good to eat noodle, and so on.

title: Great atmosphere with friendly staff
comment: Come here now and then for biz dinners. Staff are super friendly and the food is always good. Love the squid appetisers and ramen dishes.

title: Mid week visit. Covid safe
comment: Mid week visit. Covid safe restaurant. Very clean and staff socially distance. Starters are all amazing. Mains are large portions. Juices are good. I had a Bellini cocktail which was ok nothing special. Didn’t re-order one. Staff are efficient and the timings between courses are good. Didn’t have room for desserts. Be prepared to queue as some of the tables are not being used. Nice open kitchen.

title: Team lloyed
comment: We went to our local, Wagamama Staines. We were served by Lloyed who was attentive and a delight and overall nice chap.

title: Amazing food great customer service
comment: I loved the food, portions were good filling portions and staff was very pleasant offered to take a few pictures and had some nice jazz mucks playing in the background. Would definitely recommend to go there and we will be going back

title: Food overcooked and tough
comment: Chicken was overcooked and very tough (chicken) and only just warm having been delivered by Deliveroo. Food had been tipped and was all over the place. Very overpriced for the quality and service received.

title: Yummmmmmmmmmmmm
comment: Absolutely delicious food and great atmosphere. Book for a Saturday as buzzing. BYO is also a fab idea. Tap water put on the table, great service too. Really enjoyed it, will be back for sure.

title: Wonderful authentic food and
comment: Wonderful authentic food and service.

title: !st trip out after lockdown
comment: This is my first visit to this restaurant since it was taken over and refurbished a while ago, we were sat in the outside area, there was plenty of room between tables.

title: My daughters 18th
comment: Beautifully laid out restaurant, we were given a round table to seat 7 in a secluded alcove area. The staff were welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. The food was excellent, I had fillet steak as my main and I can say it was the best fillet steak I’ve had !! I’m definitely going again and would thoroughly recommend. Very good menu containing good variation of Italian food.

title: We were really looking forward
comment: We were really looking forward to trying this restaurant but we were disappointed. Yes it’s run by Italians but it felt that the passionate Italian spirit had faded. This was not the fine dining experience we were expecting. Most of the diners were casually dressed, the tables were laid out more similarly to a cafe than a restaurant. Even the food menus were scruffy reused paper printouts (not what we expected especially during the COVID pandemic). There are many other restaurants that provide a much better experience so I can not recommend.

title: Mrs Izabela
comment: We had a table booked for 2 o’clock on Wednesday

title: What a Fantastic Meal
comment: We had an amazing meal this evening the staff are so lovely and the kitchen must work so hard every dish was beautifully presented and hot plates yeah can’t recommend enough and porn star martinis are delicious! Had the Halibut special which was lovely Hubbie had the steak ! Thank you so much

title: Great Food.
comment: Amazing Food and friendly service. Will definitely recommend and eat here again , a definite 5 star eat in.

title: Ok, but nothing special
comment: Great atmosphere and nice decor.

title: Excellent food and drink
comment: A pricey place to have dinner but really nice in terms of quality and ambiance. Well worth it for a special occasion. Steaks and desserts really good!

title: Very good
comment: Great portions, great food and service and not a bad price definitely compared to most of the over priced restaurants in the Beckenham area.

title: Great place highly recommended
comment: Absolutely cracking place , great atmosphere lovely decor.

title: Our favourite local restaurant in Croydon
comment: We have been for approximately 12 family dinners here now.The food and service are always excellent. And we can bring our own wine which is great.This restaurant is a little local gem and we can't wait to go back.Always busy..so book in advance.

title: Very good, highly recommend
comment: Went on a Wednesday night, relatively quiet but still busy enough to create a good vibe. Went for my birthday meal and knowing this they surprised us with a little crepe type desert (on the house). Really good, highly recommend.

title: Our favourite restaurant
comment: A lovely cosy little restaurant with delicious authentic vietnamese cuisine.

title: Absolutely amazing experience!
comment: Went to Thanh's Bistro after googling somewhere new to visit locally. I'd never spotted it before, even though it is a ten min walk away. What a find! This place is an absolutely gem. The server was wonderful and friendly and the food was the nicest I have had in a very very long time - absolutely mouthwatering flavours and food cooked to utter perfection. My friend and I have put it on our favourites list and will be returning.

title: Wonderful
comment: Loved it! Great customer service. High quality food. Looking forward to trying all the dishes. Will definitely come back.

title: False Advertising
comment: We ordered take-away. Our order, included among other things, Lucknowi Dum Lamb Biryani and Delhi style Daal Makhani. My opinion, amongst the worst meals I have had.

title: takeaway or eat in both great
comment: We had dinner there in August and were positively surprised by the friendly atmosphere and welcome. Food was very good and we went back for several takeaways already due to lockdown.

title: Mr hollingshead
comment: Just had The best starters ive ever had at any indian..service is overwhelming..just the best place to be on a friday night.

title: Incredible
comment: Our time here was incredible! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was great and the service was stellar. I don't have a bad word to say about Jaipur of Chigwell and will definitely be back.

title: Excellent Food , and Service with a smile.
comment: We ordered far too much, but so glad we did, as we were able to taste so many different dishes, and enjoy the mix of flavours. This is surely one of the best local restaurants. If you like Indian , or purely curious, you won’t go wrong by this Resturant.

title: Just Fabulous
comment: I have eaten at many local Indian restaurants, but this restaurant was by far the best and will definitely be my go to Indian from now on. The service was great, nothing was too much trouble, the food was fabulous in fact the best prawn puri I have ever eaten along with everything else we ordered. Trust me you will not be disappointed.

title: Good food and Excellent Service
comment: This was our first time at this restaurant and were very impressed with the service from the time we stepped through the door .

title: Jaipur of Chigwell delicious Indian cuisine Certificate of Excellence 2016 - 2020
comment: Highly recommended takeaway is as good as eating in with special offers available just check there perfectionist website.

title: Awful service and poor organisation for deliveries.
comment: Used to be one of our favourite restaurants in Chigwell. Food was always lovely. Ordered on NYE and waited 3.5 hours for food. Called 4 times and was given a different excuse each time. Turns out, no one had actually bothered to pick up the food. Appreciate a busy night, but not like they had people sitting in the restaurant as well. All that was offered in terms of compensation was a 10% discount on our food order for the next time we visit - which won’t be anytime soon. Listened to the restaurant rep swear and shout whilst I remained on the phone waiting to see what was happening with the order. Unprofessional.

title: If we lived near here I’d eat here all the time!
comment: Perfect: delicious food, wonderful host, clean and tidy, the personal touch.

title: Fantastic Italian Food
comment: I had a lovely meal with my family at Positano. Staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, the food was delicious and affordably priced, lovely selection of wines and cocktails. Atmosphere has a lovely warm, authentic Italian feel- could be straight out of Florence or Rome ! A glass of Limoncello was a lovely way to finish of the evening. Would thoroughly recommend, 5 stars !

title: Welcome return
comment: So happy these guys are open again! We have missed them so much! Delicious food and wonderful warm service as always, and they have made the restaurant a safe haven with social distancing and real cleanliness. A very relaxing experience- feels like coming home!

title: Authentic Italian
comment: I love this place! This is my favourite Italian in the Surbiton/ Kingston area. It's a family-run, super cosy, authentic Italian. Always thoroughly enjoy coming here.

title: Great, genuine Italian food served by friendly, attentive staff - Bravo
comment: We had a truly enjoyable evening at 'Positano' from start to finish - food was tasty & genuinely Italian - pizzas, pasta, wine, all great.

title: Amazing Food
comment: I visited with my family recently and we absolutely loved it. I had the penne al’arribiata and it was delicious. The service was really good as well, very friendly and welcoming. We had a lovely evening, will definitely be going again :)

title: Mr & Mrs Goddard
comment: My wife & I was accommodated due to a cancellation, so We were both looking forward to our evening as we had received good recommendations but left thoroughly disappointed, we were sat in the corner by the entrance door not a problem as we had been allocated a table at short notice but the famous dirty dancing quote “don’t leave baby in the corner” was what happened we had long intervals between ordering our courses, 4 different waiters, my wife ordered sea bass it came dry no sauce’s, I had the rack of lamb admittedly not too bad edible, the noise din from another table was horrendous not that the restaurant can be held accountable but as a whole a very bad experience I’m sad to say!!!

title: Save your money
comment: Unfortunately this review doesn’t even deserve 1 star. Not pleased with the oily, greasy food. Will not be ordering from here even if you paid me.

title: Excellent service, excellent food.
comment: Excellent service, excellent food, couldn’t have a better experience. The best curry in Woodford and would highly recommend.

title: Jaipur certificate of excellence 2016-2020 Simply The Best
comment: Sorry for reviewing the same place again, but the staff are just amazing for consistency and approach to returning customers.

title: Five star food.
comment: My first visit to Jaipur and an excellent experience, booked a table for a Monday evening at 7pm and was surprised to see quite a few people already eating, quality of food was five star as was the service. One of the biggest menus I have ever seen in an Indian so something for everyone, if I lived nearer I would certainly become a regular.

title: Birthday Celebrations
comment: The food was absolutely incredible last night. The portion size was very big, enough for us to have a second serving the next day.

title: Top service
comment: Having had to forgoe a group evening out due to Boris's new rules, checked out local eateries on TripAdvisor and number one in the ratings was Jaipur of Chingford.

title: Second visit here and the food gets better.
comment: We found Jaipur on my birthday and returned on 18/10 and the food was better than before. Staff are very helpful as my wife needs to eat GF food. Only reason I've given it 5 stars is it only went as high as 5!! Deserves more stars.

title: 100% recommend
comment: Amazing food as well as incredible customer service, would 100% recommend the food and would definitely visit again, bringing quality Indian food to the local area, it’s a must!

title: Jaipur of Chigwell
comment: Search Chigwell's finest indian restaurant and you come up with Jaipur, holder of awards and accolades over the past few years and a cradle of Chigwells fine dining culture. Under the proprietorship of talented restauranteur Kamrul Choudhury, Jaipur serves some excellent mouthwatering dishes that can be customised to your taste. The chicken dhansak with its tender chicken in a tangy, sweet and slightly spicy sauce is one of my favorites. Fine dining restaurant with clean and pleasant atmosphere without burning a hole in your pockets, abiding by current government restrictions due to Covid -19. Be sure you pay them a visit..

title: lovely Ruby !
comment: first visit . great service , food was great too. Very extensive menu and very quick turnaround with the food . Can't say enough about how impressed we were .will be back soon .

title: Amazing Authentic Italian Restaurant
comment: Really lovely Italian restaurant! It has a great rustic vibe and nice family feel to the restaurant. We had very nice, fast and friendly service all night. All of us really enjoyed our food and my son thought the pizza was to die for! We’ll definitely be back, thank you!

title: TWO MEALS IN ONE WEEK!
comment: We ordered a meal for NYE which didn’t go completely to plan. When we eventually got the food, I can honestly say it was the nicest Indian meal I’ve had in years! The staff were so apologetic for the delay and couldn’t have been more helpful. I even received a lovely text the next day apologising once again.
