I thought I would try another takeaway tonight (diet starts tomorrow ) and once again it was another wonderful meal. Looking forward to restaurant restrictions being lifted so we can book a table there. Well done Jaipur of Chigwell

title: Lovely atmosphere and amazing food
comment: Had a wonderful time at Positano, the service was fantastic and they took great care of us! The food was delicious (and there was an amazing range of dishes), we will definitely be coming back!

title: Authentic Italian Restaurant
comment: Great little independent Italian restaurant with a cosy but lively atmosphere. Great service from the staff, attentive and friendly. The food was excellent, particularly the bruschetta starter, we had pizza which they kindly substituted toppings for us. Also the wine was reasonably priced.

title: Christmas Eve.
comment: We had planned a family get together for Christmas eve. Positano was our first choice as we have always enjoyed ourselves at this family run restaurant. It turned out to be a great choice; the food, as usual, was excellent and the staff more than accommodating and pleasant. It will not be long before we return!

title: Great traditional,local Italian
comment: Love this traditional little neighbourhood Italian.

title: Beautiful Experience
comment: Fantastic restaurant, outstanding service from reservation stage right through to payment. A real class act and the food is close to unbeatable. Can not fault this restaurant in any way

title: Best Place to Eat in Surbiton!
comment: I live locally and have been visiting Positano semi-regularly for almost two years. I take family members who are visiting me here in London, I take my partner, friends from work and honestly just about anyone who will come just as an excuse for me to eat here at this point.

title: Incredible home cooked food
comment: Very good home cooked food the service is great a must try lucky to find as was working in the area will be back.

title: Lovely authentic Italian..
comment: We visited here on a cold windy Tuesday evening, the start of my wife’s week of Birthday celebrations! Food and service was perfect. Sardines to start, then pizza, lasagne, meat balls, no complaints from anyone. Pizza I had was excellent, lovely light base and nice and spicy. Desserts good too. Highly recommend, proper home cooked Italian food.

title: Lovely family owned restaurant
comment: What a lovely welcome, beautiful restaurant and delicious food. Plentiful and great value

title: Lovely Friday night out
comment: Fab night out with my husband, Sister in law and niece. Notoriously fussy, they loved the place! We had pizza and pastas and all had desert and the Nero D’Avola is a great red.

title: Excellent service and delicious food
comment: Visited for sunday brunch with my flatmate, was my 2nd visit to basil and grape and we loved it. Dyan and the team provided excellent customer service, were very friendly and knowledgeable about the menu so were able to recommend the food that we would like. The restaurant is super clean and very covid secure, we felt very safe in there, a safe distance from other customers and regular cleaning of the tables. I love the food, last time I visited with a friend we had the truffle pizza which we both loved. This friend has a gluten allergy so they made a delicious gluten free pizza for her. Cant wait to return to basil and grape again. They're also the only place in croydon I've seen which offers the bottomless prosecco brunch

title: Pizzas
comment: This restaurant sent us truly fantastic pizzas, we definitely enjoyed it!

title: Basil and Great!
comment: We had an amazing night here this evening. Our waiter Valintine was excellent. He was so attentive and delivered an A* service. The food was excellent and the food was delicious. One of the best restaurants in Croydon, we will definitely be back here soon!

title: Welcome Back!!!
comment: Been looking forward to this for soooo long!! Ordered pasta and pizza takeaway yesterday and I wasn’t disappointed. “Mamma" Positano was there to greet everyone and as always she was so lovely and I can’t wait until we can go back and eat in the restaurant. Good job guys

title: Welcome return!
comment: I cannot tell you how pleased I am that this lovely, family run, Italian restaurant is once again open. We were there last night and the welcome we received hasn't changed; it really is one of the most welcoming places to eat! The food was up to its' usual high standard; I had the sea bass and was well impressed! It seems funny being sat in an Italian and being far away from everybody else, but, social distancing is a must for everybody. It will not be long before we return!

title: Staff are so friendly and
comment: Staff are so friendly and really know their cocktails. There’s a 2 for 1 offer on them till 7. We have done that. But also been in when til he offer isn’t on. Food is great - snacks or pizza. Federica is amazing. Great advice on the cocktails and all really to our taste ( I like fruity - he likes sweet and strong ). For such a small place the atmosphere is really superb. And would definitely recommend. Feels more like london casual and chic than Croydon!

title: Wonderful and delicious!
comment: A wonderful and delicious restaurant with fab vegan options and friendly staff - Frederica was very helpful and attentive. The wine tasting is excellent as well. My favourite place in Croydon!!!!

title: Best place in Croydon right now!
comment: I have been here twice the last 2 weeks and left more than satisfied. A new and fresh style of Italian restaurant. The food is amazing and very tasty and portions more generous than usual. Fresh top quality ingredients. Many pizza options are inventive and unusual tasty combinations. The cheese and charcuteri platter is beyond generous and one of the best I had. Served with a great selection of bruchetta with different toppings. Plenty of quality wine to choose from by the glass and not more expensive than buying a bottle so great for tasting a few if you wish. On top of that the staff is very professional and friendly and music is an electic mix from modern soul to old school heavy metal. I shall be back soon.

title: Visit for food and drink
comment: Very good time and very cosy. All the staff were very good and fun accommodating especially Valentin as our main waiter, the food was excellent and the main platter was really tasty and all the food as freshly selected too. Got a new menu out so bear with them knowing the wines for the mo

title: Good food and venue
comment: Food was very good. Pizzas are just that bit different from the usual you get in restaurants and always enjoyable. Nice venue set out in small bays which makes it quiet and private.

title: The best of the best...pizzas and garlic bread to die for
comment: I am so a regular at this place and just cannot get enough!!...The staff are all so professional and welcoming and every visit has been awesome. Food is amazing..service is awesome and the staff really make this place..thank you Katie..Dyan..Paulo..Pedro..Yandry to name a few...you guys rock and make this place what it is.. I cannot wait for lockdown to be over and be back...superb place ..if you don't visit you are definitely missing out this gem of a place in Croydon

title: Lovely food - absolute gem in Croydon
comment: We went here last week for the first time after lockdown and it was as brilliant as I remember. You wouldn't think you were right opposite George Street tram stop. The atmosphere is lovely and the wines are delicious. We got the Massimi board and it was the perfect amount and variety. Cannot recommend enough!!

title: Eat out to help out
comment: Visited as part of "eat out to help out" beautiful restaurant, adapted well for social distancing. Great food, great staff... especially Pedro. We had pizza, I'm gluten free & it's the best I've had. Serves salads, bruscetta, pizza etc and great wine list. We had been for lunch previously and both visits excellent... great value. The sharing boards looked amazing so we will probably try that next time!

title: Fabulous
comment: Enjoyed a lovely evening. Staff were attentive, friendly and welcoming- although busy, I could not fault the service. Food was excellent and service of the meals was quick. Varied selection of wines and excellent Gin selection. Great atmosphere.

title: Best Italian pizza of Croydon!
comment: Best Italian pizza of Croydon! Amazing dessert - Tiramisu Pan di Stelle.

title: Excellent wine tasting experience
comment: Spotted the 'premium wine tasting' when browsing the menu online and decided to give it a go. It certainly didn't disappoint! We called ahead by about one hour to book, and upon arrival a booth had been reserved with six bottles on display to show the wines we would taste. A glass of prosecco soon arrived and then we proceeded to sample three white and three red wines (100ml of each), all excellent - and accompanied by a HUGE sharing board of meats and cheeses specially selected to complement the wines. All finished off with tiramisu and limoncello! Incredible value and quality, with friendly and knowledgeable service. Frederica provided just the right amount of information and tasting notes, with none of the precociousness of some more formal tastings. A fantastic evening experience for couples or friends, highly recommended.

title: A fantastic and reasonably priced Italian experience!
comment: My boyfriend and I went in for some food and drinks without any expectations really since we’re new to the area, so it was a pleasant surprise to find a place where everything is on point from service to food and wine! Valentin was incredibly helpful and welcoming and made us feel like we’re the only ones there. We had their authentic, Roman pizza and a bottle of red after trying a couple recommended by our waiter, and ended up staying for nearly three hours! Would really recommend for a romantic date night since they have some seating that feels very private. Overall a great gem in Croydon!!

title: Jolly good place to have a snack lunch
comment: Sandwiched between a bank and shops in George Street, this was a surprisingly good place for a snack lunch. It is open at lunchtimes on Friday and Saturday, but otherwise only for evening dinner. Climbing the several steps at the entrance, we found "snugs" against the wall, each housing a table for 4.. There are no Virus procedures, but we felt safe and secure. Off the snacks menu, we had a goats cheese and pear salad for my wife, and two pancettas for me. All good to eat. Basil and Grape is more a bar with a plentiful display of drinks. Economical in price. Friendly service.

title: Fantastic Find in Croydon
comment: Fantastic find. Have been here twice: once for dinner and the second time for wine tasting. Fun atmosphere with good music. Friendly staff. Generous food portions and great selection of wines. Will definitely be back soon.

title: best resteraunt in croydon
comment: the pizza here is amazing, the staff are always welcoming and easy to get along with, they will go above and beyond to make sure you enjoy your visit. it's always an amazing night here, 1ould 110% recommend!!

title: Vreat
comment: Absolutely amazing service. Great food, amazing atmosphere. Thanks to federica for taking care of us. And thanks to Katie for being the dj of a beautiful night

title: Last night before another lockdown 15 12.20
comment: As always this place is amazing. The staff are full of spirit and smiles despite a tough year. The pizza and garlic bread are seriously the best in town. Tonight I tried a recommendation of dessert by Valentin and OMG the home made tiramisu made by Fred is the best ever, she truly brought out the true Italian flavours in the most moist dessert ever. This place is seriously the best in Croydon and each and ever staff member is a true asset to this fabulously run local business...I am truly a number 1 fan and loyal customer and recommend Basil & Grape to everyone. Awesome atmosphere and fab wine!! You won't even feel like your in Croydon!!!. I hope this tough 2020 year brings you guys on stronger for 2021..I will definitely be back and look forward to being able to dine in again. Best wishes to you all at B & G. Yandry..Dyan, Fred, Valentin, Christian, Pedro to name a few...you guys are great!!!

title: Lovely Lunch
comment: My partner and I had lunch here yesterday and was very impressed

title: Excellent!
comment: What a find! Student run restaurant in the heart of Orpington.. They did an excellent job of catering for a vegan despite not having a vegan option on the menu that evening

title: Not for me
comment: I went there with my club. It was a set menu which I wasn't to keen on but I had the Hog and poached egg for started unfortunately the Hog was tough, for mains I had the roast turkey which was really tasty, it came with pork which I don't like, pig in blanket, the meat came up first so we had to wait for our vegetables which when they came were lukewarm and rock hard. The black forest gateau which was very nice. No one seemed to know what they were doing. It's not a place I would go back to.

title: Wonderful food
comment: Attended a business event with a guest, where the Restaurant had been booked out specifically for the evening and we had all chosen our menu in advance from a varied set menu.

title: Dinner with friends
comment: Dined here last week with friends. Very nice food. It was really quiet the night we went so not a lot of atmosphere. They seemed to be having problems with the alarm system and it kept going off (not great) Will return but for the lunch menu next time.

title: Wonderful Xmas lunch
comment: A fun and very tasty Christmas lunch with a traditional option plus veggie and fish. My highlight was the Christmas pudding with a wonderful contrast from a sprig of sour berries. There was a great buss in the restuarant and our party was most reluctant to leave, even after the home made mince pies.

title: Excellent Christmas Lunce
comment: Delicous food, great help with various allergies our group had. Marcel's effiiciency and sense of humour added to a good time

title: Really Good
comment: I have visited BR6 several times with a group of friends and it just gets better and better. The standard is high and I prefer it for food to a certain smart (was Michelin starred) restaurant at Locks Bottom. The venison I chose was cooked to perfection.

title: Taste of sunshine
comment: We ate lunch here for our wedding anniversary, and it was the usual fabulous friendly service and delicious food. The Covid measures put in place are excellent. We had a meal delivered to home for my lockdown birthday in May and they are still doing take always so no need to miss out. Still the best restaurant for miles. Thank you to the team.

title: This place is just lovely!
comment: This place is just lovely! The staff and students are so friendly and welcoming. We had two small children’s and they were so helpful. The food was incredible could of fault a single thing! Will be going back!

title: Thursday night sunrise
comment: First time visit after some recommendations from friends, and glad we came. Very attentive service throughout. Lots of choice on the menu, maybe more fish biased than we had expected, but still enough alternatives. Great to have Super Bock on tap, and at a reasonable price and the draft wine was also very good. . Lovely cuttlefish for starter, another first for us. My wife had the steak rustic creamy sauce and a fried egg on top. I had the mixed grill, very tasty, and helped by a side dish of fried onions as a special request. Too full for dessert,which was a shame.

title: Still the best coffee in Orpington
comment: Popped in last week for a coffee. Great quality as always, the students are gaining invaluable skills by practicing there. Fantastic service with a smile by Yona. Well done, keep at it.

title: Lunch
comment: Had lunch at this lovely restaurant last week with friends. The food was amazing and thoroughly enjoyed by all. Staff very attentative and welcoming. Definitely will look forward to going back again soon.

title: Food good, service needs much improving
comment: The food was good and well presented. Unfortunately the service is quite poor and needs much improving, specially since the decoration expresses fine dining.

title: Fabulous meal
comment: My 13 year olds son says "best chicken he's ever had!". A seriously delicious meal. Something for everyone. The staff are super helpful and friendly too. Felt very Covid safe. Would highly recommend.

title: Great meal...beautiful restaurant....fabulous
comment: Great meal...beautiful restaurant....fabulous food....waitress Anna very helpful.... will definitely be back

title: Amazing food as always
comment: Loved this restaurant. I've been here four times and never been disappointed. The menu offers a great variety of dishes, and I especially like the seafood. This time, I tried the grilled octopus and it was delicious, very well accompanied with vegetables and potatoes. The dessert was so good, I strongly recommend to mix a cake with the Ferrero gelato.

title: Excellent food , restuarent and bakehouse and most of all customer service
comment: Excellent customer service food is presented to a high standard menu is reasonabkle price . It was just an amazing expreinece i do rate it 10/10 .

title:
Delicious steak 🥩
Can recommend
comment: Delicious steak

title: Excellent Curry
comment: Really great curry also does takeaway. Does not serve alcohol but you can buy from the shop next door. Recommend the Black Dog pub next door before or after.

title: Delicous Takeaway meal
comment: Our first meal from Albany Spice. The food was fresh and tasty. We particularly enjoyed the chicken biryani, onion rice and saag bhaji. We hope to return to the restaurant when lockdown is over.

title: Lovely lunchtime eatery
comment: Had lunch with a colleague today. A lovely calm atmosphere conducive to a meeting over a delicious lunch and attentive staff. Thank you and see you again soon.

title: Lunch with a friend.
comment: Visited BR6 recently with my friend. Have been many times and always have a lovely meal. Selected food off of the menu. The soup to start was delicious as was the fish dish main course. The staff are friendly and efficient and it is a joy to watch them learn their craft. Will look forward to my next visit.

title: Excellent cuppa and lovely staff
comment: Had a cuppa with my friends, the coffee and service were excellent. The staff were very helpful too.

title: Amazing breakfast
comment: Went there with a friend for breakfast. Such lovely students serving the most delicious food. Nothing is too much trouble and we will be back soon !!

title: Excellent!
comment: What an innovative concept for a restaurant - I was unsure what to expect in terms of both food and service, but my goodness, both were fantastic. The menu was original and exciting, with the actual dishes remaining entirely faithful to their description. Our party of four had different meals and not one of our three courses was anything other than visually appealing, wonderfully tasting and excellent value. The service easily matched the fare and was helpful, friendly, efficient and professional. I will certainly return so that other friends and family can also enjoy the experience.

title: Leisurely lunch on a wet day
comment: We had been intending to try this out for a long time, more for curiosity than with any great expectations, but never got around to it until one very rainy august day when we needed a distraction from the gloom so booked a table for lunch.

title: great quality Food
comment: Limited menu but great food and very personnel service. Have to book early as wine not served after nine o'clock , we got an extra bottle when ordering, enjoyed our meal and moved onto the Pato Lounge for a night cap.

title: A truly enjoyable lunch
comment: My wife, son and I chose this restaurant to celebrate my wife's birthday. This restaurant is a student-led commercially-run restaurant designed to deepen the experience of the 16+ year old students at the Orpington Career College focused on the Hospitality and Food industries. Not everything ran completely smoothly, nor did we expect it to. The advertised sauce béarnaise did not turn up with the steak, because the béarnaise had broken while it was being made - that is the risk you run when students are running the kitchen (shown on the CCTV screen behind us) and when dishes are cooked from scratch. The warm chocolate brownie was tepid at most. However my wife reports it was quite delicious, and my own rump of lamb with red cabbage, potatoes and a parsnip cream was excellent. Indeed the red cabbage was the best I have ever eaten. My glass of Malbec accompanied the lamb brilliantly. This is not a restaurant for those in a hurry; we expected to spent two hours on lunch, and did. But it was very good value at less than £50 for a two-course meal for three with wine, cooked and served by students who were honing their skills.

title: 1st visit
comment: This was My 1st visit with a friend for brunch

title: Takeaway
comment: Our first time using Albany spice for a takeaway, we weren’t disappointed.. the food was beautifully cooked & full of flavour.. the spicing of the dishes were spot on.. it’s our definite go to Indian takeaway

title: Excellent food and reasonably priced.
comment: Our first meal (takeaway) from this restaurant and absolutely delicious. £27 for two dinners, and the portions were so big I won't have to cook for the next 2 days! This is definitely the best Indian food in Brentford.

title: Fantastic!
comment: We were visiting the area and looking for somewhere to eat. Looked on TripAdvisor and noticed Albany Spice had good reviews.

title: If you are staying at the Premier Inn opposite get over to this restaurant immediately!
comment: We have just finished an amazing meal at the Albany Spice. As seasoned Yorkshire curry eaters of many decades, it is hard to find an Indian restaurant down South that knows had to do proper curry. At last, we’ve found it.

title: Tasty dishes; not oily; efficient delivery
comment: We have eaten in at Albany Spice a couple of times before lockdown, and always had a great meal.Will do so again one day soon.

title: Very disappointed!!
comment: I have left very positive reviews of the Albany Spice before. It is normally our go to place for get togethers after work. We arranged a post lockdown get together, 10 friends, 2 tables with social distancing a priority.

title: A Sunday evening curry
comment: Arrived in Brentford and needed to eat but not in the hotel. Checked local listings and this came up highly rated. Strange as no drink licence so you visit the shop next door and brink in a take home bottle. Hence some trepidation but food and service was excellent and the price very reasonable.

title: Albany Spice, Very Nice
comment: This place is a must visit. It is busy and located in a convenient place with public parking outside. It’s not licensed but it is BYO. Great great service from the front of house staff. The food is amazing with bursting flavours. See you again soon.

title: Good value and very tasty!
comment: Went here after a football match and had a really good meal. It’s not licensed which I didn’t realise until we’d got there but there is a an off license next door and we were given and opener and glasses by the staff. It ends up making the bill a lot more reasonable!!

title: Excellent service and food
comment: On arrival we received a warm and genuine welcome. The menu is extensive. Even though the restaurant was busy we didn’t feel rushed but staff were attentive and friendly. The food is excellent, really good quality- would definitely recommend.

title: Lovely flavours
comment: I visited this restaurant in October with my friends and we order lot of take away as well, always good and fresh.

title: Great fòod
comment: Super food and service for boys night out. Looked after by waiting staff extraordinarily well. Will be back.

title: Albany Spice is devoted to food.
comment: I live in the USA and get into London on business several times per year. I am always keen on a good Indian meal locally when I am here. Brick lane which has become too commercialized, is also an hour plus away, so I decided on the local.

title: Delivery
comment: It's so hard to find a decent Indian restaurant in Brentford.

title: Decent curry
comment: Ordered the chicken pathia extra spicy and extra sweet and unfortunately the sweetness was lost in the spice. Still very tasty though. Service was excellent even though they were super busy! The coffee after the meal was outstanding! Best coffee I’ve ever had! This restaurant is BYOB but there’s a shop next door.

title: Our New Local Curry
comment: Excellent local curry restaurant. Lovely flavours and tastes very fresh. The BYOB works well and well so does detract. This is looking a strong candidate for our local curry house!

title: Delicious food in a relaxed place
comment: We had a lovely meal, delicious and subtle flavours. Very friendly staff who were attentive and helpful. Il

title: lockdown take-away
comment: Ordered and ate a take away last night; prawns, tarte -tatine, chocolate mousse. Whilst the experience cannot match the atmosphere of the Bistro when in full service the food was delicious, beautifully cooked, and easy to reheat and prepare - with full instructions from JP. A real treat, and an exercise we will repeat whilst these frustrating restrictions remain in force.

title: New Years Eve takeaway
comment: Absolutely fantastic as always.

title: Lockdown takeaway
comment: We had soupe de poisson, and rabbit and pork terrine for starters. Lobster Pithivier with roast potatoes each, for main. The courses were packed up individually and we had clear instructions for reheating at home. The soup was amazing, better than we have had in France. We will be returning for the lobster. The Channel Tunnel may be closed, but we definitely spent the afternoon in France!

title: Superb Food & Atmosphere
comment: We have now visited three times, the last on the 4.12.20 for my birthday dinner and it really is something to look forward to. All five of us enjoyed the wonderful food and the friendly atmosphere. It is a restaurant you will want to return to.

title: Anniversary meal
comment: Thank you J P for a wonderful (takeaway) meal - reheating instructions included.

title: Nothing Petit about this
comment: Is it pretentious? It’s East Molesey. Is it overpriced? It’s East Molesey. Most importantly is it delicious food with exceptional service? Absolutely.

title: Yet another wonderful meal
comment: Wonderful birthday dinner for my Mum and Dad pronounced it as his favourite restaurant. Service is excellent and the food perfect with the most delicious beef Wellington I've ever had and lovely for JP to come out and show us how it was made. Love this place!

title: On the last evening before Lockdown #2
comment: On the last evening before Lockdown #2 5 of us had the most fantastic meal. The food and service was excellent. The restaurant was buzzing too.

title: Delicious late lunch
comment: Dropped in for a late lunch. Delicious food, everything tasted fresh and flavourful. Waiters were friendly and the restaurant setting is pleasant and modern. I liked that you can see into the kitchen. Would dine here again and recommend. Thank you to Enzo’s !

title: Best restaurant ever!
comment: Amazing food, literally SO good. Brilliant wine and ambience. Best thing were the staff, especially Georgia. So welcomed I and made to feel special, cannot wait to return! Thanks for the best night! X

title: Food is quite good but cold restaurant
comment: I wanted to like Enzo's as it's a independent restaurant and family-owned. We came for lunch on a Sunday. The food itself was quite good although some of the mussels in my seafood dish were not the best quality. Unfortunately we could not enjoy the experience fully as the restaurant was very cold. We sat in scarves throughout the meal and rushed our desserts so we could get home for a warm. It's a pity but next time we would choose to come in summer.

title: Enzos Windsor Restaurant Review
comment: Can’t recommend this place enough. Great food and fantastic service. This is a brilliant family run restaurant with a really good atmosphere.

title: Best restaurant in Windsor!
comment: I have been to Enzo’s on a few occasions now. Once with a friend but most recently with my boyfriend. Each time I have been I have loved it!! We went last night and got chatting to Enzo’s Dad... what a great time we had !! We were so well looked after by all the lovely staff, they are so attentive and all clearly love their jobs. We will be going back again and again and again! The food is the best Italian in the whole of Windsor without a doubt, The entire experience is 10/10.

title: Fabulous food, friendly staff
comment: Lovely food and friendly and attentive service. A fabulous night out! Excellent wine list but not the only reasin we had a great time. The carbonara is a must, as is the calzone, but the ravioli also - we really cannot fault this place

title: Mamma mia!
comment: Amazing service and food. Had a wonderful time there with my friends. The kitchen made us suprises which were delicious. Definitely going back! Recommend.

title: Fantastic Food! Great employees! Wonderful Chef!
comment: Everything about this restaurant was great! Service was phenomenal and food was very delicious. Would defiantly go back again and again!

title: Exquisite food and superb service
comment: We made an unplanned visit here for lunch the day my mother in law died at the end of February. Of course the restaurant had no idea. My husband, my son and I came for a late lunch. The food was absolutely tremendous, notably the pork and we had a passion fruit pavlova for pudding. The staff were on tip top form. The attention to detail was perfect. Please excuse my delay in reviewing. Love this restaurant.

title: Exquisite
comment: We took advantage of the no corkage charge to have lunch here. It was exquisite. The tuna sashimi and octopus linguini from the starter lost were excellent. Rolled pork belly and the rock bass from the mains were amazing. I had the passion fruit meringue pie for dessert which was awesome but so were all the others. For just under £40 for three courses is an excellent value.

title: Perfect Big Birthday Treat....
comment: We were taken here by our very special friends for my 50th Birthday. A really classy, professional experience, friendly waiting staff and an excellent head chef. All of our food choices were stunning, amazing tastes, presentation, I truly cannot fault anything about this restaurant, we had a thoroughly great evening with great company, food and wine!! Thank you for having us!

title: A 90th Birthday Lunch to Remember
comment: For many years, my Mother has mentioned that as a child during WW2 she lived at Kew - in both Sandicombe Road and also at her Father’s Antique Furniture shop, which was located next door to Kew Gardens Station. It was her dearest wish to revisit her childhood home once more and

title: Absolutely Superb
comment: We were absolutely thrilled when the Glasshouse re-opened its' doors post lockdown. We have dined at the restaurant many times since, for both lunch and dinner. We have been blown away by the standard of food and the level of service is exceptional. Nothing is too much trouble. The chef and his team should be congratulated. Every meal is a triumph. Looking forward to our next visit already.

title: WONDERFUL,,
comment: A Sunday lunchtime reservation for six people and celebrating our 39th wedding anniversary. It was a delightful meal with excellent food served by charming and very helpful staff. The occasion could not be faulted. Thank you to The Glasshouse, Kew.

title: So good I could have come back the next evening
comment: Just a wonderful dining experience. From the bright welcome, the ethereal queen olives, to the octopus spaghetti and then the roast grouse. My wife's tuna sashimi and halibut was vey well received. Good list of wines by the glass and helpful and attentive, but not overwhelming service. Can't wait to go again.

title: Birthday fine dining
comment: This was my second visit to The Glasshouse. For me, the mark of great fine dining (aside from delicious food and wine) is seamless service and an attractive and comfortable setting. The Glasshouse has all of these in abundance. The food is perfectly prepared, the staff are friendly and inconspicuous and the restaurant is warm and inviting. A third visit is certainly not off the cards.

title: Trying too hard - keep it simpler
comment: Excellent if slightly formal service. Wine list a bit pretentious with limited list but still modest to ridiculously priced wine (£300 a bottle) Food is good but to my mind trying too hard to be clever and original rather than getting simple things done excellently. Wouldn’t rush back.

title: Best dining out experience all year...
comment: We booked for a party of five, and rearranged en-route as we were running ahead of schedule. None of use had been to Enzo's before, but we all like Italian food, and we were swayed by the Tripadvisor rating.

title: Fantastic
comment: We had a pre-dinner meal here and it was simply excellent. It’s a warm and welcoming restaurant, with friendly efficient staff. The wine was a bit pricey but very nice indeed. I had the prawn linguine special and it was one of the best meals I’ve ever had. And our desserts were amazing. I’ll definitely be coming back. Highly recommended.

title: Fantastic every time.
comment: As a local I have visited Enzo’s many times and have loved every experience. Wonderful fresh authentic food, attentive and efficient servers, and great atmosphere. The owners’ hard work and commitment is apparent in its success.

title: Oman
comment: The food is amazing!! I enjoyed every single bite !! The taste is unbelievable !! The the staff are really lovely and friendly!!

title: Superb Italian Food
comment: This was as good an Italian restaurant that I have eaten in. Fantastic food from start to finish and super fast service from attentive staff. I’m not going into detail regards what we had for each course, but I’m pretty confident whatever you order, you will not be disappointed.

title: Absolutely fantastic meal, such a wonderful restaurant ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
comment: Went to Enzos this evening to celebrate my Mums birthday and it was as always a wonderful meal and a fantastic afternoon/evening.

title: Great Pizza
comment: Stopped for a quick pizza after visiting Windsor Castle for the morning, friendly staff, great pizza

title: Amazing and welcoming staff, very tasty food
comment: I just went there for a birthday dinner and honestly did not expect to be met with such a welcoming staff. It was lovely, the food was tasty and it was overall a very great experience. Will definitely go again and I strongly recommend it.

title: Several times and always perfect
comment: I have a stunning experience once again at then Enzo's. Food is amazing and the staff made me feel at home

title: Quality Italian Restaurant
comment: Went with my 11 year old son, he had pizza with Italian sausage and loved it. I had mussels to start and probably the best lamb shank I've tasted in a long time, washed down with 2 great glasses of red wine (recommended by the waiter). Superb service and atmosphere, nothing to fault.

title: Absolutely fabulous
comment: Another fantastic meal here

title: Nice evening
comment: We went for a birthday meal to this restaurant.

title: Excellent food and spot on service
comment: I was staying at the hotel and chose to meet a friend for dinner at the restaurant. What a good decision.

title: Uli P
comment: First time Went out to a restaurant since March

title: Back with a BANG!!!
comment: Back with a BANG!!!

title: Distinctly average
comment: Michelin star? Really?

title: Wonderful Sunday lunch!
comment: The food was outstanding - esp an extraordinary main course of monk fish. Service was polished and unhurried. Cannot recommend highly enough. A total delight - thank you - worth every penny.

title: One star doesn’t seem enough for this gem
comment: You are guaranteed a wonderful dining experience at this gem of a restaurant.

title: Outstanding
comment: We decided to book a last minute table, the day before, as we had had two holidays cancelled and wanted a treat. It was perfection from start to finish. The rose veal starter was so good, I wanted to weep! Well worth the money.

title: Mrs C
comment: We went as a family of four. We were disappointed. We were even more disappointed when we wrote with feed back only to receive a very arrogant and rude response from the owners.

title: Pretty average
comment: Pretty average food, service was good. Would come back maybe if I was in the area but wouldn’t necessarily go out of my way based on the lunch we had. Having heard good things about the pizza and the fact that they have a proper pizza oven, maybe would come back to try those.

title: Lovely summer evening out
comment: It was only my second time at a restaurant since lockdown but it was a very positive experience. We had a lovely table outside and we were very well looked after by the excellent staff. It was good to see they are taking things seriously, requesting contact information from everyone and being attentive to social distancing and sanitising. The food was as delicious as always. I was pleased to see the place so busy, with people eating in and people coming for take aways, especially given that it was a Sunday evening. I think it’s so important to support small businesses like this at the moment. It’s such a good local place so I hope it continues to be busy and successful.

title: Great 2 year anniversary
comment: So little I can't praise. The staff were friendly and on the ball, the food was amazing (the sirloin steak pasta is a firm recommendation) and the restaurant made me feel safe with their covid measures. 10/10

title: Friday lunch
comment: Went for Friday lunch at Caspari with a friend and her elderly dad. We were given a large table so we could keep a safe distance in a sectioned off part of the restaurant with amazing plush furniture so we felt like royalty!

title: Love this place
comment: Great food, great service and great wine. Relaxed and fun atmosphere. Love the meatballs and gamberoni to start. Full of flavour.

title: Fabulous family food - not on Aug deal
comment: We arrived as a family on Monday hoping for a meal to start a week holiday at home. It definitely delivered. The pizza and pasta were delicious. The tiramisu was devine. However the star of the show was the pear and prosuttio salad. It was gorgeous. I have never had such a delicious salad.

title: Lovely local Italian restaurant!
comment: Lovely local Italian restaurant! Nice ambience, lovely food and a special mention to Afrim!

title: Fantastic
comment: Just visited this beautiful restaurant, & am so pleased I did. The food was absolutely amazing. There was was about 30 diners in the restaurant, all socially distanced with hand sanitizer on every table. Did not expect it to be so full on a Monday evening, which proves how good the food is. Very reasonably priced too. Worth every penny. Will definitely be returning soon.

title: Nikki
comment: I have stayed at the glasshouse retreat twice. It’s the best spa I have ever stayed at. So friendly, caring, helpful considerate, kind and so much more. X

title: Warm & welcoming service and wonderful food
comment: Thank you to the whole team at Caspari for brilliant service this lunchtime. A warm and friendly welcome, with a great choice of dishes. The food was wonderful. A really relaxing lunch. We will most definitely be returning.

title: Family favourite!
comment: Have been going to Caspari for a couple of years now. Not only has it become a family favourite but also has managed to improve itself regularly. The team is wonderfully friendly and hospitable, the food is great and the atmosphere is always warm and inviting. My friends from out of town started planning visits to Englefield Green just to join us for a meal at Caspari's!

title: Great taste...amazing friendly
comment: Great taste...amazing friendly service and great food..the ambience is great and family friendly have been here multiple times

title: Very good service
comment: Really love the food and the atmosphere, our server was really sweet and funny and that made the whole experience more better

title: Good Chinese restaurant
comment: Very good and clean place for dining. Very friendly staff. Food is delicious we love to come back thanks

title: Excellent Indo Chinese food
comment: Excellent Indo Chinese food with good service and staff - definitely recommended if in the area. Noodles along with Garlic Chill chicken is recommended.

title: Beat service
comment: We came out to eat me and my husband and it is the most amazing restaurant we have come to this is our family outing restaurant that we come to as they have the best food and the best hospitality and service , amazing staff and amazing food got timing love it

title: Best Food ever
comment: It is the best Indo- Chinese food I have ever had in the UK. A must try for people craving for Hakka noodles and chicken lolipop

title: Amazing food and service!!
comment: Amazing food and service!! As always!! Refurbished recently so my fiancée and I were glad to be back to everything new. Lawrence was impeccable in his service as always. Highly recommended!

title: Amazing indo Chinese bar none
comment: This is our go to spot for indo Chinese and we’ve been coming here for years. If you need your indo Chinese fix this is your spot. They also do amazing hyderabadi dishes like chicken 65 and majestic chicken and of course the famous Hyderabadi biryani. Quick and efficient service.

title: Indo chinese
comment: Loved the street Chinese food, reminded me of taste from Mumbai. Will be back to check out non vegetarian food. Visited the place after 11 years new and improved.

title: Brie starter
comment: Would 100% recommend the brie in breadcrumbs with cranberry sauce starter- was delicious! Pizza was lovely also and service was great.

title: Excellent service
comment: Excellent service. Food came quickly and hot. The Schezwan noodles were amazing and we’ll definitely order from them again. Karahi dishes were mouthwatering and filling. Will be returning here and recommending to friends.

title: Great Restaurant
comment: We ordered a take away from Caspari on the Saturday 21st March. Seriously impressed. Great food excellent service. My wife is NHS but we didn’t take the fantastic offer of a free meal for NHS staff. We were grateful to get a great meal. We will come back when we can sit in and have the real service this place can offer. I look forward to if.

title: Lockdown takeaway
comment: I wasn't too sure how this would go - but we were seriously impressed with every aspect. Sunday lunch for 5. We had 6 starters and 5 pizzas. Of note, my Salami Napoli pizza was off the scale delicious. £107 - not bad value and we will be returning!

title: Bust the lockdown supper!
comment: So glad to be back out at Caspari. Our favourite Italian restaurant. We've missed them during lockdown although they kept their customers sane with their wonderful takeaways. Tonight my Husband, Dad and I enjoyed a wonderful supper. The guys have totally embraced the 'new' eating out experience, and to be fair it didn't feel awkward at all. Dad and I had Tagliatelle Basilica and Chris had his special. King prawns with chilli and garlic spaghetti. Excellent! Service is always top notch with friendly banter. We've missed you and so happy to see you busy and buzzing again. Thanks guys!!

title: Lockdown Service from our favourite Restaurant in Englefield Green
comment: With Lockdown in place, my wife and I ordered a meal from our favourite restaurant in Englefield Green - Caspari.

title: Love this restaurant!
comment: First meal out after lockdown and it was fantastic! Proper Covid precautions were in place so we felt safe the whole time. The food was amazing! Staff were super friendly and attentive!

title: Truly excellent
comment: Stumbled upon this gem after a couple of local people recommended it. It was the best Italian food I have had in a very long time. We ordered the garlic bread with cheese, a pizza and penne arrabiata, and all three were excellent. The service was attentive but not overbearing, just as you would wish it to be. We will certainly be back next time we’re in the area. Highly recommended!

title: Christmas lunch
comment: As per another review on Christmas Day lunch; we fully concur

title: Delicious authentic Italian food and wonderful staff
comment: I am a regular at this restaurant and it is one of the best Italians I have ever been to. I moved in round the corner and have already visited 5 times with family, friends and partner. Love it! The linguini capesente (scallop linguini) is my favourite on the menu. Staff are always welcoming, attentive and friendly.

title: è semplicemente incredibile.
comment: Every aspect of this restaurant is outstanding. From the way they encourage my 5 year old to eat up all her food for a 'surprise' at the end, to the wine reccomendation never being sales focused (ie the most expensive) just what they think I'll enjoy.Genuine care for their guests and recognising us when we enter asking us a heart felt "how are you all doing" to the severs encouraging us to try things we haven't before because they know what I always have ! They look after us like we are royalty and are aware of our 'quirks la such as my 5year old daughter wanting a wine glass to be 'the same as us big girls l' I cannot rate the food highly enough you must eat to believe ! And the service is impeccable please go Eat here x X

title: Nice
comment: Very yummy food came back from first visit as first visit was so good and so was the second visit had great customer service and good hygiene

title: Authentic Hyderabadi Dum Biryanis in town
comment: Absolute feast..proper Hyderabad biryanis and indo chinese ..very nice starters . Had chicken 65 and majestic chicken..highly recommended

title: Harry K
comment: Excellent food and brilliant customer service, me and my partner was trying it for 1st time and 100% found our new place, menu soo fresh and unique. Great value,

title: Hidden Gem of a restaurant
comment: What a hidden gem of a restaurant ate dinner here with a friends! Great selection of dishes that were fresh tasting and delicious! Was recommended dishes to suit and it didn’t disappoint highly recommend a visit here

title: Delicious, definitely come if youre in southall
comment: Very good food and service. Best food in southall, no complaints whatsoever. Ive come many times and ill always come back

title: Quick service with very pleasant
comment: Quick service with very pleasant staff , lovely food and great ambiance. Much recommend if in Southall!!!!

title: Lunch
comment: Great food and service. Very clean and hygienic and covid safe. Food was fresh and spicy with good flavours

title: Delicious!
comment: Some of the best indian food I have tasted :) really excellent service and delicious food. The bhajias were the especially nice as was the chilli paneer and the mogo:)

title: Excellent Indo-Chinese
comment: I visit regularly. Excellent Indochinese delicacies. Courteus service. Excellent service every time.

title: Nice food, we had the chilli
comment: Nice food, we had the chilli mushrooms, gobi 65, masala chips and Hakka noodles. Great service and good covid hygiene

title: Birthday gathering
comment: Seven of us had an early sitting on a Saturday evening. We were immediately made welcome by the staff and made to feel at ease. We had bruschetta and delightful octopus starters which were really tasty followed by a selection of excellent pizza and really good pasta. Although stuffed, we managed to squeeze some desserts in as well.

title: Food was excellent great pizza great people
comment: i come here regularly and i am never let down. the menu is great and starters are very nice. my favourite is the mario special pizza. this is a GREAT place

title: A local delight
comment: A great local pizza place that truly looks after its customers. All the food we had was fantastic and the service matched. I would go back with family and friends.

title: Finally tried it.......
comment: I live in Sidcup and eat out regularly but for some reason had ever eaten at Mario’s, even having heard great comments.

title: Delicious!!!!
comment: Fantastic Italian Food !!!!

title: Excellent - all 3 courses & the wine
comment: Everything was amazing.

title: Poor waiter
comment: Didn’t eat here, waiter said we need to book , he wasn’t very accommodating as there where 4 empty tables available, waiter looked worst for wear at 7pm, small restaurant, wasn’t what I was expected, went to prezzo up the road had a lovely meal in great surroundings similar food but larger menu

title: Great Family Restaurant!
comment: Fantastic food and very welcoming as always. The pasta and pizza at Marios is superb, all home made and an ever changing specials menu.

title: Special little Italian restaurant
comment: The service and the small restaurant is absolute perfect and the food was truly excellent. Highly recommended and please definitely book beforehand.

title: Italian treat
comment: My friend finally managed to book a table for 8pm last Friday, after never managing to get booked in previously! We both had pizzas which were thin crust and tasty. We opted for home made cheese cake - I had the lemon one which was gorgeous. Reasonably priced at around £25 per head including wine. Staff were welcoming and service good.

title: Lovely Sunday early dinner
comment: My friend and I had such a lovely time on Sunday At Caspari. We had an outside table with loads of space between us and other customers so felt safe.

title: Meatballs....
comment: I visited this restaurant for the first time with my wife. Was looking forward to a brilliant meal. I ordered the meatball as they stated just like you mama would make. What a joke, nothing like what mum makes. No flavour, rock solid, grey looking inside and warm inside;not hot. The hottest thing I got was the plate which suggests a microwave was involved in the process. I didn't complain on the night as I didn't want to ruin a date with my wife. Maybe they were having a bad night but it will take a lot for me to go back again. In defence of them my wife's pizza looked very good. If you want meatballs then probably not the place to go.

title: Excellent pizza
comment: We went with a friend for lunch. Bread and olive, plus three pizzas, desserts and coffees. Very good value, excellent food as always.

title: Overpriced
comment: We had eaten here once previously with another couple and although it was expensive for what we had, and the location, we had wine and beer so that would have not provided a true and fair reference point.

title: Totally great
comment: I visited this restaurant twice in May. Firstly to sit in and dine and secondly to take away. I can say that both times were brilliant.

title: Great Pizza!
comment: Came here after hearing the great reviews and loved it. Pizza was excellent and the restaurant had a nice family feel to it.

title: Buzzing local Italian restaurant I would love to have closer to home
comment: Went with family grouping. Initial impression was “is this the same place I heard about” but after the welcome, the warmth and atmosphere of the place more than make up for the relative small size and stark interior. This restaurant is about meeting, eating, laughing, discussing and generally having a lovely time. Food was lovely. Solid, really tasty, good sized portions. Staff were attentive and welcoming. Wine list was frankly disappointing but then many there would not care about that. Thoroughly recommend.

title: Average food at best. Cramped with poor service
comment: I can only think the other reviewers are comparing to the local fast food pizza chains.

title: Small but food and atmosphere make up.
comment: I went with my son for a Daddy night, it was a cold evening and they have no inner door so can get a bit fresh when the door is opened. Service is attentive without being irritating and combined with the music gives a pseudo Italian atmosphere. The wine list is small and too bigger gap between a couple of cheapies £19/20 and Primitivo at £32.00. I think a longer and cheaper wine list would be more appropriate for the size of restaurant as for me and my son, the wine is an important constituent of a meal out. Food is good with ample portion size so the only down size is that the restaurant is a bit cramped but no doubt in summer, when I see that they extend to the pavement outside it would be a very pleasant meal.

title: Best Pizza ever
comment: Been using Marios for several years. Great atmosphere and great food. Takeaway pizzas are a real treat too. We haven’t had better even in Italy.

title: Great pizza
comment: Have been visited 3 times and each time have had an absolutely delicious pizza.

title: Great Food and Sevice
comment: Visited on a busy Wednesday evening. Waited a short while to be seated. Food came out very timely and was delicious. Lamb Jalfrezi was very special. The staff were very diligent and polite. Very affordable prices so will look forward to returning.

title: Truly a gem
comment: Charming little cafe serving authentic and tasty food. Recommend, for lunch or dinner. Small but never too busy. On the pricier side, but worth it, for the quality

title: Dumplings are a must!
comment: Have been coming here for over 3 years almost every weekend. Fantastic service and food quality always incredible. The dumplings are an absolute must, as well as the Nasi Goreng! So lovely to support a local family-owned business! Quirky decor and warm atmosphere - would highly recommend.

title: Delicious steak dinner
comment: Excellent meal with some really nice accompaniments available on the menu. Service was good and we had a lovely table in the window.

title: Amazing Tapas & Great Local Pub
comment: As a family, with friends and now as a take away this place always delivers. Great pub and restaurant with a good atmosphere and really friendly staff. Food is fantastic with something for everyone, even during the latest covid restrictions the owners remain their usual friendly and upbeat selves. Love this place and will go more often, roll on the summer.

title: Worst food experience... old and not at all fresh...horrible
comment: I am a regular at this restaurant since its opening. Usually their food is always good. But this time had a horrible experience. Had ordered on deliveroo tandoori lamb chops- stale and very grey meat. Smelling of rancid oil and horrible taste. I just took a small bite and the rest went in the bin. Same was tandoori chicken- smelled looked and tasted old and the meat was greyish and dry.( see pictures below) chicken 65 also the chicken meat was old. Usually this dish is their best one, but the one i got today was really not fresh at all. So i spoke to the restaurant and have given them a direct feedback. First response was reluctant and defensive but after speaking with the chef, the person on the phone apologised and excepted that the marination was at least 2-3 days old. (My guess is and what i could see from the food received, it was older than that!)

title: A delightful find!
comment: Trip Advisor comes good again and this place is well worthy of its high ranking!

title: Hands down the best restaurant in Surbiton
comment: Not only is the food incredible but the staff are amazing. So attentive, nothing is too much trouble. We arrived on a busy Friday night (no booking) and no tables available. Laura took my number and we popped to the pub, I got a call 15 mins later saying our table was ready! The food is unreal, a true Italian restaurant. I would recommend the Forzo Napoli pizza, burrata cheese in the middle!! Lovely atmosphere, amazing staff and incredible food.

title: Authentic Italian
comment: Fabulous oven fired pizzas, reasonably priced. Nice atmosphere. Open for brunch, lunch and evening dining.

title: Nice local
comment: Nice food and really good calamari, was glad we tried this one. A good fall back for a quick pizza close to home

title: Fantastic visit
comment: Visited Windsor with husband and friends & Sebastian’s was recommenced . Beautiful food , amazing atmosphere , excellent service , would definitely recommend & return

title: Fab little place to eat
comment: Really cute little restaurant with a Japanese / Asian type menu of fresh food popular with locals and a nice alternative to the usual restaurant chains

title: Absolutely brilliant!
comment: The last night of our short break and definitely the best was kept til last!

title: Most tastiest place to eat in Ruislip!
comment: I love this cafe so much! The team are always so kind and friendly and inclusive - to couples, families, people with pets, newborns, and I always want to take my friends and family there.

title: Best local breakfast
comment: It was our second time visiting this nice restaurant, but for the first time we sat outside, which is an amazing little area. Very cosy, green and feels like at home. Besides all that, food was amazing as well. Very friendly team, good and fast service. Everything what you expect from a great restaurant. Another point is that for the quality and this service prices are very good as well!! It's one of Ruislip gems!

title: Great
comment: Great food and Service by our waiter Asher! Took advantage of the Wednesday offer of £2.50 a dish. Will return

title: Lovely prawn sandwiches!
comment: I attended a funeral reception here and the pub laid on a superb buffet. The staff looked after us all during the evening. Thank you so much.

title: Excellent restaurant , Great Food and Service
comment: Was here for anniversary weekend away and stayed at the Sir Christopher Wren hotel , i was looking for a good steakhouse for the Saturday night , im glad i booked this , as one of the best steaks i have had , we opted for prawn starters and we shared Chateaubriand with chips and sauces ,Superb no room for dessert!! Service was excellent and we will return highly recommended , thks

title: Wow,
comment: Wow just wow, I don't even have the words literally the best meal I've ever eaten in my life a true taste experience, so much so I had to go and thank the chefs personally, there are no words to how good the food is here Everyone must come here they just must

title: Had the most amazing fillet
comment: Had the most amazing fillet steak cooked to perfection with a delicious bearnaise sauce and chunky chips. Our table all enjoyed their steaks and the desserts were excellent too. Staff were very friendly and efficient. Would highly recommend.

title: Best Fish and Chips in Town
comment: If you like quality Fish and Chips with waitress service in a relaxed and comfortable setting, look no further. The fish of various types is cooked to perfection and the chips and mushy or garden peas are an excellent complement.

title: Gluten free.
comment: Lovely fish and chips. We have eaten here several times. Sadly what lets it down is that on the last time we were there I was served an unsafe meal. I am coeliac and they either mixed up the two dishes or mine was seriously contaminated with gluten. I have never had such a bad coeliac reaction any other time so I suspect that I was given my husband’s meal and he was given mine. I will never, ever go again as it takes me a really long time to recover from. If you don’t have dietary requirements then definitely go as it’s beautiful fish and chips.

title: One of the best Italian in London
comment: Simply delicious.

title: Simply the best
comment: It matters what you are after- this is not the spot you will impress a girl and have to dodge the elastics of her pants.

title: This one keeps delivering
comment: A spectacular Italian restaurant. Quality, execution, service, price/quality ratio, it has got it all!

title: Quality food
comment: Booked here for a birthday treat (£16.50 2 course set menu) and were not disappointed with the starters- these were of excellent quality. The mains were a little disappointing; they were not hot and only luke warm on arrival. Still nice though. We would have mentioned it to the staff, who were friendly, but they did not check to see if everything was ok. Would go back but would splash out on the a la carte menu next time!

title: Perfect Pentolina
comment: Excellent food and wonderful atmosphere at Pentolina! This is such a lovely restaurant to visit in Brook Green and worth the money. I had the duck ragu and it was extremely tasty. The tiramisu is a must-have dessert too. Definitely worth trying if you live in Hammersmith (just a 15 min walk).

title: Truly Italian, intimate and stylish
comment: A very good dinner with truly Italian ingredients and tastes, from the appetizers (cold cuts, ham and bufala) to the paccheri. I loved the style, the atmosphere the relxed kindness of the whole staff. Not to be missed!

title: Excellent
comment: My family visited twice - first for my birthday and then for Sunday lunch ( wonderfully served all day ). Loved the pub (this undersells the place- it’s much nicer than that sounds), the food and the service ( shout out for the marvellous Viking Joe) Best ‘pub’ food I’ve ever had - wonderful steak on my birthday and outstanding lamb ( and what a Yorkshire Pudding- in That London too- we’re Yorkshire) in Sunday. We loved it - great beer and wine selection too. Brilliant and we will return

title: Sunday Lunch
comment: Absolutely outstanding food - reasonably priced. All the best of a cosy pub but with restaurant quality food. An absolute must. Highly recommended.

title: Decent food and friendly service
comment: Was looking for a pub in Hammersmith for some drinks and food away from the usual river pubs. This pub came with excellent reviews and as it had been many years since checking out Brackenberry village we gave it a go. Very friendly and good atmosphere; it is clearly a favourite with the locals. Had that feel of what pubs used to be like - very much part of the local community. Some good beers and decent wine selection for our meal. Food was good but not as great, as we had expected, having read some of the reviews here on TA. The waitress was terrific and a really engaging person. Dry wit aplenty and very helpful. The only problem (and it was a fairly big issue) is that she was all on her own serving all the tables and so we found ourselves waiting for things we had asked for for quite some time. Water, sauces, napkins.......more staff, please. Prices were as expected for a London pub. A good evening out. Will return.

title: Great food, atmosphere and people
comment: I’ve found it because close to my hotel. I had one of the best fish and chips ever eaten and somehow I felt home. Truly recommended!

title: Fantastic Sunday lunch!
comment: A great experience! From the enthusiastic and attentive waiters to the freshly prepared food. It was excellent quality and the service was great. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit! I had the steak and ale pie with mash while my boyfriend had pork roast with crackling and all the trimmings. All so tasty! We really liked the decor as well - a homely feel with unique tables and chairs. A must visit!

title: Wonderfull
comment: We are a french family, we had a lovely time.

title: Really good food
comment: Looks like any British pub, but food is defenitely better than most.

title: Superior pub food
comment: We were slightly nervous about booking here, as we discovered that there had been a change from the previous management. However, we were very pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food. Possibly the best roast potatoes that I've ever been served in a pub, and our children's fish and chips was exceptional. Very good value for money, and only slightly let down by perfunctory service and a limited wine list (although the Rioja was good).

title: Nice place
comment: Eating well in a London pub is difficult. Then one goes to Hammersmith, goes through the various streets of the neighborhood and finds this wonderful place. On the pub there is little to say: in and of itself the restaurant is typical, welcoming and warm, the food is traditional and very good while the service is excellent and courteous. I'll be back for sure! Thank you Trip Advisor for letting me find this rare gem!

title: Delicious Sunday roast
comment: Yummy, yum, yum! Good service and well cooked Sunday roast. Had a visiting friend from over seas and stumbled upon this local pub in the backstreets of Hammersmith. Pleasantly surprised at how friendly they were.

title: First class authentic Italian
comment: What a gem this turned out to be! Excellent and authentic Italian food from a varied menu and all reasonably priced. Impressive wine list too. I had the rabbit with capers and black olives with spinach and mashed potatoes. All cooked to perfection and I am still drooling over the pear and ricotta torta!

title: Pure Pentolina
comment: What a find in Brook Green away from the Hammersmith hustle. This is pure Italian. A perfect neighbourhood restaurant serving up rustic Italian fare in a convivial atmosphere. It was full to busting on Saturday night but not too noisy so you could carry on a conversation. My wife’s halibut and thinly sliced potatoes was simply delicious. And our duck ragout was a pure joy. Tiramisu was the best I’ve had.

title: Consistently good
comment: I dined here this week for the fourth time in the past three months. Always great service and food and notably a local but serious-food vibe. I started with the grilled octopus, followed by the grilled halibut, coupled with an unfiltered organic white wine from Italy, superb. The wine list is entirely Italian, not surprising. The wait staff is knowledgeable about the wine offering and quite helpful if you need to steer. Great place in the summer as well, the doors open and a few sidewalk tables are placed out in what is a sweet residential neighborhood. Highly recommend.

title: Gone down hill
comment: Last few times, have been disappointed by the quality.

title: Exquisite
comment: Love this place! The food is superb, the service attentive but not intrusive and the place lovely decorated. Can’t wait to go back.

title: Saturday Night Supper
comment: Visiting friends in London they suggested fish and chips from a place the other side of Croydon to them. A little bit skeptical that they would survive the trip home we set off and arrived at a very busy establishment. Order placed for three cod and two chips (warned by my host that the chip portions were large). In quick time hot fish and chips were ready and bagged up. We set off at a dash (within the law of course) and arrived home, unpacked our hot delights and tucked in. They were as fresh as when packed and oh my..... Delicious!

title: Great quality.
comment: Food is of a high standard. Fresh and we'll proportioned.

title: Not overly baby friendly
comment: We visited with a family member from Germany as he was desperate for proper fish and chips!

title: yummy
comment: brilliant every time, really good quality crispy fish and chips. picked up on way back from day out hit the spot

title: Fantastic lunch time cod bites + chips special with drink for £4!
comment: I popped in here after my friend told me that they have specials on at lunch time.

title: Overpriced
comment: Overpriced, soggy wet fish, charged extra for salad instead of chips; a handful of dry and wilted leaves.

title: Fantastically organised in
comment: Fantastically organised in the current circumstances. Queue looked rather long but was so organised with safe distancing you were served with the most wonderful fish and chips in no time. Brilliant. Thank you for opening again. A bit of Friday night normality is back!

title: Delicious Food, Professional, and Super Attentive Caterer for Wedding
comment: We had an incredibly positive experience with Leila catering, both in terms of the food, the service, and their constant attentiveness during the months leading up to our wedding. We had contacted several caterers at the beginning but we found Raef at Leila to be the most straightforward and helpful person from the outset. He was open to discuss what we were looking for and showed a great deal of care to help us meet our budget.

title: Afternoon Tea was lovely, very tasty and service excellent
comment: Plenty of delicious food. Wraps and chicken in Filo pastry for the savoury tier, scones and homemade cakes and brownies. Amir was very friendly and helpful. Made to feel very welcome. Would definitely go again in the evening for dinner.

title: Amazing service! Great quality food!
comment: We visited last week and were super excited about our Middle Eastern food experience- Leila did not disappoint! We were served by Amir who was very friendly and gave us brilliant suggestions as we were not sure what to pick from the menu! The Mezze we had was soo delicious WOW! We highly recommend the Lebanese style glazed potatoes and stuffed vine leaves! For Mains, we had the chicken Tagine with couscous and it was so delicious! Thank you for a lovely experience and thank you Amir, once again!

title: Lovely evening
comment: This place is local to me and I’m already planning to visit again at the weekend. The food is very tasty, very reasonably priced and the service is good. Lovely atmosphere too, really relaxed. Feel lucky to have it on my doorstep!

title: Early evening dinner for 2
comment: My wife had a full days work in Ealing so having researched I thought this would be a good option for dinner once I picked her up. Unfortunately, I have more negative comments than positive for this visit. I suppose I was psyching myself for an experience similar to that of dining at Faanoos on the Chiswick High Road as the cuisine seemed comparable. The feeling on arriving at Leila's does make you think you are in for something special but I have to say that although the food was ok it wasn't anything special by a long shot. Bread was uninspiring and the cold Meze starter was lacking flavour and just seemed to be of poor cheap quality. Even the mayonnaise was tasteless and watery! Service wasn't brilliant given that they weren't busy and needed a fair bit of prompting. The mixed kebab meats also lacked flavour and felt like they had been dusted in a spice mix rather then any marinating going on. All a bit frustrating as I'm sure that with just a bit more effort and care plus better ingredients it could be a really fabulous place.

title: Delicious afternoon tea with a side portion of halloumi
comment: Afternoon tea at Leilas was delightful.

title: Disappointing gluten-free options
comment: The location is good. We had a table at the front, surrounded by windows with view of the street. The decor inside was ok, although the heater was rather noisy.

title: Friday night meal
comment: We booked htis reataurant last minute and had a great meal. We were served by Ash and Mira who were lovely. Lovely atmosphere and delicious food - we will be coming back

title: Birthday Meal
comment: We travelled to Windsor for my birthday celebration and chose the Windsor Grill for a special meal after reading the fantastic reviews. Well I must say we were not disappointed ... As we entered the restaurant the staff checked our temperature and were all wearing masks. The tables were also socially distanced.

title: Divine
comment: Gorgeous interior at this restaurant, a lovely relaxing vibe. We were served by Amir who was really attentive and friendly, and recommended some great dishes! Every dish we ate was beautifully presented, smelled delicious and was full of flavour. My personal favourite was the chicken tagine, as I loved the fragrant taste of saffron and the chicken was soo tender. Portions were really big which is always great to see and the house wine was sweet which complemented the warm spices of the food perfectly. Would definitely go back, great for couples or larger groups of friends/family. Other dishes I'd recommend: spicy hummus, sojok, sauda dhaj, Lebanese cheese rolls.

title: Fantastic Food, Helpful Staff and Great Decor
comment: Fantastic Moroccan and Lebanese food. All of it was presented so attractively and full of flavour! Particularly recommend the Sojok (spicy sausage in a tomato sauce) and Sauda Dhaj (chicken liver in a pomegranate molasses and garlic sauce) which were both suggested to us by Amir who was really helpful and very pleasant. The restaurant is great for couples and families and has a fantastically designed interior which adds to a really authentic experience. If you are in the area I would definitely recommend giving this place a try!

title: Can I give it 6 stars
comment: Excellent from start to finish - from the booking, through arrival, dining and leaving ........ great experience, great food, great service.

title: Incredible.
comment: We visited the Windsor Grill as a party of four adults and one child (4 years).

title: Fabulous
comment: We managed to book a table for a party of 4 for an early evening meal. We were advised before arrival that it was card payment only and that we could have the table for 2 hours. On the day of the booking I received a courtesy call from the restaurant to inform us again of the arrangements.

title: Simply perfect
comment: My husband and I ate here this evening. From the moment we arrived we were made to feel comfortable and all the appropriate COVID 19 precautions were explained to us.

title: Still a proper restaurant
comment: We went there on the last day of the £10 deal, but of course it's quite expensive. Sirloin steak was perfect for Anne and I had the mixed grill which was excellent but too large for an old bloke like me. A few more veg would have helped. Dessert great and proper mature timely service.

title: The very best steak
comment: Happened upon The Windsor Grill, what a lucky find! So many lovely things to chose from on the menu. Go with the prawns or steak, they are the best. Topped off by any amazing chocolate fondant

title: Excellent restaurant
comment: Amazing food, especially the spicy pork. Lovely staff. Good price on food. Will definitely be going again.

title: Lovely Tapas Meal
comment: Fabulous meal, great atmosphere and not too busy for a Friday night. Three of us had 9 of the various tapas dishes which was really tasty and more than enough. Our waitress Lauren was really attentive and a strong ambassador for great customer service. Definitely need to return and sample the rest of the menu!

title: Enjoyed a valentines evening
comment: Enjoyed a valentines evening meal here, and it was superb, as always. Patatas bravas, king prawns, goats cheese balls, hummus, salad, paella, pork belly, and the Spanish rice, were all gorgeous, and we had to bring some home, as the portions are big! That’s tomorrow’s dinner taken care of.

title: Took me right back to the flavours of Spain...
comment: What a hidden treasure -quite literally.... through the back of a lovely friendly oldie worldly pub.....

title: Delightful little pub
comment: Quintessential British pub, polite staff, lovely food, thoroughly recommended and highly regarded!!!

title: Delicious Takeaway Delivered with Love
comment: A dinner out at Squiffy's is always a delight and we have celebrated many a special occasion there over the last 25 years. So we were really excited to try out the new take-away "with love delivery service". It was a TREAT - the salt and pepper squid was wonderfully DELICIOUS and the ribs were YUMMY and there was no stinting on the chicken and bacon which pimped up the nachos.

title: Just very good
comment: I can not recommend this pub more. Amazing tapas Spanish, Asian fusion. With a very friendly local pub feel. If you just want a pint or some very good food in my opinion. The best place in Hampton.

title: Hands down the worst restaurant experience I’ve had...
comment: I’ve just left this restaurant and can honestly say that it was one of the worst restaurant experiences I’ve had to date... I went to Squiffy’s after seeing, by enlarge, good reviews so I trusted that... I couldn’t have been more wrong and in fact, the terrible reviews are very in line with the experience I’ve just had. I am somebody who can’t stand complaining, I find it embarrassing and awkward to do so, but the Iceland style / oven cooked standard of the food was something I couldn’t part with my hard-earned money for. After politely complaining, I was repeatedly challenged by the blonde, female manager (who I now know has been mentioned in other reviews), telling me that the food is freshly cooked and that it was ‘just my personal taste’, it simply isn’t and wasn’t.

title: Lovely food & Great service
comment: We are in the area visiting family and came in for some food. We had a lovely few hours in Squiffys. My son has a dairy allergy and they were very accomodating and made sure he got a proper meal that was suitable.They went above and beynd to include hin which is why i'm leaving this review. The staff were all very friendly and helpful.

title: Great as always
comment: We come regularly and we always experience great quality of food and speedy and friendly service.

title: Excellent place.
comment: Great quality of food, excellent and friendly staff providing fast service. I would recommend this place that is right in the center of the town.

title: Loved it !
comment: Salt and Pepper Squid great new menu! Love sitting in the booth - great variety of sushi on the belt

title: Great food!
comment: Popcorn shrimp, all katsu’s and ramens always taste amazing, nice quick service, will always come back!

title: Service and food were amazing, the manager vj was very engaging and happy , the restaurant had a positive energy!
comment: Service and food were amazing, the manager vj was very engaging and happy , the restaurant had a positive energy! Thanks guys I’ll come back and visit you soon

title: Great food
comment: Great food, a big selection to choose from on the belt and when ordering was really quick too. Great service

title: Had a great time
comment: Great food, lovely service, inviting atmosphere - we had a great time and we definetely will come again!

title: Lovely staff!
comment: The staff are so welcoming, attentive and lovely. Booked a table via phone and had no problems at all. The food is so fresh and colourful would recommend to anyone who is looking for a quick delicious meal ☺️

title: Amazing service
comment: Lovely restaurant and lovely staff. Liga provides excellent service making the whole experience enjoyable.

title: Cute little cafe
comment: Love this place - it's unlike anywhere else in the area! Really personal and quirky- they have loads of great options for different dietary requirements too!

title: Beautiful venue, gorgeous food!
comment: I just love the Red Onion. The staff are always lovely and very attentive, the cafe is beautifully decorated and there’s a garden at the back where social distancing has been successfully achieved without compromising the ambiance. The food is always delicious and fresh and there’s plenty of choice for vegans. It’s an A+ from me!

title: Piping hot, vibrant and healthy
