comment: Popped in to Red Onion for a delicious brekkie on Sunday. It was really very good. Delish sweet potato hash, egg and avo. So good in fact I ordered toast to mop up.

title: Wed Pizza/Beer night
comment: Brilliant food and one of the best pizza's I've had - great atmosphere - lights could be brighter if staying until dark. Very helpful and friendly staff.

title: Veggie friendly
comment: What a pleasant surprise this was. A friend booked this place based on a recommendation.

title: Asset to the high street.
comment: Arrived a few minutes after it opened, sat down, and within 5 minutes many of the tables were filling up. Always a good sign. Interesting menu, covering most breakfast requirements. The food we had was well prepared and presented. Staff were very welcoming. Would definitely recommend.

title: An asset to Ruislip High Street
comment: We've lived local to the Red Onion Cafe for the last six months but this was our first time visiting and I can't believe that we haven't been sooner! The food was absolutely delicious, I had the smashed avo on sourdough and it was gorgeous - very well presented and tasty as well! The friends I was with both had egg dishes and were equally impressed.

title: Great place for a breakfast with friends.
comment: Just had a wonderful breakfast at the Red onion, the full breakfast was amazing and the staff are attentive and cheerful. Highly recommended.

title: Best Restaurant I’ve ever eaten at.
comment: The service was excellent from the minute we arrived. Staff were friendly and very welcoming, even though it was very busy. When the food came out, I was so shocked to see how freshly the food was made. I had the Sebastian Pizza and it was the best meal I’ve ever eaten out. Will definitely be visiting again.

title: Hidden Gem
comment: We booked the restaurant after reading the exceptional reviews and they were spot on! The restaurant is tucked away in a small alley way off the Main Street. The place was buzzing for a Tuesday evening with every table booked inside and out. We were greeted by a lovely young waiter who escorted us to our table. The atmosphere and ambiance was great and so was the food, freshly cooked in an open kitchen. The menu was extensive with a a special board.

title: Superb!
comment: Stumbled across Sebastian's while out shopping in Windsor. There were some people outside and from what I could see, the food looked good and the place seemed popular and I therefore, made a reservation for dinner.

title: Fabulous
comment: We sat outside. There was a great buzz, staff were very busy but certainly attentive enough. The food was delicious. All round five stars.

title: Italian surprise
comment: visited Sebastian's on Thursday 24th September for a late lunch with our elderly mother. It was very quiet but the service and atmosphere was great, this is a little gem in hiding as it can be quite difficult to find.

title: Authentic Italian food in Windsor
comment: Myself and my boyfriend visited Sebastian's Italian for lunch today after exploring Windsor. We were seated immediately by a pleasant waiter, he gave us a choice of where we sat and went through the specials with us. Our drink order had been taken within 5 minutes of us sitting down and our mains were with us within 15 minutes. The restaurant is open plan so you can see the chef's hard at work making your meal from your seat, the aromas coming from the kitchen were amazing!

title: Fantastic
comment: Visited on Tuesday 29 sept - had a delicious meal with great hospitality. Had a lovely window seat which was nice and cosy. All staff are doing a great job during these Covid times.

title: Good Pizza
comment: Stopped in here and in glad short we did.

title: My fave!
comment: I no longer live in the area but when I am visiting, a trip to momos is always on the cards! Fresh, delicious food, quirky decor, friendly staff and speedy service.

title: A Nice, Understated Restaurant –Perfect For A Light Bite
comment: Having walked past this cafe for years I finally decided to visit. The staff were genuine, warm and friendly and the food (chicken satay) was delicious. I'll definitely come back!

title: Overrated and expensive
comment: A bit scruffy place . Ordered momo set , a little bowl of miso soup , a piece of over boiled pok Choi, few endomama , all tasteless and unskillful, Hardly justify the extra 2 pounds. The momo itself is ok , nothing too special. Totally 10 pounds are not worth it at all.

title: Nice food. Place needs a bit of a declutter
comment: The food was fine. I like quirky . However but all the mini figurines ( toy soldiers) along the restaurant ledges could do with a good clean or chucking out. Would suggest the latter

title: Nice Japanese cafe - but not great for big groups
comment: Came for a group lunch out midweek. Food was pretty good - it comes in big portions though, so two dishes is too much in many cases.

title: Food is amazing!
comment: The place is small and it does have a take away operation as well. However, it is generally relatively easy to find a place where to sit. The food is Asian in a wider sense so one can try sushy and malasyan flavours and dishes alongside other south east Asian specialities. It taste genuine and fully flavoured. The place does not sell alchool but you are not goong to miss it anyway.

title: Not bad not amazing.
comment: I’ve often walked past cafe momo and wondered what the food was like, I did check the reviews and my partner said let’s try it. I would def say the food theme is Malaysian/Indonesian. The food was very fresh and hot, I will say that and yet I was left a bit disappointed with the taste, it was OK, we ordered 3 mains, satay chicken Nasi Goreng my partner gave it an 8/10 and we shared the Prawn dumpling soup which came with salad and edamame was good I’d rate it 7-8/10 yet the olive veggie soup was bland. Maybe need to explore the menu more, but wasn’t really for us.

title: Fantastic and tasty
comment: Lovely little cafe offering asian dishes, very affordable and great food, a must visit eaterie. Very boutique and charming decor I have loved every dish I have tried. I ljust love their excellent dumplings and tofu and aubergine with rice

title: Best Pizza Ever!
comment: Masaniello pizza is sooo delicious! We just had a Deliveroo order and it absolutely brightened up a dreary social distancing day!

title: Charming, friendly and good food,
comment: A hidden treasure in Staines! Small with very interesting interior decoration touches and friendly service. The spicy tuna roll was not spicy but the condiments were, like the chilli oil - delicious. We also had a set of the veg dumpling and one Nasi goreng with tofu and aubergine - also delicious.

title: Cosy family restaurant, tasty food and friendly staff
comment: We came recently for a dinner with a friend and our daughters as we like having girls only time. My friend suggested this restaurant which I didn't know so I was happy to try something new.

title: Superb Pizza
comment: I can't recall ever having had a better pizza in the UK, absolutely delicious. A lovely local restaurant, great service, and nice ambience.

title: Mr
comment: We regularly go to Masaniello. A short menu but everything tastes terrific. A pleasant pizzeria atmosphere and lovely service. I recommend this restaurant unreservedly

title: Best pizza
comment: They served the best pizza I’ve had in years.

title: Simply AUTHENTIC!
comment: If you are looking for a REAL, AUTHENTIC and GENUINE pizza in London, you must try Masaniello's one and you won't be disappointed.

title: Back to its glory
comment: Back there after a bad experience a few months ago (February 2019)!

title: This place never disappoints.
comment: This place never disappoints. The restaurant I visited post-lockdown was a relaxed and enjoyable evening. Perfect authentic pizzas and friendly (yet safe) service. Highly recommended.

title: Nice little pub
comment: Was staying around the corner so had dinner here 1 night. Very friendly place. Nice wood fire perfect for the coming winter. Food was good but found it a little salty.

title: There are a few places in
comment: There are a few places in the world that do the greatest pies. The Andover is at the top of the list. Good pub, excellent staff, solid wine list that does not charge you ridiculous English prices, a good atmosphere and a pie to die for. If you don’t like pies the chef has many more tricks up his sleeve, but you would be foolish not to try the pie...

title: Excellent Sunday Roast
comment: Within a brisk walk of the Eventim Apollo, we parked here for an early evening roast before going to see a Dido concert. Great atmosphere, decent wine at a reasonable price and a very good roast. I had the beef and it was very tender. A little pricey but hey this is West London. Nice real fire in the dining area which could have been a bit chilly otherwise. The owners had created a very nice ambience with fairy lights all around the bar area, and service was really friendly, just as well as 12.5% is added automatically to the bill, so avoided the unpleasantness of asking for it to be taken off! Located in a back street area, not the most welcoming from the outside but worth venturing inside for sure.

title: Perfect pub!
comment: What a great little pub! Such friendly characters and relaxed atmosphere. Food was very good, (crumble = life changing according to my husband!). Nice wine menu..

title: Great food brought us back for more!
comment: The Andover Arms was so good on the first trip that we returned two nights later because my wife liked my steak pie so much on the first visit!!!

title: Very Good Pub
comment: We had family visiting London from outside the U.K. who wanted to have fish and chips. We are new to the neighbourhood and fortunately found this local pub serving it. I do not usually eat fish and chips but all of us commented how good it was, light batter and not too greasy. The atmosphere is cosy and prices are not expensive. We will return.

title: Cosy and Chill
comment: Nice place to come and chill in after being out for dinner in a nearby restaurant. Didn't eat here so don't know what the food is like. Came for a drink and it was nice place to hang and feels cosy and inviting.

title: Sunday Lunch was delicious
comment: Four of us travelled several hundred miles between us to watch the England v Ireland rugby match at Twickenham. We needed a pre-match venue for lunch. Twickenham? Richmond? No thanks.

title: Friendly and tasty food
comment: Great place to have a dinner. The personnel is quite friendly and the food quite tasty. There is a wide variety of curries to choose from. Each of them is an adventure in itself. Highly recommended for anyone in the area.

title: Rude waitress
comment: Been here many times but never coming back again due to the waitress behahaviour.Ive been coming here many times and left 2 or 3 reviews but today I wasn’t happy with the way I was treated by the waitress.Shes so RUDE

title: Best time
comment: This is the best meal i have had out in a long time, the food, the service everything was spot on it was like the good old days thank you so much for making my birthday special

title: Recommend
comment: Totally amazing food Tastes to savour Very helpful and polite staff

title: Amazing food must go!
comment: Having regularly stayed around the heathrow area i’ve never tried this restaurant until this visit and the food was amazing! The staff were friendly and helpful but the food is the winner in this establishment. The best indian food i have tasted. Not like usual indians i go this. This food was authentic and beautiful. I will 100% be visiting again, i’d recommend you visit here too! You wont be disappointed!

title: Best curry I have had in years
comment: We were flying from Heathrow Terminal 5 and found this restaurant and have to say it is the best curry/Indian I have had in years! You would never it from where it is but don’t let that put you off, it’s really very good!

title: Review of recent visit to the restaurant
comment: I recently visited the restaurant on my return to Cyprus where I live. As a seasoned customer at many Indian restaurants around the world together with cooking Indian cuisine I am well equipped to make this unbiased and balanced review of my visit to this establishment.

title: Never disappointed
comment: I stay in airport hotels all the time, the best thing about staying at Heathrow is being able to get a take away from this place. The food is good, they deliver too. I was told that I needed to order £15 to qualify for free delivery, not £12 as stated on menu, however the samosas that I ordered were so worth it, best ever! Highly recommend

title: Very good
comment: Dishes comparatively mild, but very fruity and tasty. Already the papadums with a selection of sauces were very high in quality, and the main dishes continued on that path - anytime again.

title: Disgusting Food
comment: We recently visited this place with my friends as this place was recommended by one of my other friends. We ordered spicy food and we were served food with raw chilly powder mixed into the curry. The curries were pathetic. We ordered Shami kabab and we were served with hard rock solid grilled kababs which no way looked like Shami kabab. The staff were friendly but not the food. I don't recommend this place at all.

title: Great find
comment: Lovely service, wonderful food (approved by the italians at our table), very nice decor and crowd! Highly recommended and definitely a destination in itself!

title: It is like dining at home
comment: You can enjoy genuine recipes reinvented to combine flavours from different Italian districts, in this intimate place attended by distinguished European clients living in the area. Very cordial personnel provide a quick excellent service. The bill is probably slightly above the expectation if you look at the informal environment, but still reasonable given the excellent quality of the food. Some more choices of wines would help.

title: Nice restaurant for lunch
comment: I've been to Pentolina a few times now as I work nearby. Better to give them a call before going as they can get busy. Everything I've tried on the menu was always very good. Service is discreet so perfect for work lunches. Plan on going more this year.

title: Great food in a charming setting
comment: Excellent Italian food in a charming setting. The menu was good value and had some delicious dishes. From the pea veloute, octopus stew and scallops pasta, it was a high standard of cooking.

title: Pasta at Pentolina
comment: This beautiful rustic style Italian is tucked away behind Olympia. We had a superb lunch here on a Saturday. The linguine with fresh lobster and caramelised cherry tomatoes and the pacchen pasta with homemade sausage ragout and aged Sardinian pecorino cheese were both outstanding. Beautifully cooked and full of flavour and just the right amount of pasta. The tiramisu and the semifredo were equally good. The service was impeccable - really welcoming, courteous and attentive. This is a great little restaurant serving tasty Italian food.

title: Fine dining in relaxed atmosphere
comment: A fine and varied menu - more upscale Italian, yet in a relaxed atmosphere. The place is small and cosy, but not intrusive. The service is pleasant and relaxed (not the typical intrusive and fake "are you doing ok?" commercial service found at many other restaurants in London). It is in the heart of Brook Green in a charming quiet street - ideal for having a walk before or after dining. I remember the alcohol menu being interesting too.

title: Very good
comment: I had a good experience, very good food and great service. Definitely coming back. Lovely place and very clean.

title: The best food in Hammersmith
comment: The best food in Hammersmith without question. We stopped by for lunch today and it was such a treat. We had the best meal we’ve had in months. For those missing travelling and what European food offers, this is a real treasure. The mind of place you want to keep a local secret :)

title: Stylish but comfortable dining
comment: Everything about this place is impeccable. The restaurant is beautifully furnished with usual Italian style, the temperature is just right, social distancing is great whilst still makind one feel as if one is eating in a social environment. And food is great. You know how sometimes one looks at a menu and struggles to be enthused. I could have eaten any of the dishes on the menu. Not the usual fare, very special. Service is friendly without being too intrusive.

title: Sadly closed for Covid, but excellent takeaway
comment: Collected a takeout supper from Pentolina last night and it was excellent! Sensible offerings that travelled home in the car well and were still hot after a 10 minute drive. Tasty Tomino cheese starter, wholesome rabbit and pork mains and rich chocolate pud. We’ll be back when it’s open after lockdown!

title: Delicious
comment: Amazing food and amazing service, accommodated is as walk ins on a busy Saturday night, finding us a table and helping us immediately.

title: Celebration
comment: The food was amazing, we had an array of starters - Raj was amazing and suggested some good dishes!

title: Great food, well priced
comment: Nice restaurant, nice atmosphere, friendly staff, great food, really reasonably priced! Can't complain at all

title: Excellent food
comment: Service and taste of the food both are excellent. Staff is family friendly and helpful. We really thank to Raggio for his services.

title: Thanks MR Raggio
comment: Nice hospitality

title: Amazing food
comment: What an amazing curry we have just had. Gorgeous food, great service and a good price too. We will be back.

title: Mrs kiran
comment: Me and my husband went for dinner in this restaurant as it was my birthday. Foods were delicious and very good customer service. We love the Bollywood music in the background. I would like to thanks Dixon who offered me a lovely birthday pudding. Thanks for your hospitality and I would like to recommend this restaurant to anyone.

title: Best Indian food
comment: Takaa tak was recommended by a business colleague and had greatest surprise of our trip. The food was so good that I came back the next day just to have lunch before my flight.

title: A proper curry house
comment: Found this place a very short walk away from my hotel and I’m so glad I did. This is a proper curry house and my chicken biryani was so tasty! Harrogate sparkling spring water was a nice surprise as were the free papadums and dips. A cheeky half of Cobra completed my meal, which I almost ate all of, so much was there. For £14.39 this is bargain territory and the packed room can testify to the venue’s popularity. Highly recommended.

title: Yummy yummy!
comment: The perfect place for a lazy weekend lunch with friends. Super tasty tapas which kept coming so we had time to eat and chat. And a great selection of wines to compliment. Staff were attentive without getting in the way. Thoroughly recommend and will be back!

title: Great grub & a friendly pub
comment: Great selection of food. All very fresh & nicely presented. Good atmosphere, friendly hepful staff & a charming garden out the back. Definately worth a visit.

title: Lovely place!
comment: We had a great meal here - delicious food and lovely, friendly service. The perfect place for our first post lockdown meal.

title: Highly recommend this venue,
comment: Highly recommend this venue, traditional pub with a fantastic restaurant which serves a variety of freshly cooked meals. I certainly would recommend the tapas, pork belly and calamari are amazing and the toasted marshmallows with chocolate and strawberries are a perfect way to finish the meal !!! Friendly personable staff.

title: Rude owner. Service good but
comment: Rude owner. Service good but slow as only person serving all areas. Garden at back which allows dogs but they are not really that keen on dogs.

title: Amazing food
comment: Been here several times and absolutely love the food. Best tapas I've had but would never have thought to venture in here unless someone told me about it. Fab place

title: Brilliant local
comment: Just a very friendly old-school local with smiling faces at the bar, decent beer, a proper pub atmosphere and a bustling little restaurant out back. As a beer lover I was really pleased to see an unusual choice - Exeter Brewery beers (Avocet and Ferryman - both excellent). This has been the best pub in Hampton as long as I can remember and doesn't seem likely to be laying down its crown just yet.

title: Great takeaway
comment: As the restaurant is in lockdown we took advantage of the Takeaway service with free delivery ,absolutely fabulous the food was delivered by the proprietor superbly packaged and piping hot and absolutely freshly cooked with excellent fresh ingredients .Really refreshing in these difficult times to find the quality and service available here Thoroughly recommend.

title: Excellent - refurbished but same great hosts
comment: Excellent - recent refurbishment but the same convivial hosts make for an great combination. During lockdown, their excellent Tapas menu can be delivered.

title: Food and Staff = Top Notch!
comment: The food here is amazing, but what really makes the place is the staff. Not only are they incredibly friendly, they run a well oiled machine, even in this pandemic to ensure social distancing. Always pleased to come here.

title: The best fish and chips
comment: I stopped by to get a takeaway of cod and and chips. They only allow two people inside at any one time but there is someone taking orders from everyone standing outside in the queue. Well organised as usual and lovely food.

title: Best
comment: This one of the best fish shops in London everything is fresh and tastes delicious would recommend to anyone

title: Best fish and chips in the area
comment: Only ever had a great meal from here, judging by the fast moving queues, all the locals like it too!

title: DISGUSTING, FALSE ADVERTISING
comment: The Haddock isnt haddock its frozen cod. thats why the can serve so many customers in the takeaway on friday and saturday nights. they only defrost one piece of haddock a day. It was much nicer when tony ran the shop not the arrogant son who treats people like dirt. i have eaten here many times over the years but its gone down hill in recent times

title: Four!
comment: Never really understood the 5 star ratings about McDermotts, always been slightly disappointed every time I visit there, either for a sit down or takeaway, it's good but not that good, the chips are way too big and there's never enough crackling! very expensive for a sit down although they do come along and top up your plate with chips but only rightly so as the portions aren't that great in the first plaice! I will say it's always clean and the staff are friendly.

title: To be avoided unless you want to be abused, patronised, and charged excessive prices.
comment: The woman on the till is arrogant, patronising and just down right rude. If you want to queue for ever, pay extortionate money for average food and get abused and patronised into the bargain, then this is the place. That woman has no customer skills and frankly I don't even think a customer skills course would help. I can only think she owns the place as no employer in there right mind would keep someone like her to interface with paying customers.

title: Great tradition fish & chips
comment: 1st trying the highly recommended McDermotts & it was very good. The queue was very long but managed well with social distancing & someone outside taking your order so by the time you go in you just pay & have your food ready.

title: Best
comment: Really great food fresh fish and chips taste delicious too really enjoyable only problem there’s always a long queue but other than that it’s brilliant

title: Best fish and chips
comment: The best fish and chips I have ever tasted. Beautiful white skinless Cod with thin batter. Fabulous chips.

title: Lovely Lunch
comment: Ate at Leila's for lunch and was served by Amir who was very friendly, polite and ensured our dining experience was to our satisfaction. A fantastic variation of vegetarian food. The food we had was amazing, spicy hummus, baba ganoush, halloumi, falafel, all lovely accompanied by Moroccan mint tea. Definitely going again and will recommend to everyone.

title: Enjoy and Relax
comment: The food was very tasty. The lamb tagine was mouthwatering. The grills were well cooked with salad and rice and together with the sauces were enjoyable. The fresh juices are tasty and there is a list with interesting cocktails. The environment is pleasant with middle eastern traditional touches. The staff were very friendly and helpful. No doubt a good place to come again. They have an interesting afternoon tea, which is worth trying the next time.

title: Excellent Food
comment: I love the food from here, also the staff are great, always friendly. The flavours are excellent and its probably the only place we can order a big take away and everyone at home is happy and satisfied.

title: Good food but not the right ambience
comment: The meal was really delicious, we opted for the fatoush salad, baked aubergine and mixed grill. We couldn't fault the food as it was superb. However, with covid-19 the tables weren't really socially distanced as we were quite close to the table next to us. As well as some waiters didn't have a mask on or did but it wasn't put on properly which didn't make us feel comfortable with them serving our food. Maybe the restaurant needs to adapt more to the regulations in a proper manner which would see us coming to eat here again.

title: Excellent food and management response
comment: Fantastic food and service, the restaurant also actively looks for a review which I appreciate. When I queried the bill afterwards, the restaurant took time to explain what their automatic system is capable of and the manual changes that they needed, they were fantastic in clearing things up. Would visit again!

title: Simply a feast !!
comment: We passed through and I craved for lamb. I did not expect the big portions and the quality of the food, what a discovery, it was simply a feast. Highly recomended

title: Fantastic meal!
comment: We were pleasantly surprised by the yummy food and service at Lelia! They welcomed our walk-in and the lunch express menu was a steal considering the portion sizes! Would definitely recommend

title: Birthday treat
comment: I'm not surprised that generally reviews for this restaurant are positive. My friend booked a table for my birthday and for many reasons I had a memorable evening. Leila has extended on to the pavement and this area, empty when we visited, would be suitable for watching the world go by. Inside the decor is...er...vaguely Moroccan. In one corner you can dine Moroccan-style on cushions. There's a raised area perhaps used for performances. My guess is that tables have been removed for social distancing purposes. The place was reasonably busy even on a Monday. The couple next to us told us they're regulars. Our Afghani waiter was attentive. He brought us a very palatable bottle of Moroccan white. For our starters we chose olives (£2.95), tabouleh (£4.50) and Leila fried bread and zaatar with sumac, lemon juice and olive oil (£2.95). Unusually for us we finished almost everything. The tabouleh was delicious and went perfectly with the crunchy pieces of fried bread topped with a powder of mixed spices - a first for us. My friend wasn't quite sure he had been served the main he asked for (moussaka, £4.50) but was happy enough with what he'd been given and didn't send it back. My tagine bil lahme (£14.95) - sizzling lamb with prunes, toasted almonds and caramelised onions - was superb. I couldn't finish it and was given a doggy bag. I asked our waiter how old he thought I was and he said 52. This is the thing to tell a 73-year-old. At the end of the meal he brought complimentary baklava with a candle in one piece. I was very impressed. The restaurant also does take-away and Moroccan-themed afternoon tea between 2-5pm daily. The chances are high I'll go back to sample other dishes. Leila is a short walk from Ealing Common tube.

title: The best
comment: We visited the restaurant as we live right next door and were keen to explore the area. We were left incredibly impressed and will definitely visit again. We had the strawberry daiquiri cocktails as it was 2for1 cocktails and after having one sip ordered another two! There was only one waiter when we arrived however he was so attentive despite there being many tables to serve. For mains we ordered the chicken tagine, taouk and a serving of hummus. The portions were huge and tasted incredible!! The tagine was beautifully presented, well seasoned and just incredible. The waiter was so attentive and nothing seemed too much effort. The people next to us ordered the set Lebanese menu and we will definitely be ordering that next time ... with the tagine! We will definitely be visiting again.

title: Vada pav
comment: Vada pav. It’s basically a authentic vegi burger.

title: Shockingly poor meal - for a usually decent local restaurat.
comment: I went on a sunday with my parents. Had some good starters. Then two tagines for main course, one of which had just clearly come out of a microwave and the other was fish which was cooked in canned tomatoes. We should have sent them back - but sadly didnt. We complained afterwards but the staff seemed disinterested, as long as they got their money.

title: amazing food and service
comment: Had Vada Pav from here for two consecutive days since it was awesome.

title: AMAZING!!!!
comment: Geat food, quick service. The quick stop serves authentic Indian street food, I highly recommend the Vada Pav.

title: Good.
comment: good and simple. chaat was nice. chutney also good. music good south indian really. cheap. nice tea.

title: Great veggie local
comment: Discovered this place recently and although I’m not a veggie I do like the food here. It’s cheap, cheerful but most importantly tasty. I’ve never eaten in, but always get take aways and have always been v happy with the food. Will continue visiting.

title: Simply excellent
comment: We tried this for the first time. The food is truly exceptional. Our group of 5 had fillet, sirloin, chicken and mixed grill. The meat was excellent quality and Cooked to perfection. The mixed grill of steak chicken lamb sausage chorizo liver kidney and black pudding was excellent. Service was prompt and friendly. I cannot commend this restaurant highly enough. I am a fan of miller and carter but enjoyed this even more.

title: Great food, quick service
comment: Great “street food” at good value and quick service. Limited seating available but the place is clean and great for a quick bite to eat. There’s paid on street parking available just outside but not much so you may need to go around a couple of times to find a parking slot.

title: All your favourite Indian Street foods in one place!
comment: Excellent service. Tasty food and very reasonable prices! Brought back childhood memories of home. If you are a foodie and like gorging on Indian Street food or would even like to experience it for the first time then this is absolutely the place to go!

title: Average
comment: Quite small. Fast service but food wasn't great. It was too oily. Pani Puri wasn't great it was average. Probably wouldn't go back again

title: Unacceptable customer service
comment: Very bad customer service. The person working on the counter was not professional at all. He does not know how to talk to customers. Also food quality has changed. Miss the staff who used to cater to my requests and were very friendly

title: cheap good street food eats
comment: this is an indian vegan street food cafe. Lowest price item on the menu £ 1, highest price £ 6. Table service, This is very much a cafe without any charm, but good cheap tasty food served promptly. Very good for snacks and a good variety

title: Miss Charlotte spires
comment: Had the most amazing night at the Windsor grill! It was supposed to be mine and my partners wedding day and we wanted to make it special and this was the most perfect place for it! Champagne on arrival was arrange and the food was just amazing, especially the pork crackling and scotch egg... ohh and the hazelnut cheesecake! Also they went above and beyond because I left my credit cards and lipstick in the restaurant, they called me the next morning and sent it out to me. Amazing place, food and staff! Thanks guys x

title: Impeccable service & food
comment: Could not have had a better visit for my partners birthday. We felt very safe in these uncertain times. All staff wore correct PPE & were very respectful of distancing rules. Hand sanitiser upon arrival for each guest to use. The food was unreal, we had 9oz fillet surf & turf medium. It was cooked to perfection and you got a generous portion. We finished off our meal with the ice cream profiteroles and they were just as dreamy. My partner got a complimentary glass of fizz for her birthday also which was a beautiful added touch. Will definitely be back!

title: Extremely good, outstanding
comment: Extremely good, outstanding actually. Food is delicious and staff are fantastic. Well worth a visit, I’m in such a good mood after eating here!

title: Fab dinner at the Windsor Grill :)
comment: We recently visited this restaurant for dinner as part of a day trip to Windsor. We decided to eat at this establishment, as it had good reviews on Trip Advisor and it was also near Windsor Castle.

title: Favourite restaurant
comment: I absolutely love coming to this yo sushi, the staff are so friendly and the atmosphere is chilled. The food never disappoints.

title: So glad we found this place........
comment: Although we had tried a couple of times preCovid to get a table last minute without success, we realise we should have tried harder as we have been missing a treat!

title: An excellent meal!
comment: We booked the Windsor Grill based on Tripadvisor recommendations and were not disappointed. The restaurant was cosy on a cold winter's evening, the staff were really friendly and made the evening relaxing and enjoyable. The food was fantastic. Due to CV-19 the menu, we understand was slightly smaller than would have been normal, but there were a wide selection of steaks available in terms of type and size. Our steaks were seasoned and cooked perfectly. The atmosphere generated by the staff combined with our excellent meal means we will go back next time we are in Windsor.

title: What a gem!
comment: One of the best steak restaurants in Berkshire!

title: Another fantastic meal!
comment: Second time my partner & I have returned to the Windsor Grill. It was my partners 25th birthday and I wanted to treat him & this truly was special! First of all everything was Covid conscious & the flow of the restaurant was immaculate; temperature taken on door and Covid app QR code on door, tables were spaced out well, everything was beautifully clean & table service was quick and attentive. I felt really comfortable.

title: Never a disappointment
comment: Only been to Yo Sushi a handful of times but it never fails to disappoint! Great food, lovely atmosphere and kind staff.

title: Better vada pav than mumbai
comment: The quality is amazing and consistently good. Prices are reasonable and the menu is authentic . Cannot ask for more!

title: Authentic Indian street food
comment: Amazing Indian street food served and at a very reasonable price. Vada Pav and Pav bhaji Are my favourite. They have option of dine in or take way . Its worth a visit if you like Indian vegetarian snacks.

title: true street food and cheap
comment: I went one evening with an indian friend.The most expensive item on the menu is £ 5 the cheapest £1, the average about £ 3.75. No decor to speak of. Plain tables, chairs, etc. Clean, You go in order, pay, and the food is brought to the table, All food seems to be made fresh. A great variety of Pav, Dabeli,Puri, Chat, bhajiya etc. All tasty and served simply.

title: Mumbai street food!
comment: This is a no nonsense good old fashioned Mumbai street food. The price is good and menu is big enough to satisfy most. Parking is an issue for this place.

title: What you see is what you get ...
comment: Walked in no welcome nothing asked waiter if we sit at the empty table smiled and wobbled the head.

title: Value for money
comment: Good for quick snack but the only thing i found good was the Vada Pau only. the other dishes are average or bit spicy

title: Nostalgic
comment: A no-nonsense small eatery

title: Brilliant Indian food
comment: Fantastic food for veggies. Very well priced, bargain compared to some of the sit down rip offs. Service good.

title: Vada pav
comment: Best vada pav by far in west London, vada pav and masala chai. Also must try is dabeli and pav bhaji

title: Not a vege fan but....
comment: I am a meat guy but the food tastes really good and incredibly cheap for what you get. Would highly recommend, and don't get put off by the vegetarian menu if your a meaty like me

title: 7th Birthday party - yo sushi workshop
comment: My daughter had her 7th birthday today at yo sushi! The team did a fantastic job. They ran a sushi workshop for 17 kids! The team were very accommodating, helpful, friendly and brilliant.

title: New Craze
comment: I never liked sushi until I tried it again in Yo Sushi.

title: Bad attitude
comment: Food is good atmosphere was also ok. However significant issues with staff attitude and coeliac options. Will not be returning.

title: Really good
comment: Really nice food, good service. I would definitely come back again for another visit. Would recommend.

title: Overpriced, dirty and just really bad...
comment: It was really clear our table hadn’t been cleaned properly in a good while - food stains on the water taps, congealed food at the corners, and a sticky ginger pot.m and tings. The toilets too were vile - clearly not cleaned in a long time, and even with poo on the seat and inside the bowl on the only two toilets there. It was late on, but the staff had left packets of food, used cloths etc all over the counters - the place just looked a complete mess.

title: Loved
comment: Love the food, the atmosphere and the service. Was a great spot to hit after several hours of sight seeing and starving

title: Grumpy service
comment: Food was fine but a young black girl served us. Clearly called in on her day off or something because she clearly didn’t want to be there.

title: Amazing
comment: Had an amazing time at Yo! Guildford today, the manager Robert was great so attentive and organised. All the cleaning was perfect felt safe and protected whilst having a relaxed enjoyable meal xx thank you so much

title: Recommended- highly safe
comment: Visited Karachi Cuisine with my fiancee last Week. Really lovely meal and very warm welcome – i would recommend this lovely restaurant and will definitely go back again especially for Goal Gappas. Just love them. Started going for it twice a week, every fortnight. Also, Found it really safe during covid19 outbreak.

title: Excellent Meal
comment: The staff at Karachi cuisine were fantastic. My girlfriend has a severe peanut and nut allergy, the staff were very accommodating and reassuring. On the phone beforehand they assured us they could safely cater for her. They cooked her food separately and checked all the ingredients. This should be standard in all restaurants but unfortunately is not. When the food arrived it was absolutely delicious, we ordered the chicken tikka masala, lamb madras, garlic naan, pilau rice and onion bhajis. All delicious and reasonably priced. Excellent food, excellent service. We will be back!

title: Amazing FOOOD!!!
comment: The Food was sooo tasty and delicious absolutely spot on. Friendly Staff .The Oreo Milkshake they have was just mind blowing ❤❤❤Would definitely recommend Karachi Cuisine to Family and Friends and I would come everyday

title: Nice but tiny portions
comment: Ordered lots of different meat dishes on the menu, all of them just wacked on one plate together rather than seperately nicely presented and how the photos of dishes look like online. Very small portions compared to other Pakistani or Indian restaurants.

title: Food was spectacular!
comment: So I came to Karachi Cuisine with my family when we was visiting Croydon. It came up on Google as a suggestion for Pakistani cuisine. Honestly the food was amazing and I actually don’t think I’ll need to go to Karachi to taste where these flavours were founded. Thank you Karachi Cuisine for the wonderful experience. We will definitely be back again.❤️

title: Amazing Nihari
comment: Spectacular service and delicious food, highly recommended!! Best nihari in all of UK honestly delicious

title: Worst Curry Ever
comment: Having seen the reviews and been recommended this take away, I tried it for the first time tonight. The worst curry I have ever had. The mushroom rice tasted more like onion rice with no flavour. The onion bhaji had no flavour. Tasted like fried balls of dough couldn't taste any onion. As for the chicken korma, no coconut almonds or cream used at all. It was basically an oil juice which tasted of tomato and oil. The only thing edible and nice was the poppadoms and naan bread. So I paid £23 for bread and poppadoms. Look at the so called korma sauce in the pic. Fuming!

title: Home Delivery
comment: Lamb Brain wasn’t cooked fully It’s still smelled uncooked and butter chicken looked like Cheff doesn’t know what is called BUTTER CHICKEN.

title: Very nice food and great service
comment: Food was fantastic, one of the best curries I’ve had in England - would definitely recommend. We were served by a very nice guy called Harry

title: Breakfast
comment: Met a friend for breakfast here. Lovely characterful venue. Polite staff but my goodness, the breakfast! It was the tastiest breakfast I’ve ever had. Fresh quality ingredients. I really enjoyed it and have recommended to family and friends.

title: Tasty food and good value
comment: We had shared 3 starters and 3 mains. We were served by Ali; a very good waiter. The food here has an authentic taste to it, a freshness that is evident. I particularly enjoyed the Haleem. I think the seating area might need something to brighten it up.

title: Disappointing
comment: We have been regularly going to the Red Onion Cafe for the pst couple of years and always enjoyed it there. The lst 2 visits were a massive letdown, not only have the prices gone up but the portions are also much smaller. We will not be returning.

title: Top Top Gaff
comment: I always read reviews online for places before going, and whether I frequent an establishment or not can often hinge on what I read, but like some sort of online information sneak thief, I've never really contributed to the pages and pages of information myself. But I decided to change that, and where better to start than with my favourite place.

title: Love this place ❤️
comment: Love this place our family’s fave... yummy cakes and brunch is to die for... healthy but definitely not boring staff are always super helpful and friendly even when rushed off their feet lovely family run high street business we will always come back to again and again ❤️ covid friendly outside dining options are the best touch can’t rate it highly enough

title: Fantastic food and Garden dining
comment: I love the menu with lots of healthy but tasty options, plus cakes of course. This time after lockdown we tried out the remodelled garden for socially distant mixing (?) and enjoyed our little sheltered table booth with our own heater, I didn't even need my extra coat! you do need to book in advance for a lunchtime table though!

title: Unexpectedly gorgeous
comment: With our lovely friends we went to the Red Onion today to enjoy our first meal following the lifting of lockdown restrictions. Max and Natalie have transformed this little jewel of a cafe into something beautiful and magical. The food as always was gold standard with lots of seasonal delights and gorgeous cakes to tempt you. It was such a happy time sitting in their newly created booths surrounded by christmas lights in such a stunning outdoor space - they even have their own resident Robin (now that's perfection). Go, enjoy and experience the loveliness of the Red Onion.

title: Recapturing elements of a social life- tier2 table for 3
comment: Lovely evening socialising following the Tier 2 guidelines at Red Onion Cafe , Ruislip . No chance of feeling chilly - our garden booth had a heater and we were offered hot water bottles and blankets ... toastie!

title: A proper pub serving proper grub.
comment: A proper pub serving proper grub. A locals local, warm and friendly. Good beer, good food, good people.

title: Came here with my baby and
comment: Came here with my baby and a friend and her baby. Very accommodating and family run friendly service. The toasted sandwiches were delicious and so were the drinks. The cakes and pastries were beautifully presented and took some away and was pleasantly surprised.

title: Great Sunday Roast and very friendly staff
comment: Great Sunday Roast and very friendly staff. Lovely beer garden with sport shown on the terrace as well as in the bar

title: Tasty Tasty and soo Tasty.
comment: Tasty Tasty and soo Tasty.

title: Wonderful friendly experience
comment: The quality of food was so astonishing & garnished with friendly waiters. The staff are well trained & polite. Cleanest amenities incl. restrooms. Super tasty food. wonderful ambience. A must-go for all.

title: quick and easy
comment: cute place to come and have dinner with friends, not too big or very good but for croydon its totally fine.

title: Saturday evening dinner
comment: Thank you, Mahad, for making us so welcome and catering for my veganism :) Great care was taken, and it’s so appreciated. Excellent customer service! I had panipuri for the first time, which was incredible - and the dahl was beautiful. I know the meet-eater thoroughly enjoyed his lamb too :) We were safely out by just before the 10pm curfew with a doggy bag. Thank you for a friendly, safe experience and top quality authentic food. Perfect! We’ll be back.

title: Excellent service and food
comment: I was lightened up when i was welcomed by Harry the waiter.I was in my own world when he approached the table , i was just ready to order , wanted to order and get over and done with. He just completely changed my mood and give me a very welcoming vibe with his extremely friendly, very considerate, honest and a humble nature yet very professional.

title: Excellent service
comment: Came inside didn’t think much of the place, abit dark but as you speak to Harry the waiter you will feel welcome and he will cheer your mood. He actually does the job from his heart took so much care of us and the order. Even when my friend said the drink is not up to the expectation, he straight away brought another one with a smile. Honestly not just because of that but the total experience because of him make me want to come back again.

title: Outstanding food, friendly service
comment: I went with a friend and ordered a mix of mains and sides. It is the second time we've visited, both times in the last fortnight. The food is excellent: Tasty, a good variety, and brought to the table quickly.

title: Terrible service & forcefully charged service charge
comment: 1- called an hour prior to coming to Resturant and book table ... when reached no table confirmed

title: My Fav Bun Kebab 😍
comment: Reminds me of Karachi!

title: Best grill platter
comment: Lovely evening out with the family at Karachi Cuisine, the food made it even better. The staff was very friendly. The arrangements for Covid 19 are according to the guidelines. Hand sanitiser was available at the entrance.

title: Proper pub
comment: Great food, Always a friendly welcome. The pizza are lovely. They show sport on a big screen and a good atmosphere.

title: Wanna meal?
comment: This is a meal, steak and sauteed pots..

title: The last time one will walk in
comment: A regular visitor .most days of the week eating at least twice a week sometimes more if I was busy with work etc ..the last night of the opening was a total shocker for me and my friends where we were told no food was available but every other table seemed to have a plate on it whilst the little lady was happily still taking orders ...there is obviously a personal problem somewhere here and me and my mates are happily going to spend our money in other local pubs ...chatting with them yesterday we worked it out there be losing 45/50k a year...totally double standards and I hope they find such good customers as is in the future...worst ever time in any pub and I really wished I had never laid eyes on the place....fakes and frauds are not welcome in my life

title: Takeaways.
comment: Now another lock down and Pete is doing the take aways again. Huge portions which I will try to finish one day but now casseroles for the cold nights tried 1 on Friday loved it. Sorry DUMPLINGS as well.

title: Amazing Food
comment: Had takeaway food during Lockdown and the food as usual is amazing! Great quality, great price. Will get takeaway again the future.

title: Sunday dinner and watch the football
comment: Had a fabulous Sunday dinner, staff looked after us and nothing was to much trouble, highly recommended

title: Family takeaway
comment: We order a friday take away each Friday while in lock down, the meals are so filling we haven't managed to eat all our meals as of yet. You get a taste and fill meals.

title: Amazing Food and lovely staff
comment: Visited on a Sunday with the family. Social distancing was strict and table service was amazing. Lovely friendly staff and food was amazing.

title: Great Sunday dinner
comment: A great Sunday roast dinner - delicious and just liked home cooked. Very generous portions so good value!

title: Excellent food & friendly atmosphere
comment: In truth we haven't been in the Bloomsbury for years even though we live 5 minutes away....but we were hearing so many good things about the pub we had to go and see for ourselves. We were not disappointed! We had family down on a Saturday and wanted to watch the Rugby. I had called ahead to check the Welsh game was on, unfortunately we were told it wasn't which was fine we would have tried the Bloomsbury another day...BUT I then had a call from the landlady (owner)r saying she had made a mistake and "Yes" the Rugby would be on, talk about going the extra mile for your customers-I was blown away by this. We of course went there & had a great few hours and loved chatting to the owners about the decor, food etc. The food look FAB but we already had plans for the Saturday evening,however we went back this Friday to try the Fish & Chips we were not disappointed it was Excellent!!!! This is a real GEM in the local area & you would be missing a true experience if you dont go.....Enjoy...We will see you there, as we are making it our new local :-)

title: Brilliant
comment: Not been here for a while went on sunday the sunday lunch is absolutely fantastic very welcoming staff it is very popular advisable to book great selection of beers and wine great place to go.

title: What a fantastic place !!!
comment: Visited the Bloomsbury for the first time yesterday and what a place !!! Fantastic atmosphere, food and hospitality!!! Especially loved their Port !!!! Will I go back absolutely ! Would I recommend it absolutely and make sure you try their pizza’s!!!!!!

title: Birthday roastie!
comment: Booked a table for 9 for family celebration. Had a choice of chicken, pork,lamb or beef . All served with cabbage, broccoli, Swede, cauliflower, parsnip and of course Roast potatoes and a yorkshire, with plenty of gravy. All home prepared and cooked. A traditional pub with home cooked food. A welcoming place.

title: Great news from The Bloomsbury in Twickenham
comment: Great news for everyone Pete & Janie are doing a takeaway food service from this great local pub, so not only the best pub food and atmosphere in Twickenham now the best takeout,

title: Lock down take out !!
comment: Lock down take out fish and chips.

title: Fabulous peter
comment: Give the blooms a look in !

title: Home from home
comment: Lovely couple, lovely pub.

title: Fantastically accommodating
comment: Found the pub on here as we were in the area and decided to give it a try. Roasts only on this Sunday and I asked what gluten free options they had, Chef came out to have a good chat with me about what options he had. He made me a fantastic gammon roast with cheese and leek sauce instead of gravy. Landlady was really friendly as was the chef and barman. I really very impressed, the food came out piping hot which is unusual for a roast as has usually been cooked and waiting to be served. Very impressed - thank you!

title: One of my fav places :)
comment: I’ve been a customer of momos for several years now and have never had something there I didn’t like! The food is always incredible (I especially like the tuna rendang and duck wraps), the staff are always lovely and accommodating and the decor is so quirky I love it! Such a gem and would highly recommend.

title: Excellent food / service and staffs
comment: I went for diner at Cafe Momo Staines , the food quality is really authentic and extremely delicious!

title: Three Words Describe Momo
comment: Three words describe Momo Cafe - AH MAY ZING! Although a last minute walk in whilst the restaurant was HEAVING from Eat Out to Help Out, I was politely sat down and informed I should be okay if I leave before a certain time (i was sad on a previously reserved table). The menu was easy to understand, waitresses were helpful and the food arrived very quickly! The PORK DUMPLINGS ARE TO DIE FOR! The skin was nice and chewy with a flavourful interior, you can taste that they are homemade unlike many other chains! Although the Nasi Lemak didn’t have as much flavour as those I have had previously it was very good (I’m just being extra picky haha). Overall great experience, one more appreciation sentence for the lovely waitresses! Good job MOMO CAFE, I will be back for those dumplings!

title: Monday Dinner
comment: Came for the first time in a while on the eat out the help out scheme, reminded us how delicious the food is! Will definitely be back regularly. Lovely place and fantastic service. Had sushi box 1 & pork dumplings - highly recommend

title: Lovely Food, Lovely staff.
comment: Cosy cafe with interesting decor. Friendly staff offering good service.

title: Momo's a go go
comment: I had a relatively standard meal which was fairly average, also had some sushi which was the same, but the dumplings here are definitely some of the nicest I have had

title: Absolutely beautiful food 10 / 10
comment: Came here for lunch with my mum, sat outside in the sun, we had the momo sushi for one and the Tuna Rendang. Wow. If you like fish then the Tuna Rendang is an absolute must try. Fave dish. The sushi was also very tasty and beautifully presented. Whole meal was full of flavour, healthy but filling, fresh and served with great service. Thank you momo's :)

title: Decent food
comment: Had the chicken laksa which was tasty and reminded me of a mild green curry.

title: Great food
comment: Lovely atmosphere and lovely food definitely be back to this place food was delicious and staff very friendly great service from these guys bravo

title: Excellent Pizzas
comment: Great place to eat right next to my favourite hotel - Goswell House. Lovely, friendly service and well priced - worth a try if visiting Windsor.

title: Gorgeous meal!!
comment: Booked a table here Sunday lunchtime to celebrate an 89th Birthday.

title: Great meal...
comment: Went with my 11 year old son, great seafood linguine, son had a pizza. Both meals really good, superb service, they wrapped up the leftover pizza for my son to take with him. Good atmosphere.

title: Delicious Dinner
comment: Had a weekend planned in Windsor and as always googled best restaurants. Sebastian’s has great reviews already so decided to book and here is another great review !! Staff incredibly helpful and attentive, drinks served quickly and orders taken . Lots to choose from the menu plus specials , I had the ravioli off the special board which was delicious. All 3 courses were amazing , shame we live so far away but will definitely book again when back in Windsor .

title: One of the most delish Italian
comment: One of the most delish Italian I’ve ever had outside Italy. A swift service and attentive personeels. A deffo recommended!

title: AMAZING
comment: This restaurant is THE BEST! I went last night with my family and every one of our plates (6 people) came out amazing. The food was FANTASTIC, the staff was very friendly and the restaurant ambiance feels very authentic. We had a wonderful experience. Please do yourself a favor and go here!!

title: I thought I was in Italy
comment: Great authentic Italian food, great service, food was cooked to perfection. The place has a great atmosphere, just reminded me of being in a small restaurant in Rome last year. Wines were also reasonably priced.

title: Average
comment: The tiramisu was nice but the pesto and pizza were average. It might have been because the restaurant was full but still we expected better given the rating.

title: Lunch with girls
comment: We went to this restaurant as it was recommended by our friend. The service was great and friendly, but the experience was let down by the food. The calzone was tasteless, crab pasta greasy and structure just not right. Will try again and hopefully will be better.

title: Wonderful evening
comment: First time eating out since lockdown so went back to our favourite restaurant for our wedding anniversary. The COVID safety measures they have put in place are first class, we felt very comfortable ,the Staff and food were excellent as always. We will feel totally at ease going back again. Peter and Linda Wright

title: Very Happy Customer
comment: We chose to celebrate the first birthday we could after lockdown restrictions were lifted at the Cranleigh. I must say that we were so happy that we did. The service, as always, was impeccable, the food was absolutely delicious and the staff just couldn't do enough for you but weren't intrusive. All staff were very conscious of social distancing and hygiene. There was digital hand sanitizer dispensers as you entered and we were encouraged to use it. All staff wore face guards. It's very safe and would encourage and recommend people to go. We had a wonderful meal and evening and will definitely be going back there soon.

title: Sunday lunch
comment: Nice venue, good service. Didn’t feel food was as good as it’s been in past. Beef overcooked. Meringue not home made.

title: Anniversary celebration
comment: We visited the Cranleigh last night to celebrate our 20th anniversary. Customer service was excellent throughout.

title: Sunday lunch.
comment: We enjoyed a very good Sunday lunch here recently.

title: Fantastic as always
comment: We went on Friday 2nd October 2020 with 2 family members, it was such a uplifting experience in this horrible time.

title: Funeral wake-absolutely perfect in every way
comment: We booked a funeral wake with Christine for 15 people due to current restrictions. We were socially distanced in a seating plan in the restaurant in such a way we could speak to each other. This meant the world to us on such a sad day. We were served a top class 3 course meal of soup with a warm roll, roast chicken and apple crumble and custard it was delicious. We were served drink all the time by very kind, caring staff and the whole experience on such a sad day was incredible. Thank you to them all.

title: good food
comment: my only complaint is the portions are to big i know this is not a bad fault but in general service is great food good

title: Meal with singer
comment: Fantastic food and Darryl, the singer, was brilliant even when we asked him for random songs! Staff were very Covid aware and we felt safe.

title: Wonderful bespoke wedding venue
comment: We had our wonderful wedding here back in February 2020, and we chose this venue for many reasons. The food is amazing here, it's a local venue to us, the staff are friendly, and on the wedding side of things, many things were included that other venues charged a bomb for, and you could make it more bespoke to you as well. Christine (who runs the event side of things I believe) has years of experience, knows great wedding contacts, has great ideas and makes sure you have thought of everything (I had never planned a wedding before!). For example, we chose not to have seat covers as the chairs are lovely there, but switched the rectangle tables for circular tables (better for guests' conversations) for a cost that was so worth it. We had a DJ and a band, and they liaised well with Christine. Both Christine and Lisa were happy for us to call and check things/ask questions and when we met or chatted to them, nothing was stressful or rushed and she helped us a great deal. We chose the food we preferred for our guests (with vegetarian, vegan, GF and DF options too), talked through the drinks and buffet options and the day went so well. We have since eaten in the restaurant a few times in between lockdowns and they are adhering to government guidance and the food still tastes amazing of course!!! We are so grateful to the Cranleigh team and we would highly recommend this venue for either a meal out or an event.

title: Good takeaway
comment: We got takeaway of chicken tikka masala , lamb Karahi, chole, and mutter paneer.

title: Weekend meal
comment: First I would just like to say the meal we ordered was not what we both received me and my partner we asked for king prawn dishes we got more like Tesco value not what we paid for at all and when it came it was disgusting i had 3 mouthfuls and put it in the bin the sauce or what ever it was I don't know how it could of even been classed as indian food me and my partner are used to eating indian food and have had amazing food from many places sadly this was not one of them so never again I would rate the food 0 out of 10 but I would like to say the management was so nice and friendly and did try and help us so 10 out of 10 but for food no so poor worst i have ever had even the rice was something I could not put into words and how can u get rice so wrong

title: Decent Take Away
comment: Having a great day with my friends and we ordered some dishes as take away. The presentation of the plates wasn’t very good and they get in the location cold because they weren’t covered enough. The food wasn’t that bad but I’ll suggest to change the take away boxes.

title: First evening out for months
comment: A great evening at our favourite restaurant much looked forward to after being in lock down

title: Good, tasty curries!
comment: Good service- excellent poppadoms & chutneys.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: 14 of us, family and friends celebrated my 70th birthday on a Saturday evening in February.

title: Just fab
comment: Food, service and ambience just great. Proper food with good portions, well served, all at great value with it.

title: Award function, catered for by the Cranleigh
comment: I attended an awards ceremony last night and just have to comment on the superb catering and friendly, professional service by the staff.

title: Top notch Sunday lunch
comment: I honestly cannot fault the experience at this place. A warm welcome with drinks served in the bar area and then to your table - which was beautifully laid with sparkling glasses and cutlery and linen cloths.

title: Lovely sunday lunch
comment: I booked at short notice as the family arrived as surprise visit. All 7 of us enjoyed our meals and would definitely visit again

title: Beautiful food!
comment: We went here for tea on Monday evening. Our two children (12 & 7) enjoyed it too.

title: Our first restaurant meal for 6 months
comment: Our first restaurant meal since before lockdown. The meal was superb, beautiful presentation, big portions and wonderful taste.

title: First visit since lockdown
comment: Enjoyed our first night out for meal with friends since lockdown. The staff were friendly and welcoming and made us feel comfortable with the safety procedures they have in place.

title: Fantastic evening after Lockdown
comment: First visit back after this lockdown period and as usual the same fantastic service and great food as always, the staff were absolutely fantastic with great smiles and laughter, once again thank you. If your looking for a great night out please book this great restaurant

title: Wedding Reception Meal
comment: We had our wedding reception meal in the Stanley Room and we couldn't of been happier with the whole experience, Christine and her staff made our day truly special! the food was amazing, the service was superb and very friendly.

title: Worst food I’ve ever had
comment: I visited the restaurant with my family as we entered the restaurant was very quite, firstly the chairs were dirty as we walked in not a problem as i just used the tissue to clean it. After waiting for some time we got the menus. We ordered our food the wait between starters and the mains was very long finally when the food came all the naans were burnt and rock hard the 3 dishes we ordered by recommendation were all sweet. As we complained to the manager he said to us “mainly white people come here so we have our food plain, you should of asked if you wanted it spicy” which was a surprise to us because if they make their food so plain to adhere to their customers that should of been mentioned whilst ordering but the argument wasn’t even the food is plain the food was sweet. Very big disappointment and for a restaurant that cost £170 not worth the money.

title: Good food and service
comment: Been to kaniz with friends. Lovely atmosphere, food and service. Close to Heathrow airport and hotel so it’s in a very convenient location. This is our go to restaurant whenever we travel to London.

title: Great food
comment: The food at Kaniz was fantastic.

title: Veggie Paneer
comment: It’s good to see an increased level of veggie options in London. This place made a decent paneer Palak with roti.

title: Surbiton's most authentic Italian. If you missed your trip to Italy this year visit here!
comment: Exceptional freshly made calamari fritti, the kind you rarely find in the UK, worth the trip alone!

title: amazing.
comment: Amazing Italian food, lovely staff and a great atmosphere. we had amazing pizza today. we ll come back soon.

title: Bank Holiday Late Lunch
comment: As usual, service brilliant, food even better. This place never fails to deliver. Great atmosphere. Will be back soon.

title: Couldn’t believe everybody
comment: Couldn’t believe everybody was rating this 5 stars. Very simple restaurant and layout. What a pleasant surprise. Great service and delicious food. Very impressed and will definitely visit again. Top rated and hats off to the staff. Thanks

title: Excellent
comment: They craft a wonderful pizza and they are a fantastic group. If all firms were like this I wouldn't oppose capitalism. Try it, seriously.

title: Food and service really great
comment: Been here many times. The staff are ace! The food is acer. The location is good for us. They are always so accommodating and kind through the service of food. Thanks and see you soon

title: First popped in for coffee but staff were so lovely we decided to go back for an evening meal.
comment: Had a lovely evening (deliberately chose a Monday so that it would be quiet) eating great pizza and being served by a delightful young man who humoured us trying out our very basic Italian. Will definitely make it a regular haunt.

title: Lovely spot for date night!
comment: My boyfriend and I decided on Friday evening to go out for dinner - we hadn't made a reservation so weren't hopeful but Masaniello was the first spot we went to, and luckily they had a table for two downstairs - felt like we were tucked away which was cosy and private. We shared a bottle of wine, he had a margherita pizza and I had a pasta dish - total came to about £40 which we thought was really good value.

title: These guys pull it out the
comment: These guys pull it out the bag every time. Thanks. Very professional and great food. The steak is fantastic which I appreciate you shouldn’t order at a pizzeria but it is ace!

title: Authentic Italian pizza
comment: Masaniello is always the best choice when you fancy homemade Italian food and delicious pizza. Their forza Napoli pizza is something to die for. I also just recently became intollerant to gluten, and their gluten free pizza is the closest to normal pizza I've tried. Love it!

title: Very Disappointed with the food
comment: Since the reopening it has not been the same restaurant in term of the taste of food. I ordered 2wice Chicken Lollipop and they were salty both the time . Even the naan Is not up to the mark. I hope they will sort their problem and get back to old ways.

title: Delicious food
comment: Being our local we visit Takka Tak regularly and every time the food is scrumptious & loved by my whole family. Very clean place, good customer service,now with plastic shields beteeen the tables for extra safety measures.

title: Amazing meal! 10/10
comment: Amazing meal! Service and food were 10/10. Especially recommend the Chicken 65 and First Class Mutton Curry. Thanks

title: Best indian Iv ever had. 2
comment: Best indian Iv ever had. 2 days in a row , took 6 guys from work here yesterday and all said the same . Unbelievable

title: 10/10 Superb Meal
comment: On Recommendation we tried this restaurant tonight, oh boy we were not disappointed.

title: Excellent food
comment: My third visit in last 12 months

title: Excellent tilapia curry
comment: Came in for lunch and the food was excellent, lovely paneer tikka and Goan fish curry. A few large groups dining here, overall a good atmosphere and great efforts to comply with the latest regulations which can't have been easy... hope they still have printed menus available for those who don't have smart phones though. Only bugbear was how cold it was on opening for a good hour which made it pretty uncomfortable to begin with. I suggest booking about and hour after opening or the restaurant put the heating on ahead of patrons arriving. Would certainly visit again in the future.

title: A*** Consistency
comment: We have reviewed this restaurant a number of times over the last few years, both for eating in and their takeaway service. Rarely, have we ever found an establishment to maintain such high standards over such a period of time. Well, Takaa Tak have, and in spades.

title: Pleasantly surprised and definitely worth repeat visits
comment: It was my turn to choose a restaurant for a few friends and this one stood out due to all the other positive reviews.

title: Absolutely pawsome
comment: WONDERFUL !!! Friendly staff with a buzzing atmosphere. Food was great and the dogs loved their peanut butter scone and puppachino drink. A must visit for anybody who wants a great night out. Don’t forget to ask Dan for a baby blue cocktail. Have fun.

title: Don’t bother - unwelcoming staff and overpriced
comment: Waitress was good but owner is rude and has an awful attitude. It’s a shame as it could be a good local option but we won’t be returning due to the poor service and overpriced food and drink. Also seems to be an issue with visiting with babies/ prams, could be a bit of an issue in Surbiton I’m afraid!

title: Great food at good prices
comment: I had a yummy breakfast at Wags and Tales this morning. I hadn't realised it was vegetarian so thought I was getting 2 sausages - but I got a veggie sausage and a bubble'n'squeak sausage. They were amazing - I am a convert!

title: Food was great, friendly staff.
comment: Food was great, friendly staff. Sardines to start followed by the mixed grill, both were very good. Met for a reunion with dole old work colleagues, it was that good we are meeting there again in a few weeks, £10 off from Boris, what’s not to like.

title: Simply Wonderful
comment: The Pizza is the real Italian Job! With very high quality ingredients and sourdough dough base. Salads and Pasta dishes are very good as well.

title: Fantastic breakfast and dinner
comment: We recently went for breakfast which was excellent. The specials board looked so inspiring that we simply had to go back for dinner. We were not disappointed! The menu offers a range of authentic French and Italian dishes. We loved the escargots, fruit de mer, osso buco and delicious prawns. The rest of the menu is also tempting so already planning on going back. Service was efficient and very charming and friendly.

title: Went to Moksha for dinner
comment: Went to Moksha for dinner on Tuesday night with family. The food was delicious as always and friendly service.

title: Great food, great atmosphere and great service!
comment: Travelling from Liverpool, this is one of the best indians ive tried. Highly recommended the mixed meat platter!

title: Amazing flavours
comment: fabulous food - some of the best Indian food I've ever had. Loved the street food,and everything was beautifully flavoured. Great service too, we will definitely be back!

title: Mrs Davidovic
comment: Went for an anniversary dinner and Little Mumbai has been consistently pleasant, going above and beyond in their service today! Lovely staff and great selection of food, couldn’t recommend them enough!

title: Love this place nice vibe
comment: Love this place nice vibe yummy food and great service.

title: Authentic Wonderful Food!
comment: Just eaten here for the first time and the food was really good and authentic! The service was warm, friendly and fantastic! Keep up the good work Romolo & Ferdinando. We will definitely be back! ❤️

title: All simply Great!
comment: I had never eaten here before and sampled a few meze dishes. I wasn't disappointed! Out of this world flavours that really have you salivating! The decor and ambience is beautiful and the staff were friendly, quick and attentive. Especially Ira! She stopped and had a little chat with us and told us all about the different dishes. Highly recommend!

title: Fantastic place!
comment: This is one of our favourite restaurants, even though we live 50 minutes drive away, we wish it was closer! Food is excellent (we are vegan and they have many options), the atmosphere is so good you forget you are in a busy shopping centre, you get transported to another world, and the service is great! We have no complaints, in fact we are looking forward to our next treat at Maison Du Mezze!

title: Excellent restaurant yet to be beaten
comment: Found this in the the shopping centre in Kingston , from the outside it looks nice and when we got seated it was almost if we had been abroad ‘ the decor is excellent and has a real feel of authenticity to it . The service was excellent and the wine I ordered wasn’t available ‘ so some samples were brought over to me by the waiter , as for the food we didn’t have a clue what to order but saw a few dishes being delivered to their tables ‘ and one of the managers came

title: Excellent on every level
comment: Visited here this evening and was very impressed by the Covid precautions in place and by the service and food.

title: Went for an evening meal with the family
comment: Food was excellent,staff very friendly good choice,first visit there. Was recommended by our friends

title: Great value, Delicious food, amazing service.
comment: I’ve been there few times with my family and friends and it was absolutely lovely, although we went there couple of times on weekend without any booking but they still managed to accommodate us. You will experience really warm and friendly greeting, every time try to get a different main , NEVER DISAPPOINTED:), I’ll recommend this place to all my friends and family members.

title: Incredible tomatoes
comment: The food in here is amazing. I was very impressed with the quality of products (you can taste the difference between tomatoes Melisi uses and tomatoes from the shop). Staff is extremely nice and they serve very quickly. Good prices for amazing quality of food. I highly recommend this place if you want proper Italian food !!

title: Nice ~ cozy and warm place to be in
comment: Good compact restaurant, nice oven bakes pizza directly on your table.

title: A taste of bella Italia !
comment: Wonderful pizzas - authentic just as in Italy. Good range of toppings & tasty antipasti too. Greqt for ordering to take out as well.

title: Fantastic stone baked pizzas
comment: Fantastic stone baked pizzas at very reasonable prices. Nice atmosphere with friendly service in a small little restaurant.

title: Waiters
comment: The waiters catcalled us me and my three friends and stared at us, not a very inviting environment :/

title: Takeaway Pizza
comment: Had the most incredible takeaway pizza from here. The nicest pizza in the area by far! So nice to finally somewhere nearby that does good, proper authentic pizza with high quality ingredients. We’ll be ordering again soon!

title: Dinu
comment: Amazing authentic food and punctual service! Definitely one of the best Indian restaurant in London.

title: Authentic Italian cuisine
comment: It’s always the authentic cosy local spots, that deliver the finest foods. Head down to Melisi for service, ambience and ottimo cibo

title: Dinner for three
comment: Great food and service as always, never disappointed. The pizzas are freshly made onsite with fresh ingredients.

title: 1st visit
comment: Finally got round to visiting this lovely pizzeria. It is a hidden gem in Bromley and lives up to it’s great reputation on trip advisor! we really enjoyed our evening. Cosy & friendly atmosphere, we had a sharing platter to start followed by pizza and everything was delicious. We booked in advance and it was very busy but excellent service and not rushed at all. Will definitely return and try the desserts next time!

title: Fantastic Pizzas
comment: Been wanting to come here for a while as heard very good reviews and finally got to experience for myself. Becky our waitress was lovely and guided us when we were undecided on what to choose. Our pizzas, drinks and dessert were fab and we will definitely come again.

title: I keep coming back for more!
comment: Excellent Pizza, friendly and fast service. Even though it's a bit of a trek for me, it's always been worth it

title: Absolutely amazing!
comment: We’ve dined at The Fireball while on a mini break in Chiselhurst.y husband saw many good reviews for this place and we decided to give it a try. When you enter the restaurant, you can see the whole process of making pizzas. We were seated straight away in a lovely back area of the restaurant. We decided to have starters, Caprese salad and prosciutto bruschetta. The pizzas that followed were absolutely delicious and very big. I have not had such an amazing pizza in a while. The service was great, both girls working that night were very pleasant and they made sure that we were comfortable. We have also decided to try their homemade ice cream which was the best, I’ve tried chocolate and my husband had raspberry crunch.
