We’ve thought the final bill was reasonable, £44 really isn’t bad for what we’ve received. We certainly recommend The Fireball to anyone who wants to have a chilled out evening and some delicious food. We will definitely return again when we are down South. Thanks.

title: Dinner
comment: I can’t believe that I’ve not come here sooner. The pizzas are amazing. We can’t wait to come back again soon

title: Really enjoyed it here, will come back for sure.
comment: We enjoyed a lovely dinner here tonight. The pizza was amazing, good beer, very reasonable prices and really friendly staff. Will definitely eat here again.

title: This Is our go to pizza restaurant
comment: This Is our go to pizza restaurant in the area. Fresh ingredients, lovely staff and well priced...need I say more?!

title: Never had better before
comment: It's a relatively small restaurant with a very warm ambiance. When we first went there, they served our pizzas in 5, or maybe 6 minutes and we insisted that it wasn't for us because we couldn't believe how fast they were!

title: Deserves the gold medal
comment: My friends and I have been eating at L’oro di Napoli for at least two years now and we paid our first post-lockdown visit on the evening of Saturday 25th July. Arriving at 8pm, it was strange to see the restaurant so empty at that time of night because it is usually packed at that hour. Although it didn’t reach its usual pre-Covid level of business – understandable as Brits slowly and cautiously emerge from lockdown – the restaurant steadily got busier as the evening went on. The restaurant was also doing a great trade in takeaways with big stacks of pizzas regularly being collected by delivery men on scooters.

title: Wonderful pizza + staff
comment: We visited this restaurant on holiday to Zagreb and were delighted, the food was wonderful and the staff were very welcoming + friendly. If you’re looking for great, authentic Italian pizza and good service, this is the place to go!

title: Excellent food and ambience
comment: Went there last night with a couple of girlfriends. Fantastic food and service. We sat outside which just added to the ambience. Would definitely recommend!

title: Excellent pizzas, the best in town
comment: Excellent pizzas, the best around in our opinion. Staff were very pleasant and helpful, also very professional. House wine was. Good value at £15 a bottle. No draft beer unfortunately. Pizzas were excellent as was the garlic bread. The desserts were amazing in particular the home made tiramisu and chocolate cake. Cannot recommend this place highly enough, we will be back for sure.

title: A good catch-up
comment: Very clean, great food and friendly staff

title: Beautiful food and very engaging, efficient staff
comment: I visited this place for the first time this week, and I have to say, it is one of the best Neapolitan pizzas I have had in the UK. We had starters, mains and dessert and I couldn’t fault a single thing.

title: Great, authentic, Italian Flavour
comment: This restaurant serves one-of-a-kind pizza which varies largely from what is classified as pizza nowadays. L’oro di Napoli has a very extensive range of pizzas which are all made to order quickly. These pizzas are what a pizza should be. The pizzas are also surprisingly cheap for the quality of food there. Overall, highly recommended.

title: Good "Italian" style pizza
comment: As a fussy Italian, is not easy for me to find a "good traditional" pizza in London (even places run by Italians......) This one comes very close to the best I had. The most important thing in a pizza is the dough, and the wood fired oven; all other ingredients, as long as of good quality, are almost the same. And remember, less is more.......(Chicken, beef, pineapple on a pizza?.... No thank you.....)

title: The taste of Italy
comment: I visited L'Oro di Napoli for take away only. I ordered and pay through the App: the process is very easy and straightforward. When I arrived I had only to wait 5 minutes which is really good as you want to taste your pizza still hot. Every pizza is delicious and cook to perfection: it is difficult to make a choice. Every time I go I make sure I order a different one. Staff is very friendly.

title: Very tasty authentic food
comment: We’re vegetarians and found the options to be great - there is none of the bright red masala it all lolls very much home made. Amazing garlic naan

title: Love this pizza place.
comment: Love this pizza place. For me is one of the best pizza in London. Excellent quality and very cheap (or should I say normal pizza price) not like other places around London where they charge you crazy prices.

title: Saturday night treat after lock down
comment: great place. Lovely stylish decor.

title: Great Food, Mediocre Service, Dastardly Delivery
comment: In conclusion, the food was good but not mind-blowingly great; dearer than my usual Indian curry order but not better; my order was either taken down wrong (two of five items ordered were wrong) after not one but two detailed corrections; miscommunicated; or misread by the kitchen chef(s); delivery driver was either given the wrong house number; or misread it; then failed to pass on any kind of word from the restaurant; or even show his face.

title: First time back after 3 months
comment: First time back after 3 months away and it is still the best pizza for miles. Great friendly staff is a bonus. Homemade ice cream is to die for.

title: Brilliant food as always
comment: Really wonderful food, and good, friendly service. I recommend the Chicken Xiacutti - just delicious!

title: Friendly charming place
comment: Moksha is a lovely place to dine with a nice ambience. We were welcomed by Ankit the manager. We ordered garlic broccoli which was superb ! Paani poori, veg biriyani served along with complimentary onion Baji. The food was amazing so as the service. We would definitely recommend dining at Moksha. Thank you for a lovely evening.

title: Imaginative, interesting, different
comment: Moksha lifts Indian dining from the run-of-the-mill: the menu is imaginative and full of interest, with a strong vegetarian section and several "street food" small dishes which were entirely new to me and delicious. The choices are wide, and the food avoids the fate of much Indian restaurant fare of being drowned in too heavy a sauce.

title: Excellent food.
comment: Thoroughly enjoyed the excellent food. Minor fault - music too loud. Service was excellent. Great experience

title: First thing in this climate
comment: First thing in this climate is to mention it is Covid friendly. The staff were lovely and incredibly accommodating. The two starters of a chaat dish and a chickpea samosa are two of the best Indian starters I’ve had. I ordered a recommended chicken curry whilst my friend ordered a fish curry. Now, I’d normally be petrified of a fish curry but having tried my friends it was incredibly good! Might even be a game changer for me for my next curry. There is off street parking all around and they are happy for you to stay as long as you need. The other thing to note was a regular stream of delivery drivers waiting (safely again) to pick up deliveries- always a good sign!

title: Amazing dinner!
comment: We visited last night and had a lovely evening, the food was lovely, fresh and tasty! The staff were very polite, friendly and attentive. The owner Solly is a lovely gentleman and even gave us a free drink each which was a lovely gesture. Highly recommend this long standing local restaurant! 5*

title: The best Indian restaurant in Essex
comment: The food is excellent and the host is great

title: A delicious hidden gem
comment: Great curry’s, full of flavour. I would recommend the Thali, a bit of everything and is perfect if you can’t decide. Excellent service. Will definitely be back! Thank you moksha!

title: Amazing food and awesome service
comment: Have been coming here for years off and on, high time I left a review. Great place, very reasonably priced and brilliant service. Always remembered when we come in and could not recommend enough! Best curry I have had bar none!

title: Sooooo glad of takeaway
comment: Lockdown persists and so does the superb food at bekash.

title: Exceptional food and astounding service!!
comment: When we arrived at Bekash for dinner, we were greeted by a team of very friendly service staff and were ushered to the table. The restaurant interior and setup was saying "welcome" when you entered the door. The waiter's and the owner were extremely focused on the customers wellbeing from the 1st second.

title: Lovely!!
comment: Was warmly greeted on arrival to the restaurant and service thereafter was impeccable. Food was delicious as always! Would recommend to anyone looking for a great family meal out

title: Outstanding food and service
comment: Just been to Bekash and the food here is sublime, the costomer service is excellent as always. When we visit we are always greeted by a warm and professional staff. The owner always greets us at the door and sees to it that we have everything that we need. I will most definitely keep coming back to this amazing restaurant.

title: Delicious!
comment: The food was really good, if anything i think that during lockdown its somehow got better! i decided to do collection today rather than delivery, this way i got out of the house and i was able to pick it up quicker.

title: Great Ruby!
comment: Great restaurant. Lovely service from the owner Solly (whose even pictured with the queen!) and really tasty food. Will be back!

title: New favourite
comment: Tried the Bekash for the first time last week, this will be my new regular takeaway! I ordered vegetarian food, a lot of places don't know how to cater for non meat eaters, they have skilled chefs as the food was flavoured deliciously with the correct textures. Looking forward to my next visit

title: Mrs
comment: The food was amazing particularly the mozzarella garlic bread and the Parmigiana layers of baked aubergine, fior di latte mozzarella and tomato was fantastic.

title: We went to this restaurant
comment: We went to this restaurant today at lunchtime. The food was amazing as was the service too. Highly recommend the grilled salmon. It was so soft and cooked to perfection

title: Great experience
comment: Had a most enjoyable and delicious meal. Waitress was confident, maintained social distancing and hygiene to high standards and was so lovely with my 5year old grandson. Would highly recommend this restaurant and will go back,

title: perfect
comment: I don't want to give this review as I don't want this restaurant to be too popular

title: Excellent Taste of Italy
comment: I’ve had a few takeaways from here recently. The delivery and service has been excellent.

title: Our first visit to Chez Pascal
comment: Our first visit to Chez Pascal post lockdown tonight and it was as lovely as ever. Menu has been slightly updated and the daily special board still going strong. Considering the ongoing circumstances the options were great and did not disappoint with my wife having buffalo mozzarella salad for starter and sea bass for main whilst I went for the white crab meat and avocado starter and veal chop from the specials board for main at Pascal’s recommendation, which was superb. Portions are massive and all ingredients are fresh and very well put together. Very friendly waiter along with Pascal who was on good form. We have been going here for years and can’t wait fir our next visit. It’s well worth the money and stays very reasonable price wise as still able to take own alcoholic drinks. Please give this local bistro a try.

title: Delicious as always, lovely
comment: Delicious as always, lovely take away pasta meal from the lovely Pascal. Would highly recommend. My husband, daughter and myself had a thoroughly delicious meal this evening, excellent value.

title: after lockdown
comment: went there for the first time since lockdown,felt very safe,lots of distance between tables.Had calves liver which is new to the menue,was the best I have ever had,cooked to perfection with a delicious sauce.So glad it has reopened cant wait to visit again.

title: Amazing staff! Amazing food
comment: The atmosphere, food and friendliness of the staff make Chez Pascal a delight to return to, again and again. Highly recommend to go if you haven’t been. It’s quite a small place, which adds to its charm, but you would need to book in advance if possible. My personal favourite is the sea food pasta dish, but there’s a lot of great choices on the menu.

title: Great food, generous portions, decent social distancing
comment: Eaten here for the first time since the CV19 lock down, social distancing measures in place, less tables and chairs, this less customers, sanitizer on enter. Staff not wearing masks like some other restaurants but didn’t present a problem.

title: Food and service were excellent.
comment: Food and service were excellent. Have been before and it never disappoints and will definitely return. The staff are very friendly and attentive and we always receive a warm welcome from Kevan. This was our first meal out since covid and we felt very safe as tables were suitably spaced apart for social distancing.

title: A wonderful meal as always!
comment: Thank you to the Pascal Bistros team for another tasty meal and great service on Friday night. Lovey local restaurant on our doorstep. We will be back!

title: Superb!
comment: Absolute 10/10 service from as soon as we arrived in from the pouring rain! Superb advice on the menu, and second to none service. Definitely will be returning. Thank you Kevan, excellent! Food was so authentic and delicious!

title: A very Special Valentines Evening
comment: Incredible service and a very good atmosphere on Valentines night. Waiters very attentive and giving everyone a very personal service making it a very relaxed and romantic evening for all - just priceless

title: Lovely food and atmosphere
comment: My friend and I dined here last night and we had a lovely time. Food was amazing, cooked to perfection and presented well with charming waiting staff. The atmosphere was buzzy we will definitely be coming back. I recommend the hot meze starter.

title: Best place to eat in Beckenham/ Bromley
comment: We have been coming to Hisar for the last 5 years and the food is always amazing so tasty and fresh, the service is always friendly and helpful. We love it. The hummus is amazing always!!!

title: Hisar Meze Bar
comment: Great Restaurant, superb food & very well presented. Slick & efficient waiting staff.

title: So good to be back!
comment: After several months of lockdown we returned to Hisar, our first choice on 4th July. Tables have been spaced out more to comply with social distancing guidelines but apart from that no change.

title: Takeaway Meal
comment: Ordered a takeaway meal for me and my Wife from Hisar.

title: A lovely meal
comment: Went for an impromptu dinner at Hizar this evening...delicious! Service was prompt, food lovely and and we even had complimentary Turkish bread, olives and baklava to finish! Overall a very wholesome, friendly place to eat...we will be back! Highly recommend

title: Little Gem in Beckenham.
comment: I regularly use Hisar and in my opinion it’s the best Turkish restaurant in Beckenham. The staff are always friendly and welcoming and treat you like old friends. The food quality is always perfect, food is always fresh, hot and very well presented. Prices are very reasonable for this type of restaurant.

title: Lovely lunch
comment: Had a gorgeous lunch today, Antipasto to start and as mains the wild cod and the tiger prawns & scallops. No complaints whatsoever, food was outstanding, as was the service. Can’t comment on the wine as I was on water due to driving duties!

title: Fabulous,as ever
comment: Never fails to delight. Just had a family lunch, service and staff just as delightful as when we have had dinner with friends or even Christmas Lunch.

title: Lovely meal!!
comment: Lovely meal. They were very covid cautious which was reassuring. The bread they served was fresh and fantastic! The starters were beautiful, especially the prawn and crab pasta. For mains we had Dover sole which was cooked perfectly, veal Milanese and the mushroom ravioli. All were tasty. Wine was also lovely. Good atmosphere. Only issue would be we had to remind the waiter for tap water and we didn’t receive the olives after being asked. Neither of which would stop us going back again. We will definitely be returning!

title: Hadn't been for a while but
comment: Hadn't been for a while but had an excellent meal this evening - pleasantly surprised and will definitely be back.

title: Absolutely loved the food!
comment: Second visit in just over two weeks. So I guess that says a lot. Loved the food so much that I came back with a friend.

title: Classy Restaurant- the little touches make a difference
comment: We had a lovely evening.

title: Fabulouuussssss! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
comment: Had a really fantastic evening at Di Paolo last night. The service was exceptional with lovely, attentive staff, who genuinely seemed to care. The homemade Foccaia was just delicious. Plenty of precautions were in place for Covid. My starter of scallop, Calimari, black pudding was devine and my partner’s cold meat selection, very impressive and so flavoursome. I really felt the food was genuinely made with love! Restaurants like this are a rarity and they genuinely deserve to do well.

title: Excellent dinner
comment: Lovely food and staff. More importantly very Covid aware. Staff wearing masks and supplied bags for mask and wipes for hands. Asked to wear mask when entering and when going to toilets - shame some visitors decided they didn't need to bother.

title: Great Italian restaurant.
comment: Great Italian restaurant. Service not obtrusive food excellent and great for COVID 19 friendly. Dover sole is always the best

title: Food is tasty but a bit overpriced
comment: Food is tasty but a bit overpriced and portions are not that big .

title: Work Christmas dinner
comment: This restaurant has a pleasant vibe & decor but the lighting is awful - much too bright in some parts ... glaring down on you in a most unflattering uncomfortable fashion.

title: Sumptuous food!!
comment: After doing shopping we made an impromptu plan to have dinner there. The restaurant was beautifully decorated. Being vegetarian, we asked Ferdinando (who were serving us) for recommendations, he gave us very good suggestions and we had ordered the same. Each and every dish was very delicious, with lovely presentation. Our daughters also loved the food and icing on the cake was the superrr perfect Oreo milkshake. Staff was very warm and helpful. Would definitely love to go again there.

title: One of the best restaurant experience!
comment: Where do i start, this little gem of a place in Kingston (in the shopping centre) is absolutely stunning. I was amazed by how authentic the decor of the place was to lebanon. The welcome was very warming and professional, the service was excellent and the food was amazing! I highly recommend this place if you are looking for authentic Lebanon food, or just in general a top place to eat because you wont be disappointed.

title: Beautiful Breakfast!
comment: I found a wonderful gem of a restaurant in Kingston this morning and had a wonderful breakfast recommended by Romolo. The food was delicious and I felt transported to another place altogether. The surroundings are stunning. I hope to bring my husband here for a meal. I now know I like yogurt with thyme! Really pleased with everything. Thank you!

title: Daciana
comment: We had a very lovely meal at this restaurant, ordered a hot plate mezze and a seafood soup, it was a bit pricey but the food was delicious and of high quality. Also ordered a lemonade which was the best we ever had.

title: Shame
comment: Raw ingredients, burned ends and one of them looked like half a pizza.

title: Consistently outstanding
comment: A Neapolitan friend of mine introduced me to L'oro di Napoli, and it's been a regular haunt for quite a few of us at work for both lunches and dinners - visiting bi/weekly prior to extended working from home this year. Happily I've been back a few times in August and September, and it's well worth the 45 minute drive from home!

title: Lost fresh basil
comment: Went trought the ingredients list when ordering again the same pizza and was a bit surprised that there supposed to be a fresh basil as I did record it from the last ordered. We ordered 2 the same pizzas and I had a look at the basil. No wonder I didn't noticed it. Not that I pernickety, but I think an Italian pizzeria should have a fresh basil as must.

title: Conmen
comment: Ordered online they said they’d delivered and it never arrived. I got charge £30 for no food. Avoid these conmen

title: Lovely pizza
comment: I recently discovered this fabulous restaurant which serves one of the best pizza's I've ever had. The staff is very friendly and helpful at all times. It's a great place to go out for food in South Ealing!

title: Really good pizza
comment: I have eaten here few times. Each time the pizza was delicious. Here I discovered how amazing is pizza with fresh basil. Since that day I use it in my kitchen, especially when I do homemade pizza. I will recommend that place for all pizza-lovers!

title: fantastic real napoletana pizza
comment: Very good pizza, real napoletana taste, nice staff and excellent cheese cake. Place is not huge but cosy and you feel familiar mood

title: Cold food no refund
comment: If your food arrives cold you won’t be given any compensation. Not good enough..

title: Livid
comment: I am absolutely disgusted without L'oro di Napoli Ealing treated me and my family.

title: Best vegetarian food in Surbiton
comment: I frequently dine at Wags n Tales and am never disappointed. The coffee is delicious, the food hearty and the staff are exceptionally friendly, even during busy hours. As a vegetarian, I'm spoiled for choice with the delicious menu, but the shaksuka and tamales are my favourite! I would rather take a friend here than a high street chain coffee shop any day!

title: Average food, bit disappointing.
comment: Average food, bit disappointing. Have previous had good time there but today the food looked like it had just been chucked on the plate and was missing some things like the sauces it said on the menu, and just tasted a bit blank. Drinks took 20 minutes to come and when I asked I was just told by the waiter “they’ll come when they’re ready” and that was it. They’ve spaced the tables well and atmosphere is nice and admittedly it was busy but was just disappointed with the food and the staff were not particularly helpful or friendly today.

title: The best oven baked pizza
comment: The best oven baked pizza I had, the only thing is the South Ealing place it’s a bit thigh inside with very limited space to sit.

title: Get some customer training service!
comment: I will never go back to this place and I will not recommend it to any of my friends. The reason is a bad customer service and a log wait for foot.

title: very bad attitude
comment: I have been a regular at Waggs for a couple of late afternoon beers for around 18 months.

title: Really impressed!
comment: I came here for the first time this week for brunch, and I was really impressed! You can order on your phone from your table which is great for maintaining social distancing! Food and drinks were reasonably priced, came super quickly and everything was absolutely delicious! Staff were very friendly, and even looked after my phone behind the bar when I left it on my table when I left! Would recommend and will definitely come again!

title: Lovely food, easy service
comment: Visited for brunch and it was lovely, offered a few options for seating and the food arrived quickly. Really delicious food and drinks would recommend if you're in and around Surbiton

title: Brilliant Service and Even Better Food
comment: My colleague and I ordered for a takeaway but on arrival we were surprised by the professional atmosphere and decided to stay for our meeting.

title: Great food, coffee and remote working spot!
comment: Only discovered this spot 2 weeks ago... and I have been back four times since! I love this space for remote working - there's wifi, power outlets and both low and high tables (which make for great 'standing desks'). The coffees and juices never disappoint, the food is always fresh and delicious (I could easily stay for breakfast, lunch and dinner) and the staff are always friendly and welcoming. Thanks to you all (especially Dan) - I'll be back soon! :)

title: Tea date with the girls
comment: Visited this Sunday afternoon for a girly catch up! Ambiance was great, social distancing respected and overall experience made better by our server Dan who double checked if we were ok! Excellent customer service..will be back again!

title: This really is the best curry
comment: This really is the best curry not just in Twickenham but everywhere. It’s fresh, authentic and sophisticated. It’s almost sad as you approach being full up because you know you’ll have to stop eating! Also the most lovely people. Can’t wait to visit when these ‘unprecedented times’ are over! Thank you

title: Great deliveries - can't wait for it to re-open
comment: We've continued to have deliveries from Little Mumbai since it opened for deliveries \ take-aways only. It can never be as good and fresh as eating in but the meals are still great and tasty. The veg platter starters are simply the best!

title: MISSING YOUR FAVOURITE CURRY
comment: Well no more. LM is open for take outs and delivery. There is now a simple ordering/payment system on line. Food arrived on time, excellent, so if you need your curry fix you don't have to wait any longer.

title: Best Indian near me
comment: We generally get a take away from here and always love the food. The staff are all so nice and the food tastes so fresh and is delicious.

title: Best curry inTwickenham
comment: Love this place!!! We eat here often and are never disappointed - and are lucky enough to be living just down the road! As well as seriously good food - each dish is unique rather than relying on base sauces plus the owner/front of house is so welcoming and attentive. A cut above the rest!

title: Fantastic food and service
comment: I've been looking for an Indian restaurant near me for a couple of years, tried a few but never went back to any of them.. little Mumbai was amazing. The food was delicious and the service first class. I will definitely be returning to this little gem in the heart of Twickenham. Thank you for making my evening special.

title: Safe and tasty!
comment: Safe environment in these strange times, staff wear visors and the tables are distanced. We went there to Eat out Help Out in August as our son was visiting us and fancied a curry. Needless to say, the service was excellent as was the food. Three of us are vegan and there’s ample choice, the portions are very generous too. Delicious!

title: Excellent fresh and tasty food.
comment: I recently used Little Mumbai in Twickenham and the food was really tasty and fresh. Everything is prepared with a lot of care and attention. All my neighbours recommend this restaurant. All the staff are very polite and professional and wear face masks. I recommend this place very highly.

title: Best Indian I’ve ever had!
comment: Best Indian I’ve ever had! No grease in the curry, nice mixture of crispy where it should be and tender where it should be. Doesn’t lose its charm as a takeaway either. Good allergy advice on the menu.

title: OPEN FOR DINING
comment: Pleased to report that Little Mumbai is open for dining in ......food delicious, service excellent, tables spaced apart, sanitising etc all up to code .......

title: Great evening !
comment: Booked for Sunday dinner. Restaurant quiet, thanks to Covid, which suited us fine!! Curries were delicious, and vegetable dishes very fresh. Service excellent and all in all it was a great evening out and can really recommend!!

title: Awful service all round...
comment: I came here with my friends for my birthday thinking that this would be a great night, considering the amazing reviews this restaurant has been giving - it was not at all, and was incredibly disappointed.

title: Fabulous meal
comment: Moksha’s menu is based on dishes that you would actually be served in India as opposed to the Westernised versions that you normally get in English curry houses. Freshly cooked, very spice oriented rather than just chilli heat. Very enjoyable, the nest in New Malden/Kingston for sure. The Chicken Chettinadu was excellent.

title: amazing
comment: Been to Moksha recently very attentive staff specially Ankit was a great help in explaining the dishes and making our evening memorable one as it was special occasion would highly recommend the restaurant.

title: Excellent food and Service
comment: Excellent food and Service. Food was delicious. Best Indian food I ever had.Chicken xacuti was very good.

title: Stone baked pizza cooked to order
comment: Visited with friends for celebration, good quality but quite limited choice, all pizzas are 12" unless you order a child's portion which is a mahgerita. Side salads quite expensive at a fiver a head.

title: A fireball of a restaurant!
comment: A great Pizza Restaurant with a wood fired oven and quirky decorations The Pizzas are delicious and the ingredients are fresh and tasty. I especially like the meatball Pizzas .Staff are attentive and friendly and the place is value for money!

title: Worst takeaway pizza in a while
comment: Ordered two pizzas got home one "The Spaniard" had three bits of chorizo on the whole pizza the "Meatfest" had 7 bits of meat across the whole pizza, absolutely shocking will not be returning I suggest you change this otherwise you will lose more customers

title: Awlful!!! No toppings, Pizza
comment: Awlful!!! No toppings, Pizza was raw, literally just tomatoe sauce on a base. Do not bother getting a takeaway pizza from here as you will be disappointed!!!

title: Good but a little disappointing
comment: Went for the meal on New Year’s Eve. We arrived at 6:00 and they accommodated us but told us that they needed the table by 7:30 which was fine. We wanted to order the veg sharing platter, two sides and naans. However we were disappointed to be told that we must order a main dish. Nowhere on the menu it is stated that this is the case. So we went for a single starter a main, side dish and naans. From a monetary point of view they lost out. Even though tha sag is highlighted as mild, and we specified mild, the sag was very hot. When we finished our meal at 7:05, our bill was delivered to the table without being offered desert or tea or coffee.

title: Let Down on New Year's Eve
comment: 5 friends of mine and I went to this restaurant on New Year's Eve. One of my friends had booked and reconfirmed that morning. When we got there at 8.15 pm there was no table for us and although my friend knew the name of the man who had taken the booking, he would not come out of the kitchen to talk to her. Rubbish service. Disgraceful. We would never go back.

title: One of the best Indian restaurants in London. Probably the best value.
comment: I am writing from the perspective of an Indian living in London and Mumbai.

title: Valentines evening 2020
comment: We hadn't booked in advance, wrong move by my husband, so we went to a local pub and the restaurant called us when a table became free,excellent customer service before we had even gone into the restaurant. it had been highly recommended to my husband by friends now I would like to recommend it but try and book first.The food, my Prosecco and friendly and helpful service means I have no hesutation recommending this restaurant.I had the best butter chicken ever. The staff were so friendly and all our food arrived in good time.Give it a go you will not be disappointed.

title: Great night out
comment: Probably the best sushi and sashimi I have tasted outside of Japan coupled with an amazingly generous host

title: Now our regular favourite Indian restaurant - excellent food, service and ambience
comment: I'm not one for writing reviews, but this one deserves to be written.

title: Amazing food, amazing service, moderate prices - a must visit!
comment: This is a place I can visit often. I have done now, a few times since my initial visit.

title: While visiting home of rugby
comment: After a day visiting Twickenham ground,stopped off at the little Mumbai restaurant and was pleasantly surprised by the staff food at little Mumbai as my kids can be really fussy and difficult, they seem to have enjoyed lamb chops and Chillie chicken on .

title: Excellent
comment: Booked this for a meal with friends after visiting Twickenham Stadium and from the outset a member of staff Satya was very helpful. We got to the restaurant slightly early and our table wasn’t ready. A member of staff directed us to a nearby pub and Satya phoned me when our table was ready.The meal was excellent and reasonably priced.The whole experience was really good and I can’t recommend this restaurant enough. I will definitely be back when I’m in the area again

title: Great Food and Friendly Staff
comment: Went here with my wife for an evening meal and the first thing that struck me was how nice the staff were;they actually looked like they enjoyed working there.The ambiencne was just perfect.

title: Great food.
comment: My friends and I had dinner here last night( 3-3-2020) and the food was really good.

title: Best pizza
comment: Love this place, great pizza, friendly staff and fairly priced. I like the fact the menu isn't massive but there is something for everyone. They stick to what they know and do it very well.

title: Great pizza!
comment: Not only the pizza is really nice but also the atmosphere in the restaurant is lovely and the staff couldn’t be anymore helpful!

title: Another Great Evening! Excellent
comment: Another Great Evening! Excellent food, warm and friendly service and all out for Halloween decorations. The kids love it here!

title: Best pizza restaurant in Bromley
comment: I took my daughter for an enjoyable meal during 'eat out to help out'

title: Halloween Night
comment: Another brilliant Halloween Night great food great service and awesome halloween decorations thank you as always Xx

title: Best food Indian food in Romford
comment: Food was amazing

title: BEST Indian restaurant
comment: The food is great! 10/10,the service is very good and solly greets you on the way in and makes sure you have everything you need.

title: Lovely meal
comment: Lovely meal friendly service great food also does a takeaway service he’s also open during lockdown he’s food is amazing

title: Outstanding Indian restaurant
comment: Outstanding Indian restaurant , total spur of the moment google and order , i have found a total gem of a Indian restaurant in Bekash . Lets start with the food i ordered , i had the chicken Jalfrezi and the lamb chops , both were cooked perfectly, the chicken jalfrezi had the right amount of spice and heat , while the lamb chops were cooked perfectly, succulent and melted in my mouth . Light years ahead of any Indian restaurant in the area . Solly the amazingly friendly man who took my order and gave me my food is a credit to the restaurant.

title: takeaway
comment: really good food, staff are helpful and very friendly, good service and always gives you enough food just to fill you up!

title: Great food and friendly service
comment: Bekash is a great restraurant for amazing food and Solly always gives service with a smile. I would highly recommend.

title: Would not recommend
comment: Ordered chicken tikka damask, was really disappointed I could smell oxo as soon as opened it . Nothing like my normal take away .

title: great quality italian
comment: had an excellent 3 course meal for 4 people.all the dishes were well cooked and tasty. The service is friendly but not over the top just leave you alone.

title: Home delivery works brilliantly
comment: Great food as ever but delivered to the door, what's not to like. Well done Salvo and co. Please support this fantastic restaurant through the hard months ahead

title: Fabulous!!!!
comment: Wonderful fresh delicious food and fantastic service!!!

title: Had a take away tonight from
comment: Had a take away tonight from La Palma first class quality and service well done Salvo and team. Linguini and Milanese perfect.

title: Delicious Pizza
comment: I found this place online as we were in the local area and wanted to grab something to eat. With it being lockdown, needed something easy to takeaway and eat in the park nearby as we were going for a walk.

title: Amazing Restaurant food at home
comment: During lockdown they have been my saviour. the nights I’ve wanted a nice meal out rather than a take away It was so nice to have restaurant standard food delivered. The mushroom pasta is amazing and the tiramisu is the best I’ve ever had!

title: Always great
comment: Salvo and the team are always great and the food is fantastic. We are so happy to see its open again and my kids are happy to. If you order meat, pasta or fish its all good.

title: Amazing Italian food, lovely
comment: Amazing Italian food, lovely atmosphere, great customer service! Great dinner venue! We will be back!

title: Amazing
comment: Best Neapolitan food i’ve had here, it came so fast and was so delicious and authentic.Staff were so kind and provided excellent services. Would come back here a 100x

title: Amazing!!
comment: Just back from An amazing night... Great staff, great food.. Without doubt my new favourite restaurant.. Can't wait to go back..

title: Excellent food and service not setup for COVID
comment: Excellent food and service .we have eaten at this restaurant a number of times and have always enjoyed the food .However we did feel uncomfortable on this visit as not set up for COVID . tables too close together and staff only wearing visors and not masks .I have given 5 stars only for food they need to follow gov guidelines

title: Birthday Meal
comment: We went last night for a birthday meal and have to say we thoroughly enjoyed it. Both our pizza and pasta were delicious and arrived very quickly! Very tasty, will be back!

title: Good night.
comment: Delicious food, great atmosphere and good service. I would definitely recommend the ravioli. Absolutely value for money.

title: Great lunch, great service
comment: I really like, where possible, to go to restaurants which aren't part of big chains! Both the food and service are always good at Melisi, and I like that you can ask them to tweak a dish and they are able to do that. At this time, it is really important to support our local businesses and I would urge you, if you haven't been here before, to give it a go!!

title: AMAZING
comment: - Great People

title: Amazing pasta!
comment: Been twice now and has been lovely both times, the truffle pasta is delicious and the pizzas are so fresh! Highly recommend!

title: Excellent pizza
comment: Very good quality of pizza and cannoli, hard to find outside central London. Friendly staff, reasonable prices.

title: Still serving delicious, authentic, Neapolitan-style pizzas.
comment: I first reviewed Melisi in the summer of 2017 – before the “plague”. After that first visit, we returned twice and things were equally good both times. Further visits did not materialise, simply because we have to reach Melisi using public transport and we had two relatively decent Italian “chain” restaurants less than five minute’s walk away from our house. The crisis in what is sometimes called “the casual dining sector”, allied to Covid, put paid to those two establishments – they have now closed. The remaining local “pizza” establishments are simply awful - so we hopped on the tube and returned Melisi.

title: Takeaway Fresh Pasta
comment: Eaten in the restaurant a long time ago and ordered takeaway a couple times and quality of the pasta never disappoints!

title: A hidden gem...
comment: Booked for a family meal for 8. Service was wonderful and staff couldn’t do enough for our group. A wonderful selection of traditional pasta dishes and daily specials, with recommended wines to accompany the dishes. Although we were the first there, the restaurant filled quickly and there was a lovely atmosphere - there were obviously a lot of regulars who the staff knew which added to the occasion. After our visit we’re planning to become regulars ourselves.

title: Nothing to write home about,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
comment: We dined here on recommendation but frankly were disappointed as we failed to find the 'wow' factor. Nothing particularly stood out and whilst nothing wrong with the food, service or deco it was just average. Quite a small restaurant that was quite noisy and normal conversation not always possible. Drinks expensive.

title: Splendido!!!
comment: Compelled to share my recent experience of this true gem of an Italian restaurant. My wife who was working on a recent production at Pinewood studios told me how wonderful and authentic this family run restaurant was. Having read some recent reviews i was slightly sceptical, however, we ate there last week and must say that any concerns were dispelled and that it was a delight. The service was warm, efficient and the food was outstanding with a clear initiative to use on the finest fresh ingredients. Will be sure to visit again soon! Thanks for a wonderful experience.

title: Really tasty food
comment: About 15 of us went for a big family meal - and we were very well looked after. Having not been to this place since it was the Palm Suite (which I very much liked) I am glad to report it's not another tasty place to eat.

title: Perfect evening
comment: Three of us, for the first time, ate here at this restaurant, very pleasant evening, staff are very attentive, super food, which we really appreciated, nicely presented. Will definitely visit again.

title: Saturday Delight
comment: Back in Slough, as our Daughter started her course at Iver, we found this little gem of a restaurant on an earlier Sojourn.

title: Just excellent
comment: We used to really like this restaurant when it was Palm Suite and it has been some time since we visited.

title: Meal for 2 ladies doing lunch
comment: Meal for 2 ladies doing lunch

title: Authentic Italian restaurant that is a hidden treasure!
comment: We were out on a long hike and, finding ourselves in Iver Heath at lunchtime, used Trip Advisor to find the best place to eat. By coincidence we were only 100 m away at the time, although we could have easily missed it as it is a little off the beaten track.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: Great restaurant. Food really good and not overpriced. Really extensive menu with something for everyone. Staffreally friendly and helpful. Good selection of wines. Would thoroughly recommend.

title: Very friendly staff and great
comment: Very friendly staff and great food! For someone that does not live in the area I would 100% travel to eat here again!

title: Very nice curry
comment: The place was offering a limited menu due to Covid but the food was amazing. We had a tandoori mixed grill plus free naan. Amazing

title: Take away
comment: Once agin got to review this restaurant hats off to them called them for a take away and requested that I will pay over the phone and asked is they could bring food to the car... for obvious reasons

title: The best Indian restaurant I've ever been to
comment: I've been coming to this restaurant for over 20 years since they were just a small restaurant. They have expanded with popularity and I've never tasted better Indian food (I have been to a lot of Indian restaurants). Sometimes they are really busy which can effect service, but the food is always consistently excellent. The prices are not the cheapest, but the portions are quite big and it's worth paying the little bit extra for the quality of the food.

title: Exceptional Indian Delights
comment: We had a last moment trip and found the Sipson Tandoori to be very helpful with rescheduling. If only all restaurants were as efficient. We had a lovely meal and would recommend the Lamb Bhoona to all. Compliments to Jay, Simon and Mohan for the exceptional experience.

title: Our favourite curry take away.
comment: Our favourite curry take away. The delivery driver (older gentleman about 5’2 tall) always is polite and a joy to see. The food is always top notch

title: Very good food, let down by poor service
comment: Very good food but poor service. My meal was great but had to keep trying to get the waiters attention for drinks and finally waited about 45 minutes for the bill so ended up walking upto the bar to try and pay. I would go for Achari up the road instead as I found the food better and the service a lot better.

title: Evening meal with colleagues
comment: Evening meal with colleagues I had not seen for the past 6 months. Felt very safe and staff were attentive and wore face masks. Food OK and everyone enjoyed the choices. The portions are large so ensure you are hungry. If I was in the area again I would certainly pop in again.

title: Leaving another 5* review
comment: Leaving another 5* review post covid, staff as friendly and welcoming as ever our favourite restaurant in Sidcup and beyond for outstanding homely personable genuine service can’t Thank you enough and proud to support this local business would recommend again and again!

title: Amazing Hazary Lamb
comment: Went here for 1st time a couple of days ago, I was impressed by the staff and very happy with our waiter who recommended the Hazary Lamb which was absolutely delicious, service was friendly, couldn't fault it and will definitely be going back soon.

title: Bland, dry and burnt.
comment: Delivery was short of items ordered. The restaurant was called and the rest was delivered half an hour later. The food looked like it was thrown in the bag. It was leaking out everywhere. One of the main dishes smelt odd and was partially burnt which tainted the rest of the dish with the smell and taste. The meat was so dry as well. Almost like lunchtime food reheated for the evening. The other dish was bland as well. Ruined a takeaway evening in.

title: Excellent
comment: I decided to look at tripadvisor around that area and decided on Simpson curry house short notice . Absolutely fantastic and so attentive top place 10/10 if you wanna go fri/ sat make sure you book. Good job guys. I’ll be back

title: FOOD DELIVERY
comment: By far the best curry I have ever tasted! I ordered a delivery and the food came on time and piping hot, outstanding customer service they will go above and beyond to cater for your needs, very professional at all times. I will be back for sure thank you!

title: Ok but no more
comment: I ate here twice in the same week. I like good indian food but this was only ok, maybe I have been spoiled living in Birmingham.

title: Overrated terrible and expensive
comment: This is overrated restaurant. Maybe ok for people who do not Indian food regularly.

title: Great service
comment: Delicious food,

title: Delicious food
comment: I would recommend this restaurant to anyone especially if you are staying at Heathrow because their is no other Indian restaurants that are good as Sipson Tandoori

title: Best Indian restaurant
comment: This is a restaurant with quality all round .service is exceptional. Food tasted like proper indian food.

title: Fantastic food and service
comment: Such a fantastic meal, excellent service and a lovely place to eat, portions are massive compared to normal Indian's, wish I lived 230 miles closer as it would be a regular.

title: Nice
comment: Must visit this restaurant you get amazing Indian food over here I give a big Thumbs up to this restaurant must visit once

title: Great local restaurant
comment: Came for dinner and had a lovely time.

title: Excellent food experience, staff really accommodating and friendly
comment: I can highly recommend that you try this restaurant if you are in the area. The food is tasty and flavorful. Good quality food! Also the service makes you want to come back as they are super friendly.

title: Fantastic takeaway meal and service
comment: Had booked to be in restaurant for our annual Beaujolais Nouveau day but decided Covid won't stop play so ordered 7 meals for Takeaway and given chosen time to pick up, 1pm and all was ready as stated. All meals different and delivered to 7 households for a 'zoom' lunch and the New Beaujolais Nouveau tasting.

title: Lovely local bistro
comment: Enjoyed a lovely meal on a lockdown Wednesday. Wonderful service by Kevan the host, who was attentive and recommended some great dishes. The cod saffron flaked beautifully and the tarte au citron was perfect. Fresh rabbit was beautifully cooked. It is byo and this suited us well. Wish we had discovered this gem of a restaurant sooner. They also do take-away, which also interests us for future. Definitely worth a visit or two.

title: Our go to choice.
comment: This is our restaurant of choice for all special occasions. The range of food choices is great and the portions very generous. Their continued choice of not having a drinks allowance has the obvious advantages of allow you to bring good quality options at “ off sales” prices. The staff have always been welcoming and friendly and the atmosphere even with Covid 19 restrictions is always informal and relaxing.

title: Lockdown takeaway
comment: Beef stroganoff and Bass both with selection of vegetables and potatoes.

title: Just had a Sunday roast beef
comment: Just had a Sunday roast beef dinner from pascals for 4 people, because of the COVID-19 virus we got it as a takeaway, it came in a big tray all laid out with all the trimmings, my wife is a good cook & we always buy our beef from Waitrose because in our opinion we think it’s probably the best you can buy locally but I have to tell you that the beef we had from Pascals was something else everything was excellent including the lovely gravy, we will definitely be back for more in the near future, Thanks Pascal.

title: Delicious Food
comment: Love the food and the service. The staff are very friendly and the food is scrumptious.

title: Takeaway during lockdown
comment: We just had an amazing meal absolutely delicious thoroughly recommended and so reasonable well worth trying

title: Friendly staff but cakes were very average!
comment: We had 4 cakes (two vegan, two regular) and tea. We went in because of good reviews (and the promise of vegan cakes) but we were disappointed. Place was not very cozy. Staff was very friendly though.

title: Lovely breakfast and cake for my girlfriend's 40th!
comment: Limes of Windsor was our first stop on our day out in Windsor for my girlfriend's 40th birthday celebrations in late November. I had pre-ordered a small birthday cake and booked a table in advance. Although I have never met Lynn (owner) I made arrangements via LOW's Facebook page and Lynn was extremely helpful. She made a delicious cake for my girlfriend which was presented after we had breakfast, and was very understanding and accommodating keeping our table available when I contacted her at short notice to say we'd be late as the M25 was a nightmare. I can understand why LOW has such good reviews. I will visit again next summer for a cuppa and another yummy sausage sandwich!

title: Perfect start to a day in Windsor!
comment: We came for the scones and we weren’t disappointed! The cafe is cozy and lovely, and the staff was very warm and attentive. The scones were delicious and clearly fresh-made (as well as being quite large.) The clotted cream was some of the best we’ve had. Highly recommended for a light breakfast before a day exploring the town.

title: Amazed
comment: Very impressed with the service from the staff team. They were welcoming and accommodating when meeting me and my other halfs needs during our visit.

title: Quick late lunch
comment: Lovely homemade food - steak pie, pasties, and beef sandwiches were all had for a late lunch last weekend. Nice place and friendly helpful staff with sensible prices.

title: Excellent food , all baked
comment: Excellent food , all baked fresh in this delightful hidden gem . Scones were served fresh from the oven we also requested several breakfast/lunch additions that deviated from the menu . The staff were more than happy to help . Nothing was to much trouble . Would highly recommend. One of our party ordered the steak an ale pie witch is baked an shaped to cleverly look like the castle found this place to be reasonably priced as similar in the area our more expensive . Sad to see the 1 star review an strongly disagree with everything that was said . Staff are super friendly an you can see them busy baking away . As the kitchen is open planned .

title: Great food and a warm welcome!
comment: We had pre-booked for lunch for our group of friends and enjoyed a range of great home-cooked food between us - toasted sandwiches, soup, wraps and quiche and salad - all beautifully presented and extremely tasty. Lynn had also made a lovely chocolate fudge cake for our friends' birthday celebrations - a perfect finish!

title: DO NOT EAT HERE
comment: This is not a restaurant but a cafe without cooking facilities. The 'homemade' soup was shop bought Carrot and Coriander (I've bought it myself!) . We got under half a bowl each and charged £6.50 each for the privilege. The 'homemade bread' was cheap presliced. A cheese and onion pasti, which they microwaved, was at least authentic but the salad from a mixed salad packet, some leaves too rotten to eat and cost £7.95. So unless you want to be ripped off don't go here.

title: Coffee near the Castle
comment: This is a friendly coffee shop with inviting looking cakes and delicious coffee and other drinks. We were cold because the door was open all the time. We were given rug for warmth. This was February in England. Very chilly.

title: Very friendly with good service!
comment: Popped in for quick refreshments on a weekend away. The staff working were very friendly and the cream teas and coffee were delicious! Would highly recommend with it’s location so close to the castle.

title: One of the best in Beckenham
comment: Friends living in Beckenham took us here for a Saturday night meal. One of their favourite restaurants and it didn’t disappoint. Friendly staff and a cosy layout. Not too big with around 10 tables.

title: Relaxed family dinner
comment: Delicious food, extensive menu and friendly staff, great with kids, cocktails, mocktails, wine, beer, juice - what’s not to enjoy? Be warned - the cake portions are very generous!

title: another excellent lunch
comment: good ambience, great food, lovely friendly polite staff, very good value for money, big portion sizes

title: Best restaurant in Beckenham.
comment: Best restaurant in Beckenham. We’re regulars here and love the food (quality and portion size) and amazingly friendly service. Great cocktail list as well. After trying most restaurants in Beckenham this will always be the one we come back to. Great value for money and a good veggie selection.

title: Piss poor service for delivery
comment: Never eaten in but placed an order for delivery don't do this the food took over an hour and half to arrive even though I live less than 5 minutes drive away. Portions were small for the price and the food was of course cold. If your going to try them I guess eat in those reviews are better. Guess they don't care about delivery orders.

title: Super little restaurant with great food and service
comment: Friendly service, brilliant menu, delicious food. What more could you ask for? Special mention - Mo - a friendly and efficient waiter!

title: Favourite restaurant in Beckenham
comment: Delicious! Great starters, lamb, chicken and salads- a takeaway treat in lockdown (in 15 mins).Thank you!

title: My favourite restaurant in Beckenham
comment: Lovely cosy restaurant, great friendly service. Meat was cooked perfectly and good quality and lovely wine too.

title: Amazing take out, with cocktail
comment: Amazing take out, with cocktail included! The food from Hizar is always exceptional, with a great choice for veggies. High quality takeaway during lockdown.

title: Meal out
comment: Lovely restaurant, the food and service is superb and also good value. Would thoroughly recommend this place.

title: Very good tea and snack little shop- all freshly prepared and family-run
comment: They certainly deserve their top ratings! An true english experience, having tea there! Thank you my ladies

title: Mrs
comment: Great little hidden treasure. Lovely atmosphere Fantastic lunch and a great cup of tea. Thankyou so much Lynn.

title: Gluten free
comment: This cafe has amazing gluten free scones with vegan butter instead of clotted cream (if you prefer) and the service was very friendly. Thumbs up for me

title: Lovely food, great staff, recommended!
comment: Stopped at Limes for a midweek lunch after the pub next door was too busy for us to relax in. Glad it was as we'd have never gone in to Limes! My wife has to eat gluten-free and was very pleased to be offered a g/f wrap (usually just a choice of jacket potato or salad) by the busy yet cheerfully helpful ladies in the cafe. I had the same chicken wrap in a regular tortilla and both were excellent. Our coffees were prepared to our liking too - not too hot - so 10/10 to Limes for their efforts in making our lunchtime experience a good one. The pub's loss was definitely our gain! Recommended.

title: Excellent all round cafe - a delight for all to enjoy
comment: Excellent service. Nothing is too much trouble for the kind, warm and welcoming staff -the service delivery is always the same.

title: Little Shop of Delight
comment: We were visiting Windsor Castle and upon the recommendation of a few gift shop employees, we venture to Limes. What an adorable restaurant. The staff were approachable and very friendly. The homemade food, yes homemade, was absolutely delicious. I would recommend this to everyone who seeks a quiet, quaint, and friendly place to eat.

title: Wonderful staff, delicious food.
comment: The staff were absolutely lovely! The ladies were wonderful with my 8 yo and served us promptly but never made us feel rushed.

title: Best /only quiche in town!
comment: Thank you ladies for the lovely homemade quiche & excellent tea this afternoon.

title: Hidden Gem
comment: I was treated to Afternoon Tea here for my birthday and it did not dissapoint. My friend booked due to the reviews she had read on here and she was right to do so. I have been to a number of afternoon teas in my time from farm shops to well known London hotels and this tea shop was one of the best up there. Freshly made food was devine and the scones were MASSIVE. We had to box up the left overs that we couldnt finish. The sandwiches were made fresh in front of us and we did ask for alternative fillings and neither of us liked coronoation chicken with no problems whatsoever. 5 stars from me and I would encourage anyone to pop in, even just for a slice of cake and cup of tea. You will not be dissapointed!

title: Deserving of its five-star reviews
comment: Stopped in for a late lunch based on TripAdvisor reviews. So glad we did. Excellent quiche, strong non-bitter tea, excellent scones with clotted cream. Delightful staff. perfect.

title: A very pleasant evening
comment: This was a return visit after a long time. The restaurant is still as good as before and well organised under present Covid difficulties. They provided an interesting and appetising menu, the service faultless in a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere. Highly recommended, we have been here many times, never had a complaint and we look forward to returning.

title: EVENING OUT
comment: Last minute decision to go out and eat, so glad we did. This was our third visit and we will go back again. I had the rib eye steak and my wife had the calves live and both dishes were cooked to perfection. Excellent service . Would definitely recommend . It will lift your mood

title: Fabulous welcome and Covid safe.
comment: Fabulous welcome and Covid safe. From the moment we arrived we were generously looked after, and made to feel special. Staff were attentive without being obtrusive. However, it’s all about the food. Very reasonably priced for an exquisite meal and excellent wine selection. We will definitely be back after lockdown, and popping in for takeaways in the meantime.

title: Great night out, excellent food, good service
comment: Very friendly staff. All the food was delicious but the starters especially the salmon ravioli were superb. The wine was good and reasonably priced. Covid measures were good.

title: Birthday Lunch for two to celebrate my mother's birthday
comment: I meant to write this review two weeks ago. I took my mother there to celebrate her 91st Birthday. The experience was delightful. Di Paolo has always been one of our favourite local restaurants but on this occasion they surpassed themselves. So friendly, such a warm welcome, Covid safe and delicious lunch. We both had the special of the day - Wild Seabass taken off the bone - it was perfect. We ordered ourselves a side order of Zucchini - yummy - so light and crispy! We could not resist an Affogato to finish with, made all the more delicious for the dash of Amaretto that was added.

title: Perfect fod and service
comment: Pleasant room, nicely decorated.

title: Superb food and wine.
comment: Food is beautifully presented with a superb selection of wine. I have been there three times over the last few months, and being Italian, can honest say it is excellent. Service is spot on. Attentive but not obtrusive.

title: A wonderful evening
comment: What was clearly going to be a very busy evening, before closing to go into tier 3 measures, the team at Di Paolo were still very attentive and nothing was too much trouble. The food was beautiful and there was plenty of it. We are looking forward to going back next year.

title: Covid Hysterics R Us
comment: Sadly this restaurant has devolved into Covid hysterics. Asking customers to use hand sanitizer on entrance, destroying your microbiome. Insisting on mask wearing even to take two steps to your seat. Waitress was blaming the fact the government is shutting them down on their customers' not taking mask wearing seriously enough, and not the govt itself.

title: Happy New Year
comment: We had dinner for the new year. It was fantastic.

title: Charming Litle Lebanese Oasis!
comment: Another delicious meal in this elegant authentically styled pretty little restaurant. It's a favourite for lunch between shopping but this was a first for romantic post-cinema light supper and just delightful!

title: Average overpriced Lebanese cuisine
comment: We visited this restaurant with family. Portion size small, food taste average, only good part was the rice dessert. Service average. Ordered 3 starters, fish platter, 2 desserts, 2 juice and 2 wine.

title: Fabulous
comment: A perfect meal of beautifully cooked food served by the most attentive young man who honestly was a delight. He made our evening and I made sure to tell his manager.

title: Worthwhile a visit
comment: Delicious food, very friendly and professional staff and beautifully decorated restaurant with the staff uniform to match. Highly recommended!

title: WONDERFUL EXPERIENCE
comment: Visited the resturant for the first time and was blown away be the experience!

title: Fantastic
comment: Excellent food. Really nice atmosphere and friendly staff. The felafel was out of this world delicious

title: Eating out
comment: Good atmosphere nice food friendly stuff and price reasonable.

title: Excellent Restaurant
comment: I’m a regular and love this restaurant. Excellent service, delicious food and would recommend you visit the restaurant.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: One of the best restaurants in Kingston. The mixed grill and chicken curry were so delicious and the dolma was also brilliant. Very friendly staff and great service. Will be going back there soon.

title: Great ambiance
comment: The food was very good, the waiting staff were friendly, attentive and efficient and the old fashioned wooden panelling helped to create a lovely ambience.

title: delicious food and amazing dessert trolley
comment: The food is delicious, great ambience and the dessert trolley makes it very hard not to have at least one dessert!!

title: Traditional Italian
comment: We love this restaurant. Great food, service and atmosphere. It never disappoints. Traditional, quality restaurant, hard to find these days

title: Fantastic as usual
comment: We were SO pleased to finally return to Da Remo. They've really hit the ground running with safety and we felt very at ease. Food was amazing as always.

title: Lovely Traditional Italian Restaurant
comment: I haven't been to Da Remo's for years, and can't actually remember why! This is a hidden gem in Denham Village.

title: Excellent restaurant
comment: This is an excellent place to eat. From the off it was obvious the kitchen and staff know what they are doing. Great food and good atmosphere. Covid secure.

title: Delightful Italian restaurant
comment: This is a well established and attractive restaurant which has not been subjected to the demands of fashion. Good menu and wine list. Service excellent. Very much recommended.

title: Quaint restaurant
comment: Old style Italian restaurant that offers excellent quality food at a very reasonably price, dessert trolley is a nice touch

title: Lovely, just lovely.
comment: We've been dropping in to Da Remo for a spontaneous dinner for years.

title: Amazing thai food!
comment: We both randomly fancied thai, so counting on trip advisor for reviews picked dan thai, will definitely be adding this restaurant to our repertoire, tried booking a table for after730pm on a Saturday but was fully booked all night(good sign) so we sat a table at 630,really amazing food (really hot also) good service too, and didnt mind' touch of frost theme music in background either! Lol

title: Just perfect
comment: Had a superb family birthday celebration dinner, the beef in peppercorn so tender, possibly best I’ve had, lovely prawn starter, we’ll be back soon.

title: Excellent food
comment: Excellent food polite and helpful and attentive staff. The food was great and nothing was too much trouble. It’s such a shame the restaurant isn’t a little larger as it was busy and cramped. Although we were not rushed.

title: Superb welcome!
comment: Food was well cooked but the quantity was a little small. Had to order extra rice.

title: What a find.
comment: What a find. Lovely mixed starter. Beautifully cooked and nicely served. Main course also excellent. Will be using this often from now.

title: Annual visit
comment: Always make a point of eating here on our annual visit to the local church pantomime,it never fails to satisfy ,always a warm welcome, excellent Thai food with impeccable and gracious service.Strongly reccommend booking as it is a small restuarant and very poular.Rd

title: Excellent
comment: We had a very taste takeaway on Saturday, it was easy to order the food via email and book a collection time. The food was tasty and As normal delious

title: Delicious food and fabulous service!
comment: We went to Dan Thai for a Friday evening meal with friends. Tasty food and relaxed atmosphere. Would definitely eat here again and the service was very attentive! Great Thai food!

title: Fabulous food!! I went here
comment: Fabulous food!! I went here with my sister and fiancé for some dinner. We enjoyed the food so much, we want to come back here with our friends!

title: Beautiful food and great service
comment: The food was delicious, all extremely fresh and hot. The duck stir fry particularly was lovely with very tender meat. The service was brilliant- would definitely recommend this restaurant.

title: Excellent as always
comment: We visited today with our cousins and their other halves - 6 of us in total - and we all had different food and we were all absolutely delighted with the food service and ambience.ABSOLUTELY FIRST RATE.

title: This is now my favourite restaurant!
comment: Was invited to this lovely restaurant by a friend for his birthday. There were 8 of us on a comfortably busy Friday evening.

title: Lovely lunch
comment: My Sister invited us here for a lunch to help celebrate her Anniversary.

title: Wonderful Italian Cuisine
comment: Visited this restaurant on a recommend and was so pleased we did. A lunch time meal for three was just superb, service excellent and welcome first class. We loved the old fashioned dessert trolley which is something you rarely see these days. The whole experience was a memorable lunch time which we will most definitely repeat in the future.

title: Lovely Traditional Italian Restaurant
comment: The atmosphere in the restaurant is apparent as soon as you walk in and are greeted by a smartly dressed, smiling person.

title: Good old fashioned, excellent restaurant
comment: This is our go-to restaurant for any special occasion. Excellent service without being over-the-top. Never had a bad meal there. Cracking calves liver. Beautiful starters- especially melon and Parma ham, or in fact, any of them. Very reasonable for the lovely atmosphere and quality of food and service. Highly recommended.

title: A lovely restaurant with good food
comment: A lovely restaurant with warm and classy decor and ambience. The service is fantastic with friendly and helpful waiters. The food is excellent with a good balance of different dishes. Have been there a few times now and it has been a pleasant experience every time.

title: Polly
comment: Excellent food and nothing too much trouble for the very attentive staff. Lovely modern room with plenty of space. Friendly atmosphere. Have been a few time’s now.

title: A difficult visit
comment: On our second visit to Da Remo, we were pleased with the food and choices but wish we had been warned they were having a large party for lunch. All speech was drowned out by the party, my husband had to remove his hearing aids and our elderly guest couldn't make herself heard. If we go back we will ask if they have any large groups booked for lunch. The restuarant was fully booked.

title: Always good
comment: All the staff are friendly and welcoming. The menu does not change but specials give alternatives to the excellent food on offer. Good choice of wines and the desert trolley is always tempting

title: Absolute local favorite
comment: We came in for a random date night and because of it, it’s now our favorite local restaurant. From the moment you walk in, you’re greeted warmly and with a smile. All tables were properly spaced and sanitizing stations were all up to code (per Covid regulations). The staff were knowledgeable, helpful, and of course, the food was top notch.

title: Personal touch and great Thai!
comment: I love this place! The service here is impeccable and the staff treat their customers like family members. The food is outstanding without exception, every visit I’ve never been dissatisfied. Thank you Dan Thai

title: Great to Eat In
comment: Had been introduced to this restaurant by a friend and it is now one of my regulars! As someone who has been to Thailand I can confirm that they serve authentic Thai cuisine and it’s really tasty, even if it is slightly expensive! They do a good lunch service where you can order a starter and main for a set price if you eat in (it’s quite cheap - I think around £12).

title: Good time as usual
comment: I have reviewed this place previously and the very good standard has not changed. The food is typical Thai fare, tasty and enjoyable. I will no doubt be returning there soon.

title: The real deal Thai
comment: The perfect place! A small and quaint family business. Such warm hearted people and, goes without saying, delicious food!!

title: A very pleasant return visit
comment: I’ve visited Dan Thai a few times but really wanted to give another review as the last visit was extra special! Service is always very friendly and the dishes are consistently tasty. Thanks Dan Thai, we’ll be back very soon!

title: six stars!
comment: What a delightful evening. Food was absolutely delicious and the service was fantastic. Found this place by chance and was delighted. Would highly recommend to anyone in the area or passing by. Prayad who served us is absolutely lovely and made it a lovely evening. Thank you very much.

title: Great food and service
comment: Lovely people offering quality Thai food in a convenient location in Purley, certainly recommend it.

title: Authentic, fresh food
comment: Great tasting authentic Thai dishes. We ordered Pad Thai, Red Curry, Massaman Curry and a couple of salads. All were freshly prepared and delicious. A small friendly local restaurant. Would highly recommend.

title: Takeaway
comment: I can’t comment on the service as I had a takeaway, but the staff seemed very friendly.

title: A taste of Thailand in Purley
comment: This review is for a Saturday night for a party of 3, we pre-booked our table.

title: Lovely bar with vegan food, dog friendly too.
comment: This place is lovely. Ambience is smart casual, service is effective and the choice of drinks is great. Food is mostly vegan/vegetarian, yet very tasty. Don't bother with the 1* reviews, these are mostly mothers who expect to sit and socialise in this place for hours yet spend nearly nothing, but somehow think it's their right.

title: Favourite Hangout
comment: The food is so tasty. From Brunch-Dinner everything is great! The drinks are so good! I love their homemade raspberry lemonade, so fresh. Their cocktails and coffees are probably the best I've had! This place does a good job of being a cafe, restaurant and bar! The environment is friendly and you always feel welcome. I love coming here!

title: Amazing!
comment: Such a lovely atmosphere, great selection of vegan dishes and attentive staff. The hotdog was delicious. We were served by a friendly South African girl, great job! We will definitely be back!

title: Great food and good customer service
comment: We visited this restaurant on an off chance thought. Turned out to be a great decision for the family (self, wife and teenage son). The choices for vegetarians were amazing, innovative and delicious. We had recommendations for the next visit, as well. So, would definitely go again. The portion sizes were quite substantial. Came away very happy and satisfied.

title: I visit Wags N Tales a lot
comment: I visit Wags N Tales a lot and generally love it, but since the covid restrictions have come into place it has gone rapidly downhill. The staff have absolutely no idea what they’re doing and are rude when you ask for help, and the food and drink takes forever to arrive and when they do they’re cold.

title: Perfect
comment: Honestly I can't think of any negatives to this place. The food is sublime, the service is 100%, the environment is protect and no animals were harmed. Just great. Be it a vegetarian, vegan or meat eater this is a place you must visit but remember to bring your fury friend if you have one :)

title: The food was amazing!
comment: The food was amazing! Definitely recommend the aloo tikki and mixed kulcha! The lime soda was really good too 10/10

title: Worst Experience Ever
comment: Visited the South Road branch today in Southall. Firstly the place was empty. The Waitress did not greet us with a hello or Welcome. She was busy listening to music which drowned the place out that I had to ask her to turn it down so my family could even have a conversation. Clearly there was 3 of us when she dropped 2 menus on the table still no greetings. I had to walk to the bar to pick up a menu for myself. She then took our order for Starters and Mains which on the menu states Starters. She then brings all the food out together which I then asked her why have you brought the main course out with the starters. At this point 3 other people walked out due to rudeness without even ordering. She then shouted if you don't like it leave which we did without even eating a thing. Worst experience ever my 17 daughter was horrified by her behaviour and attitude.Never going back.

title: Great food & service
comment: Came here for family lunch, really enjoyed the food and great attentive service. Definitely worth a visit if in southall.

title: Kulcha express -Hayes Uxbridge
comment: Kulcha express -Hayes Uxbridge Road

title: Really impressed by food and service
comment: Having visited first time with family I was really impressed by the authentic food and friendly staff.

title: Had an amazing Sunday lunch
comment: Had an amazing Sunday lunch with my wife. Sensational food - delicious and very well presented. The service was relaxed but attentive and all staff were very friendly. Will definitely go back.

title: Perfect for a special night out
comment: I’ve been here a couple of times now (pre and post lockdown) and it by far my favourite place for a special meal, be that anniversary, celebratory or just at a great evening with friends...

title: 7 star service, 7 star food
comment: Visited with family for Sunday lunch. What a wonderful restaurant this is. Beautiful ambience, outstanding service, amazing food and wine. Also good value for money. A small comprehensive menu of top-quality choices. Food presentation is stunning, and the food matches up to its looks. Support local businesses like this and treat yourself at the same time. I cannot over recommend.

title: 33rd Wedding Anniversary Dinner
comment: Helpful attentive service made to feel very special. Menus written with our names and the occasion at the top. As always the food was superb, the wine delightful.

title: Fab post-lockdown meal
comment: Such a treat to return to No97 post-lockdown. I definitely noticed the richness of the food - but it's not intended to be everyday fodder. The savoury cheesecake main course was incredible (I never wanted it to stop!). Only gripe would be right now salt & pepper needs to be in sachets, as I'd rather not touch the mills.

title: Patient staff and fresh food.
comment: Lovely staff and the food was really fresh and super delicious! I had the Haddock & chips... the only complaint would be that the chips could have been cooked a little longer.

title: Enjoyable evening.
comment: Good vegan food, friendly staff, good atmosphere. The food was healthy and flavourful. We enjoyed the experience

title: A must visit restaurant
comment: Everything about this restaurant is wonderful, with incredibly tasty food served by welcoming and knowledgable staff. We absolutely loved our visit here for dinner and certainly encourage everyone to visit

title: Great food,, friendly service
comment: Had a great evening here tonight with my family. The food was all fresh and tasty and served with a smile.

title: We had the Lunch menu. Really
comment: We had the Lunch menu. Really tasty and good food. Really recommend the meatball tagine, the goat cheese with caramelised onion “pastries” and the pastilla

title: Daughters 16th Birthday
comment: We went here for a lovely early dinner as it was my daughter"s 16th birthday .

title: Always serves great food!
