comment: Whenever friends visit me I always trust Meimo to leave them raving about how lucky I am to have such a great restaurant in my area.

title: Luke warm food delivered by Just Eat
comment: Most of the food that was delivered by Just Eat was luke warm and also the onion bhajis were so oily / greasy, they were inedible.

title: Wonderful Meal
comment: Wonderful meal as always, had the Chicken Shashlik and it was a triumph. Always look forward to visiting.

title: Fantastic first delivery, amazing food
comment: To celebrate the birthday of a person avid of Indian cuisine, we first did some online research. We chose Masala Inn after having read the great reviews on Google Maps and Tripadvisor. We also checked their food hygiene rating (5, the top grade). The restaurant was very responsive by email when contacted.

title: Great dinner made better by great team!
comment: My friend and I called into Pier 1 for a quick bite to eat. I'd head about it twice before through other people and my friend raved about it so thought I would give it a go. Not only was the food excellent, but the team at Pier 1 are delightful! Really on top of things without being pushy. The owner is super charismatic and was lovely to have a laugh with but learn about how he has set up such a successful business! Definitely recommend a visit, I know I'll be going back!

title: Went masala inn for a dinner
comment: Went masala inn for a dinner on Sunday, they added some new dishes on updated menu which was excellent full of flavour, the Kala Bhuna and the Gongura Lamb both was perfect, will order again on our next visit on weekend which we booked for.

title: Excellent food
comment: The king prawns are amazing as were the lamb chops

title: This is the sixth time I have
comment: This is the sixth time I have visited Pier 1 with my family and it’s as good as it’s ever been. The fish is fresh, cooked very well and the staff are extremely nice. Good value for money for a London restaurant. If you like fish, this is a great place to visit

title: 18th birthday celebrations
comment: I reserved this restaurant for a family meal to celebrate my sisters 18th birthday. They allowed me to come in prior to the booking to add abit of decorations. The service was great, the food was great, customer services was great. Only thing I would be mindful about is that they do charge for the popadoms and dips, so keep this in mind if you are offered some before the starts. Other than that, it’s a great restaurant with great people and really nice food!!

title: AMAZIG
comment: I can not recommend this lovely Italian cafe enough. Being a regular visitor to the south of Italy I have to say this is the only place in the area that matches up to the deliciousness of Italian food!

title: Great find, home cooked meals
comment: Have visited here for lunch and also in the evening (where you can take your own drink in and it's a different menu). Always excellent food, good sized portions and excellent service. Great find in Bexleyheath ..... but keep it quiet or everyone will go there !

title: Very good
comment: Family run, excellent for lunch. Also for dinner at the weekend. Excellent Italian food, where everything is cooked on the premises.

title: Little gem!
comment: What a great find, step in the door and it takes me straight to my happy place Pizzo,Calabria!

title: Best coffee in Bexleyheath
comment: Only ever had coffee and pastries from Cuore but easily the best coffee in the area, and the vegan chocolate croissants are amazing.

title: Such a delightful spot
comment: What a little gem this place is. Excellent service and the best coffee in town. I also highly recommend their authentic Italian groceries, with high quality pasta and pasta sauces available.

title: Delicious - haven en route from Red House
comment: Thanks to Trip Advisor reviews we stopped here for lunch after visiting Red House. Food was delicious, freshly made, with excellent Italian coffee and homemade pastries for dessert.

title: Baby shower dinner
comment: I cannot praise this restaurant enough. From the amazing food to the fantastic staff this place is a true gem. We planned a baby shower dinner for my sister and the staff were so helpful in planning the menu as well as everything else. Food is always so fresh (the carbonara was to die for) and cannot thank the staff enough for a truly fantastic evening for my sister

title: Delicious food
comment: Absolutely lovely evening on 28/09/2020. Service was fantastic - Jacob was really attentive and Took the time to speak to us. All staff were welcoming. Restaurant was really focussed on covid safety measures. The food was so tasty- we had a lamb tagine for main which we have to say is the best we have had!

title: Five star
comment: Came here on Monday 28th and were immediately given a warm welcome. The staff were great, really friendly and informative about the menu. We both opted for tangines and they were superb, followed by a tiramisu. All swilled down with a bottle of white. A fantastic evening.

title: Incredible review, impeccable service
comment: This was our second time eating at Meimo and once again the food was outstanding. They went above and beyond with their service and will definitely be dining there again. The beef burgers were the best!

title: Every visit is brill
comment: I have eaten here many times. The food is always exceptionally good. The service is always perfect. Great night out.

title: Great experience & great food
comment: Staff were incredibly inviting and hospitable from the moment we entered the restaurant...they were joking with us and helped explain the menu, so made the experience really enjoyable. The food was also great and the mint tea offered at the end was a nice touch, would definitely come back here when in Windsor again.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: A great meal. We received a starter that we hadn't asked for, but this was given to us free of charge. The wine was lovely and the lamb tagine huge!

title: Vegan Options
comment: We were recommended this restaurant as there are quite a few Vegan or Veggie alternatives, we were not disappointed, the food is excellent as was the service.

title: Excellent food
comment: During lockdown we’ve had a few takeaways from Masala Inn which were excellent and decided to go to the restaurant for the first time. We had a great experience, the food is incredible, excellent quality meat and fish, unusual dishes and fantastic service. We will definitely be returning!

title: Smashing as always
comment: Another great meal at the Masala Inn, the best food and great service. See you soon for another great experience

title: Sarah
comment: Tried Masal Inn for the first time this evening and we wasn’t disappointed, the food was very tasty and the service was very good , we will definitely be back again Thankyou

title: Try the Chicken Bhuna!
comment: I have visited this restaurant a few times now and it’s amazing. Service is great, even in busy times they cannot do enough for you. Special mention to Sam for always making us feel welcome. The Chicken Bhuna is incredible - best one I have ever tasted. Can’t wait to return again soon!

title: Masala Inn Bexleyheath
comment: We decided to take advantage of the Help to eat out yesterday evening, so we thought we would try this restaurant as it was recommended to us, so I called & was lucky enough to book a table for the same evening. I found the place to be very clean and tables were a decent distance apart. Although busy the waiters were attentive (& all wore face masks). We had the Chicken Murgi Masala & Chicken Korai, as well as rice & Nan bread. The food was delicious and the Nan was very light. We will definitely be booking a table again, would highly recommend this restaurant!

title: First Indian meal with grandchildren
comment: We booked here yesterday and they managed to squeeze us in , the welcome and service was great even though they were busy. We were early table booked for 5.30 and when I booked that we would have to leave the table by 7 . The food was ordered and I dont know what magic the chef has but every dish had a unique taste, 5 curries ordered and each had a different flavour, my dish was the Railway chicken amazing. My grand daughter even enjoyed the chicken tikka it was the first time she tried it. This ranks as one of my best meals out.

title: Been back to this restaurant
comment: Been back to this restaurant 3 times since lockdown & had a fabulous meal every time. The staff are lovely, the recognise us & are so welcoming. The restaurant is always spotlessly clean. On my last visit I tried the railway chicken & can honestly say it was the best curry I've ever had. Will be going back next month.

title: Fantastic Takeaway
comment: First time eating from here tonight but will not be the last, probably the best Indian takeaway we have ever eaten! The spices were used well and the sauces were rich in flavour, it was so delicious and arrived piping hot which is a huge plus. Thanks to the amazing chefs, we really loved our meal, the chicken jalfrezi was fab.

title: Over priced
comment: Visited there today. Food was pretty good, but over priced. For example, 6 popadom £4.50, and if you want the chutney, the bill said another £4.50 x 6 people. So to have 6 popadom it was £9? We asked if they had a bit of milk for our baby. They said yes and charged £1.95 for a small glass, to put in her bottle. I wouldn’t go there again.

title: Excellent!
comment: Ate h re last night with some friends. Can’t fault it! The tagine was a little spicy for me, but that’s down to my dodgy tastebuds. Food quality excellent, service excellent, and as we were the only table in the restaurant, no problem with social distancing. Very happy with the COVID measures. Wouldn’t hesitate to return.

title: Excellent experience
comment: Friendly staff that welcomed us. Incredible food, cuisine that just is not around enough therefore made it even more special as I haven’t had it in a while! Could definitely tell they knew Moroccan Mediterranean food very well or are native to the country. Couldn’t fault it.

title: Went to masala Inn again Saturday
comment: Went to masala Inn again Saturday night for a meal, the restaurant was full and we sat on our pre booked table promptly, the table was socially distanced and all the waiters wearing masks, hand sanitizers by the entrance feel safe environment. The new dish Chicken 65 was recommended by the staff which was excellent mouth watery dish, we was so happy after we asked for the bills they offer complimentary drinks, it was a perfect night out. Can’t wait to coming back to Masala Inn again.

title: Good food, good service at a reasonable price
comment: On recommendation we booked this restaurant for a special occasion and it certainly matched expectations. Staff were very welcoming and attentive. The menu offered an extensive choice for all tastes and the quality of our ordered food was excellent. If in Windsor again we would certainly return and would recommend to others.

title: Great little cafe/restaurant
comment: I love the coffee, the food and the people. Family run Italian cafe that makes me feel welcome and relaxed as soon as I go in. Best carbonara in town as well!

title: Delicious!
comment: Delicious food whatever the occasion! Breakfast, lunch or dinner. Authentic food and wonderfully friendly staff! Always have to take some pastries to go!

title: Still best salt beef bar around
comment: I have been a fan of B&K for over 40 years. Their salt beef is second to none, you can request fat on or fat off, always fresh bouncy rye bread and Coleman’s ! Warm, friendly service, lovely salads and pickles, always look forward to a visit

title: Imre
comment: Excellent dinner, cosy atmosphere, value for money prices. The salt beef and tongue are made to perfection. We will be back soon....:)

title: The Best Salt Beef and Latkas around!
comment: A small friendly, long established, family run Salt Beef restaurant with the best salt beef around. They cure their own salt beef and it is always excellent - moist and flavourful. Amazingly good as a sandwich with mustard on rye bread, with a latka and a couple of fried fish balls if you are really hungry and very greedy! The chopped liver, egg and onion, tongue and pickles are great too, though I've never been a fan of turkey. I just can't ever manage to fit everything in, in a single visit as the portions are very generous. I've been coming here for my regular Salt Beef fix for decades and it has never failed to please. What more can you say about BK .... unassuming but definitely one of the best.

title: Salt-beef and tongue paradise
comment: This is the finest salt beef - and tongue - restaurant for miles around. It really is melt-in-the-mouth, not least when accompanied by a spot of mustard, some chips, and the almost unique blackcurrant tea. What with the wonderful staff, for whom nothing is too much trouble, B&K is a real experience. Parking is a bit of a problem, but a walk to the restaurant to whet one's appetite and a walk back to digest what is a culinary masterpiece is no problem. Enjoy!

title: Non kosher kosher style restaurant
comment: Really good food. Lovely salt beef and latkas. Great and helpful staff. Simple setup and ambiance. Great selection of salads including new greens. Good selection of Jewish soups.

title: The Best
comment: Undoubtedly the best Salt Beef on Rye as well as Hot Tongue on Rye I have ever had.Their chips and Potato Latkes are very delicious.

title: Take away
comment: If you fancy some delicious salt beef, tongue, fish balls and selection of salads. Definitely worth a visit for a take away. You can eat in the restaurant but more like a cafe experience than a restaurant one.

title: Best saltbeef
comment: Best Saltbeef in north London friendly pleasant

title: Classic Jewish Brilliance
comment: A couple of years ago, I went to this restaurant's sister Deli restaurant, in Hatch End, with my late Mother and she thoroughly raved about it. Trying to find it again, I asked around but people mistakenly told me that it was closed, but nevertheless today I went to the main Edgware Restaurant with two of my cousins and we were in awe of the traditional quality of the spectacular food. Although not strictly kosher, it epitomises classic traditional old fashioned Jewish cuisine, Whereas most other Jewish restaurants these days tend to do middle eastern type food rather than timeless dishes like these. Since Blooms closed down, there is nowhere to go for decent chicken soup and matzoh balls, kreplach, chopped liver, hot salt beef, tongue, viennas, and all the classic vintage Hebrew delights that I so loved while growing up. This wonderful restaurant run by John and his sister in law, Gina brings back the taste of my youth, the fondly remembered delicacies of yester year.. Everything is perfect, the incredible service dished up with warmth and charisma, the taste of the food, which dances a tango on your taste buds, the best salt beef outside of the Stage Deli in New York. Blooms was never perfect and its memory pales into insignificance when compared to this truly rare find. Whatever else do do, try the hot salt beef sanwich - WOW - indescribable. It fills me with joy that such a restaurant like this can still exist in 2020.

title: Superb brunch!
comment: No place in Surbiton would beat No.97 when it comes to weekend brunch. Booking in advince advisable.

title: The best!
comment: Salt beef at B and K is wonderful soft and juicy. Nowhere else comes near it, except their other branches

title: Amazing food and excellent service!
comment: I went to No. 97 for an anniversary dinner with my other half and we were blown away by the food. We were given complimentary fresh bread with different flavoured butters and then had an amuse bouché.

title: Great night out
comment: We have previously visited the sister restaurant in Teddington (much enjoyed) but found No 97 to be a cut above. The downstairs gin bar is cosy and intimate and the cocktails are expertly mixed - with a running commentary. My favourite gin - Nordes - is available so I was happy. The food was inventive, elaborate and served with brio. The staff really are great here. We will most certainly return and will be strong advocates in the interim.

title: Excellent food
comment: Have visited no.97 and its partner restaurant in teddington. Both are excellent. Food is great. Lots of gin to chose from

title: Have been here several times
comment: Have been here several times now, amazing what Sam has done to this place.

title: Lockdown Takeaway
comment: Ordered the new takeaway on Friday and is was amazing. This is not just a takeaway it is a dining experience. Very well packed and everything labeled corresponding to each course. Watch the videos to show you how to plate up and it actually looked like a Michelin star meal.

title: Excellent 5 course takeaway
comment: The restaurant is currently open on Fridays and Saturdays for takeaway, you need to preorder the 5 course set menu online. The restaurant provide videos explaining how to plate the food up at home. This was the best meal we have had since the start of lockdown.

title: Lockdown Takeaway
comment: I can't recommend No97 5 course takeaway enough. Fantastic value but wow the food was superb. Minimal effort to create top quality food, super easy step by step instructions and videos on how to plate. We had a great evening in the comfort of our own home.

title: 1st Post-Lockdown Meal
comment: A delightful place to eat our first post lockdown meal - great food, great service, great gin - great night!

title: Best Fish & Chips
comment: Just had the best fish and chips that I have ever had. Friendly and relaxing atmosphere. Good service. Will definitely be visiting again.

title: Lack of social distancing by some staff
comment: Went for a meal with a friend, and was surprised by the inconsistency of mask wearing by staff. The lady on front of house wasn’t wearing a mask and didn’t observe appropriate social distancing. She leaned across me and made me feel very uncomfortable. She also served us our food with no mask on.

title: Amazing!
comment: I love this place. My sister found it for my birthday. Best grilled prawns ever, perfectly done. All the dishes I’ve tried were great. Met the owner Mete, told him I would be coming once a month specially from east London. Top quality ingredients. This is the third time in August I’m eating here, writing this as I’m waiting for the main. I’m not 11, candles chosen to make me feel young again :)

title: The best fish restaurant in London
comment: We’ve dined here many times now, first time was for a takeaway during lockdown. As Richmond Hill is simply my favourite place in london, Pier 1 is simply the best. Whether you fancy old fashioned fish and chips, or healthier options of grilled fish, burgers or a pie, come to Pier 1 in the best setting of whole of London. You can have a takeaway picnic by the river and watch the world go by.

title: Exquisite food and service
comment: Absolutely perfect service with a range of divinely tasty fish cuisine. Fresh and flavoursome. The halibut and prawn tempura were just flawlessly delicious. The sticky toffee pudding was breathtaking. Seriously fine food and wonderful service!

title: Excellent service & great fish
comment: Excellent service with a friendly smile. Made to feel welcome from the minute we walked in. Fish was really fresh cooked well and very tasty. Great atmosphere and will definitely be going back.

title: Great takeaway
comment: Lovely staff great fish and chips.

title: The Best service!!
comment: Very delicious food and the best service ever highly recommend, worth your money and your time, definitely will come again

title: Lockdown takeaway
comment: The Saturday takeaway was super fast delivery time with a free Bombay Potato, food was excellent, nice and warm, revived free papadom with sauce, see you again masala Inn

title: Spanking fresh fish
comment: Pier 1 fish is always spanking fresh. Their tables are wiped down when customers leave and before new customers are seated. As you go in you are asked to use the hand cleanser machine. The tables are well spaced and the restaurant is airy. You feel safe and well looked after.. The fish and chips are really well cooked. The batter is light. Wines, beers and fruit juices are well chosen.

title: A wonderful dining experience
comment: We visited The Masala on Thursday evening after lockdown. We made the right choice for our first meal out

title: Lovely Food
comment: Lovely ambiance. Wonderful food. Large portions, served promptly. Waiters were so friendly and welcoming. Welcomed with a smile. Would definitely come back. We’ll see you again soon! ☺️

title: Lovely food
comment: Ordered from this restaurant last night for the first time and it was lovely food .

title: Delicious takeaway - amazing!
comment: We had the most delicious takeaway from Meimo. The food was amazing and the service brilliant - we highly recommend!

title: Pleasant Evening
comment: They accommodated us at the very last minute which we were very grateful for. We had a very enjoyable meal with good service. Would recommend.

title: Absolutely delicious and great service
comment: We thoroughly enjoyed a delicious selection of authentic Moroccan food. The small plates have generous portions and all the flavours are incredible! The team serving us were so friendly and gave us great service. They made my daughter’s 22nd birthday very special!

title: Piping hot & delicious.
comment: Mid-afternoon on a Monday and yet the food was freshly cooked and delicious and the welcome was warm and friendly. The dishes were packed with flavour and washed down with pots of mint tea. Thank you Abdul and team. Our first time. We will be back!

title: 100% recommend - amazing!!
comment: 100% recommend!! Amazing food and lovely cocktails. Thank you Christian and the staff at Lefke, will definitely be back very soon x

title: Great restaurant
comment: First time to Lefke, had a lovely meal, felt safe and very Covid secure...will defo be returning in the near future...Christian & team looked after us xx beautiful chicken shish xx

title: Lefke
comment: Come to this wonderful restaurant for our anniversary tonight amazing service , gorgeous food and of course the drinks def worth a visit and I’ll def be back

title: Take away pick up
comment: Wow what a great meal. Ordered 2 large shish. 1 chicken and 1 Lamb. It came with flat bread, rice and salad and 2 dressing. It was amazing. We will be returning. Thank you Lefke, it was all great and thoroughly recommend

title: Amazing time
comment: Had a lovely meal with cocktails :) would definitely recommend. Good portion size and nice atmosphere!

title: Dinner
comment: Great food, lovely people and even better cocktails! Would 10/10 come back. Thank you Lefke! See you again soon.

title: Brilliant night
comment: Brilliant night ! Christian was a legend made us feel so welcome ! Very nice food defo coming back

title: Amazing meal out with housemates finally!
comment: Absolutely amazing meal. So good being able to finally get out of the house as we are a group of close friends studying together! Food was so delicious, probably the best moussaka I’ve ever had. Whole team there are awesome and couldn’t do enough for us. Would highly, highly recommend!

title: Hidden gem
comment: I have passed by this place many times and wondered what it was like, as it looks inviting. Eventually took the plunge and wished I’d ventured in before. The menu is wide ranging - pizza, pasta, fish meat and risottos - we felt spoiled for choice! Charming service, delicious house wine, can’t fault this place. Definitely will be back.

title: Amazing time at this restaurant!!
comment: Amazing time at this restaurant, me and my friend did the bottomless Prosecco deal and it was incredible. We had such a laugh.. food was unreal, drinks were constantly flowing and portion size of the food was perfect.

title: Brilliant find
comment: We went to this restaurant based on the reviews we had seen and it did not disappoint. The staff were warm and friendly, the wine was good and the food was fantastic! Will definitely be back!

title: Hidden gem
comment: Amazing little Italian! Went as a table of ten and everyone loved their meals! Sea food was really good and the pizzas were great! We were also allowed to bring birthday cakes which they kindly served and cut up for us as Happy Birthday played in the background.

title: Lovely food and staff with concerns over how busy it was
comment: We aren't from the area at all, and had booked this restaurant based on the reviews.

title: Wonderful Experience
comment: From start to finish the food and service were absolutely fantastic - we ordered Scallops and Bruschetta for starters, these were both full of flavour and the accompanying complimentary homemade bread was delicious! For mains we had a large pizza and a linguine dish and again, both were tasty and could not be faulted! The service was also warm, friendly and we felt like regulars although this was our first visit - it will certainly not be the last!

title: Just wonderful
comment: This is such a dreamy little restaurant. Brilliant service, food, wine, atmosphere...we can’t wait to go back!

title: We love this restaurant -
comment: We love this restaurant - the lasagne is excellent and I order it every time we visit. The wine is delicious and the hospitality is always warm and attentive. 5 ⭐️

title: best italian reastaurant in kingston
comment: My friends and I are regulars at this restaurant. The staff are always warm and friendly. The food is always superb!

title: The BEST Italian FOOD!
comment: One of the best finds in the area! Wondering why I had not discovered this place before? Second time I’m back now the food is wonderful, the owner is very attentive and I’m Italian so trust me very hard to please with Italian food. But this place doesn’t disappoint, great portions, service and most importantly FOOD!

title: Lovely
comment: My ‘Big Turk’ cocktail was lovely! The food came in good time and tasted absolutely amazing! Everything came served with a smile and was a real nice place to spend the evening..... and they still offer the eat out to help out discount!

title: Bottomless Thursdays deal
comment: Bottomless Thursdays deal - I was meant to visit this restaurant pre lockdown for a friends birthday, however as we had paid £10 deposit my friend booked Thursday bottomless Prosecco deal!! It was really worth it the money!!! There wasn’t many options to choose from food wise however the food was lovely fresh and waitress was always topping up the glasses!! Service was good. 2 course meal and bottomless Prosecco for 90 minutes £25 was worth it!!!

title: Little Gem
comment: We had a fabulous pre-lockdown meal on Wednesday and loved it. This was a our first visit and we’ll be back when we’re allowed. It’s small and very unpretentious, but we were given a warm welcome by the team who were friendly and helpful, and the food is fabulous and reasonably priced. The only surprise for me, on this of all days, was that it wasn’t full.

title: Brilliant night!
comment: Had another Fantastic night at Lefke, Great food, Brilliant service as always! Would definitely recommend. Looking forward to returning soon.

title: Most amazing evening
comment: Thank you for such an excellent evening

title: Prosecco Night
comment: Amazing evening, even with the new restrictions. Incredible food, regularly topped up prosecco and a lovely atmosphere! Thanks Christian and the team!

title: 40th birthday
comment: Amazing night! The food is lovely, staff attentive and we had a great time. I would really recommend it!

title: Amazing Turkish meal with friends
comment: Amazing meal with my friends, would 100% recommend! Food was great and service even better! Thanks to Christian for being such a good host!

title: Expensive for what it is...
comment: Been trying out similar restaurants around the area of late and found this one to be the least appealing. Staff were exceptional and restaurant was very clean however, no atmosphere and the food and drink is by far overpriced in comparison to the other restaurants we have tried.

title: Great food and great service
comment: Great food and great service as always! Highly recommended. Best restaurant in Upminster in my opinion.

title: Fun time with my sisters!
comment: Amazing food & cocktails highly recommend! Very friendly and polite staff! Brilliant service from Christian & COVID secure too.

title: Lunching with friends
comment: Great home made food, both savoury and sweet, and drinks. Relaxed atmosphere and good place for meeting friends for a catch up!

title: Perfection
comment: We discovered this lovely restaurant after a game of checkers in the Shisha cafe next door.

title: Delicious Lockdown Takeaway
comment: We ordered a three course meal (to takeaway as we're in lockdown) as it was one of our birthdays. Every dish was excellent - absolutely delicious - so we had a lovely evening. The portions were huge. We thoroughly recommend Trattoria Calabrese for wonderful food and lovely staff.

title: Best Pizza outside of Italy
comment: Closest thing to proper Italian pizza outside of Italy you will get in UK

title: Delicious pizzas, always top experience!
comment: We have gotten pizza twice from here during lockdown. Both times they were AMAZING. So flavoursome and cooked to perfection. Ordered the fillet steak and mushroom pizza and it was incredibly good, as was the other time with just margarita. Great value for money. We have picked it up both times and it has a lovely little terrace outside the restaurant we can’t wait to eat at once it is possible.

title: Best Italian, wonderful host!
comment: Best Italian you could ever wish for.

title: Amazing, it’s always amazing
comment: Amazing, it’s always amazing here. The service is excellent, Gianni is a wonderful host. He is funny, knows the food and wine inside out and he has a great sense of humour. Food, it’s Italian food done by and Italian and it’s done the Italian way, so it’s like being on holiday eating here. Love it, coming back again and again!

title: Fantastic time
comment: After being stauck in the house for many months what an absolute delight it’s been to get out and feel safe, welcome and completely stuffed. The atmosphere was perfect on the beautiful summer’s day. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone with a family or a date night. You’re definitely safe in their hands. Thank you so much

title: Loved it.
comment: I enjoyed the entire experience, particularly the service which only enhanced the meal. Anything you need ask Gianni promise you won’t regret it ;).

title: Fabulous small Italian
comment: Stumbled on this hidden gem by accident, having been badly let down by the Fish!Kitchen, 3 doors along. Small, pleasant ambience, vaguely industrial lights and lots of wood and iron. Charming waiter, other customers all seemed to be couples in their 20s. Fabulous food, cozza provicial ( wonderful) spaghetti vongole ( wonderful) garlic bread with mozzarella (wonderful !! ) and home made Creme caramel ( wonderful!!)Unable to move!! Highly recommended !!

title: Breath of fresh air
comment: Great tasting coffee, although cappuccinos could do with less milk. Haven’t tried the food but looks and sounds delicious and reasonably priced. This is a much needed break away from the vast majority of ‘grub’ cafes in Bexley. Lots of charm and a relaxing atmosphere with real quality and healthy food and drink

title: Will be returning
comment: Nothing bad to report about this place. My partner and I went last night and had a wonderful time. The service was incredible and the staff have a brilliant sense of humour and know how to entertain. The food was to die for, particularly the steak and the banoffee pie.

title: The best italian meal in ages
comment: This afternoon my friend Giuseppe, suggested we grab a quick lunch before he went to work. He suggested we go to an Italian restaurant he's just been the orher day, and said it was delicious. All I want to say is that ever since I got out of that restaurant, I just can't wait to go back. Delicious food (home-made) great atmosphere. It's the kinda restaurant that I always liked. Small family business, food made with love, great desserts, excellent service. I would recommend it anytime to anybody!!

title: Never let us down!
comment: Always a pleasure to have my lovely cappuccino by Andrea. Great atmosphere, authentic Italian cuisines. Iam highly recommended ti visit Cuore.

title: Wonderful restaurant
comment: I recently celebrated my birthday at Cuore with a small group of friends and the staff were so lovely, exceptional service and delicious food for such a reasonable price. I've visited several times, both in the day and evening, and I'd definitely go again and recommend to family and friends! Thank you so much for a lovely evening!

title: Delicious Pasta dishes!
comment: We bought 2 pasta dishes for lunch today, the pesto pasta and cuore pasta - there was plenty, and they were perfectly cooked and delicious,

title: Always very good. Wonderful
comment: Always very good. Wonderful service and food. Takeaway good, but it will be better when it fully opens again.

title: Food party order
comment: Ordered some amazing meat and antipasti platters from the amazing cuore for my 30th birthday gathering last weekend. Food was amazing as always and the staff were so knowledgable and fantastic at helping me decide what to choose for a special occasion. Thank you so much again for the Delish food as always even when getting take away food it’s still amazing

title: Fab fab fab
comment: Have just visited after looking for a quick lunch with the kids. Found this via tripadvisor and what a gem this place is. Simply the best hazelnut croissant I have ever tasted and a good mocha to go with it.

title: Great visit to Cuore!
comment: It was my first visit to Cuore today and I just wanted to say how much I enjoyed it! I had pesto pasta, which was absolutely delicious, and we got amazing cakes to come home with! My Mum said it was the best coffee she’s ever had! We’ll be back again soon

title: Halibut to die for
comment: I am a frequent visitor to Pier 1 because I love their haddock and chips. This time I took a gamble and had halibut instead. What a fantastic meal - well worth the money.

title: Great quality “eat in” Fish & Chips
comment: A really good experience at Pier1 this evening. Fresh food, quick service and good sized portions. Would recommend both to eat in and to takeaway.

title: Stale fish
comment: We went here on the evening before my son's wedding because we wanted something low-key but good before the celebrations to come. What more suitable than an up-market Fish n' Chippie? The meal was a disappointment. I had a Whitebait starter that I had to send back because the fish were leathery and chewy. They gave me a fresh serving but the fish were in the same condition. so were not eaten. I'm informed by a fish merchant that the probable reason why it was like this was that it had been kept too long and had lost its tone. So the main arrived - Cod & Chips. The cod was unfortunately dry and not in the least moist and succulent. I used quite a lot of tomato sauce to moisten it.

title: Best Fish n Chips in the world...
comment: After a long walk in the Richmond park, we were hungry and looking for some hot food and chanced upon this place in Richmond hill. What a find!

title: As always wonderful fresh fish and warm greetint
comment: We went to have a meal in the restaurant last night before the November lockdown starts.

title: Take Away
comment: Excellent take away tonight. Beautiful fish and masses of chips,plus mushy peas such good value.Best around.

title: Good to be back
comment: We are regular visitors to Pier 1 and it is the first restaurant we go to after lockdown. Simply the best fish and chips. We do not go to any other as they cannot compete with the freshness and quality of Billy and his superb team at Pier 1. It's well worth the travel. See you next week.

title: Perfection
comment: We've been here a couple of times now and it is definitely worth travelling from Crystal Palace to visit! The food is exquisite and the staff go above and beyond to keep their customers happy. Despite a broken ice machine the manager left the restaurant and returned with an ice bucket full of ice for our drinks!! Absolutely amazing. There is a relaxing atmosphere and a wide choice of food and drinks. Pier 1 is much more than a chippy, it is a top rated restaurant which we will be visiting again and again and definitely recommend.

title: Best salt beef
comment: The best salt beef hands down! Great soups, amazing fish balls, crispy latkes. My favourite restaurant for Jewish food in London

title: The food is lush, the service divine Thanks John keep up that good heart of yours
comment: Hi, i just a huge thank you to John today who very kindly made sure that a hungry lady did not walk away from his amazing establishment still hungry, He has a good heart that deserves all the good luck his business deserves.

title: Easily the best Salt Beef in London
comment: Went a bit mad and tried all the best Salt Beef spots in town.

title: Super food and lots of it
comment: Fancying a break from cooking my wife and I decided to get a get a takeaway and having had B&K In Edgware recommended by friends we decided to give it a go. Delivery to Finchley was only possible if we spent beyond a certain amount and we reached that by ordering a enough for a few meals/ a largenumber of items. The food was really excellent - great quality and large portions .

title: STILL KEEPING UP THE STANDARD
comment: Here I am again, I've had 3 take aways during the present crisis, i collection and 2 deliveries. Very quick delivery service

title: Friendly Atmosphere and Sensible Prices
comment: In a précis - the best Salt Beef in North London and that’s coming from a gentile!

title: Salt Beef
comment: Can’t go wrong with this place. The salt beef sandwiches are stacked and delicious.

title: Better Than Ever
comment: Please see my last review of August 2020,

title: Very friendly staff
comment: Great food, Plenty of it served with a smile. And sometimes even a free taster.

title: Simply the best
comment: We have been coming here for more years than I can remember - simply because their salt beef and tongue sandwiches are the best. Meat is always cooked just right and portions really generous. fried food such as latkes and chips virtually grease-free, and very friendly service. Just do yourself a favour and try it. I'd be surprised if you don't go back.

title: Simply perfect!
comment: We choose to host our wedding at reception at No. 97 and were so pleased that we did. From the outset Sam and the team did their utmost to ensure that our every wish was accommodated. The service was impeccable, and the food was delicious. We could not have asked for more.

title: The best place I’ve eaten
comment: The best place I’ve eaten out!!! Impeccable service!

title: Predinner drinks
comment: Excellent Gin drinks, brilliant selection very varied. Next time will stay and try the food as looks fantastic too.

title: Hard to beat
comment: I can't speak more highly about the friendly and attentive staff or the food, it was delicious. The little touch of a congratulatory card on the table was really appreciated. Thank you all

title: Couldn’t fault this restaurant
comment: Couldn’t fault this restaurant .. superb food , great service, great atmosphere even the music was excellent .. we will definitely return .. assuming we’re not all in lock down !

title: Excellent food, first-rate service, and great value for money
comment: This place is seriously good. The food is excellent and the service is great.

title: Sloppy food and service
comment: Thoroughly disappointed with No. 97. I came with high expectations, in light of how busy the restaurant normally appears.

title: Lockdown takeaway
comment: Had a takeaway tasting menu. Really excellent, fun to prepare at home and great value. Each course is sensibly pre-packed and they come with cooking instructions, so the whole process is pretty easy

title: Great quality food!
comment: Great food and friendly service. The food is cooked to a high standard and the four of us had different mains which were all very nice. Will definitely come again.

title: Lovely food and place... must
comment: Lovely food and place... must check it out. Abit pricey but it is a star Restuarant.. fix the men’s toilets and you will get full marks next time .. lovely food.

title: Excellent all round
comment: Imaginative menu, great ingredients, good service. All in all a wonderful evening dinner in warm comfortable environment

title: A special evening
comment: I've eaten in many restaurants........but this has to be one of the best. Service is quiet, professional, attentive, knowledgeable. The menu is split between a 6 course taster......which looked fab.....but we went for the traditional menu. We had an excellent glass of champagne whilst ordering ......and we quickly demolished the excellent brown sour-dough bread (and ordered more). My partner had scallops, which turned out to be a single gignormous scallop, expertly cooked + foam; I had wild duck with an intense sauce. Mains were roast & lamb - sounds plain but the flavours were incredibly intense with interesting accompaniments........and more than adequate portion size. For dessert, I had a gorgeous choclatey thing whilst my partner had an apple pie souffle - probably the best thing on the dessert menu. Washed down with an excellent Aussie Shiraz......and accompanied with a cognac for me and a dessert wine for her. For most mortals, this isn't the sort of place to visit for a casual weekend meal out - it's a special deal for the palate and the wallet.....but well worth it.

title: Best meal of the year
comment: So happy that La Trompette is back in business and that they still provide an excellent dining experience.

title: Stunning food, slightly awkward service
comment: We’ve been several times so our food expectations were high,and were met. They had gluten free bread, and every course was sublime - well thought out, and perfectly balanced.

title: Never disappointed
comment: We have been going to this restaurant for 18 years, and it has been our go to restaurant for special occasions or generally indulging a bit. In all this time, we have not had one bad meal, or even one bad dish. We went there again recently, visiting for the first time after the COVID closure, and the food was as good as ever. If anything, the experience was even better than before as the service, which had sometimes been a bit slow on previous visits, was this time extremely quick and efficient. Those who want to be seen in a trendy place serving showy experimental dishes will probably be a bit disappointed. If on the other hand you are looking for excellent French/European cooking in a classic (and classy) setting, you will LOVE this place.

title: Sometimes it’s the little things that irritate!
comment: La Trompette by earning a Star from Michelin is known to offer the most delicious food, artistically presented. That really is what one should expect. We found the meal rather over salty, also we felt the service was rather over-attentive but .... horror of horrors at this level of establishment ....how can one forgive spelling errors on the menu and drinks list. Probably this would not upset most diners but it indicates a slip in attention to the meticulous detail needed to warrant maintaining cred. Similarly at such a tricky time socially ‘the rules’ were not always followed through.

title: So friendly and all round excellence.
comment: Very friendly and prompt service. We were on the outdoor Terrace on a chilly night - heaters kept us warm. But were definitely not forgotten. Delicious sweetbread. And all the food of a very high standard. So nice and a treat to have first dinner after lockdown at one of our all time favourites.

title: Fabulous tasting menu
comment: We had a really fantastic dinner at La Trompette. Normally we avoid tasting menus because they can be just too much. However, this menu was predominantly fish and was not too filling.

title: Better than ever
comment: Returned after lockdown and better than ever. outstanding food and service and great wine suggestions from the sommelier. Will return as soon as I can

title: Superb Food, Staff and Ambience
comment: My final birthday meal of my birthday week with 5 of us at this fantastic restaurant - treated by our lovely daughter, her boyfriend and our son. Donata greeted us at the door and took our temperatures (reassuring in these strange times!). She’s expecting a baby boy in November so good luck for that - I told her boys were exhausting but very worth it! A lovely round table sparkling with cutlery and glasses - very pretty. We were served a little ravioli as an amuse-bouche, in addition to the five-course tasting menu, which was very tasty. We stuck with red wine throughout the meal - a very drinkable Mas de Vigneron. Bread was absolutely delicious and we asked for more, mainly the chorizo one. Next course was tuna - I’ve never eaten it so rare but it was absolutely delicious, melt-in-the-mouth, and the avocado/watermelon salsa was a tasty surprise. Then the most beautiful work of art - a terrine of rabbit and ham hock with the most delicious tarragon jelly and plum chutney and the pistachios in the terrine were a fantastic nutty surprise along with the delicious walnut toast. Absolutely delicious. Cod to follow with a gorgeous chorizo crust, cooked to perfection with a smooth cauliflower purée and lovely rainbow chard - couldn’t fault it. Venison was next with a lovely granola of cranberry and nuts, beautiful pommes Anna and a yum celeriac purée - the juniper berry jus brought it all together so wonderfully. Not sure where the blueberry sorbet came, with a light crumble, could’ve been before the venison - delicious and extra again to the five courses (made seven courses in all!) The chocolate soufflé was a triumph with a beautiful little ball of vanilla parfait within a chocolate shell. This was just so very good - superb quality ingredients, cooked to absolute perfection and some quite different combinations which were both surprising and delicious!!!! Combined with my lovely family, I was just in heaven - the perfect meal. Estelle our waitress, and Donata also, looked after us so attentively but unobtrusively. This place is fantastic!! Can’t praise it highly enough - thank you chefs, just superb and just can’t wait to come back for another tasting menu!!! Apologies for only two pictures - I was having such a very good time I couldn’t bear to stop and take pictures - a very good excuse to go back but I did get a snap of the terrine which I think was my absolute favourite course.

title: Amazing as always!
comment: TFT has always been our go to place for special occasions, long after moving away from the area to have our family.

title: Anniversary meal
comment: We have been visiting The French Table for several years but only recently started enjoying their wonderful tasting menu (with accompanying wines chosen by Sarah). On our most recent visit we celebrated our 28th Anniversary. Having a personalised menu was a lovely touch and we were beautifully looked after by the wonderful Judith who is always friendly and welcoming. The five-course menu was absulutely delicious and we were never made to feel rushed as we enjoyed each delicious course. During lockdown we discussed what would really cheer us up as we were not planning to go away this year. We decided a monthly lunch at TFT would be the perfect replacement for any holiday and it looks as though we were right!

title: Consistently great!
comment: We hadn't been to this restaurant for at least a year but it was every bit as good as ever. Lovely taster menu and really enthusiastic staff who explain everything about each dish you get. I was very impressed by the Covid procedures put into place. Our temperatures were taken before entering the restaurant and the tables were spaced well. I was really worried that it would suffer during the lockdown but it's up and running again thank goodness!

title: Delicious lunch
comment: It was so nice to have a delicious lunch here I really liked it and will be coming for more and more

title: Good vegan options
comment: Happy to discover this venue after reading the reviews. Great location, good service and delicious food. Very nice vegan options :))) hurray

title: Best breakfast ever
comment: Amazing breakfast in Wembley with my Gaby. The food was amazing and the girls who served us were lovely.

title: Lovely place to go!
comment: Lovely food. Good service. I would reccomend this place to anyone looking for a nice spot to have a drink a small bite to eat

title: Still the best in town
comment: We had a wonderful post lockdown lunch here. The place was buzzing, and the staff were as friendly as ever and following social distancing guidelines. As for the food, everything we tried from the set 3-course menu was cooked to perfection and highly enjoyable. There’s no other restaurant in the vicinity that comes close for producing high quality cuisine at reasonable prices.

title: Superb dining in West London!
comment: I dine quite regularly at La Trompette and it’s one of my favourites in West London. Consistently good food, innovative cooking, great service, lovely dining room - La Trompette ticks all the boxes! I had lunch there just before the Covid 19 shutdown and will be back as soon as life returns to normal.

title: Amazing food!
comment: La Trompette is an absolute gem! The wine list is so extensive, the food is absolutely delicious, the service is next to none! The menu is very balanced with meat, fish and vegetarian options, there is also a tasting menu which looked divine as well! I had the cod and my boyfriend had the lamb, we were both very happy with our choices! The restaurant is keeping classic French traditions with a modern twist! Will absolutely visit again!

title: Very good but pricey
comment: Le Trompette provided a formal dining experience & excellent service for us dining there this week. We sat on the right of the restaurant which provided tables well spaced out and we felt it was more intimate and very comfortable. Staff were attentive and helpful. The 3 course set menu is £60 pp and I have to say that its a bit expensive once you add a 12.5% service charge. For two people that's £135 before any drinks.

title: Perfect
comment: This is my favourite restaurant of all time!

title: Not welcoming experience
comment: I was expecting much more from the Michelin star place...especially on my birthday.

title: La Trompette
comment: This was my wife and I, first 'fine dining' meal since the Covid lockdown and we were both very much looking forward to it. We wanted to avoid Central London but not too far out, so the location of this restaurant was perfect. Also, the area it is located is very lively as you would expect in that part of Chiswick.

title: Keeping up standards in hard times
comment: I've been to La Trompette a number of times but this was the first visit post-lockdown. There wasn't an empty table in the place and I had the best meal I have had there, with the quail raviolo as starter being the high spot, although the guinea fowl was also excellent. The three-course lunch menu is excellent value for a Michelin-starred restaurant and the service was as friendly and attentive as ever.

title: Welcoming Restaurant with excellent food and service
comment: Had the pleasure to eat here last Friday. We were part of a group and had an excellent wine pairing with the food. We bought the wine with us to have with the lunch. My lunch was excellent starting off with oysters, followed by lamb and finishing with cheese selection. The staff were excellent and looked after us well. I highly recommend a visit.

title: Once again this place delivers.
comment: Once again this place delivers. Stunning food with friends made for a great evening. Starting with juicy oysters, followed by divine fish and rich desert. Always a winner. Very happy this is local!

title: Good
comment: Very nice visit. Loved it here. First time and won't be the last time the next time I will be back I'll be bringing a lot more often friends!!

title: Lunch Time
comment: I have eaten here before (3 or 4 times in fact ) for breakfast, and left thoroughly fulfilled and satisfied, so its about time i wrote a review

title: Nice place
comment: Good food food service amazing place amazing staff very nice location nice restaurants thanks so much well done

title: Excellent food and service at a very reasonable price
comment: I love this place. The food is great whether you want a three course meal or just a really tasty soup. They have a great vegetarian breakfast too. Maria, the owner is always helpful and will make sure you enjoy your meal and have a good experience. I highly recommend it

title: great cafe worth a visit !
comment: Great good, great vegetarian breakfast, lovely staff, friendly warm environment and good value for money

title: Unbelievable
comment: Great price, location and people!!

title: Great food, friendly service 10/10
comment: The staff at the spice station were attentive, friendly and complimenting.

title: Lovely place!
comment: Lovely service staff are friendly and make you feel comfortable and make sure your satisfied! Would highly recommend

title: Wow! Why Im a Spice station regular
comment: Wow! Im a Spice station regular - but what with lockdown its been a while. Tonight reminded me why they are simply the best- juicy, tasty quality chicken and properly prepared sauces with fresh herbs, spices and peppers - each sauce for our jalfrezi and Korai was delicious and delicately spiced. Thank you Shah and to your top team of chefs

title: Fantastic food and great atmosphere
comment: Fantastic food and great atmosphere would definitely come back again. All the staff were helpful and follows all COVID hygiene rules

title: Probably the worst coffee in Chingford
comment: stopped for a "flat white" on the way back from a walk - wish I hadnt have bothered - I think they forgot to put the coffee in!!

title: Food and service was excellent,
comment: Food and service was excellent, recommend to anyone who fancy a good bit of grub and a couple of nice tasty cobras.

title: Superb as normal
comment: Even in the midst of COVID this restaurant still maintains great customer service - putting their customers first. All staff with PPE, every table has sanitiser and tables are distanced. Food deeelicious, service great and will always come back.

title: Excellent food and excellent service
comment: We had a great dinner a Meszzet this evening. My two kids loved the starters (Clamari + lamb sambousek). The mains were also excellent especially Kastaleta (lamb chops). But what we loved most about this restaurant was how good Jonas ( the manager ) was. He was very welcoming and made us feel very welcome. Will definitely go back. Thanks Jonas.

title: Absolutely brilliant experience
comment: Absolutely brilliant experience with my mum and brother. The food was delicious and our waiter (Jonas) was extremely good. There was a never-ending stream of freebies (baklava, hummus etc) and I think you can always tell when a restaurant takes customer service seriously when they don’t include the tip in the bill. Shows a lot of confidence. 10/10

title: WOWZERS!
comment: Recently visited here with friends on their recommendation.

title: So good that I'm creating a trip advisor account solely to post this review.
comment: The food was fantastic, from the baklava to the houmous. We were presented several complimentary offerings which was refreshing, and really makes you feel looked after.

title: very good
comment: After walking to and being in Hampton Court Palace for 6 hours we were both feeling rather hungry I had researched this eatery on Trip Advisor

title: Pleasant surprise
comment: We stumbled on this restaurant after a morning at Hampton Court. We are vegans so hard to find somewhere to eat without planning. Lovely choice and great service. Good sized portions and absolutely delicious.

title: Not just great service and atmosphere.....
comment: Gerardo takes great pride in his customer service - you can see that instantly. All the staff are really warm, friendly and attentive from the moment you sit down. The menu is diverse, authentic and very tasty. Gerardo’s wine menu has been carefully put together and every glass/bottle is a winner. He will recommend a bottle to accompany any meal. Felt like a friend eating at a friends house. Will be back again....and again....

title: Friendly
comment: This place is such a great and friendly.

title: Very enjoyable Italian
comment: The seafood linguine, vegetable platter and gnocchi were excellent. Service great and nice 'buzzy' atmosphere. Good quality food served here but feel that a couple of the main dishes are a little over-priced. However, overall very good indeed.

title: Fantastic food and lovely
comment: Fantastic food and lovely service. Will definitely visit again when in the area. Good value and generous portions.

title: Tuesday lunch
comment: This is our first visit since this restaurant changed hands. The food remains excellent but the service was slow perhaps because everyone was taking advantage of the Chancellor’s offer of £10 off per person.

title: A Wonderful Experience
comment: Myself and my partner had a lovely evening here. The food was excellent, dishes were full of flavour and good portion sizes. The staff were lovely and attentive, we felt very well looked after and enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere very much. We will definitely be visiting more regularly. Thank you for a great experience!

title: Licence to Grill
comment: Argentinians are world-renowned for their love of beef so any place calling itself the Buenos Aires Argentine Steakhouse had better deliver the goods. A friend and I visited in late October – Halloween to be exact – to belatedly celebrate my birthday and the restaurant did not disappoint.

title: Fabulous Food and Service
comment: Great food and great Service. Sukh, Honey and the team at Tandoori Lounge were amazing. Will be visiting again soon. We all had a great time.

title: The Best Indian Restaurant
comment: The Best Indian Restaurant this side of the Himalayas!! A Superb family run restaurant, with food to die for and great service. A wonderful asset to Hornchurch and the surrounding area.

title: Lovely Italian meal
comment: Overall a lovely meal with quick service. The Bruschetta was so tasty and the salads were really fresh. Came here during the ‘Eat out to help out’ scheme, just as well as without the discount would have come to over £60 which did seem a bit steep in my opinion.

title: Great experience
comment: We had a fantastic experience, visiting on an extremely hot day, service was really friendly and food great. Thank you!

title: Fun Italian
comment: Good family restaurant. Upbeat atmosphere. The staff are the big upside. Super attentive and friendly.

title: Best Italian in Richmond
comment: by far the freshest pasta in the richmond area d. Do not miss this. Friendly team, amazing food . easy to order. great atmosphere as well

title: Great experience
comment: Fabulous Chinese restaurant right beside Wembley Stadium. Great evening; very friendly, comfortable atmosphere. Owner run, and great advice from him on menu selection. Lovely food and loads of it. Great eating experience.

title: One of the best spots in Wembley
comment: Lovely family restaurant with a nice atmosphere and delicious food. We had a mixed chef meal where we got a selection of recommended dishes which were delicious, special standout were the fried green beans. I'd be a regular if I lived nearer

title: As good as ever.
comment: I have visited Youngs on a number of occasions over the last 20+ years and the food and service are as good as ever. We were a group of friends totaling 18 who had traveled from all over the South of England to attend what we all consider to be one of the best Chinese Restaurants in London. We had a Banquet created by Mr. Young and the quality and variety were fantastic and the service exceptional.

title: Visited here for my daughter’s
comment: Visited here for my daughter’s 9th birthday. She chose it :) staff are brilliant. Really made it special for her with a card and birthday banner. Also the $1 note to sign and put on the wall. Food is huge and delicious. Loved it

title: Birthday Meal
comment: Visited here to celebrate a birthday with family members. The portions are huge. I had ribs, the meat was tender and fell off the bone nicely. The staff were very friendly. The only downfall was the long wait for the mains.

title: Delicious
comment: Had a lovely meal here, portions are large and good value for money! The service was outstanding, the owners were wonderful to us, we couldn't have asked for better service, in fact it was better service than we had ever received, the staff are so attentive. A shining example of how restaurants should be, and a thoroughly enjoyable experience! We will definitely be returning.

title: Great tasting food and nice atmosphere
comment: The food tasted really nice. Friendly service by a smiling lady. The chef comes and talks to you as well.

title: Amazing food
comment: Excellent food exceeded our expectations. Brilliant service. Highly recommend. We will be definitely coming back to that place.

title: Authentic Nepali food at decent price
comment: The owner (Basant) was very welcoming and helped us chose the best food from the menu. The food was amazing and authentic. You could feel the spices in every bit of the food.

title: Tommy H
comment: Very good food. Fish curry was very good and the lamb was so tender! good food with very good service!

title: Delicious momos
comment: We recently visited this place with family, with recommendation of my friends.

title: Amazing food and service
comment: Food is amazing, great kebabs and starters, friendly staff, and service is excellent..

title: Authentic
comment: Great food and good service.

title: Spectacular!
comment: This Magnificent Meal has changed my opinion about Hounslow I use to think it was an old run-down place but now the food is monumental it can not be touched if you don't think it's 5 stars. You have to try this food your mind will be blown and also the customer service is amazing always smiling and the chef also smiling. TRY IT NOW YOU WON'T REGRET IT!

title: Highly recommended
comment: The service of the restaurant was amazing ! The staff members were absolutely friendly and helpful ! The food was Devine and it was very spacious ! I highly recommend it !

title: Excellent
comment: A family dinner for 18 people including kids. Sent a reservation on the day and they happily accommodated us, we were seated in the banqueting section, all clean and very well presented. Food was delicious and service was exceptional, they dealt with our endless demands. Definitely a great experience and the food was amazing.

title: Delivery took 2 hours, food missing, part refund promised but not received
comment: We ordered a family takeaway meal from this restaurant about 2 or 3 miles away. The delivery was promised in 50 minutes. It took two hours. After 90 minutes we phoned and were told that the driver accidentally left the food at the restaurant and had to return to get it. During later conversations with the manager, he revealed that this was not in fact true.

title: THE UK'S BEST AFGHAN RESTAURANT
comment: Words can not do this place justice. It is a national institute for Afghan gastronomy. Being Afghan myself means this place was under close scrutiny. Service to food, nothing missed a beat. Amazing meats, rice, curries, salads, even the dipping sauces. Friendly staff, excellent food, great value, comfortable surroundings for all types of social gatherings. Highly recommended!!!

title: Fantastic
comment: Excellent food and excellent customer service!! A must visit...good for family and friends or both!!

title: Great Food!
comment: Recently visited with a friend. The overall food quality was excellent. The service was friendly and quick. Do try the dough (the yogurt drink) and Mantoo (Afghani pasta). Will visit again.

title: Delicious Afghani food!
comment: Probably the best Afghani restaurant in Harrow! The Qabuli Pilao is so fresh and the lamb chops are cooked to perfection! Such a friendly staff and amazing food which I will definitely go back too

title: Tastiest Afghan cuisine in London
comment: Tastiest Afghan cuisine in the UK. Good service and excellent atmosphere. The energetic manager really knows how to run a restaurant.

title: Believe the reviews
comment: The Tripadvisor community certainly came up trumps here. Located just off the main walk into town, this is a stylish, airy restaurant, with the owner a solicitous and unobtrusive presence on both occasions we were there. The food was superb and made the return visit a foregone conclusion.

title: GREAT FOOD AND CUSTOMER SERVICE
comment: I am always so wary when I visit a restaurant for the first time, but coming here all my expections have been exceeded. Food is absolutely amazing, and great customer service. I will definitely be coming here to eat and recommend to my friends and family to dine here!

title: Fabulous
comment: We had a great meal, lots of atmosphere and great service. Very recommended to anyone who wants a fresh and tasty evening in a friendly restaurant.

title: Mrs Robyn Baird
comment: Reunion with friends. We had a blast. Relaxed atmosphere. No pressure to leave. Service excellent Respected our space, there when required.

title: No 1 for a reason !
comment: We chose No1 on Tripadvisor and it was a great choice. Friendly & efficient staff. Fizzy drinks ! We had garlic prawns which were fabulous, lamb chops were the best ever and I really enjoyed the milky coconut pudding. No problem with my nut allergy. Highly recommended.

title: Meal with Friends after visit to castle
comment: Brilliant food. Very clean restaurant. Waiters very attentive and helpful. Hand sanitiser as you walk in and staff wore masks felt secure.

title: Excellent and Friendly
comment: Visited one friday evening withthe wife, usual covid precautions available. Social seating food absolutely excellent. Staff very friendly and attentive. Reasonably priced. Had the tempura prawns and feta parcels to start, quick to appear, fresh and tasted superb. Mains we had lamb chops, thick and very well cooked, succulent and served nice sides. Wife had the lamb & chicken combo again meat cooked perfect and juicy. Lovely baklava and ice cream to round the meal off. Drinks good. Good price for a lovely meal. Would return when next in windsor. Worthy of its ranking as #1 in windsor.

title: Fantastic
comment: We are very pleased to comeback this great restaurant. Meze platter to start and finish with mixed grill was a excellent choice. We will definitely recommend this restaurant who likes to get a first class service and food

title: Excellent food!
comment: We had a lovely lunch at Antalya today, the food was really delicious, and the restaurant was very bright, clean and safe. Highly recommend

title: Great Food and Friendly Service.
comment: Great food and friendly service. We had a few dishes suggested to us. This was a nice way to finish our UK trip and head to the Airport.

title: Fantastic food
comment: Love, love love this restaurant run by Hari & Sergi, a winning combination for any restaurant. Their food is always amazing and the welcome you receive is so warming. They are deservedly the top restaurant in Windsor. Have the lamb kebabs with baclava for dessert- you won’t regret it

title: Great Momos
comment: The momos here are very good and authentic. It is served well with variety of chutney.

title: Absolutely brilliant & sooooo delicious...
comment: We have been this evening 28th August. 1st time to the restaurant, we're not too sure what to have so we asked our server, Zekria who also happens to be the owners son - what he would recommend. And we had Chopan Kebab, Bara (BBQ) & Challow Rice and it also came with a Naan Bread. Well, it was all soo delicious and the lamb was very tender and succulent, not dry at all. We throughly enjoyed every morsel and Zekira's recommendation was spot on. Will we go again - Yes!, going on Sunday!! Do we recommend it - Yes, Yes!! Go, you will not be disappointed at all. Thank you again Zekira for a lovely evening

title: Best as always
comment: Best Jhol Momo in UK. Me and my family always use come here and have lovely momos. 100% recommendations

title: Great, fresh food
comment: Superb, authentic food served very politely. Doesn’t look that appealing from the outside but well worth seeing beyond that.

title: A must if you want a variety of delicious food
comment: Momo & Roti has the most delicious dishes we were spoilt for choice. Never been before but checked the reviews on here and thought we would give it a go and we are so glad we did.

title: Best momo in London!
comment: I have visited this place several times with friends and family. The foods are great and services is friendly and the cost is very competitive.

title: Best curry found in Twickenham so far
comment: Delicious curry that actually had flavour. Great for gluten free options. Menu more restricted than a normal curry place (ie not having all the ‘classics’) but this is a great thing. All the curry’s are delicious.

title: Good to see they're back
comment: The Cochin was closed for a while thanks to the crisis and we were sorely disappointed as it's our regular Indian takeaway place. We were very pleased to see they're back and we've had (checks email) seven takeaways since then.

title: good
comment: really good indian food. prepared with real recipes and served in the right way.

title: Good different!
comment: We went on a quiet Monday night and had a lovely meal. The seafood curry was really tasty and we were recommended the appam which was a lovely accompaniment - unusual but worked well with the curry. The staff were friendly and it was so nice to try some food which was different from the 'usual' type of curries that we have. They are part of the eat out to help out deal. Now we have tried it we would definitely return.

title: Another amazing Indian meal
comment: We were once again amazed with a splendid dinner! We've tried many Indian houses in the UK. Fair to say this has consistently been the best. I recommend the paratha, any chicken dish or the banana leaf fish. Although, I doubt you'll be disappointed with anything from here.

title: Excellent, traditional Indian
comment: Excellent, traditional Indian food, and great service .

title: Best Indian restaurant in Twickenham
comment: We went to the Cochin restaurant on a Wednesday night, when they were participating in the Eat Out initiative. We had the mini masala dosa (which was not mini at all!) and a few vegetarian dishes. The food was excellent and the service likewise. Having been to a few Indian restaurants in Twickenham, I can definitely say that this is the best. Wholeheartedly recommend.

title: Amazing food, hospitality and service
comment: Had an amazing meal at The Cochin, our waiter was super friendly and recommend/advised us on what to order in terms of how spicy we liked our food. We had lamb and parathas which were the best parathas we have had, also had chilli paneer which amazing. We mentioned it was a birthday and they came out and sang happy birthday with cake and a candle, it was a nice touch as even the chef came out! Nice to eat in such a genuinely friendly restaurant.

title: Authentic Malysian food
comment: We had a takeaway for Nasi Goreng, Roti Canai, Mutton Curry and Spinach Dhal.

title: Absolute gem of a restaurant
comment: We always seen this restaurant but had never thought to pop in till yesterday (Sunday Evening). I was with my baby brother and my mother. Our plan was to go Saravana Bhavan across the road but to our luck the queues was huge and we came across this incredible restaurant. The waitress was friendly and answered the questions that we had for her. My mother had dish 96 (I cant remember the name of the dish) it was a anchovy fried rice and it was out of this world, I have never tasted something like it. If you're a seafood lover and love a bit of spice you'd love this dish!! (I had about a third of her dish ahaha:P ). I had a masala dosa which tasted amazing and the green coconut chutney that it came with was mouth watering!! My little brother had butter chicken and roti, and the roti was amazing with the curry. Every single dish we had tasted incredible. The chef also came and had a chat with us and asked us how we found the food. We gave our compliments and saw the passion he had for cooking this treat. We all had milk hoppers at the end, which honestly was out of this world. I cannot stress this enough, this restaurant is absolutely amazing. I regret have only come in this restaurant in 2020 when I've been coming to Rayners Lane to eat for over a decade.

title: Very authentic!
comment: SO GOOD I can see why the reviews are so high yet so reasonably priced. Nasi goreng and char kway teow brought us back to days in Singapore and KL. Uncle was super nice. What a gem! Will try the roti next time!!

title: Excellent service & friendly owner
comment: Came to the owner from a friend. Did a casual visit to the restaurant for some discussion. He offered me and wife for a meal. We had restaurant signature dishes. My personal experience having such dish. It was excellent. First time such menu. Not too heavy meal. Does not need much energy for digestion and suitable for senior people. Does not feel lethargic easily after the meal. Excellent owner and keep it up.

title: Excellent Mock fish curry place
comment: Walked into the restaurant casually also the first customer for the evening. Had mock fish curry and chilly Porotta. Chef is the owner and awesome. I will be going back !!

title: nice and reasonable priced local Malaysian restaurant
comment: nice friendly place to eat in i like the fish and i only seen this is the only Malaysian restaurant in harrow

title: A South Indian with a Malaysian twist that ticks all boxes
comment: Being from Buckinghamshire where Indian food is limited to mostly the North Indian variety, we traveled towards the old haunts to satisfy our south Indian palates. There is no dearth of south Indian restaurants within the Harrow/ Wembley belt. The food, I suspect, in most of these establishments would range between good and excellent. One drawback however is the lack of ambience and dull customer service. Not that service is bad – it isn’t that forthcoming in most of these places ( it’s a cultural thing). With the Covid situation we hesitated as we were not really convinced of cleanliness in those establishments we normally did not have a problem with. Eastern Fire in Rayners Lane near Harrow bucks this view.

title: Amazon service!!
comment: Authentic home made food with excellent service!

title: Excellent home style food
comment: Excellent home style food and genuine and very hospitable service and value for money

title: Great food, worth going!
comment: Loved the place! Very authentic atmoshpere as you step in, the food was so good (first time trying Nepalese food), staff very nice (helped us decide as we weren‘t familiar with the dishes). Would definitely go back!

title: Post holiday curry
comment: Ordered our post holiday curry and it was absolutely delicious. Flavours were really fresh and good. Always enjoy their food but last night was fabulous!!

title: Nepal for the win
comment: One of the, if not the best dining experiences I’ve had! Very helpful and nice staff, great service! And the food was amazing! Would absolutely recommend this to anyone!!

title: 10/10 experience
comment: Not really a huge fan of asian food in general, but I have to admit I was positively surprised! The staff truly went above and beyond in terms of service. The absolte best resturant experience I've had

title: Great Food Yet Again
comment: I love this informal Nepalese restaurant. The food is tasty, pricing fair and staff friendly. Go adventurous in your order and you wont regret it!

title: Nepal Authentic Dining
comment: We were staying over night before travelling back to Australia and found this little gem. Neither of us have had this sort of food and it exceeded our expectations! The service was just outstanding and the food was just delicious! If we had more time we would be eating there again tonight.

title: Delicious Food, Lovely Staff
comment: Dined here prior to a gig at Shepherd's Bush theatre. They sell traditional Indian fare as well as Nepalese food and I opted for something off the latter list. It sounded lovely but was rated as hot however they made it more medium for me - and it was delicious! The peshwari naan was great too. They also sold a good quality blush rose by the glass. The young girl who served us was lovely. Would definitely eat here again if I was in the area.

title: Great food and service. Perfect
comment: Reservations recommended. We had a table of 8. They have a great mix of nepalese specialities (like dumplings) and regular Indian food - this is hard to find in London and all the food was great. The bill was very reasonable (about £20pp). Really nice service, good food and beers. Would go back if in the area.

title: Tasty, well presented delights
comment: Excellent food. I had the MoMo's and a traditional Nepalese platter, washed down with a Bottle of Ghurka.

title: Very disappointed ☹️
comment: I ordered chicken dansak and I was so disappointed, the sauce was like sugary soup, I couldn’t eat it, my husband ordered king prawn shashlick (sorry about my spelling) his was nice but not great.

title: Fun restaurant, with lovely welcoming staff.
comment: The food is good, with very generous portions, and the staff at Maddisons are lovely, very friendly and helpful. A good place to relax and celebrate.

title: OUTSTANDING AMERICAN STYLE RESTAURANT
comment: Charming and excellent service' we were made to feel very welcome. Not overly attentive and nothing too much trouble - also very friendly. The seating was most comfortable (important to me as I'm slightly disabled) and plenty of room. THE FOOD WAS THE HIGHLIGHT. It was obvious from the first bite that they really cared about the quality of their ingredients. We had delicious garlic bread whilst perusing the menu. I scoffed down the succulent BBQ ribs in a delicious hickory sauce as a starter. Then I managed to eat most of my ground chuck steak burger - it was an enormous plateful, enough to satisfy any appetite. My son ejnoyed the wild boar stilton burger The Cornish dairy ice cream was delicious and the coffee lovely. Others at the table all said their food was superb. We enjoyed the San Andres, Sauvignon Blanc and one of us managed two Guinness. A most enjoyable night out - we will definitely be back!

title: Little Gem in Holmesdale Road
comment: 1st time at Madisons and we were most impressed, cosy, friendly happy atmosphere with the 70's and 80's music and Mark and Luke looking after us and the food was lovely especially the Pulled Pork !!!
