title: Great American style restaurant
comment: Very friendly service. Amazing food. Some great competitions (spicy burger and massive burger) Reasonably priced and big portions. We will be back!

title: Group night out
comment: Amazing food and good variety I had the zebra burger and it was amazing. Would go again in an heart beat :-)

title: Big portions
comment: I take my family to this American restaurant for the first time. We had a lovely time! we ordered full rack of ribs, fajita and pull pork burger and all the meals was huge and delicious. The staff was friendly and always by hand we will recommend 100% this restaurant for American meal.

title: 83rd Birthday..
comment: Love this little place..

title: Great fresh food
comment: Dined here on a Tuesday evening. Went for set menu. There was a great selection of dishes, and the food was so tasty. Very welcoming.

title: Second visit, and I'll be back again
comment: Excellent friendly service. Shredded chicken starter was very tasty, and a generous portion. Beef in black bean sauce was also excellent. All extremely freshly cooked. Easy five stars.

title: Beautiful food
comment: The hotel we normally stay at is still closed so we found ourselves in the Wembley area for a change. Youngs restaurant provided a top quality service and the food was absolutely delicious.

title: Nice Restaurant
comment: Whenever I feel like having a takeaway on a lazy day, I always order from Young's! Great selection of dishes so you don't need to stick with same tastes. Been Ordering with them for ages, just realized I never had a chance to review it. Definitely one of the best Chinese takeaways in area! Only wish they do delivery not collection only but otherwise 5stars!

title: Awful overpriced food in brown glop
comment: Took the family to Youngs based on Tripadvisor reviews. Lord know I wish I hadn't.

title: Great food and nice atmosphere
comment: Love the food! I had a chance to visit this restaurant as I like to try new restaurants thanks to help out to eat out scheme. The owner recommended to start with some hung Shao ribs as I wanted to have something spicy and then it was followed by chicken with homemade chilli and rice which was Absolutely delicious and just what I was looking for! The service was really pleasant, food amazing, will definitely recommend!

title: Absolutely faultless.
comment: Absolutely faultless. Lovely waiter, lovely atmosphere, lovely food.

title: Amazing family run restaurant!
comment: Such a great place. Homemade pasta, both of our dishes were super tasty and loved the atmosphere. Definitely coming back!

title: The Best Tony and Gerardo ❤️
comment: This restaurant is one of the best in UK

title: Classic Italian Restaurant favourites with great Covid-aware service and exceptional value
comment: Six of us booked at 5 for a table at 6, sat outside under an awning on this relatively quiet street and got exceptional Covid-aware service serving classics like calves liver with butter and sage, bresaola, seafood risotto, tiramisu - you get the idea. This is clearly a popular local restaurant and no wonder - bill came to £236, three courses, no wine but a cocktail each. Great double espresso and a limoncello pop on the house to finish. Not a gastronomic adventure but highly recommended

title: Fantastic local Italian
comment: We were staying locally after a change of holiday plans due to CV19 and I changed my dinner plans last minute as I really fancied Italian. From the reviews I had got the impression that they served gluten free pasta but I called to double check and to my excitement they did. It was easy to find parking on a side street - parking restrictions in the area only seem to be on weekday mornings so we were fine for a weekend dinner.

title: Awesome again!
comment: We went for our customary dinner on Sunday to Q Verde and it was awesome as always! Tony - the owner/chef made us the special starters, mains and desserts all custom made to our specific tastes.

title: Local, brilliant food and outstanding service
comment: Our first time here despite living in the local area for six years. Did not disappoint. Beautiful food, perfect portion sizes and lovingly presented. It genuinely felt like eating in Italy! We will be back for many more suppers. Thank you!

title: So well looked after
comment: So for my wife's 50th birthday, a day strolling around the magnificent Kew Gardens was called for. Tired at the end of a wonderful day we sought out a local place to eat. Q Verde it was then. Wow, could not have chosen better. A huge thank you to the whole team for how well we were looked after, with wonderful food and excellent service. Gerrardo in particular you are a star and made a birthday celebration extra special. Thank you once again.

title: Great Food
comment: Lovely Italian restaurant. Food was delicious and staff were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely return again when I’m in the area.

title: Perfect evening
comment: Went last week for my dad's birthday...was a great evening, delicious food (not a single gripe about anything from our party of 5), good portion size, and wonderful atmosphere. Gerardo is attentive to every table without being overbearing, makes sure everyone enjoys their night. Service was excellent, and the lovely waitresses even came out and sang happy birthday (and managed to get me to join in!) 5 stars...

title: Fantastico
comment: Great food, great service and the location is perfect. It is in the centre of Richmond.

title: Exemplary food and service!
comment: The food is amazing here! I got the Tuna pizza with a beef, rocket and parmigiana starter. My waiter, Arturo, gave exemplary service! I thoroughly recommend this place.

title: Best restaurant experience ever!
comment: Today a group of 8 of us (from two households) met up in the Richmond branch and were greeted by the friendliest three staff members, I believe their name was Arturro, Viscera and Marcin. I don't usually leave reviews but felt it was so important to do after the treatment we had today.

title: Excellent meal!
comment: Came here on a Wednesday evening and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. My husband and I had two of the specials, the bruschetta starter and some lemon sorbet to finish. All the food was lovely, made even more enjoyable because of the great service. Special mentions to Adrian and Julia who were particularly impressive. Will definitely come back and definitely recommend.

title: Lively and great food
comment: Busy bank holiday Monday but booked a table. Large indoor area and conservatory. Despite being busy and a little slow in getting our main courses service was good and the food tasty too. The starters we shared the prawns the antipasti and the salad all tasty. The main course chicken with cream sauce and potatoes lovely and tasty. Nice atmosphere and great food.

title: The food was absolutely amazing
comment: The food was absolutely amazing ! The service was good and the staff are nice . Not my last and definitely will bring my friends.

title: Wonderful
comment: Friends and I came here for a mates leaving do.. and we had an absolutely phenomenal time! Firstly, our food was delicious. Superbly prepared. And secondly, the service. Our waiter, Adrian, was fantastic. Very friendly and attentive, cracking jokes and really interactive as well as helpful. Thank you so much for a wonderful experience! We will definitely be back!

title: Delicious Authentic Indian Food
comment: Great decor and great food. Everything on the menu was fairly priced and presented in the highest quality. The best thing was the taste, can't wait to visit again.

title: Dinner with the Family
comment: I've been to Tandoori Lounge several times with friends and finally got the chance to visit as a family. As always, it did not disappoint. There's so much to choose from and the owner, Honey was on hand to advise which dishes the children would like, as well as how much food to order. The food is amazing and the lamb chops, as with every visit were the star of the show, followed by the chocolate samosas, wow! The service is always so good. Thank you for an enjoyable evening.

title: Best Indian food ever!!!!
comment: By far the best Indian! The menu is different, it has a lot of choice for vegetarians and the portions are very generous, the presentation of the food is Outstanding! The flavours and dishes are just brilliant! The service is very good I will be returning again soon to try other dishes.

title: Best Indian in Hornchurch
comment: We live in Hornchurch and have struggles to find a good Indian Punjabi restaurant ! Since Tandoori Lounge had opened it’s been a blessing, the food is outstanding, and proper Punjabi style which is what we like.

title: Lovely Bday Meal
comment: Wonderful meal five of us for Mum's bday!

title: First visit
comment: Had a date night here and didn't disappoint, food was amazing as were the staff ! I really love a curry but this isn't a curry you're used to, traditional punjabi flavours and spicy or mild if you like, very reasonable price too, the starters are big aswell and would definitely recommend the lamb chops and paneer tikka!!

title: Friends night out
comment: Went here for a catch up Ordered Amritsari fish and was defo the best by far, service food and atmosphere was lovely, definitely recommend and will go again thanks for the food being spot on!’

title: Anu Sohal
comment: Brilliant service, very friendly and fabulous tasty food to top it off. Great portions and delicious.

title: Absolutely amazing
comment: Been here a good few times and it is always amazing. Never leave hungry or disappointed. Would highly recommend!!

title: Great experience!
comment: Delicious food, good portions,good people and fast service. Had an amazing meal,kids loved the food was perfectly spiced. Fragrant rice,tender meats and great customer service to match. Clean and ambient surroundings.Thanks team Masa, we'll be back soon.

title: Amazing Food
comment: Visited with family for the first time, amazing BBQ, Curries and Salads.

title: The heart of Asia
comment: Outstanding service the food itself very delicious real authentic Afghan kebabs and various other dishes, I’ve been coming here for quite some time the consistency has stayed the same which is fantastic

title: Masa
comment: Was extremely delightful atmosphere, helpful staff and great tasting food with affordable prices. Couldn't describe it in a better way. Would highly recommend to anyone who is hungry and looking to fill there stomachs with wonderful dishes. Haha.

title: Great grilled meats and curries - and interesting starters
comment: The starters, grilled meats and curries are always great here. As an added bonus, Masa is not licensed, so you can bring your own alcohol. The food is reasonably priced - and you save an alcoholic drinks.

title: Best restaurant
comment: Wow. Where do I start. The staff at the door greeted us with a beautiful smile and directed us to our reserved table. The decor was stunning and we had 3 starters: grilled aubergine hot potatoes and the halloumi . All were stunning and fresh as a daisy. Really and truly it was finger licking stuff. For the main course we went for the famous masa special. The portion size was amazing- enough to fill 2-3 people . Taste was ridiculous 10/10. The staff were all so kind and looked after me really well. I would definitely recommend this restaurant and they’ll definitely be seeing me again very soon !

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent. We enjoyed a delicious meal at Masa recently. We ordered selection of really tasty Afghani food, all the dishes we had were fresh & so tasty. The young men who served us were friendly and explained each dish. I liked the lamb kebabs the most. Bathrooms clean, fresh & lots of sanitizers everywhere.

title: Won’t be going there again
comment: Not what I was expecting, after I spend £75

title: Quality gone down!
comment: The rice was ok and for nearly £12 they gave us just 3 pieces of meat - there was just a bit of meat on the bone. Definitely not worth £12 !!

title: Top class
comment: Very friendly staff and food was delicious would highly recommend to anyone in the area you won't be disappointed with the customer service or the food it was superb

title: Delicious
comment: Delicious food, great service, nice decor, just a great environment and a great experience had by us all. The food is delicious and the staff are great fun.

title: Great BBQ
comment: We have been to Antalya for weekday dinner and it was very busy, they supplied hand sanitizer in many different part of the restaurant which was very good

title: Amazing food tonight. We had
comment: Amazing food tonight. We had the hot meze platter, mixed grill and a spicy lamb mince wrap. All were absolutely delicious!

title: Consistently good.
comment: Always great, we have been coming to this restaurant for years, the food is always delicious and the service excellent. Highly recommended.
Awsome fresh food....normally i wouldnt go for this type of food but this was 100% on point!

title: On the 1st day of unlocking
comment: On the 1st day of unlocking down, I was surprised with new refurbishment of the restaurant as everything are fresh and very clean. Food was spot on as always!

title: First dinner after 2nd lockdown
comment: Newly refurbed the restaurant was classy, the service was fab and the food was devine, friendly welcome and great hospitality would highly recommend!

title: Lamb chops
comment: Lovely restaurant, staff are brilliant and the lamb chops are incredible. We also had a lovely bottle of wine with our mixed mezze platter.

title: Authentic delicious nepali momos
comment: We got the sandekho fried momos (chicken) and jhol momos (lamb). The momos are so tasty and mouth watering. Best momos i have had in london. Also ordered the sukuti which tasted amazing! I didnt really enjoy the gurkha chicken curry as much, its not as true to a real gurkha nepali curry. But the momos are perfect!

title: Authentic flavours
comment: Lovely place with excellent food and they did not skimp on the flavours. Absolutely enjoyed it, was well worth the drive to Hounslow.

title: Every dish so full of flavour!
comment: Absolutely amazing food. Every dish was so full of flavour. We would come back just for the roti rolls! Other highlights were the Jhaneko Sekuwa, chicken lollipops and the steamed momo. We wish we lived locally and could come here frequently. Such good value. Our waiter was lovely but we had great service from all the staff. Would highly recommend.

title: Lovely Nepalese soips, momos, and curries
comment: I really enjoyed my first visit to Mono and Roti this Saturday with my friends on Hounslow. I tried the veg momo soup with the thin broth and friends had the thick broth one. They were absolutely scrumptious and heartily recommended. Very warming on the cold night.

title: Cute Nepalese restaurant
comment: Nice place great staff and good food. Really loved the Himalayan chips and spicy momos :)

title: Roti and Momo - A must try in Hounslow
comment: I have visited this place couple of times. The taste of the momo is really great. It is a must try if you go to hounslow and if you are looking for some thing different than regular dishes.

title: Lovely staff, great food
comment: Lovely staff, great food, large portions, reasonably priced, no complaints at all - highly recommended and will definitely visit again

title: Nice people
comment: Food was good specially noodles.I made my visit with my family and enjoy lovely meal with decent service.

title: EXCELLENT AUTHENTIC FOOD AND AMAZING SERVICE
comment: I absolutely loved the food! The spices were subtle but very flavourful. The service was equally amazing, with the staff being very friendly and helpful. The food came quickly and was very delicious!

title: Good food
comment: Nice Nepalese food.. momos were quite soft and looked fresh.. sauces were quite authentic.. noodles were quite tasty too.

title: Disappointing
comment: Broccoli was disappointing for £4.50. Was something I could have cooked easily myself. It said the broccoli was sauteed in the menu but it seemed only steamed or boiled. Mushroom fricassée was nice. Potatoes weren't very crispy. The two sides werent any better than what I could prepare at home myself which was a shame as they cost a lot more.

title: Delicious As Usual
comment: My third visit and most special one because after lockdown it was the first restaurant i’ve dined out. Again everything was very delicious and service was great. I liked their precautions due to Covid. You can go without any doubt.

title: We visited at lunchtime and
comment: We visited at lunchtime and were delighted with excellent food and lovely service. It is a little gem in the village of Eastcote.

title: Very pleasent visit, great food
comment: Had a lovely meal here a week after covid 19 restrictions were listed, vising with some concern as to how safe it would all be and have to say felt very safe and cared for, more than that the food was delicious and very reasonably priced.

title: Disappointing
comment: Dreadful, overpriced muck. Don't waste your money, when complained staff not interested, totally ignored us when leaving the restaurant

title: Lovely food and excellent service
comment: Lovely food and excellent pleasant service, definitely recommend it. The owner takes it upon herself to make sure you actually enjoy the food.

title: I’ve been here several times
comment: I’ve been here several times now. Each time bringing someone who hasn’t been before and I can honestly say, every time the food has been exceptional and the service really good. Each time my guest has been delighted. The chilli King Prawn Gamberini is divine. It’s my dish of choice and this for me is as good as it gets. The Tiramisu is also one of the nicest I’ve ever had.

title: A lovely first experience
comment: I visited SENSI for the first time on 06/08/20. After being tired of visiting the same local restaurants over and over, I decided to take to tripadvisor and see what hidden gems were in Harrow to make a suitable booking for a quite and cosy meal with my parents for my 25th birthday. When looking at the reviews I was a bit of a sceptic, it seemed very strange to see a restaurant with such high reviews, BUT, to my surprise, hand on heart, they lived up to their word. Our server was a young lady that made an exceptional job of making sure we felt happy and went above and beyond to satisfy our needs. The food was fresh and delicious, and the ambience of the restaurant was perfect, not crowded or congested, Italian music playing, but not too loud, a well lit room, not too dark and not to bright! The experience as a whole was delightful. With the heatwave we experienced at the start of August you could’ve sworn that you where on a promenade in Italy with the perfect environment of the restaurant, gentle music playing and rustic food. I really have to take my hat off to our server, even though we were only a party of 3, she really wanted to go the extra mile when she found out it was my birthday, she insisted I have a complimentary desert, and after a little sweetening I gave in and took her up on her offer. The dessert was a perfectly balanced strawberry cheesecake with a champagne jelly, it was exceptional and surprisingly light after having quite a heavy and rich meal, and made a perfect end to my meal. I highly recommend SENSI, anyone in the area or visiting, you will not be disappointed! Thank you for a pleasant experience; I hope to visit again in the not to distant future :)

title: Always fantastic experience
comment: Our favourite hidden gem in Chiswick. The restaurant has a beautiful vibe, a really warm atmosphere, the staff is knowledgeable (thank you, Julija, for always recommending a spot-on wine), the team is relatable and very attentive. All this adds to a special experience and enjoying the most amazing steak you can wish for. We had their signature sampler board on two occasions and it allows you to explore different cuts. My boyfriend whose birthday we were celebrating last night praised his Churrasco de Lomo as the best steak he has ever had. He woke up this morning already planning when do we go again. My order of a fillet/tenderloin was delicious too. Highly recommend their sauces, all are booming with flavour. Excessive choice of fabulous freshly made desserts, impressive wine list, lovely waiters. The kitchen is consistently exceeding our highest expectations and we look forward to visiting soon. Many thanks to others who looked after us, we had a great time. Sarka & Adam

title: Fantastic steak restaurant
comment: after being to the likes of STK, Gaucho etc , this is definitely up there or if not better!

title: The best steak we've ever had!
comment: My partner and I came here for our anniversary meal and it did not disappoint. We both love steak and regularly order it when we eat out. Therefore on this visit we ordered the sharing meat board which includes 4 cuts of steak (rib-eye,fillet, sirloin and rump)

title: Friendly welcome and fantastic food: make sure you book ahead
comment: I visited the restaurant with my partner. From the moment we arrived it was clear that they are taking their guests’ health seriously as it’s very clean and fresh. We sat at a large table downstairs.

title: Yummy!
comment: Had the steak sampler to share between 3. It was absolutely divine but I was still starving afterwards even with the sides! Staff were friendly and attentive and the food decently priced!

title: Great food
comment: This place is excellent. We had the calamari and padron peppers for starters - they were great. Then we had ribeye and sirloin - which was cooked to perfection. Then we had the banoffee pie which was also spot on

title: Great steak night . We had
comment: Great steak night . We had a lot of fun. Staff followed necessary restriction.

title: A good steak with an Argentinian wine!!! It’s a must.
comment: All my compliments to Juan, so professional and even tried to make a spit fire cocktail for the first time, so much appreciated.

title: Best Sea Food without a doubt!
comment: This place was highly recommended by our friends and no doubt it was above expectations. We ordered calamari and king prawns and meat balls.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: We went for my boyfriend’s birthday, it was amazing. We were seated with two glasses of prosecco, shared the 4 piece steak main between us (which was delicious) and given complimentary chocolate cake. Overall, a lovely evening, recommend strongly and would come back!

title: Amazing food and service
comment: I had amazing food here! The chef is great and friendly, it is clear he cooks from he heart and is passionate about his job. The atmosphere and music are always nice here too. The owners are really nice people who try their best to provide guests with the best quality food and drinks as well as service. The service is great, staff are smiling and always try to do all possible to ensure guests are happy. It is a great place to find a lovely dinner and spend a nice time with a friend, the family or other half- perfect for all occasions. I really recommend it.

title: Small but beautiful
comment: A tiny place, but high quality. Service was friendly and food well presented. We ateItalian food and were told that their pizzas were remarkable,. Will try one next time round. My hoe Brie starter was done to perfection and so was my lasagme main course, My wife was impressed with her King Prawn starter and also enjoyed her main. This is definitely a place we shall revisit.

title: Delicious Food
comment: We were recommended to this restaurant and we were certainly not disappointed. Food was delicious with plenty to choose from menu. The waitress was very attentive and helpful. Will certainly be back.

title: AMAZING FOOD👌👌👌
comment: We had a chance to try their Valentine’s Day Menu. Food was amazing and service was excellent for a very busy night. We will be back absolutely to try their regular menu.

title: Brilliant lunch
comment: Had lunch today and ordered the spaghetti carbonara which was fantastic. A perfect dish.

title: Not just the best in Pinner!
comment: I am a very picky eater but this restaurant has come to amaze me! I went back many times now and have tried it all from the Risotto to the Pizzas and all of them are made and served beautifully! The chef is amazing, the waitresses are kind and friendly and make you feel welcome. I recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a nice dinner and definitely am a regular now!

title: Lunch and dinner excellent
comment: Under new ownership. I think it was good before and very good now.

title: Great meal
comment: Had a great meal there, staff were so kind and food was excellent. Went with my mum and niece and they both loved it. Good kids menu, and lovely food generally.

title: Delicious food and great service
comment: Food was delicious and good value. We had the masala dosa (which was huge), king fish curry with appam and lamb biriyani. The waiter was very helpful in recommending dishes. Would come back!

title: Excellent takeaway service
comment: We ordered a takeaway from Sensi last night and I just had to tell someone how incredible our entire meal was, but the spinach and ricotta ravioli was the best I’ve eaten anywhere since a visit to Florence.

title: Fine South Indian
comment: For those who don't know, South Indian offers variations from the high street mainstream and a high proportion of vegetarian dishes which makes it easy to feed a party with mixed preferences. The restaurant remained quiet on a Sunday evening but deserved more trade. The food was very good indeed and the service engaged within the limits of current behaviours. Every dish was enjoyed by our party of four and some, such as the okra, were exceptionally good. Parking in the evenings and on Sundays is (remarkably) free. This is a very good restaurant and we would certainly go again.

title: Superb food and service!
comment: Thoroughly enjoyed our visit. All 3 of us had Dosa's which were delightful, accompanied by a daal and an aubergine curry (great portion sizes!). Very fresh and tasty food. Nice atmosphere for a Sunday evening. Made to feel very welcomed by the waiter. Will be back very soon!

title: Good but overpriced
comment: We had a decent meal but paid handsomely for it. I would not say that the quality of the food was anything much above average. The restaurant is also on the small size and was very noisy. We came close to shouting to make ourselves heard. One thing that is in its favour is the service which was very good!

title: pre-rugby
comment: excellent service, delicious food, and fair pricing. the steak platter was especially good and good value

title: Fantastic!
comment: We went to meet our two adult sons to celebrate my husband's 60th birthday. It was a truly special evening. We were greeted by very friendly staff and when we had to wait a few minutes for our sons to arrive , we were given a celebratory birthday drink. This was just the start of the exceptional service. That, together with the most delicious steak I have ever tasted will ensure a return visit. Thank you.

title: One of a kind
comment: Located at the end of a narrow alley off Turnham Green Terrace in Chiswick, the Buenos Aires has a unique atmosphere. The floor is of wood, the ceiling is remarkably high (there's a small upstairs seating area, too), and the wall facing you as you enter is decorated with an extraordinary number of wine bottles.

title: Excellent and naturally happy service.
comment: This restaurant has all you need to have a nice evening: great staff, high quality food and very comfy atmosphere.

title: Perfect Date Night
comment: Reservation was made online and I got a confirmation on my phone. On arrival we were seated immediately. My steak was perfectly cooked(medium rare) and my wife thought her chicken was excellent. The waiter recommended a very nice Argentinian wine and we left full and contented. This was out third visit.

title: Amazing
comment: The restaurant is amazing from the delicious starter to the succulent sirloin steaks, great customer service, very friendly and affordable, could not fault.

title: OUTSTANDING
comment: What an excellent way to have a first meal back after 4 months or so of Lockdown and no eating out.

title: amazing steak place
comment: just a really good argentine steak place. Been a few times. Probably my favourite steak place in London. If you are a steak lover i recommend the spiral cut rib eye.

title: My favourite Chiswick restaurant
comment: There is so much to love about this restaurant. The staff are wonderful, welcoming and helpful, the food is delicious (especially their steaks), very good value and great atmosphere!

title: Lovely and fresh home made
comment: Lovely and fresh home made food as always. We love this place for take out and eat in. Super tasty and made to be a “healthy” version of a curry with a lot of the flavour coming from the spices. Thoroughly recommend eating here- we have been doing take out during lockdown and finally got to visit and the staff are so lovely and hard working- come and support if you can

title: Cochin takeaway
comment: We wanted a good Indian, looked up on google and found The Cochin. As we have been to south India and knowing the food is very good. So we placed an order, I looked up on their website the menu.

title: Went to this place a couple
comment: Went to this place a couple of weekend ago, but it certainly deserves a positive review.

title: Greasy!
comment: I am a huge fan of Dosa's and it is hard to find a decent local place. I saw that these were on the menu so ordered them. I was disappointed, although the sambal was lovely (stingy portion though) the dosa was so greasy that I could taste the fat! The semolina pudding was good though, took me back to my childhood.

title: Proper Tastey
comment: Delicious food. Great service. Will definetly be back. Hopefully we get past this covid stuff soon so more people feel confident to taste your nice food. All the best.

title: Delicious food and excellent service
comment: From the moment we arrived, the staff could not have been more welcoming. The service was excellent and every dish was delicious. We highly recommend the Cochin seafood starter for two, the chicken Manchurian, fish wrapped in banana leaves and all the bread!

title: Friendly service and delicious food!
comment: Friendly and shared his recipes and knowledgeable service. Food was delicious and added more heat when requested separately as others couldn't eat too spicy.

title: Fantastic food
comment: We had the prawn sambal, totally amazing, definitely recommend. If your not sure what to have just ask uncle. This place serves some of the best food in my opinion.

title: Amazing Curry
comment: Delicious every time, I try something new everytime I come here. Highly recommend and try the biriani

title: Amazing food, brilliant service!
comment: Was in Harrow for work and stumbled upon this gem of a restaurant! As a Malaysian, I was initially surprised to see a Sri Lankan & Malaysian restaurant - but I am so glad I decided to drop in for a meal. Ravi and his wonderful wife Raji have come up with an amazing restaurant that serves the best from both these countries! I had a plate of Hokkien noodles that took me straight back to Kuala Lumpur, a yummy glass of teh tarik, netli kottu ( anchovies sambal, you have to try it to know how good it is) and the piece de resistance, paal appam with jaggery (indian pancake with milk and brown sugar) ! Yum yum yum! Heaven on a plate... Meeting Ravi and his family was like meeting old friends, am definitely coming back real soon.

title: Home food
comment: We had an awesome take away fo Char Kuey Teow, Vege string hopper Khottu, jaggery appam and teh tarik.. super awesome food with the right balance of spice, flavour, that reminded me of home. Friendly owner and wife .. made us feel warm and welcome. Definitely another visit.. for the vegetarian nasi lemak i think!!

title: Found on a whim, what an amazing find!
comment: So, we picked this place on the last day of the eat out to help out scheme as Colindale food court was packed. Wanting Malaysian we called here and the chap said they weren’t doing the scheme but we took a chance hoping the food would be good.

title: An exceptional restaurant worth travelling to Zone 5 for!
comment: Having recently moved out from central to Harrow on the Hill, I've been exploring the surrounding areas. Eastern Fire's wonderful owners meld their heritages - Malaysian and Sri Lankan (KL to SL, as it were) to make some utterly delicious food. Is it unique in London? I'm uncertain, but I do know that Sri Lanka and Malaysia have a long interconnected history, and the synthesis of these cuisines is something I hadn't tried before in the UK.

title: Authentic home-style Malaysian and Sri Lankan cuisine
comment: Glad I chanced upon Eastern Fire. Enjoyed the authentic Malaysian and Sri Lankan dishes which are generally hard to find in the UK. There are many tasty vegetarian and vegan options. The owners are very friendly and happy to customise dishes according to dietary needs. Highly recommended!

title: Great Food, Great Service!
comment: We were craving some Malaysian food and came across this gem on TripAdvisor. Don't know how we missed it after living in the area for the last few years.

title: Amazing food
comment: Absolutely fabulous and awesome food. Out of this world. Good quality and reasonably priced. Place to go for authentic malaysian food.

title: Must try!
comment: Came here for lunch and my boyfriend and I absolutely loved it! Pure Malaysian cuisine, so tasty and filling! We came with empty stomachs and left with completely full tummies! It’s authentic food that has got a homely, family feel to it. The owners are both very nice and made us feel very welcome in their restaurant. Recommend the roti canai, mutton curry and prawn sambal. We will definitely be coming back to try more delicious dishes from their extensive menu . Thank you once again for your wonderful hospitality

title: The most delicious curries
comment: The most delicious curries and such friendly service! We live locally and enjoy it so much that at one point we were going once a week!! We now order sometimes so avoid looking like we are trying to move in!

title: Contemporary Nepalese twist... Recommended
comment: Delighted to have discovered this restaurant as part of visit to a concert at the wonderful Bush Hall.

title: Great takeaway curry
comment: 1st time visit for a takeaway. Ordered by phone & received confirmation by text. V friendly staff and generous portions.

title: Excellent local find
comment: Great meal here with the better half. Found this on TA. So highly rated it seemed crazy not to head here! We were very well looked after. The staff were so friendly. We actually had the restaurant to ourselves as people were still wary to be eating out. It was just after being able to visit restaurant again. We are hoping that the crowds have come back.

title: Delicious!!!
comment: I booked by mistake (thought it was another one) and what a good surprise!

title: Consistently beutiful food....
comment: Have used this restaurant numerous times now with friends and colleagues and it continues to deliver beutiful food everytime. The whole experience from start to finish is exemplary, extremely polite and professional staff, lovely comfortable surroundings, prompt and good service, beutiful food and all at a very reasonable price!

title: Superb.
comment: Excellent food, quick service and reasonable price. Experience the cuisine and hospitality . Better value for your money.Look nowhere.

title: I usually have to eat twice
comment: I usually have to eat twice of your average London portions to get full, but here I was full before my plate was finished but my sense of taste kept asking me for more of that delicious chicken curry!!!

title: Outstanding service and food!!!
comment: I’ve been in this restaurant 4 times already and I’ve never been deceived.

title: Classic American
comment: Love the staff and the food here, cocktails were also excellent - Try the hot wing roulette, my partner and I could barely take the heat, but still a fun challenge!

title: Great as always
comment: Havent been out for a meal in a long time but booked Madisons as local and fancied bbq ribs. Staff very attentive on arrival and during our stay, owner remembered me from 2 years ago and was exactly like I remembered him. As I've said I'm no regular customer but the food was delicious as before. I know it's maybe not hard to do ribs, but consistency is as we all know and the menu and food still is. How many burger joints open and close in bromley, I think Madisons is over 20 years strong if I remember rightly. It still has the same character, quality, and cleanliness I remember. Might sound strange ( I am) but If you try it just look at the $1 dollar bill's (notes) signed by hundreds of previous customers then placed on the walls. They still look brand new!

title: You must visit this place
comment: Had a lovely meal at this restaurant last night. Atmosphere was great, staff very friendly, nice music was playing, and our food was delicious.Will definitely be visiting again

title: For my 40th Birthday meal out.
comment: Food amazing and can't fault it.

title: Amazing
comment: Fantastic staff so welcoming, the service was fantastic with a lovely atmosphere , cocktails are nice and the food is fantastic and great price would recommend to anyone a hidden gem

title: Great food , service
comment: Went for a family members birthday . Food was amazing I had burritos and they were unbelievably nice !

title: Best takeaway of lockdown
comment: We ordered a takeaway on Friday night for 6 of us and it was fantastic. Food all packaged up brilliantly and arrived hot. We appreciated the courtesy call from the restaurant to let us know our order was ready and awaiting pickup. Everything was delicious and we enjoyed trying the Mac and cheese bites. Thank you.

title: Takeaway heaven
comment: We had friends over and decided to have a takeaway. Madison's burgers more than satisfied, the burgers were massive and perfectly cooked. It's the little touches that set them apart from the others, separating the salad from the hot food, serviette wipes, toppings selection etc. Everything was truly delicious. Many thanks.☺️

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Great food, great evening.
comment: I went with a group of friends and had a wonderful evening here. I love the concept, there is no menu, they just bring you course after course of exquisite Italian food. Everyone eating the same thing at the same time really adds to the warm atmosphere. The staff were excellent, very friendly and helpful. I will definitely be going back!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Excellent food
comment: Lovely atmosphere, excellent food and wine. Every course was very high quality and delicious. There is no menu so no stress. You come in and sit with the other guests and just get served lovely food for 4 hrs. Perfect.

title: Fantastic Takeaway
comment: We used the Madison's takeaway service last night, having always thoroughly enjoyed visits to the restaurant. The food and service were fabulous - the food was beautifully packaged and labelled and everything arrived as ordered. Everyone was very happy with their meal and we were impressed with the way the restaurant has adapted to the current situation. Highly recommended.

title: Takeaway is delicious!
comment: We ordered burgers and they were delicious! Everything is packaged really well so your burger doesn't go soggy. Food is always good here and so is the service!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Outstanding cozy and homely
comment: By far one of the best meals I have had in London. It's a great tiny restaurant where you feel almost as if you're in their home getting served plate after plate of incredible food! Highly recommend if you're lucky enough to get a booking

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Still my favourite Italian place in London...
comment: Ricardo now owns a second place, so he is not automatically there to entertain his clients. That said his team is great and the formula remains the best way to taste Italian food to my eyes: let them choose what they want you to eat and drink, and enjoy your time there eating a series of smallish dishes allowing you to try several types of food per meal without feeling overfed. Splendid experience each time!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: An experience you will always remember
comment: Just go! It is a fantastic expereince in every respect - absoutely marvellous! You will be telling your friends non stop.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Amazing and authentic Italian food!
comment: I’ve been wanting to go to this restaurant for years after my sister went to this place and the experience was worth the £66 I paid for.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Great Italian- however the same menu served each visit?
comment: We love this place- we have been 3 times in the past 12 months. On each occasion we have had a fabulous time. The first two times we thought was a coincidence that the exact same menu was served as our previous visit...(antipasti same, scallops and prawns exactly the same, two pasta dishes exactly the same, pork exactly the same, panna cotta exactly the same) however we went this week and it was the same exact menu again! Great for a first time or a once a year visit, I would like to see them mix up what they offer on the menu though...

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Such an amazing restaurant
comment: Such an amazing restaurant and experience and also great gluten free options and great wine. It’s like having dinner in a family’s living room only it’s the best dinner you every ate and it’s never ending! Can’t wait to go back and the staff and owners are as lovely as the food!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Cosy diverse experience
comment: Our familiy really enjoyed a special celebrtation here. The restaurant chooses the menu - and I think that is is seasonally opportunistic. Absolutely delightful, strangely cosy with attentive but informal service. All tables are served with the same food at the same time but the menu os very diverse so if you like the generally Italian theme you will be pl5eased with the result..

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Never disappoints....
comment: So glad that this little slice of heaven is open again. Genuinely missed this place and the hospitality was as always sublime....

title: Great food
comment: I was there with my partner, l have to say that the food is amazing and the atmosphere is great. We will becoming back!!!!

title: Second visit
comment: This was our second visit to Young’s Peking restaurant. We will return! Our last meal was few months ago. We found the food as delicious as before. Especially fried noddle with 3 kinds of meat and beef with home made chilli sauce. It’s a great place to eat and have a nice time with friends. If you are nearby, check it out!

title: Great Service and food
comment: I enjoyed my Sliced Beef Chinese Style a lot. It’s sweet and the meat was tender so you didn’t find yourself chewing too much. I can’t take spicy food but my partner said they enjoyed their food. The shrimp fried rice can be shared between two people so it’s worth the price. What I will say is that we found ourselves not finishing our food and taking it home instead because the dishes can be shared between two people (depending on how much you eat - or maybe we both just don’t eat a lot), so again worth the price. We left the restaurant with half of both of our dishes left over and the restaurant was kind enough to give us a container for this. The grilled dumplings were decent but we both agreed best dish from what we had on the table is definitely the Sliced Beef Chinese Style. Service is great - we didn’t have to wait too long for our food to arrive, about 10-15 mins but best part are the workers who were very nice to us and I enjoyed speaking to them. I would recommend this restaurant, plus it’s not too expensive

title: Over charged for nothing
comment: I got a take away and ordered over the phone, picked up my order and 4 items came to £26 when I calculated it, it should have been £18! The food was not made well at all. The first time I went, it was great and decided to go back but the egg fried rice was literally egg and boiled rice and no flavour of soy sauce. Meat and prawns definitely terrible and badly made. Wong be going back

title: I went back to this restaurant
comment: I went back to this restaurant after a very long time. Was very worried on a bank holiday Monday about the seats availability so I had booked in advance and thank god I did because it was already filling up. The food still taste as good as ever. Rice might have been a bit dry but the rest of the food made up for it. Service as always led by the manager was impeccable. If you are dropping by for shopping in Wembley designer outlet, be sure to pop in for a nice homely feeling Chinese food that is very different from the mainstream Chinese food many people in Britain might know of. Take a chance.

title: It has been a pleasure coming
comment: It has been a pleasure coming back to this restaurant after a very long time. The food was marvellous, there is something about the food here that is cooked differently from many Chinese restaurant. It’s very distinctive. There may be better restaurant than Young’s but there is quite no one who does it like Young’s, at least in London. They have their own flavour and some might find it does not suit their palate but we absolutely love it. The trick is also to knowing which dish to order. Do ask the manager regarding this. He always recommend good. My wife always talks fondly about this restaurant. Thank you Young’s.

title: The food was excellent!!
comment: I went to young’s Peking with my mum, and it was fantastic. The food was high quality and homemade and the service was top class. We felt welcome as the manager would talk with us making us feel at home. I would highly recommend this establishment as it is my favorite in wembley

title: Youngs restaurant
comment: We'v recently visited the place were we had a great time.The food is absolutely amazing,everything we tried was fresh and cooked to perfection. Certainly,the best meal we had in a long time. We loved the atmosphere, awesome staff,the chef is so friendly with the guests and always takes care to offer the best quality! Excellent experience, we have nothing with regards to the meal and service but compliment, highly recommend!

title: Outstanding food and the place
comment: Outstanding food and the place is perfect for a night out. Would recommend for work related parties and birthday party

title: Perfect anniversary dinner
comment: Lovely place. We felt home as soon as we stepped in. Amazing food, everything was perfect. I recommend the tajine el ain, it was WOW. We re definitely going back!!!!

title: The best experience.
comment: Me and my fiance drove 2 hrs from kent for our date night and it was the best experience! The decor and atmosphere was amazing, the service honestly was the best we ever encountered! The owner and the staff were very welcoming, very friendly to talk to and very helpful and charismatic, the food was to die for! You could taste that everything was freshly made, the food came out very quick, we had starters, mains, desserts and 2rounds of drinks in less than an hour! I've never been to any restaurant that served food that quick. The food was very well presented and tasted as good as it looked and my god was it absolutely delicious. We had the Tangine marrakech & Mechoui for mains and it was the best I've ever had. You can tell that every dish that comes out was heartfelt in this small family run business and everyone behind this restaurant are putting their hearts into everything they are doing. The food price is surprisingly very reasonable. I thought because of the location they might be expensive but that is not the case. I highly recommend, and will definitely will be going back. P.s the owner bought us a drink just because we travelled 2hours just to come eat at his restaurant and travelling another 2 hours back. That was really kind and appreciative of him. **The best restaurant we've ever been to** This wasn't just good food. It was an experience.

title: Delicious Algerian food
comment: Lovely atmosphere, friendly staff, the best Algerian food I've had so far! Many thanks to the owner/chef!

title: Absolutely wonderful evening!
comment: Absolutely wonderful evening! Chris hosted in such a personal and friendly way. We had the best calamari we had ever eaten in our lives. Delicious tagines and “brik” starter which we enjoyed trying. Loved the decor, such a charming place. Can’t fault anything, a perfect experience. We’ll be back!

title: The best couscous in town and a very friendly host
comment: The best North African restaurant in London. Beautiful atmosphere and fantastic food. Chris is super welcoming and attentive. The couscous is by far the best that I've had in London. Can't recommend enough!

title: JUST. GO. AND. ENJOY
comment: As a French/Moroccan girl, in London, sometimes I miss eating my childhood couscous and tajines and everything that reminds me of my origins.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Exquisite Italian Food with Friends
comment: Wow what a lovely restaurant this is - ring on the door bell and be invited to join other guests in what appears to be a private dining experience.... there was a set menu of some 7 course each absolutely flavoursome and unique ...

title: Best food experience
comment: I am an Algerian-American. In March 2020 I had a school trip to London. It was a short visit for about a week. However, I invited my classmates to try Algerian food. As I remember I told everyone to stay hungry as much as they can to leave their stomachs empty and ready for Couscous. Lol! We entered the restaurant they welcomed us, they were very friendly, we ate good food, we enjoyed it. We had such a great experience at Azou restaurant. My classmates were grateful for the food and asked me to cook for them couscous when we back. In the future, I am planning to visit this place again with more people, Inshallah.

title: Hands down the most delicious
comment: Hands down the most delicious food!!!

title: Love the food and atmosphere!!!
comment: I come here with my boyfriend and it’s always a pleasure to chat with the owner, enjoy the delicious food and just relax with a great music. Everyone is putting amazing efforts to make clients happy-so rare to see in London! Definitely a treat!!!!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Fantastic
comment: This is very different eating experience but rest assured you will not regret it, each dish is perfectly prepared and balanced. I can’t wait to return.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: A very different meal out!
comment: We ate here in August with friends visiting from Australia. It certainly is an experience and a very different meal out, we thought it was great!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: No menu!
comment: Why have I not come here before! I have lived I. The area for years and never even heard of this place. I went with a friend last night and you basically don’t get a menu, you get a constant stream of amazing food.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Outstanding
comment: This place is admittedly a bit pricey but it is jaw-droppingly good!!!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: A birthday to remember
comment: Good company, good service and excellent food. So much exquisite food served over a leisurely lunch and very good wine to accompany the food.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Delicious food and great value for the quality
comment: We had about 9-10 courses, all of which were really nice. Some were quite big so go here hungry especially the last one!!!

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Fantastic Italian feast, great atmosphere
comment: We went as a group of about 15 and were treated to 8 courses of Italian food at its best. Very intimate restaurant with a lively atmosphere. Brilliant experience, would highly recommend.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Definite Must Visit
comment: We went to Richmond a few months ago and read about this place before we went and decided to pop along and see if we could get a table. Silly me. It is pretty well booked up all the time and you need to book in advance. We were going back to visit kew Gardens Christmas lights last weekend so we decided to book here on one of our nights. There is no menu, and no prices, but not knowing what you were going to eat was all part of the charm. Very small cosy restaurant, 38 covers, and so you do sit in very close proximity to others but again no worries. The owner invites you in sits you down and gives you a little information as to what to expect and take your drinks order. We had house wine, which was the cheapest option at £30, but was very pleasant anyway. I fancied a beer and the 'artisan' beer was recommended. it was a 75cl bottle and was lovely so I had another one!! The food was amazing, we lost count of number of courses but they were all good, different and very tasty. The main course was a succulent piece of pork. This was a great fun night, great food, nice atmosphere, great beer, good wine and all in all a great night out. I would highly recommend booking to go here and can not wait to go back. 'Artisan' beer, £15 per bottle. I am glad I enjoyed it so much. The house wine as I say was £30 per bottle and the meal was £60 per head and well worth every penny.

restaurant_name: Al Boccon Di'vino is Non Solo Vino
title: Best saved for a Saturday or Sunday lunchtime
comment: This is a restaurant that I have visited 5 - 10 times now, and always enjoy my afternoon/evening there.

title: Perfect!
comment: My boyfriend and I visited last minute on a Sunday evening and what a delightful find it was! From the moment we walked in we were treated to a friendly and welcoming introduction. We ordered two starters which arrived nice and quickly before ordering our mains. Our food was delicious and the drinks were prompt. Our waiter Acho was the loveliest and friendliest waiter we’ve ever had, and was the highlight of the evening. Overall, a fantastic, romantic, and friendly evening. We will return again soon! Thank you for a great evening.

title: Great Evening, As Always
comment: We are frequent customers due to the simple fact that its hard to beat the overall experience of this restaurant. The food is wonderful, the service is perfect, the atmosphere is welcoming and warm and they always have gluten free bread waiting for my wife, who is Coeliac.

title: The best restaurant in Richmond!
comment: The best restaurant in Richmond! Food and service is brilliant, especially Arturo who made our visit so great!

title: I wish I heard about this place sooner! SO. DAMN. GREAT!
comment: We have recently moved into the area and I noticed this restaurant on the walk home from the tube station. It had so many trip advisor and michelin guide stickers on the front, I figured it was worth a visit.

title: Heavenly food
comment: I have visited Azou around 10 times over the last 5 years. It is a consistently delicious meal with incredible flavour combinations and fresh ingredients. The ultimate dish is the Tajine el ain, with lamb that falls straight off the bone. Everything on the menu is delicious and you could happily go multiple times with a different order. The ambience is delightful, making it feel as if you are in North Africa. Can not recommend this highly enough whether to go as a date night or to take the family

title: Amazing
comment: Food was amazing. Service amazing. The flavours were marvellous and left a memorable taste in my mouth.

title: Highly recommended
comment: Lovely, homely place.. wonderful food, amazing service. Ben and his staff were very welcoming and attentive. We ordered the fish tagine and lamb shank with couscous which was cooked with love. Will visit again soon.

title: By far the best North African restaurant in London!
comment: The food was amazing and the waitress absolutely lovely! Being of Algerian descent, I can ensure it is absolutely authentic.

title: absolute heaven
comment: i am glad the restaurant is back to normal after 3 months absence ,pleasure to see Chris do his magic,the food just out of this world ,and the service top notch definitely will be back.

title: Delicious as always
comment: Really happy that Azou has opened its doors after the lockdown. Delicious and moorish North African cuisine prepared straight from the heart. Thank you Chris!

title: Fantastic food and welcoming host and staff
comment: Azou is a small, independent restaurant in Hammersmith's King St specialising in north African cuisine. We were made very welcome by the proprietor Chris on arrival and our orders were taken promptly. We had four different starters between 5 of us (two had the same) and I tried each of them. There wasn't one that I wouldn't order myself next time. All were delicious. I make special mention of "Brik" which I ordered and would say this was big enough for two to share.

title: The most authentic North African food in London
comment: A spot on place that takes your breath away around North African cuisine, with it’s authentic menu , from the Chakchouka to start with to the succulent Couscous Royal or Tagine Constantine to follow and all of this to be enjoyed around a cosy atmosphere and a friendly customer service.

title: It is OK to visit once
comment: The starter of the day, buffata on rocket with figs was excellent. However, the fetucini with home made pesto was mediocre. The wine and limoncello were OK. Service was alright, not especially attentive.

title: Real Italian vibes
comment: Me and my husband came here on Sunday 4th of October, after our first wedding anniversary lunch, and we ended up eating once again as everything smelled and looked so good. We had a great pizza with a twist under the amazing Arturo 's recommendation, and couple of deserts and drinks. First and foremost I must say, I've never had such a great espresso martini, nice service nor such tasty salamino piccante in the UK. Ammazza quant' era buono! Thank you guys!

title: Perfect pizza
comment: First visit for lunch and we were impressed with this restaurant. Friendly staff, Covid safe, tasty starters, lovely Italian wine, but the star of the day was the pizza base. Crispy, light, very delicious! We highly recommend this gem to pizza fans.

title: Not just best North African in Chiswick - best restaurant in Chiswick!
comment: There’s a lot to be said about North African cuisine. It’s spicy, full of flavour and wholesome. What you wouldn’t expect from most restaurants though, is both the quality of food and level of service you get at Azou. It really is a world beater in terms of both and a hidden gem in Chiswick. Highly recommended!

title: Fantastic Italian restaurant.
comment: Fantastic Italian restaurant. Lovely welcome and a great atmosphere. Garlic Pizza Bread to start was superb and the Mains were amazing washed down by lovely beer and wine. Cannot recommend Sebastians enough and is a must visit when in Richmond

title: Excellent lunch!
comment: We had the most incredible lunch here today. Very good distancing etc. We had beef carpaccio, king prawn starter, chicken in lemon sauce, mixed salad and sea bream between us and it was all absolutely delicious. The staff were efficient and observant and we will definitely be returning. A lovely place to go with my mother in our little 'bubble'.

title: Super friendly staff and boss
comment: Very nice staff and boss very involved in the business. We had a lovely lunch, but the pizza wasn’t that wow! It was good but not the best Italian authentic pizza. Very welcoming and friendly staff

title: Covid Takeaways
comment: We have used this great place for takeaway Sunday roast throughout this last few months.

title: Great chef and service, good choice of meals
comment: Always enjoy a visit to this pub, helpful staff, the food is wonderful, will return soon. We rarely go anywhere else to eat out.

title: Wonderful!
comment: My partner and I came here for dinner last night for the first time and we absolutely loved it!

title: Brilliant.
comment: Brilliant. Went for Saturday lunch today. The menu is extensive. Every dish was tasty and the service warm and friendly. We are coming back for more please.

title: Sceptical about take away Sunday Roasts?
comment: Don't be, we had an absolutely cracking roast from the Green Dragon a week ago, restaurant quality, well presented and piping hot when served.

title: Christmas Dinner
comment: I had booked to go to the Green Dragon for Christmas day lunch Unfortunately we moved into tier 4 so this was no longer allowed Nick @ the Green Dragon offered a take away service on Christmas Day I booked my time slot and it was ready for me when I arrived along with 2 bottles of wine & crackers packed in a lovely gift wrapped box I only live 10 minutes away & it was still piping hot when I arrived home It was delicious Thank you to all those who worked on Christmas day I appreciate your hard work

title: Fantastic food
comment: We had the bruschetta and meat platter to start. Great portion sizes for sharing, and the bruschetta was really flavourful, you could tell the tomatoes were fresh and of good quality.

title: Amazing service, lovely food- no complaints!
comment: I don't ever leave reviews but felt compelled to mostly because of the amazing service. There was great banter between the 2 waiters who were very friendly and accomodating. Even more so impressed because there was such a big group of us. The food was lovely and arrived all at the same time with no mistakes. I would definitely come back again!

title: Lovely good good service
comment: I highly recommend this if you like good food and tasty

title: V nice pub with restaurant which also does delivery at moment!
comment: V nice pub with restaurant which also does delivery at moment!

title: Not worth it
comment: Horrible Tikka Masala for the price.... and the music is way too loud. We don’t know if they want to be a club or a restaurant

title: Terrible!
comment: Shocked and so disappointed! We have been eating here for over 8 years! But after tonight's experience I will never go back. Ordered a takeaway for delivery when the food arrived the 2 curries they tasted absolutely horrible! And the naan was stone cold, Tried to get back in touch with the restaurant to express my disappointment with the food and see if the situation could be resolved however no one was answering the phone, I called the nice guy that delivered our food and asked him to get the restaurant to call me. After waiting 30 minutes I decided to drive to the restaurant to return the disgusting food, when I arrived I was questioned as to why I had returned it, I was offered a refund for the curries only (even though the whole meal had been ruined!) Safe to say they have lost a very loyal customer! And clearly their chef!

title: Wonderful Evening
comment: Excellent visit.the food was so plentiful and tasty and reasonably priced the staff were very attentive and went out of their way to make it an even more special evening.the setting is relaxed and I loved the outside terrace to relax .would visit again.offered complimentary drinks too

title: Lovely food and great service
comment: We came here for my mums birthday, the food was lovely and the staff were so friendly. When we rang up beforehand to book the table we told them it was for an occasion they decorated the tables and even got my mum a personalised cake. Would definitely come back here again!!

title: Lovely meal and friendly atmosphere
comment: We had a lovely meal with great service by the attentive waiters we found the restaurant is run by brothers who have put their hearts and soul in it. Voujon has a lovely ambience and friendly atmosphere we will definitely go back.

title: Excellent Food and Service
comment: Fabulous food and service, really enjoyed it and now visit regularly. Would recommend this restaurant to anyone

title: Excellent Take Away
comment: The food is always excellent and Roman is the perfect host. We have been coming here for years and the food and service never disappoints. Thank you very much.

title: Takeaway Heaven
comment: Another fabulous takeaway.

title: Excellent Italian
comment: We dined here on a Sunday evening early September - would have dined Saturday but fully booked which we took to be a good sign. The food was typically Italian and no pizzas in sight. We had veal with potatoes and vegetables followed by desert and coffee. By the time we left it was practically full and it's quite a small place. Would heartily recommend. Staff are very approachable and friendly.

title: friendly, fun and fabulous food
comment: Great little Italian in Kew - delicious food, great atmosphere and fun and friendly staff! Can't recommend highly enough.

title: Amazing place to go for pub food
comment: The staff are so welcoming and also had an assistance dog which was no problem at all show me to the table food was amazing I had Breast of duck with Roast potatoes butternut squash and it all was truly amazing

title: Very good.
comment: First time post lockdown. Safety was uppermost in my mind and it felt as safe as could be. The weather wasn’t kind and we were indoors but well spaced. Service was excellent and the menu though limited compared to previously was still very good. Recommended.

title: Excellent Restaurant
comment: Lovely restaurant, wide range of choice, cooked to perfection. Friendly staff and service. Thoroughly recommend.

title: Tuesday Night Sharing Plates
comment: We hadn't been in a while, like most people! Their current promotion on Tuesdays is a sharing plate option. We had 4 plates between myself and my wife. They were all fantastic, chilli prawns ( great sauce for mopping up with bread!), lamb meatballs (scrumptious!) , blue cheese potato rosti (yum!) and the pork belly ( delicious!). Just enough room left to share the sticky toffee pudding (excellent!). Wonderful service too, so would thoroughly recommend trying Tuesdays! Great idea, and worth backing local eateries! Good luck to their team!

title: Amazing meal
comment: Simply outstanding. I can't fault anything about our meal. All the food we chose was fantastic but i can safely say the steak far outstrips any other steak we have had (and we have sampled many). The service was amazing too thanks to Oliver.

title: Incredible food and service.
comment: Incredible food and service. The burger especially was excellent as was the duck and fish cakes. Excellent family dinner all round. Great service from Oliver!

title: Grandmother's first trip out since lockdown
comment: I went for lunch last Friday (21/08) with my mum and my 84 year old grandmother- her first trip out since lockdown. I booked a table online easily. When we arrived, the server asked if we would like her to wear a mask, to which we said we were happy for her not too as long as she kept her distance.

title: Disappointed
comment: We have eaten here before and food was ok. Sunday lunch though was very disappointing. We expected more and better quality for £17.95. My meal was not great but my wife's was really poor. It took the waiter a second to realise it had to go back which begs the question how could the kitchen have sent it out. Vegetables were non existent and you claim on the menu that you have the 'best potatoes in Barnet' sorry not even close. It would have been 1 star but apologetic waiter was good enough to take one meal off the bill. I guess it's back to the Gate for us.

title: Disappointing Sunday roast
comment: As the title states, the roast dinner was disappointing. For £17.95 the roast beef really was substandard. My beef was ridiculously fatty and my partner's was cold. The Yorkshire puddings were covered in grease and the gravy was so thin it was see through! In all fairness, I did enjoy the mixed vegetables and roast potatoes (although they are definitely not the best in Barnet; The Gate has better). The service was hit and miss, it certainly didn't warrant the service charge added. We would have mentioned our disappointment to the management but it was difficult enough just to grab someone's attention for the bill. £43.12 for two poor quality roasts and a large bottle of water.

title: Amazing Chef & Fabulous Front Of House Experience!
comment: We have frequented this establishment a couple of times a week since the first lockdown

title: Support this excellent venue
comment: First time we visited, we found the food to be really exceptional and service fantastic. It was shocking so few people were in supporting this wonderful gastro pub. We will definitely become regulars now! They added benefit for us was we could bring our dog and they were just as attentive to him! Highly recommended and the venue is beautiful, clean and welcoming.

title: Fantastic
comment: We visited the restaurant for dinner, all measures were in place for social distance and safety. The food was amazing the best Indian food around,fresh and full of flavour. The owners and staff are so welcoming.Definately returning soon.

title: Still the Best for miles
comment: We sometimes visit this restaurant and often have a takeaway. Last Sunday we had a takeaway, it was excellent. We ordered for four people and everyone thoroughly.

title: great meal!!!
comment: the service was very good, very welcoming and friendly. Also the food was really nice and a good price.

title: Lovely food and service
comment: I’ve been her a few times before and always great experience, amazing service and really enjoy the food! Price is very reasonable.

title: Tasty food, great service
comment: A delicious meal! Ruman was very accommodating. So tasty, will definitely visit again. The Vougon platter starter is delicious

title: Excellent takeaway. Best Indian food I have had in a long, long time.
comment: Amazing food. Starters great, the Voujon Platter was immense. Chicken 65 was the real winner. Chutney's were great. Couldn't have been happier.

title: would return !!
comment: came here about 2 weeks ago, food and service was great, price was decent too, would be happy to return !!

title: Dining after Epping Forest Walk
comment: A warm welcome, started off an excellent meal. Popoddoms were crispy and nicely flavoured, the sauces/dips were a level above the usual, we realised we were onto a good thing. We had three different vegetarian dishes, one was a special, off menu dish. All were wonderful, portions were very generous. Breads and rice complimented the meal perfectly. All washed down with kingfisher beer. The service was charming, pleasant humour, very amiable hosts. Definitely recommended, we will certainly be back.

title: Overall Food
comment: Good food, bad service, and dirty place...

title: Style over substance!
comment: First visit to Voujon and not overly impressed! Perhaps due to the great reviews?

title: Excellent as always
comment: My partner and I enjoyed a lovely meal at one of our favourite restaurants. The owner and staff are so welcoming. He even rang to check that we were happy with our table which was situated snugly between the bar and the window. It did in fact feel very safe and secure!

title: Great evening
comment: Better restaurant than we found in 10 days on the Amalfi coast!

title: Clean, tasty, very good service.
comment: Clean, tasty, very good service. The veal scallop was really good, burrata was great too. Recommend visiting

title: Not a warm welcome
comment: We wanted to support restaurants before the 2nd lockdown and decided to go back to Qverde. Had dinner there before, previously the food was good and the service average.

title: Anniversary Meal
comment: Booked After our local was fully booked. So glad they were fully booked. Love this place. Food is amazing and the service also brilliant. You won't be disappointed!

title: What a gem!
comment: Me, my husband and daughter had a really lovely lunch at Q Verde today after visiting kew gardens. Both food and service by Rui were excellent from beginning to end. They were very attentive and child friendly. Highly recommend if you find yourself looking for a nice and authentic plate of food.

title: Glad we decided to eat here
comment: Wanted to try some local restaurants after just moving nearby. So selected about 4 in the area, Tandoori lounge is by far the best. The food is amazing, really fresh ingredients and cooked perfectly. Service is great, very professional waiting staff and really well managed following all the COVID rules. Will be returning soon. P.S the Paneer starter is amazing !!!

title: Great food, very accommodating staff
comment: We visited for my fiancée's 30th birthday and the staff could not have been more welcoming and accommodating. The food was great too!

title: Tasty Takeaway
comment: Ordered takeaway friday night, was delivered quickly and still hot. Ordered the meat platter which was delicious with the chutneys. We had the butter chicken and paneer with a mushroom rice which was spicy but not too spicy, it was just right. The keema paratha was the best naan I have ever tasted. This will be my lockdown weekend takeaway now.

title: Great food with really good
comment: Great food with really good portion sizes.

title: Tasteless food and really pushy waiters
comment: We had seen this restaurant a few times when driving past so we thought we would give it a try for a birthday meal

title: Excellent all round
comment: We love this restaurant. The food is so much more interesting than your normal Indian. Also being vegetarian and pescatarian, my husband and i are delighted at the amount of options. The staff are very friendly. Would highly recommend. Great value for money too.

title: Fabulous dining experience
comment: Delicious food, nice atmosphere and great service. Even during these unprecedented times when dining out feels very different, the team at Tandoori Lounge ensured we were well taken care of of

title: Birthday feast!
comment: Tandoori Lounge are absolutely fantastic and I am so glad we ordered for my hubby’s 40th. They accommodated us despite the lockdown issues and delivered our food to our home. They took great care with each detail of the dishes. As some of the dishes we needed spicy and others not! The food was piping hot on arrival and we enjoyed everything. The food was presented so well and the portion sizes were large enough that we had leftovers for the following day and we are big eaters! Overall we had such a pleasant experience that we can’t wait to order and also be able to go their with our friends. What’s really nice is how I felt that they went above and beyond to really make us happy!

title: So disappointed (take away for 2)
comment: We went here when it first opened as a family and thought at last we have found an Indian place where we could come again or do take out from but we found it way over priced. Did a take away as really fancied an Indian (not cooked by me) even though it was pricey for 2 this time as least I thought it would be worth it, but i was wrong as nothing was tasty. The butter chicken should not be called that as it was more like garam masala chicken curry and the karahi chicken had no flavour. Punjabi cuisine is full of flavour, garlic and ginger and this lacked both. Clearly the chief has changed. Back to the drawing board for us.

title: The best indian/pakistani food
comment: Since 10 years every time i visit London i have to visit this restaurant. The quality, service and price is great. Imran serviced us greate this time. I have tried more than 50 indian restaurants....this one is the best.

title: Amazing food and service!
comment: I visit Giftos quite often with my family but this was the first time since lockdown. Our visit happened to fall on a Tuesday so we took advantage of the eat out to help out scheme. Despite how busy the restaurant was, the staff (especially Kazi) did an amazing job to accommodate everyone. Kazi was very attentive and took care of our table - it was an extremely hot day so well done to the staff for continuing to deliver great service!!

title: Great food and service !
comment: We come here often and travel quite a way to get here. On our last visit our waiter (Imran) was excellent and ensured we had a lovely meal. Can't wait to go again!

title: Great food and service
comment: Fantastic service offered by Kazi, food tastes amazing! Highly recommended and would definitely come again

title: Amazing food
comment: Its my favourite place to eat in Richmond.The family run business has a great atmosphere and the breakfast and cakes are delicious.Always feel welcome and look forward to dining here.

title: Always a Pleasure. Love this quaint Little Restaurant!!
comment: I have been going here for almost a year since I have moved to Key. This was the first restaurant I dined in Richmond, and I just love going! I have always dined alone and the staff are so friendly and attentive. The food is absolutely gorgeous and extremely tasty. The crepes are amazing and so delicious!! Can't praise you enough! Thank you for always looking after me. Nice atmosphere and cosy. Keep up the Great work Guys!. I cant wait to be back!! 5 Stars!!

title: Superb restaurant in Richmond
comment: It was fantastic to have a delicious meal in Chez Lindsay again now that lockdown is over. The restaurant feels so safe with tasteful screens separating tables. The sirloin and fillet steak and fries, with a piquant peppercorn sauce were utterly mouthwatering. Chargrilled leeks with hazelnuts were a refreshing starter. The service is exceptional from Lindsay, Laurent and Lucy. The chef Alex is amazing. The restaurant has a super room upstairs with an apple tree - inspirational. We are so pleased to be able to go there again. Thank you to the team for such a warm welcome.

title: Excellent dinner with friends
comment: Excellent dinner with friends under December 2020 post lockdown rules. My Minute steak and Truffle Parmesan fries were superb. Outside dining area refurbished beautifully, very effective heaters. Highly recommended.

title: Quirky Interior. Fab Feed
comment: We went for lunch in the bistro and loved the interior of this old coach house with lovely Christmas decorations. The staff were really friendly and one of the team were telling us about the history of the pub which was really interesting. We both had the burgers which were really fresh and tasty. We'll be back!

title: Delivers every time
comment: We are thoroughly enjoying our new favourite restaurant! Posto is incredible. A family run delight. Incredible service - Sam is a credit to the establishment.
