Tonight was my fiancé’s birthday and they treated us beautifully. Plenty of time between courses & even a candle in our pudding! Beautiful Italian liquor on the house in departure. Thoroughly recommended :)

title: Double wow!
comment: Hadn't got round to trying out this restaurant since its change of ownership several years ago and my only regret is not having gone earlier. The food was stunning - from the simple super-fresh tomato bruschetta to the fabulous roast potatoes (soft as confit inside) which accompanied my calves liver.

title: Pasta and Pizza both excellent as take-away
comment: During the Covid-19 lockdown, we tried Del Posto several times for take-away meals. Both their pizzas and pastas are excellent.

title:
Love it here.
Tasty, quick,
comment: Love it here.

title: So very pleased to be able to eat here again!
comment: We ventured out last night for our first restaurant curry since lockdown easing. What a treat! The food was even better than I remembered it, the service was simply perfect and for the first time in months we didn’t have to wash up afterwards!

title:
Best curry in London.
Fresh
comment: Best curry in London.

title: Whether you are at this excellent restaurant or at home during the lockdown, well worth a visit.
comment: Due to the current situation, I decided to order a takeaway last evening from my favourite curry house in London. As usual the food arrived piping hot, well prepared, enjoyable, and a welcome change. I shouldn’t be surprised by the speedy service as that is what we always receive whether we are in the restaurant or at home.

title: One word can describe this restaurant “Exceptional”
comment: It may come as no surprise to anybody who reads my reviews on here regularly that, yet again, myself and a group of friends attended this restaurant on its first evening of opening after lockdown.

title: Excellent food and well covid managed
comment: A great meal with great service. The restaurant made us very covid comfortable with clear screens between every table and every effort to seat diners away from each other as much as possible. 5 stars. Thank you we will be back soon

title: Fantastic dinner
comment: First time to try Chez Lindsay. Everything from the wine list to the Gallette and the delicious desert was wonderful! Service was great, dining room was set up well for Covid. We loved it and will be back again!

title: dinner pour deux before lockdown
comment: As always a first rate experience - service impeccable and great food.

title: Magnifique
comment: It’s been a while since our last visit, happily the quality and standard of food and also the level of service was just as good as we remembered. Flavour, attention to detail and presentation was outstanding. Nice to see staff had taken note of my gluten intolerance and presented special tasty bread without any fuss or being made to feel abnormal? Nothing much pudding wise on offer to allow for allergies, but the petit fours with fresh mint tea certainly made up for it!

title: Birthday treat
comment: We hadn’t been for a while but fabulous as ever. Very pleased to see excellent veggie choices. The rigatoni sounded a bit dull on the menu but was really special! We had a wonderfully cooked, tasty meal with a good wine and at a very reasonable price. All very Covid aware but in no way detracted from the warm and convivial atmosphere. Couldn’t recommend it highly enough. Thanks for a lovely birthday!

title: Fantastic and well balanced
comment: Highly recommended restaurant for private dining and couples.

title: Relive La Belle Epoque!
comment: I have begun to stay at the T5 Sofitel on my way to and from India and decided to try La Belle Epoque as I wasn't satisfied with the other main restaurant in the Sofitel. I have to say I found the food and wine of excellent quality, the service very attentive and the seating very comfortable. I will definitely be returning!

title: Truly excellent - will definitely be back
comment: We had Sunday lunch for two - exquisite risotto with mushrooms, a tomato, rocket and parmesan salad and roast chicken with vegetables. All were absolutely delightful - "risotto to die for" as my wife put it. We followed this up with a shared dessert of chocolate souffle and hazlenut ice cream and a couple of coffees. Couldn't fault it. Everything was cooked to order as well as being beautifully fresh and well presented.

title: ALWAYS AMAZING & EXCELLENT
comment: I've been coming here for years and it has never failed, it is always welcoming from the moment you call to reserve a table until they say goodbye to you. All the staff and management and also the bosses are very accommodating, Mario the manager very experienced and always has his lovely smile for you.I don't know all the staff names but similarly they are all welcoming, and as the bosses which I think they are, exceptionally amazing too.The food quality is excellent, the service is always with smile,the great atmosphere extraordinary. We'll be back soon. Love this place.

title: Best Resturant in St Margarets
comment: Bloomin exceptional as usual! Love spending time in Del Posto, love the crew, love the food, love the atmosphere (even with a new born....but pre-6pm is best for young ones! :). And Jake said he LOVES the icecream hidden in the cow. Thanks again. Ross, Debs, Jake & Hugh Jackson

title: Great atmosphere, service and food
comment: Always busy and with good reason. Excellent food and service and a lively atmosphere. The only thing that could be improved is to change the menu but it is extensive and the daily specials give some variety.

title: Food that never fails to impress
comment: I've been coming to Del Posto occasionally ever since I discovered it two years ago. The food here has been improving every single time. The chefs are incredibly skilled and clearly pour their passion into every dish. It fills my heart and belly with so much joy.

title: Always excellent
comment: Great atmosphere, even better food! We live locally to St Margaret’s, we have visited here many times and the food has always been impeccable.

title: Really liked this place
comment: Feels like family, very friendly. Food all cooked fresh to order and all very good. Thoroughly enjoyed the visit. Will come again if in the area.

title: Birthday dinner
comment: We went on a Saturday evening and the whole restaurant was buzzing. The staff were exceedingly gracious and unflappable, we arrived ten minutes earlier than booked but this wasnt a problem for them. The food was Italian and very delicious. The lamb shank was copious and my brother in law had a seafood dish which he much enjoyed. It certainly looked very appetising.

title: Family dinner
comment: Great food and service. Very kid friendly. Have been several times over the years. Not been disappointed yet

title: Brilliant Food
comment: Have visited this place on so many occasions now and have always had an excellent meal. On this occasion we had ribs, calamari and dumplings to start which were all delicious. The calamari is very good value. Mains were crispy duck, Singapore noodles and a curry all were lovely. The staff here are very friendly and the prices are extremely reasonable. Its advisable to book especially on fri/sat as it's always busy.

title: A hospitable place
comment: We went here on Christmas eve to have a nice meal. We were pleasantly surprised by the hospitality of the staff and we also loved the variety of food choices, meals, starters, side dishes. The service is quick and accurate. There is a separate cloakroom for the coats if you wish to sit more comfortably. The meals are well proportioned and the prices are reasonable.

title: Nice little neighbourhood restaurant
comment: Came here recently on a cold and rainy evening and thoroughly enjoyed our meal.

title: Everything we tried was very
comment: Everything we tried was very delicious with lovely service. Qeema naan was very tasty. Lovely service. Highly recommended

title: Best curry in the area
comment: Have been to Monkey Temple several times over the past year, and the food is always brilliant. Very tasty, generous portions that aren’t swimming in oil. Hospitality and ambiance of the restaurant is warm and welcoming too

title: Excellent food and service.
comment: After ordering through Just Eat this evening our order arrived via scooter driver. Unfortunately, on the way the delivery was squashed and sauces had leaked everywhere into other food and into the bag. On calling the restaurant the staff were apologetic and immediately rectified the problem by fully replacing the order and personally delivering it. The food and service was absolutely amazing and well worth the wait. The chicken Biryani, Butter Chicken, Saag Paneer were delicious! Will definitely order again and attend the restaurant in person.

title: An exceptional restaurants
comment: Last night I went here and tried the Gherka chicken which is advertised as one of the hottest issues that they do. I have to say it was absolutely exceptional! Despite the heat of the curry, I could still taste the flavours of the spices and of the meats. It was a sort of dish that got hold of you and kept you in its arms until it was finished with you. I would recommend this restaurant to anybody as the food quality is nothing short of brilliant.

title: Very good
comment: Very nice Nepalese restaurant. Friendly and good service, and the food is really nice. However the wine list is not great.

title: Well worth a visit especially on special occasions (birthdays)
comment: I attended this venue last night for my birthday. I was made very welcome and even received a free cake from the restaurant owner.

title: Fantastic food, friendly service.
comment: having stumbled upon this place by accident it has become our go to for a good curry. All our friends and family that have visited us in London have been taken here. All love it. Good for meat eaters, veggies and vegans highly recommended.

title: Another Hidden Gem
comment: Came across this little restaurant by accident down in Isleworth for work and needed some great flavour. This couldn’t have been better, a fantastic choice of food and a really friendly atmosphere, lovely staff and made to felt so welcome. Thank you for lifting the evening.

title: Great visit - much improved
comment: Went back for the first time in a long while.

title: Always excellent
comment: They have just opened again for delivery only amongst the Covid-19 madness and we ordered straight away! I have been coming here for the last 3 and a half years and never had a bad meal! Always a friendly welcome whether it’s just me and the missus or when we had a party of 15!

title: What a wonderful, friendly place near home
comment: Moni and Louis are the most lovely owners who great one with real pleasure. We go when we’re exhausted, need a good meal and a relaxed atmosphere. Moni and Louis always have time for a chat and hug after we’ve eaten a delicious meal. Good choice for vegetarians too. Good lunchtime menus too and takeaway. Love it!

title: Quick last-minute bite
comment: Fresh and tasty! Really great little Chinese with friendly service and cosy atmosphere. We were in a rush and we’re in and out in an hour. Classic fishes as well as some unfamiliar more adventurous ones. Definitely recommended to Asian food enthusiasts!

title: Just amazing
comment: We went there unplanned and were lucky enough to get table. Very friendly staff. My kimchi fried rice with tofu was delicious and so was my other half’s Katsu.

title: The best
comment: This is the place where we fell in love with Asian food.

title: Great food
comment: Ive had deliveries and eat in at hei hing and always enjoyed my meals. Food is flavour some and good value for money

title: Still one of the best even in a pandemic!
comment: Ordered a takeaway during the pandemic having always had such a good experience here (see October 2019 review). Still the best burrata and the pasta travels well too! Soooo tasty!!! Order early - high quality is popular!! Thank you Del Posto for keeping going . We ❤️you!

title: Friendly!
comment: We randomly found this restaurant on google. What a great find, staff were all incredibly friendly and made conversation with us, food was really tasty and the restaurant itself had a authentic character to it. Would highly recommend.

title: Soooo tasty
comment: We ate here one evening after work

title: Banging food and service boyyyy!!
comment: The food can't get any better nor the service!! Express food service..I've never got food served to me quicker and better tasting as Namaste Gurkha do.. taste it to believe it!! Simply efffing amazing is what it is.

title: Awesome
comment: Great quality food and even better service. I went there with 3 other friends and loved everything. The food was excellent. Just as I expected. The taste was just right. The servicr was even better. We went in and immediately received a warm welcome. The interior of the resturant was something else. The paintings were beutiful.

title: Mr widomski
comment: Amazing food very friendly and professional crew. Place is atmospheric with little taste of Nepal in Middlesex. Lovely place.

title: That's nice
comment: The excelent food was matched only by the service. Very clean with attention to preventing Covid. Good prices. I'll be going back for more when I get the chance.

title: What a find!
comment: First time at this restaurant, and it was fantastic. Pani puri were really tasty, and the Thalis were out of this world. The service was super quick, and the staff were really friendly with nothing being a problem. Excellent value for money, and we are already working out when we can go back!

title: Excellent dining with friends
comment: Well deserved 5 star rating. We've been to this place with friends only twice so far but always top service and delicious food. The place is cosy, service is kind and polite, food is reasonably priced and truly delicious. I can't wait for the next opportunity to come back and try something else from their extensive menu.

title: Always a must once a month
comment: Amazing food. Fantastic staff. We’ve actually moved to another area and we still drive 40 minutes to get a takeaway / eat in.

title: Mr. D & Mrs. M Gurung.
comment: One of the best place to enjoy hospitality and great taste of food .I always take my family & friends there.

title: Awesome Place
comment: Good place to have nepaleese and indian food. The food is very tasty and mouth watering. Really like the kind of service they provide. The place has a good ambience. Overall its a good place to have quality food and spend quality time with family and friends.

title: Great Food
comment: This is our go to place for authentic Nepalese food. Enjoyed the thali, momos and sekewa. And love the nepali songs that keep going on the background.

title: Simply Magnificent!
comment: Took my girlfriend here for valentines day. Excellent service and very nice and romantic atmosphere. The food was excellent, some of the best i've ever had anywhere. Definately will go back.

title: Always Consistent
comment: Have eaten dinner here on many occasions and have never been disappointed. The food has always been exceptional, the wine first class and the service faultless.

title: valentines meal
comment: We visited and stayed at the sofitel the valentines meal which was a set tasting menu was fantastic. the staff were great attentive without being in your face a great experience all round hotel great and so close to the terminal 5

title: Tasting menu
comment: We just tried the tasting menu and it was a great experience. Especially the truffle risotto and the bailey's chocolate dessert. Thanks to Andrei and all the staff

title: Hidden gem
comment: Really enjoyed our meal here. The service was outstanding and the food, delicious. Couldn’t find fault with any aspect of the evening. I’ll be returning again in the near future.

title: Excellent tasting menu and fantastic value
comment: We almost always stay at the Sofitel when we're flying from LHR, and almost always come to La Belle Epoque for the tasting menu. If you pre-book it's only £59 for six courses which is fantastic value for food and service of this standard. The restaurant itself is very pleasant, with an relaxing atmosphere. You'd never guess T5 is just a few minutes' walk away!

title: True Fine Dining
comment: Not expecting to be in the UK for Valentine's Day (change of business commitments), I admit the venue was a last minute choice but I had heard good reports and we are always keen to try somewhere new. I am delighted to report the quality of the food was superb. The skill in the kitchen was undeniable and the presentation as one would expect in a fine dining establishment, which are few and far between in the area. The table service was highly professional and attentive without being claustrophobic. To be honest, neither of us are fans of tasting menus but it was the only choice on the evening. However, each course was delicious. There is no avoiding the fact that the restaurant has been created within an open space, and when looking up, hotel floors are visible. It is a shame it is not a conventional room where a more intimate atmosphere would be easier to achieve. Nevertheless, we thoroughly enjoyed our evening and will return soon.

title: Regarding Delivered Pasta
comment: On back of a delivery - ordered a pasta and 2 pizzas. The Pizzas were fine, however the pasta we ordered was their special. Turned up with 2 small pieces of prawn and that it... some bland spaghetti. I was appalled to see 2 small prawns in there, felt like they were having a laugh. So phoned them and fed back straight away. Owner answers call and doesn’t take any ownership - most hilarious thing was that she blamed the delivery driver. I can assure you - no manipulation with the boxes it most certainly was not the delivery driver. The chef and owner should have just taken some ownership here and apologised which they failed to do. Doubt I’d be ordering from there anymore - food ordered won’t be consistent every time. Real shame.

title: Great authentic Italian food
comment: We had a wonderful meal in this restaurant on Saturday evening. We found the food delicious and reasonably priced. Staff very courteous and professional. We will definitely be returning soon.

title: The Best
comment: So pleased this restaurant has reopened. Food is fresh and high quality and Martino and the team provide fantastic service. I’ve eaten here several times, lunch and dinner, and it is constantly good. The owners and staff are clearly passionate about what they do and it shows. Definitely my favourite restaurant and arguably the best in Bexley. Thank you all - see you again soon.

title: TOP QUALITY
comment: Booked a table in Brewers fayre got ignored for at least 20 minutes. Walked into this restaurant, lots of staff giving excellent service advice etc. Quality of food superb. Will definitely recommend and visit again

title: Wonderful Italian Food
comment: Excellent choice of menu. Mid range prices. Good service with very pleasant staff. And the food was so delicious. Would definitely recommend it. And we shall be back. Thank you.

title: Exceptional service by Gosia,
comment: Exceptional service by Gosia, we know her from previous joh at Zizzi. Wonderful asset to your company, we will back for sure. Thank you for made our day wonderful!!!

title: Just love this place 😍
comment: Wow Martino and Mira did it again superb food and amazing customer service they always make us feel so special. The whitebait starter is the best we have ever eaten. If you love seafood my favourite dish is Spaghetti Vongole ... clams in white wine and garlic. We have eaten here many times now and aways recommend this truelly fantastic little gem of a restaurant to all our friends and family . Can't wait for our next visit xx We had lovely surprise tonight as very lovely waitress Gosia that we new from another restaurant (that is nowhere near as good as Il Vesuvio) now works here ... This restaurant is a absolute must a hidden gem in Bexleyheath ...if you not already been here you need to book now xx

title: Authentic Italian flavours
comment: First visit to the relatively new Italian in Bexleyheath. Without travelling in to London we have always struggled to find an Italian restaurant with such great tasting food. Great choice all throughout the menu. We had a meatballs and mushroom starter both delicious. Then a really tasty seafood pasta and lovely pizza. So many other dishes we fancied so we will definitely be back.

title: The best pizzas
comment: Have eaten here both in the restaurant & Take away. The food never fails. It’s always fresh & tasty. The staff are very friendly & helpful & the food is very good value for money. It’s my ‘go to’ for a takeaway pizza. In my opinion, they are the best pizzas in the area.

title: Post lockdown experience
comment: Service - perfect

title: Hidden gem!!
comment: Birthday meal with my family. The food is excellent and the staff are very friendly.

title: Chez Magnifique
comment: Last day before lockdown decided that oysters were in order, and where better to go than Chez Lindsay for a late lunch. We were warmly welcomed and sat at a nice distance from other diners.

title: Fantastic find in Richmond
comment: Just by searching for a French restaurant in Richmond we found this little gem. A great French restaurant which genuinely feels like you have pooped across the Channel. A great selection of tasty dishes and good wine to accompany them and not too expensive. Fantastic staff who were very friendly and happy to put up with my attempts at speaking French. Just a shame we discovered it one the eve of Lockdown2 but we will be back

title: Delicious takeaway galettes
comment: We have been so pleased to be able to enjoy the delicious takeaway galettes during this second lockdown.I particularly enjoy “Galette Chez Lindsay” They kept us going through first lockdown and they are just as brilliant this time as well. Thanks to everyone , much appreciated. Good luck with all you are doing.

title: A true gem
comment: The food, service and atmosphere at Chez Linsey is always excellent. We went for an anniversary meal and felt very welcomed. It is tastefully decorated and feels safe with plenty of safe between tables, separated by elegant screens. But most of all, my husband and I love the food - it is absolutely delicious. I highly recommend visiting.

title: Lovely experience!
comment: My friend and I had a lovely time at Chez Lindsay- great food, great service and COVID safe. Will definitely come back!

title: Great food
comment: My first encounter with Nepalese food and it won't be my last!

title: Absolute exceptional food,
comment: Absolute exceptional food, great service and very nice small independent vibe to it. Wouldn’t eat anywhere else when I’m in this area

title: Great tasting food and excellent service!
comment: We've been a long standing takeaway fan of the Temple, and finally we dragged ourselves off the sofa and went for the dine in experience. The restaurant is really well set up with Covid measures (scan the tracking app and then scan another code for the menu - if you don't already have a scanning app on your phone now is the time to get one).

title: Ground zero for amazing food in London
comment: It's very rare for me to write a review for a food place, especially a positive one, but Monkey Temple absolutely deserves it -- I've only ever ordered their Lamb Momos and their Lamb Biriyani, but on each occasion without fail I am *still* thinking about what I had to eat days later. Their stuff is GORGEOUS

title: Miss
comment: We had a great dinner at Monkey Temple. Good Nepalese food, lovely staff and nice atmosphere ! Highly recommend.

title: Ordered food from this restaurant
comment: Ordered food from this restaurant as I visited in the past before COVID-19 and everything was delicious. The delivery service didn’t fail either. Large meals, still hot and fresh and the delivery driver very quick and polite. Everything was wrapped up safely and no spillages. Very happy with the Chicken Tikka, prawns and poppadoms with the sauces.

title: Best customer service:
comment: Everything we ordered was delicious and they had even better customer service especially from our waiter Fahim. He went out of his way to make us feel comfortable and his recommendations in food were great.

title: My Lahore
comment: Absolutely amazingthe interior is so beautiful and the staffs are super friendly, they make you feel home. The food is 10/10, amazing varieties to choose from in resealable price. Definitely going back and it’s 110% recommended! xx

title: Fantastic local restaurant
comment: First time visiting this restaurant after recommendations from friends and couldn’t have had a better experience. Greeted at the door by a friendly gentleman, who talked us through the restaurants covid measure that were in place and was seated promptly in a booth. We had great customer service throughout the meal from Fahim and a waitress that was in training, his support for her was amazing to see (great credit to the restaurant). We ordered a number of dishes- breaded king prawns, fish pakoras, chilli cheese bites for starters and special mixed grill, lamb Karahi, biriyani, and flaming chops for main- all food was delicious and plentiful. Overall a great dining experience and will certainly be returning as soon as lockdown is over.

title: Amazing food and Fabulous staff especially Kasif and Usman
comment: I’ve dined in this restaurant many times and during lockdown I have order from My Lahore on several occasions. I had a little problem with the delivery once only and I was amazed at the way the staff handled it, Kasif personally came and delivered my missing items and apologised.

title: Evening meal
comment: Loved the setup of the place and the idea of British Asians settling in the UK.

title: Great Food in a Welcoming Environment
comment: I've dined once in the restaurant, and had several take out orders.

title: Excellent
comment: Really good food and lovely staff at barking. Wide choice and all very good. Can’t beat Yorkshire folk

title: Arguably the BEST curry in London
comment: After years of overindulging at the MyLahore Flagship in Bradford, moving down South and eating London curries was a huge disappointment. After trying every curry house on Brick Lane, I came to the stark conclusion, only save curries for home. Now, thanks to Khan and his team in Barking, I have managed to find arguably the BEST curry in London. This place is so much better than Dishoom, which places 2 in my <3 down here and is poplar in central London

title: Stuffed with wonderful food
comment: Now where do I start? Let's start from the front door. Welcomed in by the wonderful owners Maff and Ishfaq, who we initially thought were the managers. After being asked to sanitise our hands at a sanitising station, we were led in, maintaining social distancing and we got a family booth. It was our first experience of a paper-free menu, instead triggered by a photo, so no touching any surfaces.

title: Get sick
comment: Called and asked for gluten free options and were told they had many to choose from. When we dined the order was entirely gluten free. Afterwards, got very sick resulting in chronic celiac symptoms from eating non-gluten free food. Do not go there if you are a celiac!

title: Yum
comment: Fabulous meal last night as always. We were served by a charming young waitress who found the time to chat and smile despite being rushed off her feet. She was fairly new to the job but we wanted to mention her as the service was outstanding. We can't recommend this place highly enough!

title: Excellent food and service!
comment: Been here twice in the last two weeks, both times the food and the service was excellent. Plenty of vegetarian options and would recommend the Vietnamese drip coffee at the end of meal. Can’t wait to come back again in the future.

title: authentic South East Asian
comment: We ordered a takeaway yesterday and even though the restaurant was empty due to the lock down, their phone was ringing non stop. There were clearly regular locals who were waiting for orders a the wait was worth it. We ordered staples like nasi goreng and Singapore fried noodles which were both outstanding. The portions are generous too. We haven’t had access to Singaporean / Malaysian / Indonesian (plenty of Thai) so we are absolutely delighted with this gem of a find and can’t wait to patronise them when they are fully open for business again - will be regular take away customers until then

title: Fantastic .. love the food and the people who own the restaurant
comment: This is one of our favourite restaurants in the whole of London, family run and the food is make with love.

title: Excellent variety of food - beautifully cooked!
comment: Excellent food and service. The atmosphere is wonderful. The staff are willing to adapt their food to your preferences - fantastic!

title: Stunning Food
comment: Wow! You just have to try it as the ingredients are fresh and you get nice pieces of meat in the noodle dishes that you can see are good quality and cut a bit thicker! No flavour enhancers or MSG in site!

title: Fabulous food and owners
comment: Can't wait for this place to open again. Love the food, love the people and love that it is local. A real gem.

title: Simple the Best.
comment: You will never have chinese food this good anywhere else. The menu is small and perfectly formed. I cann express how good it is. Family run this is not a cheep take away but real home cooking.

title: Lockdown Pizza
comment: During the height of lockdown all I seemed to want to do is eat Pizza and I wanted to try as many as I could in my local area. I can't believe I missed this place! The chicken and Chorizo pizza was excellent and the base was so thin and crispy. Definitely up there in my top pizzas!!!

title: Always very good!
comment: Went along with my family and was bowled over by service and quality. The arancini are great by the way. I’ve run Italian restaurants in the west end but these guys are just the best - book a table now, have the chat, then enjoy the best Italian food!!!!!!

title: Really flavoursome food
comment: Really flavoursome food, simple good ingredients.

title: Fantastic!!!
comment: We booked a table here for our wedding anniversary- what a find!! the staff were helpful and attentive, the food was truly outstanding. An absolutely fantastic restaurant. highly recommend cheeses garlic bread, arancini, pasta and seafood platter. Book a table - you won’t be disappointed.

title: personal, yet space
comment: we had a lovely lunch in this restaurant. food was superb and well presented (sorry, I didn't take pictures of the starters). Staff was attentive and coureous. Atmosphere excellent.

title: Amazing food right in the heart of St Margaret’s!!
comment: Came here as a couple for our anniversary. Food was to die for, great sizes and really reasonable price especially for the area. The restaurant is really cosy and intimate and the service was amazing - all staff were smiley and friendly and service was very quick. We will definitely be revisiting after lockdown is over!!

title: Our favourite local Italian with amazing service, atmosphere and food
comment: We order from, or eat at, Del Posto very frequently and it never fails to delight. Whether we’re ordering pizza to take home (Piggy is our favourite but we have probably tried 75% of the pizzas and none disappoint), sitting outside with a glass of wine and people watching, or having a romantic dinner in the restaurant, Del Posto is always 5 stars.

title: A beautiful pub cooked roastie
comment: My husband and I visited yesterday to enjoy one of your famous Sunday Roasts and it was absolutely delicious. We both opted for the roast pork. It had the crispiest of crackling and the meat was so sweet and tender. We also shared the cauliflower cheese. We were so full after the starters and main course we were too full for desert. Your staff are an absolute credit to you. We will definitely be back after lockdown. Thank you

title: PERFECT SUNDAY LUNCH SETTINGS
comment: We planned to visit Chislehurst Caves and knew we would be hungry after. We aren’t from the area so I looked online to see places to eat close and with Imperial Arms being one of the top picks we chose to dine here because after looking at photos posted by other guests it’s what caught our eye the best. After the lovely food we had served today alongside exceptional service it’s no wonder this pub/bistro has such great reviews. There’s nothing like your Mum’s/Nan’s roast but the meal we had today is the only thing that comes close. The lamb and roasties were cooked to perfection. Russell and Amber made us feel very welcome, they were so friendly and really made the effort to make our experience fantastic. We will definitely be returning!

title: Fabulous meal
comment: Came here with my partner. The bistro is stunning! The staff were so professional and attentive ! Very impressed. I had my starter and main for the specials both Korean style dishes which were insane!

title: Lovely experience, esp due to our server Mo
comment: The whole family really enjoyed our visit today. Nice food at a decent price. Our server Mo was really kind and attentive. He made sure everything was perfect and special for my mum's birthday dinner. Thank you Mo, really appreciate it!

title: Lovely evening
comment: Lovely food and service, osama looked after us. I’ve visited Manchester branch but food tasted better here

title: Wonderful food with excellent service
comment: Ordered butter chicken and it was the best I've ever had in a while and strawberry mocktail was banging as well. 100% would recommend to my friends and can't wait to visit again. Shoutut to Awes who took good care and for great recommendation from his side.

title: Amazing food! And Great Service!
comment: Amazing food! And Great Service! Would definitely be visiting again!

title: Great food, excellent service
comment: The food was really great, love the twist. Desert could have been a little better but was worth it. Great service, Osama is a legend.

title: Mylahore visit
comment: The food was delicious and osama was really great and delivered it to us in our car.

title: Excellent food & service
comment: A new discovery we'll certainly be returning to order from! The manager Kashif was outstanding with his level of service (accommodating for one celiac in our group order).

title: Really impressed
comment: Such a great find. The food was exceptional the service by Osama was pleasant and informative about all the dishes, and the portion where very large. Even though the restaurant was full we were served in good time.

title: Excellent service from word go
comment: Upon arrival we were greeted and seated promptly. Very friendly/ polite staff. If you want a enjoyable evening this is the place.

title: Exceptional service, delicious food!
comment: Mouth watering cuisine, very generous portions and the service was exceptional. Was served by Osama, we took very good care of us. Highly recommended!

title: Our last HURRAH before Lockdown number 2
comment: My hubby and I visited the Imperial Arms one last time before lockdown 2.

title: Best pub for miles around
comment: Cosy, gorgeous, friendly and full of character, we’ve been new punters here for about a year now and it just keeps getting better and better, especially with the beautiful new courtyard changes.

title: Best Sunday Roast
comment: Truly the best Sunday Roast I have eaten at a pub in a long while. I ordered the goats cheese nut roast with all the trimmings and it was lovely. The meat eaters enjoyed their meals too. Great Yorkshire puddings, crispy potatoes and the vegetables still had some bite! The staff and owners are very hospitable. I would encourage everyone in the area to support this pub through the current hard times.

title: Lovely Pub & Bistro
comment: We had a lunchtime reservation in the bistro. Great menu, reasonable prices- large portions and the best battered fish I’ve had in a long time. Staff were friendly and attentive without being intrusive. Will definitely be going back.

title: Great Sunday dinner in the
comment: Great Sunday dinner in the bistro around the back of the pub nice staff as well was very impressed we had two courses both really nice

title: Excellent Sunday lunch
comment: My husband and I had a late Sunday Lunch in the Bistro and were very happy with the ambience, staff and, of course food. The staff were friendly, but, not intrusive in this intimate Bistro. We had a lovely roast dinner - with very crispy roast potatoes! Too much to eat - but, it was a lovely late afternoon with some nice wine.

title: Just awesome!
comment: We’ve lived in the area for a long time but never been to the Beehive. People I work with rave about it, so we went for lunch. Quite seriously some of the best food for the money you’ll find anywhere. My lamb rump was staggeringly good and only £14. Decent wine list and staff that were all great fun and nice to chat to. Can’t wait to go back - it really that good!

title: Great Sunday lunch!
comment: My family and I dined here on Sunday for roast dinner. Friendly and helpful staff :-)

title: This pub is so much more than your usual local!
comment: This pub is so much more than your usual local. The menu is far more adventurous than your average pub. The standard of hospitality is charming for new faces such as ours but I also could see how well they looked after their regulars making them feel appreciated without alienating new comets at all. And the bar is warm and cosy. If I lived near by, I’d be in here frequently.

title: Best roast locally!!!!
comment: Had roast beef Sunday lunch today which was delicious. Beef was cooked to perfection, Yorkshire pudding potatoes and veggies (broccoli, carrots and leeks) plus we had the cauliflower cheese was gorgeous. Can totally recommend and the service and setting was fab!!!! Thank you thank you thank you xx

title: Lovely ambience
comment: Went for a work dinner the other week, food was great, owner and staff are all lovely, and it’s such a charming and cosy interior. All COVID measure in place that actually have helped the business, which is lovely! 5 stars!

title: Highly recommend
comment: We went for dinner in the bistro on Saturday 3rd October. The food was superb and the service brilliant. Seaford menu was amazing which is one of the reasons we went and we were not disappointed. Nonetheless, a great around menu, a hidden gem in chislehurst.

title: The BEST Sunday Roast
comment: We are often looking for a good Pub Sunday Roast, having tried this pub for lunch on a Saturday a couple of times we decided to try their Sunday Roast - it didn’t disappoint!

title: This pub made my day
comment: This was just what we wanted from a pub. Cosy, warm welcome, friendly staff, top quality food and a tasty beer.

title: Fab roast dinner in the Bistro!
comment: We dined in the Bistro and had a delicious Sunday roast. Myself and my housemates cannot fault anything, the service was spot on, we felt very safe covid wise, the gravy was so yummy! Followed by a really tasty sticky toffee pudding and no funny looks for wanting cold custard with mine haha! You won’t regret coming here and I will be back. Thank you!

title: Delicious, couldn't fault a thing.
comment: Had Sunday lunch in the Bistro with my housemates after a country walk in Chislehurst.

title: Made us feel very welcome for a family celebration
comment: We booked a table for 6 and a dog at the Beehive for a family birthday celebration. We were made to feel very welcome and the food was delicious. We look forward to coming again.

title: Philomena Gard.
comment: We had a starter and it was amazing, better then the one I had at the ivy the night before. And the Sunday roast dinner was amazing as well. Did have room for pudding to fun up.

title: The best ever Camembert
comment: The Camembert flatbread was absolutely epic. The burger amazing and a great pub with brilliant staff. Can’t wait to visit again.

title: Outstanding food
comment: We met friends here for lunch and it could not have been a more perfect choice of place to eat for me. I basically wanted everything on the menu! I opted for two smaller dishes, both of which were equally delicious. I had cauliflower veloute which came with the most delicious homemade filled flatbread. I also had a salad with sweet potato, heritage tomato, fresh cheese and a very tasty yogurt based dressing.

title: Friendly & fantastic food
comment: A great friendly indoor and outdoor space with fabulous staff and food to die for. Highly recommended

title: Decided to try and treat ourselves/ best takeaway ever
comment: Decided to try and treat ourselves during this latest lockdown and keep spirits up. Called the Beehive and ordered London pride beer battered haddock, chips, and crushed minted peas with charred lemon x2 (and a couple of pints) take away from the Beehive. Genuinely the best fish and chips I have had, really. Superb quality and so well cooked. It’s certainly lifted the spirits and something we will be doing weekly. Highly recommended. Sunday lunches have always been excellent and available on their “in a box collection menu”

title: The best Sunday roast I have had in years!
comment: Lovely place with excellent service, delectable food and Covid safe environment! Went there with friends on the weekend after a long walk from Egham to the Magna Carta and back to enjoy a great roast, heavenly deserts and selection of local beers

title: Friday night lockdown 2 takeaway
comment: Fab delicious burgers for a very safe takeaway. A great service, with great value for quality, we will be ordering again very soon!

title: Best pub in Egham
comment: First pub we visited after lockdown and it was absolutely fantastic! Food was sublime and the table service was fantastic. Will return again soon!

title: Feel good pub
comment: Feel lucky to have such a feel good, family run pub so local to us. Always welcoming, with great service, too many of our fave wines (not a bad thing ha), and awesome food.

title: Lovely Sunday roast
comment: Visited for the first time since lockdown and had such a lovely Sunday roast. Food was delicious and the service was great. Would highly recommend the sticky toffee pudding.

title: Great experience
comment: Great experience every time without the fail, amazing food in house as well as take away. Friendly and accommodating stuff, will find a table even when overbooked. Keep coming back again and again.

title: The best pub roast (or dare I say home cooked roast!) you can get!
comment: Lovely, friendly, accommodating staff. Great for families and those who want to put their phones down for a bit. Board games to play which is lovely. But best of all- the food. My hubby absolutely raves about the roast and trust me, he is very fussy as he makes an amazing roast himself with all the trimmings. They do not skimp on anything. You won't be disappointed. The vegetarian options are delicious too (I'm veggie)

title: Chilled atmosphere,perfect service amazing food
comment: Perfect evening, we wanted a laid back evening meal and the Beehive didn’t disappoint. Super friendly and helpful service and delicious food. We sat outside and loved the chilled out atmosphere. The staff are lovely and the service was attentive and friendly. Definitely recommend it!

title: Best pub in Englefield Green
comment: Amazing food, service and atmosphere. We both had the burger and it was fantastic. Homemade and the chips were great too. Lovely outside seating area with shade. I would highly recommend this place. A truly genuine pub with lovely , attentive staff.

title: Fantastic!
comment: Family lunch in the covered outside dining space. Brilliant food (esp piri chicken thighs) and flawless service...thank you!

title: Great setting and amazing food
comment: My partner and I love coming here for drinks and food, the new menu is fantastic, the staff are really friendly and the place is very clean and characteristic. See you again soon for another Camembert flatbread and Palma Violet Gins!!

title: Best Sunday roast
comment: We were meeting up with family for a walk around the Runnymede memorials, so wanted to find a local pub with good food for Sunday lunch. The Beehive did not disappoint.

title: Amazing burger
comment: Been to the Beehive today had the amazing burger and flatbread with Camembert. Can’t wait to come back again

title: Worst curry I have had.
comment: Myself and my wife ordered a takeaway tonight, I had the Sagamatha Lamb and my wife had a Lamb Madras and we both agree it was the worst curry we have ever had. Both dishes looked like a curry soup with a few bits of meat thrown in, it tasted awful, I think a Tesco's curry would have tasted better. We both ate in this restaurant when it first opened and the food was good but now it is terrible and quite expensive. I would have thought that during a lockdown they would have produced good food to get repeat custom, I for one will never buy food from them again.

title: Lovely little pub
comment: Cosy, friendly local. Landlady and her staff were lovely as was the quality of service and the food. Would definitely recommend the flatbreads.

title: Great food with friendly service.
comment: Enjoyed our meal last night, lamb sekuwa was the best. Never goes wrong with the chilled beer! Lovely service, always trying to go extra miles for the service. Keep it up!!

title: Best Takeaway in West London
comment: I have to admit that this is the best meal I've had in ages. The curry and Nepalese Street food are delicious I will be ordering every week. Please surprise us again.

title: Excellent takeaway food ordered so far
comment: One of the finest Nepali food in feltham. We ordered sukuti which tasted perfect along with chicken biryani and the service was quick too. We did not have to wait so long as it arrived on mentioned time frame. Will keep tasting other foods too.

title: One of the best restaurant visited in UK.
comment: I would like to take time and share my experience visiting namaste Gurkha. The restaurant menu is excellent,and the food items are really very tasty and yumm.

title: Think twice if it’s a busy period
comment: I love this place and order from them all the time. I placed an order at 6pm and now it’s 8pm and they are ‘still wrapping up’. I have tried calling but no response.

title: Best takeaway in West London
comment: Why is this place always busy? I love the food here. I have to admit that this the best meal I've had in ages. You should definitely open a branch in Hounslow (where I live).

title: Best food around feltham
comment: the consistency of the food is amazing ,never disappointing best place for nepalese food.would recommend anyone who wants to try good food around feltham

title: New Year's eve dinner
comment: We've been to this restaurant on multiple occasion over the years but this past few months and since the lockdown and including this evening (New Year's eve) was a serious let down. Lamb psanda, lamb buna and chicken corma were awful. It was watery, very little flavours, portions were smaller and food arrived well in advance of the agreed time. Its like the chef hasn't showed up for work. Zach

title: A wonderful afternoon
comment: A superb meal at The Clink at HMP Highdown today. A delicious lunch, and exceptional service. A afternoon to remember. Thank you.

title: A really enjoyable and unique learning experience
comment: We went as a party of 4 people for Christmas lunch at The Clink Restaurant at HMP Highdown yesterday. It was amazing. The whole experience was very enjoyable as quite apart from a delicious lunch (with a very good menu) it also afforded us the opportunity to learn so much more about the whole concept of The Clink Restaurant - and an eye & mind opening chance to meet and talk with the people and better understand a bit more of what life in prison is like.

title: The Clink HMP High Down Sutton
comment: Just back from a gorgeous lunch at The Clink HMP Downview , the food presentation and taste was exceptional. Service by Stevey was first class very attentive and helpful. Really, really impressed by the restaurant decor you soon forget you are in a prison. Learning more about The Clink charity and all that it does was really enlightening...we will definitely go back again

title: Cant beat The Clink
comment: Love this place, conveniently placed, always serves up good quality food. One of my favourite places to go and it never disappoints.

title: Great service
comment: Great Jerk Chicken and excellent staff. Popped in for lunch after a business visit. Looking forward to returning soon!!

title: Excellent food and service ,a must visit restaurant .
comment: Our first visit ,Feb 20 ,once the formalities of security were done we were taken into the restaurant in the main building ,decor is amazing ,and worthy of any top class restaurant ,,we were very well looked after by our server Dean,mocktails to drink ,two starters ,Parsnip soup and sourdough toast ,for me ,Cheese soufflé for the wife ,mains were venison and oyster pie with kale ,mushrooms and creamy mash ,followed by ice cream ,and a sorbet ,with coffee ,food was excellent service was also excellent ,we had quite a long conversation with Dean who told us how much he enjoyed working there ,and a bit about himself ,I said it must be strange to be called by your first name in the restaurant and your surname back on the wing ,he said it wasn’t a problem as they get on really well with the staff ,we wished him luck for the future ,I would recommend anyone with an interest in food to give the restaurant a try ,you will not only be amazed but you will be supporting a very worthwhile charity ,thank you to all staff at the restaurant .

title: LOvely restaurant, great food and staff.
comment: Had lunch on February 28th. Enjoyed the food: very impressed with the quality and the service by excellent staff.

title: Unusual venue
comment: Thank you Lenroy & all the staff for your fabulous front of house service. You made us feel so welcome & enjoyed chatting to you all. The food & presentation were superb. Cheese soufflé, parsnip soup, belly of pork with pig cheeks, creme caramel & mille feuille. 5* Thank you so much for a wonderful afternoon & wish you much success.

title: Consistently Good Food
comment: We discovered Il Vesuvio during lockdown and ordered a takeaway, it arrived hot and everything was tasty. We all really enjoyed the food so we were looking forward to eating in the restaurant once it reopened. We’ve eaten here a few times now (once in the last week) and we have all tried something different from the menu each time - 2adults & 2children, I can personally recommend the mussels, the garlic bread (topped with tomato sauce) and the seafood pasta. The food is of good quality and seriously tasty. The portion sizes and prices are also good. The staff are friendly and helpful but not intrusive. Not one complaint. A new family favourite. Looking forward to going again :)

title: Fabulous meal!
comment: What a wonderful lunch we have just had at The Clink, HMP Highdown! My third visit and have never failed to be impressed by the level of service and quality of food. Lunch was expertly prepared, presented and tasted delicious.

title: Lovely
comment: this restaurant is so conveniently placed just a few steps from my apartment, makes it easy to stop by for lunch. Just recently went with my ma and pa. They are so hard to please but it was a big smile on their face at the end :))))))))))

title: Wanted to try here and was pleased I did
comment: I have always wanted to try this restaurant and I am glad I did. I had lunch here last Saturday and was not disappointed. The restaurant was clean and definitely abibded by the rules placed at the moment with regards to Covid. I had the mushroom risotto it was delicious. The service was very good and I would definatly come here again.

title: great food
comment: I went there last night and everything was very good. Great taste food freshly cooked and real good flavour . Service was excellent. Best Italian in bexley area for sure.

title: One of the best Italian restaurants I’ve been to (incl in Italy!)
comment: Fantastic! One of the best Italian restaurants I’ve been to in and around London. Proper Italian food, owners are Italian, passionate and it shows! Love the feeling it feels like a family restaurant too!

title: Yet another fabulous evening at Il Vesuvio
comment: I have written several reviews about this wonderful restaurant and I just have to write another one. My husband and I have been visiting since the day after it opened and it never fails to impress. It was great to be there on a fully booked Saturday night and soak up the atmosphere. As usual, thanks so much to Mira, Martino, Matteo, Marcella, Gosia and in fact all the staff whose names we don't know. The welcome, the food, the atmosphere, the service are second to none. We are grateful to have you as friends as well as our hosts.

title: A GREAT restaurant.
comment: A GREAT restaurant.

title: New spot for authentic Italian cuisine
comment: 10/10 food and service. This is a lovely restaurant and I’m glad I found it. Food portions are plentiful and the prices are good. The service we received was great so we’ll be back and will spread the word of this little gem. Highly recommend. Great cocktails.

title: Superb!
comment: My friends and I have visited this restaurant on several occasions. We are always warmly greeted and extremely well looked after. The staff are well mannered and very professional. The food is excellent and well portioned. The pasta is so full of flavour, delicious! The dry house wine always goes down a treat, and the tiramisu is outstanding. The restaurant itself has a lovely ambiance.

title: Good Start to the Holiday
comment: Always look forward to booking into Heathrow and La Belle Epoque. The food and service is excellent, the staff change over the years but that does not alter anything, but for the loss of a friendly face.

title: Couldn’t get any better - excellent!
comment: First visit, brought my mum. Fabulous food, so much choice, obviously fresh ingredients. Started with complimentary olives and bread, awesome starters, I had baked avocado, mum had scallops. Followed by monkfish tagliatelle and my scampi and prawn tagliatelle was to die for. Left a bit of room for chocolate mousse and panacotta! Lovely idea of complimentary limoncello as we paid the bill. Price was reasonable, food really good and they have absolutely got the customer service right! Friendly and welcoming. Will definitely be back and thoroughly recommend. I just hope the COVID situation and lockdowns don’t hit them too hard. This is one restaurant that deserves to survive!

title: wonderful food at T5 hotel.
comment: Wonderful food at Sofitel T5 in house top end restaurant. great quality food and service. full a la carte and taster menu available. best airport hotel restaurant I have visited.

title: Fantastic Authentic French Food! (With great service too)
comment: We hadn't booked and were asked to wait in the bar for 15 minutes, not a problem....

title: Fine Dining at HMP Highdown
comment: It's such a treat when you go somewhere and the food in real time is just as good as the photo's on the website. Unbelievable standard of food with the quirk of the plastic cutlery and of course no alcohol, which when food is of that standard you don't miss at all. Our favorite choices were the mushroom and chestnut pate and rump lamb but all were delicious. Service again was up there, a young guy called Jason, who was very polite and attentive and we sincerely wish him well in his future. Well done Clink, a great concept

title: Superb lunch
comment: Superb lunch, cordon bleu cuisine. Jason our waiter was excellent, Couldn't believe that he was new to waitering. Asked him loads of questions and he seemed happy to chat with us. Good salesman we purchased a poetry book (heart rendering and thought provoking) a mug and a pen. He said that he was enjoying the training and had learnt a lot. We chose rump of lamb for our main course which was cooked to perfection - compliments to the chef and Jason persuaded us to have a Mockcocktail (obviously non alcoholic which was so delicious we asked for the recipe. Recommended to friends and we are booking for tea in December. Will pass the word around. Great experience all round.

title: Stunning surprise
comment: We decided to have lunch at The Clink as the ratings were high, and we can see why. The restaurants was surprisingly stunning, the food was great and the service was sensational! Highly recommend.

title: Amazingly good food with a twist
comment: 4 of us attended on the 6 November for lunch.

title: A great lunch and an illuminating experience
comment: Our WI group had an excellent 3-course lunch at HMP Highdown. The food was superb and beautifully presented, the service good and the experience informative. We were very impressed with all the staff who served us, and who made our visit so memorable. The Clink is a great concept and deserves to be supported. Highly recommended.

title: Don’t miss this experience
comment: Had another amazing meal at the clink yesterday with friends for a special birthday.

title: Perfect!
comment: A perfect lunch, delicious food, just right size portions. We were served by Jason who was friendly, informative and efficient. Would recommend and would happily go back!

title: Great experience
comment: If you are looking for great food in a less than traditional venue then The Clink is the place for you. The restaurant is tastefully furnished, with an open pass so you can see what’s going on in the kitchen. The menu included lots of home grown ingredients and seasonal produce. The food was delicious, beautifully presented and the service was faultless. A great concept, will definitely visit again.

title: Such a brilliant idea!
comment: Wonderful system of preparing former inmates for the outside world. So much pride in their work. And truly tasty, beautifully presented food.

title: Faultless Food
comment: Once you are passed security you almost immediately forget the location. The decor is restful and staff attentive. Most of all the food is to die for. Presentation, flavour just exceptional. I have been raving to my friends about the sea bass. If I was served this sort of food at a top London restaurant I would not be disappointed. I wish everyone the very best in the future as they so deserve it.

title: La Belle Époque - 5 🌟
comment: We stayed at the Sofitel Heathrow Terminal 5 and decided to eat at the “La Belle Époque”

title: Fantastic as always
comment: Fantastic as always. Came here few years back and didn’t expect much as it’s a hotel next to the airport but they have proven me wrong. The food was delicious and the staff were well trained (even better than the hotel staff), I would travel all the way from Central London to here to have the tasting menu.

title: Great dining experience
comment: The staff is friendly and offer a great service for a enjoyable dining experience.

title: Great Dining In an Airport Hotel Restaurant? Better Believe It!
comment: We were blown away by our meal at Sofitel's La Belle Epoque theme restaurant within T5 at London Heathrow on our overnight last weekend. Had never really had time to try it on many prior layovers, but this time we did, and so glad we had the opportunity. Have to say that the meal was delicious, the service impeccable and the value outstanding (we did an earlybird prix fixe at 7p.m., which was a new option at the hotel, by the way. The creativeness of the menu, obviously from a master chef, was fantastic. The ingredients were very obviously fresh, ideally prepared and well-presented. We were happy campers, for sure.

title: Delicious tasting menu
comment: We had the tasting menu before a trip to New York and it was such a wonderful experience! We went for the accompanied wine pairing which was a lovely! The whole experience was brilliant and the service was very good and knowledgeable about the dishes!

title: A hidden gem
comment: Found myself in this restaurant on a Saturday night before a Sunday flight. Despite sitting on my own, I didn't feel out of place. Excellent service from all members of staff. The food was beautiful, central London restaurant quality without a central London price. Can't make a criticism of any part of my visit.

title: Wonderful restaurant
comment: We had a takeaway for my birthday last night, would normally have eaten there, but due to lockdown, next best thing, meal was delivered on time, a lovely meal, garlic mushrooms, lamb chops and tiramisu, all so well cooked and hot, did put them into the microwave for a minute just to make sure. Would throughly recommend this restaurant for a takeaway in lockdown.

title: Best dinner
comment: The restaurant is incrible from the decor style, great service of attendants to amazing food. I was delighted by the treatment I received and delicious food. I will certainly eat there again if I stay at Sofitel... But it is worth going there if you are around Terminal 5 at Heathrow. The waiter who served me was Andrei and was amazing. Great work and company. Thank you all La Belle Epoque staff.

title: Takeaway fabulous.
comment: Visited Bella Donna with my husband a few times as the food and service is always brilliant. The food is always fresh tasting and just the best Italian I've had, especially their arancini, never had that before and oh my goodness, just beautiful but just appears on the specials menu and missed out last visit. Service is the best, absolutely cannot fault them. Due to lockdown, recently had a takeaway and pleasantly surprised the quality did not differ from eating in the restaurant and was beautiful and tasty and had to call them to let them know. Keep up the great work team, stay safe and hope to be able to come in and see you once things settle down.

title: Good meal
comment: Very nice meal, well cooked, good ingredients, well presented, and good, friendly staff.

title: Meal after Lockdown
comment: We visited Bella Donna on Saturday 4th July as restaraunts were able to open that day after lockdown. Once again the food was absoutley delicious. The premises has been re-decorated during lockdown and it is looking very nice with new and very comfortable chairs. The staff as usual were attentive friendly and proffesional. During lockdown they served takeaways which were always presented in appertizing way and the food was always fresh and hot.

title: First meal out after lockdown
comment: First meal out after lockdown and as usual the food and service were excellent. For those of you around morden still wondering whether to go out for your first meal I would suggest you try belladonna, screens around tables for social distancing they can be moved to accommodate small or larger family parties. Staff still very friendly whilst keeping their distance and serving at arm’s-length. lovely atmosphere with couples and families still enjoying their evening out. Shell go again very soon.

title: First visit after lockdown.
comment: First visit after lockdown. The restaurant has been redecorated with fewer well spaced Covid-distancing tables. The food is excellent as always and the staff, their normal friendly and efficient selves. Nice to see familiar faces amongst the customers.

title: Date night
comment: Pete and Sue Smith have just enjoyed a lovely Date Night at Bella Donna in Morden. Surrey taking advantage of the Eat out to Help Out.

title: Regular customer
comment: This has long been my favourite restaurant but haven't visited in some time aside from special occasions.

title: Super Italian food
comment: Had dinner with 5 friends and restaurant felt spacious with screens and good space between the tables. We had a selection of courses including the chicken special, pizza, risotto, etc.

title: Lovely evening
comment: Really pleasant restaurant with French and Bretton specialities.

title: A hidden Gem
comment: You would not believe there could be such a lovely Restaurant in Morden. The food is plentiful and delicious. Good prices and very friendly service. Book somewhere local today

title: Fantastic!
comment: Lovely food and fantastic service! The staff are incredibly friendly throughout and clearly passionate about the food they serve and the service they provide. Lovely warm feel to the restaurant as well! Would absolutely recommend!

title: I would so highly recommend
comment: I would so highly recommend this lovely restaurant we visited for the first time. Very welcoming staff, great food and service. The lamb was delicious and cooked perfectly. A little gem in Richmond!

title: Wonderful as always
comment: We have been coming to Chez Lindsay for 20+ years and it is special every time. Absolutely our favourite restaurant in Richmond. Food is always of the highest quality and the welcome is so warm.

title: Delicious galettes
comment: Our favourite French restaurant, but an hour or so drive from home, so it has been a while. Friday 11 December 2020, en route to the Christmas lights at Kew Gardens, we popped in for lunch at Chez Lindsay. We had a cosy corner table by the rear window. It was an opportunity for us to try the Galettes and Crepes for the first time. We were not disappointed! I ate the Les Complete (Buckwheat pancake with egg, cheese and ham), followed by the Crêpe au Nutella - with extra ice cream. Both were superb and delicious. My wife ate the Galette au Roquefort (Buckwheat pancake with onion sauce, celery, walnuts and Roquefort sauce), followed by Crepe Normande (apples and salty caramel sauce). I washed it down with a very good glass of Largesse 2017 Merlot (Pays d’Oc), and my wife particularly commented on how good her Kir Royal was. All for £27 per head, including 12.5% Service. Highly recommended. Oh and yes, all Covid measures were observed: screen, masks, etc.

title: Wonderful meal, staff, atmosphere and dining experience. Highly recommend
comment: We always enjoy our evenings at Chez Lindsay, as it has an authentic French menu, which is delicious, varied and seasonal. The staff are friendly, attentive and create a lovely atmosphere.

title: All in one, really nice food,
comment: All in one, really nice food, really nice service. Crossing the Richmond Bridge we found A true journey to France.

title: A wonderful piece of France in London!
comment: My colleague and I visited the restaurant for lunch earlier this month. The service was absolutely brilliant-typical of a french restaurant, attentive and patient. I had the soup to start which was heavenly, my colleague had the Camembert. We indulged and went for the large shellfish platter to share. We had a wonderful bottle of Viognier, recommended by the waitress and then my friend treated us to champagne too. A fabulous experience. I do hope to return once things change next year!

title: Excellent
comment: Fantastic genuine cuisine, excellent staff and atmosphere! Cannot fault it!

title: Delicious lunch in R&H cafe in Richmond
comment: Had lunch with a friend here. It's a small ish cafe with a nice chilled atmosphere. They offer healthy options at affordable prices. I had the four salads with Thai broth which was delicious. My friend had a vegetable quiche and a brownie. Quick service. I'd definitely go back !

title: Very good food and service
comment: Popped in for a quick lunch on the way up to London for the day.

title: An awesome restaurant
comment: Came here with my husband, son, daughter in law and 2 grand children aged 4 and 1. The level of customer service was the best I have ever experienced. My 4 year old grand daughter had paper to draw on a special drink and her pasta before we had ordered and both of them were totally looked after from start to finish. The lovely waitress even noticed that my grand daughter's hair was getting in her pasta and brought her a hair bobble! The food was delicious. Fast service but we didn't feel rushed at all. Lovely wine and beer and the atmosphere was warm and inviting. The manager was incredible. Super suggestions for food and made my grand daughter feel so special - even pinning her picture up on the wall and taking her into the kitchen. By far and way the least stressful meal out we have ever had with the 2 kids but also one of the nicest meals I have had too. My husbands birthday is January and we will definitely be back then if not before.

title: Great Christmas Party!!
comment: Recently had our Christmas party at Bella Donna.

title: Friendly Family Italian Restaurant with lovely food
comment: We ate here as part of a group of 29 adults and children for our Christmas Party. The staff were extremely friendly and accomodating and the food and service was excellent. They even allowed us to dance after the meal.

title: MVC Christmas Party
comment: Came to Bella Donna for Merton Vineyard Church Christmas party. A lovely venue. Food was really tasty with good size portions. The staff were superb and met everybody’s needs. We had a really good time dancing after the meal. Fully recommend this place for food or even hiring for a party. Well done to all the staff. Compliments to the chef.

title: Nearly 5*
comment: 7 of us came here for dinner,I had the prawn cocktail for starters which was a huge portion (see photo)and tasted great, the mains I had was on the special board ( lobster ravioli) for me it tasted good, nice wine the Italian Sauvignon blanc. The party had different dishes all enjoyed there meals, menu was great with a specials board, staff were great and explained the Specials. Overall a lovely place and its well recommended.

title: Great local Italian restaurant.
comment: Good food & wine with welcoming and friendly staff - what else could you ask for?

title: Xmas dinner
comment: Very friendly food good a bit expensive but very nice. Parking not good if you are driving so I recommend bus or cab

title: Hidden treasure
comment: Planned to go there for last two years.. and never have as i assumed its impossible for a good restaurant to exist in Morden.. well.. it is!

title: Delicious Breakfast!!
comment: If you want to eat the perfect breakfast, just visit H&R Richmond. This Persian style breakfast was mouth-watering.

title: Great food and atmosphere
comment: Great food and atmosphere in a venue that we had meant to try for a long time.

title: Bit pricey
comment: Situated in central Richmond on the road leading up to the park a very small Persian restaurant.

title: Delicious brunch
comment: Had a lovely brunch here. So impressed with the creativity of the menu. Lots of things I had never heard of before. Just looking at everyone else’s plates made it very easy to choose. Will be back.

title: Off the beaten track, we found ...
comment: Off the beaten track, we found this little gem ... packed and we almost left without trying some of the delicious food. However, the single guest moved to a smaller table and so we got a space, lucky we felt! Three different dishes, all of them hit the spot ... also the teas were full of flavour, really nice. Super friendly personnel, knowledgable and good recommendations - thank you! I am certain this wasn’t our last visit, the desserts were looking amazing too, more than enough reason to return.

title: Dolce Vita
comment: Best Italian takeaway I’ve had for years. The quality of cooking and ingredients has translated to takeaways - thank you! You are stars ❤️

title: Lovely little cafe
comment: Lovely little cafe well decorated and very quaint, really tasty food and coffee. However, didn’t have a toilet which is not ideal when drinking coffee!

title: Lovely coffee and cake
comment: I had a double espresso with purple carrot cake, One of the best cake I have had by far for long long time, Thanks R&H cafe.

title: Lovely vegan breakfast
comment: We both had vegan nargesi, a Buddha bowl of fried spinach, pistachio, garlic, walnuts with bread and fruit. It was so nice. I also had a few stuffed dates, also delicious. Great coffee as well and a lovely atmosphere.

title: Went to giftos as a party
comment: Went to giftos as a party of 20, the guys did a great job to accommodate us especially when it was so busy with the everyone making the most of the 50% off.

title: Was delivery
comment: One of the biggest disspointmen of life,would have given -5 ,har it been any way.paid 18 £ for king prawn and got small shrimps ,king fish curry ordered and got cod fish fry

title: Great food
comment: Great service and good as always food is always piping hot and the staff are always friendly will go back again

title: Uncle’s Birthday Meal
comment: Had a great time at Gifto’s restaurant. It was extremely busy the evening we went and we had a waiter called Imran. He made the experience one to remember. His service was 5 star. Honestly get like our table alone had our own personal waiter. The food was great and had an overall lovely time.

title: Delicious food, great service. The best place we’ve been in Richmond
comment: This place has everything going for it.

title: My favourite in Richmond, London
comment: I love my (delicious)breakfast and will always finish with (must-have) cakes and coffee at R&H! Personal favourite cake is one known, lovingly, as Grandpa's choice amongst all other wonderful options - I don't even have a sweet tooth.

title: Cosy environment and delicious food.
comment: I went with a friend to this restaurant on Richmond Hill because I had heard good things about it. The food was unusual and really delicious and the staff friendly and helpful.

title: You of the best brunches!!
comment: Cozy cafe where lovely brunch and cakes are served in Richmond. Perfect for family afternoon out! Highly recommend!!!

title: Amazing gem of a place.
comment: The cosy little cafe with an art gallery upstairs - was such a find. The food was different form anything we've had before and so tasty! Family-run and no booking - get there and be ready to wait but early enough or off-peak hours you'll find a cosy table. And they are dog-friendly.

title: Too cramped
comment: Way too cramped to be enjoyable, took a coffee to take away and my flat white was 75% foam and cake was more expensive than it was worth. Felt like sardines rather than cozy

title: Consistently excellent
comment: Been here many times, always leave happy. Truly lovely people, serving truly lovely food. If I were ever in the market for a personal chef, I would choose the person making the mirza and eat it every day for the rest of my life.

title: Went in for coffee, stayed for lunch
comment: The food in this place was amazing.

title: Amazing homely cafe!!
comment: Easily the best place I’ve been to in Richmond - the food and coffee is amazing and all of the staff are incredibly accommodating and kind, even in the busiest moments! It was amazing to chat with them and they were so happy to take the time to talk to us. It’s like walking into a family home.

title: Delicious breakfast
comment: Very tasty food. Good service. Unfortunately, it is overpriced!

title: SUNDAY BREAKFAST
comment: We got there by 11.30am it was not busy with in half hour it was jamming

title: Great food and excellent service
comment: Food is great with good portion, variety and reasonable price. Shehzaad has always provided excellent, attentive and welcoming service.

title: Taste of Peshawar :- Chapli Kabab,Sekh Kabab
comment: Been here many times but a special occasion today as my friends from different countries has joined us - a lovely meal as usual!

title: Tasty
comment: Dinner was amazing.The food Smell & setting was all perfect.Qadeem Bro is a fantastic Host/ Manager.

title: Hidden Gem!
comment: I have recently discovered a real hidden gem nestled in the leafy suburbia of Teddington. Oozing with charm and offering delicious authentic middle Eastern culinary delicacies. Perfect setting for a lunchtime catch up or for an intimate evening weekend rendevouz and I heard a rumour that another branch is due to open soon in Twickenham. Thank you Sidra and see you very soon :)

title: Tasty food
comment: Great place, tasty food, friendly staff, would definitely recommend and visit again, we ordered Tawwa for 3 people, kheer and green tea at the end was lovely,

title: Mr
comment: One of the Best places ever tried. Came here many times now . But no compromise on quality. If you need consistency come here #Taste_of_Pashwar

title: Lovely small restaurant with delicious food and caring service
comment: This is a very lovely restaurant, focusing on food to go, but they also have a couple of tables. Do not expect a very fancy dining environment, but it is cosy and comfortable. Food is served fast, and exceeding expectations with Mediterranean delicacies. You can bring your own bottle of wine, and they serve it there.

title: The best Restaurant in the
comment: The best Restaurant in the south west . Thanks for the welcoming. Friendly service and enjoyable time ,the best experience we had after hard research.can’t recommend enough. Thanks

title: amazing food
comment: top quality food from a family business, can’t beat it drinks can be a little costly but otherwise well worth the money

title: delicious food
comment: best place to try Lebanese food in south west London

title: Excellent service and delicious
comment: Excellent service and delicious food. I highly recommend heading there. We went for the halloumi wrap which was toasted and came with a side of humous.

title: Delicious, fresh and healthy.
comment: Delicious, fresh and healthy. A wide variety of options for meat eaters, vegetarians and vegans and great value for kiney. Would highly recommend!

title: I popped in for a wrap and
comment: I popped in for a wrap and I was not disappointed. The good was fresh and tasty. I got a fruit berry smoothie on a summer’s day highly recommended

title: Fantastic Lunch Option in Teddington
comment: Lebanese & Syrian grub - v v good versions of what you would expect from this lovely cuisine - great value lunchtime wraps and super mezze - really nice people - one of first times I visited I said I was visiting a friend in hospital who loved that sort of food -they did up a brilliant wooden platter and tho they didn't know me didn't ask for for a deposit for the platter - been back many times since - generally just for a job lot of wraps for the family - lovely food and excellent value - I'll be ordering occasionally in Tier 3 - their baclava id great too

title: Nice surprise !
comment: I had a coffee ,a small pistachio cake and a small takeaway falafel box .great food .all under £10.00 ..lovely fresh dining area and clean loo.

title: Absolutely amazing
comment: Such good tasty food and lovely customer service over the phone, so glad I found this on trip advisor otherwise I never would have found such an amazing Indian

title: This place really is something
comment: This place really is something special. We’ve ordered twice from here now both times different choices but both times the food was just excellent. The chicken melts in your mouth. The lamb kebab for starters is unbelievably good. Delivery is quick too. Cannot recommend this place enough.

title: Outstanding!!!!
